Hava Soğutmalı Su Soğutma Grubu
Klima Santrali
requirements: Yeni başlayan ve sektörde deneyim kazanmak isteyen herkes için uygundur.
courses.description:
Selamlar,
Ben Ümit Kayahan ÖZTÜRK kapatılan hesabımdan sonra tekrar aranızdayım. Kısa sürede yayından kaldırılan eski kurslarımı ve yeni kursları platformda tekrardan paylaşacağım. 10 Yıllık proje ve saha tecrübesini sizlerle paylaşmak istiyorum. Sektörün en büyük sorunu nitelikli personel bulunmamasıdır. Sıfırdan başlayarak ileri seviyeye kadar adım adım izah etmeye çalıştım. Kurs ile ilgili yorumlarınızı en son yapmanızı rica ederim. Geri dönüşlerinizi bekliyorum. Kurs içeriğinden ekleme ve çıkarmaları buna göre yapabilirim.
"Nasıl Yapıldı Seri-7 Otel Proje Tasarımı" Kursu kapsamında sektöre yeni başlamış veya kendini geliştirmek isteyen ve HVAC sistemlerine merak duyan herkese hitap etmektedir.
Bu kurs kapsamında neler öğreneceğiz ? Ya da bu seri sizlere ne öğretecek bunu anlatmak istiyorum.
Diğer kurslarım her bir disiplinin tek tek nasıl tasarlanacağını anlatırken sizlere yeni bir proje geldiği zaman nasıl tasarım yapabilirsiniz bunu anlatmaya çalışacağım. Multi disiplinlerin bir arada nasıl çözümlenebileceğini anlatacağım.  Projelerin hikayesi nedir nasıl sistemler kuruluyor bunlara da deyineceğim.
Bu proje Ankara'da yer alan bir otel binasının proje tasarımını izah etmektedir. Sıhhi tesisat kapsamında kurulan tüm sistemler ve bu sistemlere neden ihtiyaç duyuldu neler tasarladık onu anlatacağım.
Yangın söndürme tesisatında bir teknik hacim kurgusunun yapılması, sulu tip sprinkler nasıl tasarlanıyor bunları izah ettim.
Havalandırma tesisatında rotorlu tip ısı geri kazanım sistemleri, otelbölümlerinin havalandırılması, proje çizimi ve kurgu detayları izah edilmiştir.
Isıtma ve soğutma tesisatında 4 borulu fan coil cihazı kullanılmıştır. Tüm akış şemasının üzerinden tek tek geçilmiştir.
Kurs ile ilgili örnek şemalar, örnek projeler kaynaklar bölümünde yer almaktadır. Buradan indirebilirsiniz.  Sorun yaşayanlar mail adresim üzerinden bana ulaşabilir.
Kursa ait tüm çizimler, föyler kaynaklar bölümüne eklenmiştir.
Kursun faydalı olması dileği ile,
target_audience: Yeni mezunlar
Sektör Çalışanları
Üniversite Öğrencileri
Mekanik Tesisat Sektörüne İlgi Duyan Herkes

courses.title: Arquitectura y diseño Montessori
courses.bio: Aprende a diseñar espacios Montessori
objectives: Diseñar espacios funcionales y armónicos aplicando los elementos fundamentales del diseño Montessori.
Aplicar estrategias de diseño interior Montessori en ambientes educativos como aulas.
Distinguir los principios clave de la arquitectura Montessori
Desarrollar un proyecto final completo de un cuarto Montessori
requirements: No hay requisitos bases para aprender.
courses.description:
¿Eres arquitecto, diseñador de interiores, docente o padre/madre interesado en crear espacios que respeten el desarrollo natural del niño? Este curso te brinda las herramientas esenciales para aplicar los principios de la arquitectura y diseño Montessori de forma práctica y consciente.
A lo largo del curso, descubrirás cómo transformar ambientes comunes en espacios funcionales, armoniosos y adaptados a las verdaderas necesidades infantiles. Aprenderás a integrar elementos clave como mobiliario a escala, iluminación adecuada, materiales sostenibles y distribución libre, todo bajo la filosofía Montessori.
Este curso es para ti si:
Quieres especializarte en diseño Montessori como arquitecto o interiorista.
Buscas aplicar estos conceptos en tu hogar, escuela o emprendimiento educativo.
Te interesa el diseño consciente, funcional y centrado en el niño.
No necesitas experiencia previa en Montessori, solo pasión por el diseño y por mejorar la vida de los niños a través del espacio.
El índice de este curso es el siguiente:
MODULO 1: INTRODUCCIÓN A LA ARQUITECTURA MONTESSORI
Presentación
¿Qué es la metodología Montessori?
¿Qué es la arquitectura Montessori?
MODULO 2: ELEMENTOS MONTESSORI
Mobiliario Montessori
Iluminación Montessori
Paleta de colores Montessori
Materiales naturales y sostenibles
Distribución Montessori
MODULO 3: DISEÑO INTERIOR MONTESSORI
Aula Montessori
Flexibilidad del espacio.
MODULO 4: DISEÑO EXTERIOR MONTESSORI:
Espacios al aire libre.
UNIDAD 5: PRESENTACIÓN FINAL
Diseño de un cuarto Montessori
target_audience: Ideal para estudiantes de diseño, arquitectos, padres de familia y educadores.

courses.title: تعلّم الخط المغربي المبسوط
courses.bio: تعلم أساسيات الخط المغربي المبسوط مع الخطاط العالمي سامي الغربي
objectives: الخط المغربي المبسوط
التمكن من تطويع القلم و الحرف
requirements: إلمام باللغة العربية
courses.description:
السلام عليكم و رحمة الله و بركاته
مرحبا بكم أيها الأحبة في دورة تعلم الخط المغربي المبسوط مع الفنان التشكيلي و المصمم و الخطاط العربي العالمي سامي الغربي من تونس الخضراء.
قمت بتصميم هذه الدورة الشيقة لتمكنك من وضع أولى خطواتك بثبات في مجال الخط العربي المغربي المبسوط ، مع التدريب و المراس و التمرين المستمر سوف تتمكن من تطويع الحرف و القيام بأعمال فنية خطية تشكيلية رائعة و مميزة.
سنستعرض خلال هذا الكورس أهم مبادئ النجاح في مجال الخط العربي بأسلوب الخط المغربي المبسوط الذي يمتاز بالعفوية و جمالية خاصة ، مع التركيز على القواعد و القياسات بأسلوب سهل و مُيَسَّر مع فسح المجال للتلميذ(ة) إضفاء روحه الفنية في العمل الفني.
أنجزنا هذا الكورس لكل شغوف بمجال فن الخط العربي الذي أصبح يحضى بإهتمام كبير من قبل الشرقيين و الغربيين على حد سواء .
الخط العربي يجلب لصاحبه الاحترام و التبجيل كما يتيح مجالات واسعة للعمل في مجال التصميم و المشاركة في المعارض الفنية.
انضم اليوم لهذا الكورس و تابع الاستثمار في هذا الفن الرائع و تذكر و أن الخط العربي للإمام كمال و للعالِم جلال و للفقير مال.
تعلم قوام الخط ياذا التأدب
فما الخط إلا زينة المتأدب
فإن كنت ذا مال فخطك زينة
و إن كنت محتاجًا فأفضل مكسب
بالتوفيق للجميع إن شاء الله
target_audience: المهتمون بفن الخط العربي و تطوير قدراتهم الفنية

courses.title: Lighting Design and Human Behavior
courses.bio: Identifying the Methods and Functions
objectives: Identify the appropriate lighting design for a certain environment.
Get information on the basics of lighting design.
Understand how lighting works and how each design concept benefits the public in terms of safety and security.

Start with Lecture 1: Psychological Influences of Lighting: Fear and Safety

requirements: You should be able to use a PC at beginner level.
An interest in lighting design and sustainable lighting systems would be a great advantage.
courses.description:
Lighting design plays a great role in how people perceive and react to outdoor spaces. This webinar will provide an overview of the psychological and physiological aspects of light, social responses to light and the relationship of light to health and well-being.
Participants will learn about how people use visual and non-visual pathways of light that influence behavior and mood. The webinar will discuss a range of examples where the non-visual aspects of lighting design is can be used to create value through influencing occupant behavior and perception.
target_audience: Individuals who are interested in outdoor and indoor lighting design.
Individuals who are interested in sustainable designs
Individuals who are interested in landscaping.
Professionals with an interest in trending lighting design concepts.

courses.title: Interior Design Masterclass: Light Your Home
courses.bio: Creating beautiful and practical lighting solutions for your owned or rented home
objectives: Understand the key principles of home lighting
Explore the creative potential for lighting in your own home
Transform home lighting within both owned and rented accommodation
Calculate how much light you need in the various rooms in your home
Understand how to apply lighting differently in different rooms of the home
Create drama and impact using lighting effects and the shape of light
Choose light bulbs based knowledge and understanding of their technical performance
Complete a sketch lighting plan for a room in your home
Control lighting creatively with particular moods and scenes in mind

Learning About Lighting: General, Task, and Accent (or Feature) Lighting
Optional Exercise One - Looking at Lamps
Optional Exercise Two - Finding Inspiration Online
A Demonstration of Painting with Light
Optional Exercise Three - Finding Inspiration in Real Life
The Class Project: Draw a Plan from Survey Notes
Conclusion: Short-Term Solutions and Rented Homes
Conclusion

requirements: No prior knowledge is needed: you will learn everything you need to know.

You'll either need architect’s drawings for your home, or the following materials (so you can follow lessons on drawing your own scale plans): tape measure, squared paper, pencil, eraser, clipboard or a book to lean on, fine-tipped pens in different colours
To complete the class project on paper you’ll need: a ruler, masking tape, tracing paper (or kitchen baking paper - non-waxed, non-silicon), plain paper, a yellow pencil crayon or highlighter pen

If you use CAD software regularly, you could draft plans digitally. Once you have a scale plan, the class project for the class could be completed in programmes like PowerPoint, Keynote, Procreate, Photoshop, Illustrator. Please note, the class does not include instruction on how to use these software programmes - the digital option is for regular users of the software mentioned.
To watch the class and read the notes, study time is approximately 2-3 hours. If you'd like to create a sketch lighting plan for a room in your home, you should allow a total study time of 2-3 days.
Good organisational skills, to follow lessons on drawing to scale and creating a lighting plan.
courses.description:
This lighting design masterclass shares everything you need to know to light your home efficiently and beautifully.
It explains all the key principles of residential lighting, and takes you through the practical process of producing a fully-resolved lighting proposal.
It provides advice for every room in your home, and suggests both permanent and temporary installations - solutions for home owners, and for home renters.
THIS CLASS COVERS:
Types of lighting - general, task, accent, decorative and kinetic
Layering lighting - applying light to dramatically model 3D surfaces and texture
Inspirational and creative lighting - painting light into your home
Colour temperature - how to get consistent colour in lighting
Colour rendering - make the colours in your home sing out
Shape of light - lines, pools, washes, spots, and how to achieve these effects
Quantifying fittings - calculating light for all the different rooms of the home
Lux, Lumen, foot-candles - metric and imperial measurements of lighting
Light fittings - different types of lighting, including the hidden budget breakers
Lamp choice - the many specifiable qualities of different light bulbs
Controlling light - switches, circuits and dimming
Surveying a room - how to record the dimensions of your home
Creating a lighting plan - clearly communicate a complete scheme of lighting
Drawings and documents - simple advice on the key parts of professional lighting proposals
The class project is to make a sketch lighting plan for a room in your home.
WHY YOU SHOULD TAKE THIS CLASS
Great lighting is the best gift you can give your home: it is transformational.
What’s the point of making a beautiful home if you don't show it off. Good lighting is life-enhancing; it anticipates your needs, and supports daily routines by putting light in exactly the right place, and it creates beautiful, dramatic, creative, and relaxing environments.
I'm Julia, I am an interior designer, and a design lecturer. For more than 20 years I’ve split my career between design practice - including lighting design - and teaching at London’s top design school. My classes bring practical and clear step-by-step guidance, along with professional tips, tricks and short-cuts.
Your home is equal parts gallery, laboratory, theatre, and retreat, and it’s good lighting that helps you to create and switch the scenes.
This class assumes no prior knowledge and starts from the very beginning. It includes simply-explained technical elements; the principles you must know to get the very best out of your home lighting scheme.
Information is given in both metric and imperial measurements.
HOW TO TAKE THIS CLASS
The running time for the class videos totals nearly two hours. When you pop in exercises and you work to create a project (along with reading the class notes) you should actually allow at least 2-3 study days if you want to produce a bespoke sketch lighting plan for a room in your home.
As a first step, start by watching the whole class all the way through to the end. This will help you understand the scope of the class, and the context of the exercises and project.
Then, taking it slowly, start again at the beginning and watch again. This time stop to complete the short exercises.
Finally, when you feel you’ve digested the materials, when you feel comfortable, start work on your live project.
So, make sure to give yourself generous time for each stage, at least a couple of hours to survey your space, and a few more hours for 'painting with light' exercises, or for drafting a sketch lighting plan.
It would take an experienced lighting designer a day or so to work up a scheme for your home, so give yourself ample time - this way you’ll get the very best outcomes for using light to transform your home!
target_audience: Home builders and renovators - anyone remodelling their home
Home renters - anyone who wants uncompromisingly good interiors using products they can own
Architecture and design students - learn to take a professional approach to residential lighting
Clients of architects and designers who want to understand and discuss finer details
Anyone who wants to improve their home lighting - even in small ways
Service providers and suppliers wishing to offer additional value to their clients and customers

courses.title: Corso di Allestimento negozi
courses.bio: Come allestire vari tipi di negozi in autonomia
objectives: Come allestire un negozio
Come avviare un negozio
Conoscere come meglio allestire un locale in base al tipo di attività
Come mettere in luce il punto vendita

Progettare lo spazio con la luce: Tipi di luce, illuminare l'area di vendita, metodi di esposizione..........
Mettere in luce il punto vendita e la ve: Struttura architettonica dell'edificio e illuminazione esterna ..........

requirements: Non è richiesto alcun pre-requisito
Essendo un corso base, chiunque può partecipare
courses.description:
Se siete interessati a conoscere i trucchi ed avere consigli sul come allestire ed avviare il vostro negozio nel modo più congeniale all’attività che svolgete, questo corso fa per voi!
Il corso di allestimento negozi è suddiviso in 10 lezioni facilmente comprensibili a tutti, non sono richieste competenze specifiche, perché mira a farci osservare gli spazi commerciali che ci circondano e gli oggetti che occorrono per creare un dato effetto.
Al termine del corso sarete in grado di conoscere l’iter procedurale per aprire la vostra nuova attività ed il modo migliore per renderla accattivante nei confronti dei vostri clienti.
In particolare date le prime nozioni generali, ma da non sottovalutare, verranno fatti degli approfondimenti su singole attività commerciali quali:
- il negozio di abbigliamento
- il minimarket
- il bar
- il ristorante
- il negozio di scarpe e borse
- il negozio pet shop
PROGRAMMA – CORSO DI ALLESTIMENTO NEGOZI
MODULO 1: Introduzione
- Excursus storico del negozio: dalla bottega al centro commerciale
- Il design per lo spazio di vendita

MODULO 2: L’importanza del colore
- La teoria del colore
- Cromoterapia

MODULO 3: Progettare lo spazio con la luce
- Impianto elettrico
- Quanta luce occorre e di che tipo
- Illuminare l’area vendita
- Metodi di esposizione e flessibilità spaziale
- Spostamento della clientela nel punto vendita
- Classificazione delle zone di vendita in funzione dei livelli espositivi
- Illuminare i camerini

MODULO 4: Mettere in luce il punto vendita e la vetrina
- Mettere in luce il punto vendita
- Struttura architettonica dell’edificio e illuminazione esterna.
- L’illuminazione per l’insegna del punto vendita
- La vetrina
- Suggerimenti Pratici

MODULO 5: Il negozio di abbigliamento

MODULO 6: Il minimarket

MODULO 7: Il bar

MODULO 8: Il ristorante

MODULO 9: Il negozio di scarpe e borse

MODULO 10: Il pet shop
target_audience: Titolari di una attività commerciale
Appassionati di allestimenti

courses.title: Blender: Learn how to create realistic furniture unit
courses.bio: Step by step we will learn how to create simple furniture unit from start to finish with Marwan Hussein.

Modeling: Blender modeling chest of drawers section p 1
Blender modeling chest of drawers section p 2
Texturing, Rendering and post processing: Blender modeling chest of drawers adding the materials p 3
Blender_ Render and post processing part 4

requirements: Download Blender 3 and, that's it.
courses.description:
Hello everyone in this course we will learn how step by step creates a furniture unit with Blender 3, it's very important to learn how to create your 3d models by yourself, maybe you can sell them or use them in your project, so it's very important to know how to use the software in the right way to create your object.

In this course we will go through modeling, unwrapping, adding materials and lights after that we will render the scene and make the final image, not just that, we will go to the compositor section to make the final post-processing to tweak the colors and have a nice final result.

This is all about the course in general, but about the details, we have a lot of details.
In the modeling section, we will learn how to extrude, how to use knife cut, how to use inset and a lot of tricks that help you to speed up your modeling ability.
we will learn as well how to use Bevel modifier with harden normals check box to fix the object shading and get the best result of shading, and there is a lot of stuff in the modeling section you can check them.
After that, we will unwrap the objects with a fast method to get fast results to make the materials and apply the textures correctly on the objects.

In the lighting section, we will learn how to add the lights and how to use HDRI images to illuminate the scene.
We will add a nice background with a transition from Black to white colors to give our result more interesting looking.

When all of that is done we will render the scene with cycles and learn how to get a nice shoot, after that when everything is done we will render the scene and open the compositor to add the final effect to get a better render result.
And here we reached the final part of this course, the whole course will be less than 2 hr, I hope you enjoy it.
target_audience: This course is for student want to learn to create furniture by their own, and for student that want to create 3D models.

Muy recomendable si ya trabajas en el sector de la decoración y el interiorismo y deseas actualizar y mejorar tus conocimientos teórico-prácticos para progresar en tu trabajo.

courses.description:
Experto en Diseño de Terrazas y Pequeños Jardines Domésticos
Convierte en Profesional del Diseño, Decoración, Organización y Planificación de Espacios Ajardinados Exteriores
Instructores: Arq. Álvaro García y Arq. de Interiores Mariangeles Fernández  Actualizado: Octubre del 2025  Estudiantes: +7.100 Requisitos previos: Ninguno


Descripción del Curso:
Convierte cualquier exterior en un oasis con “EXPERTO en Diseño de Terrazas y Pequeños Jardines Domésticos”. En Udemy aprenderás a unir diseño de terrazas, paisajismo sostenible y decoración para crear espacios funcionales, bellos y fáciles de mantener. Dominarás zoning, hardscape/softscape, selección de plantas por clima y orientación, riego e iluminación exterior, privacidad, sombra (toldos/pérgolas) y mobiliario para balcones, patios y áticos. 100% online, a tu ritmo y desde cualquier país, apto para todas las edades y niveles.
Finaliza el curso con una metodología completa: del briefing al planting plan, memoria de materiales, presupuesto y cronograma de obra; con criterios de xerojardinería, especies nativas, drenaje y mantenimiento bajo. Construirás un portfolio profesional con antes/después que revalorizan la vivienda y enamoran a clientes. Optimizado para SEO: diseño de terrazas, pequeños jardines, iluminación exterior, riego eficiente y paisajismo doméstico. Inscríbete hoy y obtén ventaja competitiva con certificado de finalización en Udemy.
El curso es adecuado para personas que les guste la decoración y la jardinería y vean en ello una oportunidad profesional de su agrado. Con esta formación podrás conocer las herramientas imprescindibles para el diseño y concepción de pequeños jardines y terrazas en el espacio que precises. En estos ambientes las plantas serán las protagonistas de un espacio verde único, atractivo y agradable.  Este curso puede enseñar a los alumnos cómo diseñar y planificar patios, jardines y otros espacios al aire libre, incluyendo la elección de plantas y materiales adecuados. Este curso enseña a los estudiantes cómo diseñar hermosos espacios al aire libre que complementen y se integren con el diseño interior de la casa.
Durante el programa formativo se expondrá todo lo necesario para que el jardín diseñado coincida con la intencionalidad que vayan a conseguir, permitiendo conectarse con la naturaleza, poniendo en valor la flora, haciendo más eficientes y sostenibles los recursos del medio.
Este tipo de espacios ajardinados, exteriores, nos permiten conseguir un espacio físico y temporal con nosotros mismos, disfrutando de un ambiente sano en el que liberar mente y cuerpo, donde podamos calmarnos, relajarnos, expresarnos y compartir nuestro tiempo más preciado. Además nos permitirá conectarnos con la naturaleza. Ahora tienes tu oportunidad de diseñar, organizar, ejecutar y mantener tu jardín. Durante la formación aprenderás los principios y claves para conseguirlo, de un forma sencilla y amena.


Itinerario Formativo:
Introducción a Udemy
Bienvenida al EXPERTO en Diseño de Terrazas y Pequeños Jardines Domésticos
Historia, Tendencias Actuales y Referencias
Diseño y Organización del Espacio Interior
Mobiliario, Iluminación y Atrezzo

Maquetación, Presentación y Documentación Técnica de Nuestras Propuestas de Diseño
Medición y Presupuesto de la Ejecución Material del Proyecto
Creación de un CV y Portfolio Creativo Impreso y Digital
Consideraciones sobre Seguridad y Salud en las Obras
Recursos para el Alumno del Experto en Diseño y Planificación de Proyectos de Diseño de Terrazas y Pequeños Jardines Domésticos
Emisión del Certificado de Finalización del EXPERTO en Diseño de Terrazas y Pequeños Jardines Domésticos
Objetivos del curso:
Dominar una metodología completa para diseño de terrazas y pequeños jardines: análisis de clima y orientación, zoning funcional (estar, comedor, huerto urbano), equilibrio hardscape/softscape, selección de especies nativas y sustratos, xerojardinería, riego eficiente, iluminación exterior, privacidad y sombra (pérgolas, toldos). Aprenderás drenaje y nivelaciones, mobiliario y textiles outdoor, criterios de bajo mantenimiento y estilo. Finalizarás con planting plan, planos de riego/iluminación, memoria técnica, presupuesto y cronograma, además de un portfolio con antes/después listos para clientes.


Salidas profesionales:
Diseñador/a de exteriores residenciales, paisajista doméstico, consultor/a de terrazas y áticos, stylist outdoor para fotografía inmobiliaria y home staging exterior, asesor/a en retail de jardinería y mobiliario, y project manager de pequeñas obras exteriores. Oportunidades como freelance o en estudios de interiorismo y reformas, promotoras y alquiler vacacional. Potencia tu empleabilidad global con un perfil práctico, sostenible y certificado en Udemy.


Dirigido a:
Estudiantes y profesionales de diseño de interiores, arquitectura y paisajismo, así como propietarios de pisos con balcón, patio o terraza que quieran crear un oasis funcional y bello. También para jardineros/as y manitas que buscan profesionalizar su servicio con criterios de paisajismo sostenible. Apto para todos los niveles y edades, 100% online, a tu ritmo y desde cualquier país, con procesos claros y plantillas aplicables a terrazas pequeñas y medianas.


Metodología de Aprendizaje:
Recuerda que este curso incluye lecciones en vídeo fullHD con audio de estudio (compatible con TV, PC, Mac, tablet y smartphone), artículos didácticos, actividades, animaciones, ilustraciones, proyectos paso a paso, recursos descargables, links de interés, acceso de por vida, certificado de finalización, tutorización online, y una exclusiva comunidad de aprendizaje privada que nos ayudamos aportando nuestras experiencias en el foro de comunicación del curso.
La modalidad de este curso te permite que empieces y acabes cuando tú quieras, marcando el ritmo de la clase según tu disponibilidad. Puedes volver a visualizar lo que te interese, saltar el contenido que ya domines, hacer preguntas, resolver dudas, compartir tus proyectos... Puedes elegir ver todas las lecciones de forma secuencial (lineal) y aprovecharlas al máximo la formación, pero también puedes decidir ver este curso como una guía de referencia.
Las clases están claramente organizadas en secciones y lecciones, puedes decidir visualizar solo las clases que te resulten más importantes según tus necesidades formativas. La mayoría de las lecciones son independientes para que puedas comprender los conceptos de cada lección sin tener que ver las lecciones anteriores del curso.
Para seguir el programa formativo propuesto no ser requieren conocimientos previos, ya que la formación se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0. El curso está orientado a aquellos creativos que quieran ampliar sus skills (habilidades) y conocer múltiples trucos, consejos, recursos y recomendaciones, de la mano de los instructores Álvaro García y Mariangeles Fernández. Además la formación disponen de acceso automático al contenido, sin limitación de tiempo, disponibilidad 24/7 (24 horas al día los 7 días de la semana), sin caducidad y con garantía de devolución.
Con esta formación disfrutarás aprendiendo desde dónde quieras, sin tener que desplazarte, sin horarios, con quién quieras, según tus necesidades y disponibilidad. Aprenderás con un instructor avalado por miles da alumnos satisfechos en todo el mundo (comentarios certificados). Conocerás las técnicas, métodos, trucos y flujos de trabajo de este sector creativo. El docente te transmitirá su sabiduría y conocimientos con pasión a la vez que las explicaciones concisas, claras, sencillas y con un enfoque profesional en cada clase. Podrás conseguir un  certificado homologado personalizado y firmado por tu instructor en cada formación. De está forma podrás compartir tu título en tu portafolio, currículo, en redes sociales...
Con la alta definición de los vídeos (vídeo fullHD y audio de estudio) conseguirá no te perder detalle. Podrás ver las clases las veces que requieras para recordar y perfeccionar tus habilidades como diseñador. Tendrás la posibilidad de preguntar, pedir opinión y ayuda al instructor, además de compartir tu experiencia de aprendizaje con los demás alumnos del curso, tan apasionados como tú, repartidos por todo el mundo. Seleccionamos cuidadosamente los contenidos y producimos cada curso para garantizar una experiencia de aprendizaje online integral y de la máxima calidad.


¿A qué esperas?, este curso es ideal para ti, atrévete a convertirte en un experto y expresa tus ideas de la forma que siempre has deseado. Adelante, nos vemos dentro de la formación ;)
target_audience: Estudiantes de diseño, arquitectura y paisajismo que quieren dominar diseño de terrazas y pequeños jardines con enfoque práctico y sostenible.
Propietarios de pisos con balcón, patio o ático que desean crear un oasis funcional: sombra, privacidad, riego eficiente e iluminación exterior.
Profesionales de interiorismo y reformas que buscan ampliar servicios con paisajismo doméstico, xerojardinería y selección de especies nativas.
Hosts de alquiler vacacional y home staging que quieren revalorizar terrazas y patios con diseño atractivo, bajo mantenimiento y grandes fotos.
Freelancers y jardineros que desean proyectos rentables: planting plan, hardscape/softscape, presupuestos y gestión de pequeñas obras.

courses.description:
Pada materi Interior Design 101 ini, akan disampaikan tentang materi mendasar atau pengantar tentang Desain Interior yang dapat dipelajari oleh mahasiswa Desain Interior maupun jurusan lain, bahkan untuk pengguna umum yang ingin mengetahui dasar-dasar Desain Interior yang dapat digunakan untuk penerapan dalam pengkayaan pembelajaran Desain Interior maupun pengembangan bisnis dan usaha, terutama yang berkaitan dengan profesi desainer interior atau profesi terkait, seperti visual merchandiser atau 3D artist model.
Materi ini terbagi menjadi beberapa tahap, sesuai dengan langkah-langkah dari dasar sehingga lanjutan, yaitu :
Mempersiapkan konsep dasar
Mempelajari elemen perancangan
Menyusun programming
Mengetahui peran profesi Visual Merchandiser
Mempersiapkan Presentasi Proyek
Dari kelima topik besar tersebut, akan dibagi menjadi beberapa sesi pembelajaran, agar peserta dapat mempelajari secara langkah demi langkah sehingga akhirnya mendapatkan pengetahuan secara komprehensif dari langkah-langkah tersebut.
Tujuan dari mempelajari materi ini adalah mendapatkan pemahaman tentang proses lengkap yang mendasari pekerjaan seorang desainer interior yang sedang membantu klien mewujudkan keinginan dan harapannya, terutama untuk klien yang bergerak di bidang retail dan bisnis terkait dengan jasa maupun produk. Pembekalan seorang desainer interior untuk menjadi entrepreneur atau wiraswasta di bidang desain memerlukan pengkayaan tambahan dari berbagai disiplin ilmu selain interior, antara lain kewirausahaan, desain komunikasi visual maupun informatika. Kewirausahaan untuk memperkenalkan jenis-jenis usaha dan trend yang berkembang pada keilmuan terkait, desain komunikasi visual untuk menambah pengetahuan tentang packaging dan cara-cara memperkenalkan usaha pada klien serta informatika untuk mengetahui pengetahuan UI/UX serta teknologi yang dibutuhkan untuk mendukung bisnis yang terkait.

courses.description:
It is believed that among the ancient civilizations, Egyptians were the first civilization to introduce the aspect of Interior design in their day to day lives.
And all through the course of civilizations, Interior design was a subject of profound interest in many civilizations, like the Indian Vaastu Shastra and the Chinese Feng Shui.
Plenty of Scientific research have also shown that when a person is surrounded by good interior design, he can live a much happy and productive life.
There are many elements to a good interior design, but there is one major element without which none of the other elements can bring its qualities to the fore, and that is Lighting.
And in this course, I will cover this element or the lighting aspect of the interior design.
Below is an outline of what i am going to teach you in a step by step process in this course.
I will teach you
·         How to read and understand architectural drawings
·         How to use the tools required for your lighting design project, which is dialux evo
·         How to construct individual floors, basements, balconies and roof tops
·         How to add internal and external materials & textures to your floors
·         How to add furniture and objects to your floor designs
·         How to use the lighting design principles and lighting standards like IESNA, CIE to determine the lux/foot candles level of a particular task area
·         How to choose and add light fixtures into dialux evo, keeping the lighting standards of the task area in mind
·         How to run lighting calculations, as per your customized needs
·         How to document your calculations and results, and export them as reports, which are meant to be sent to vendors or clients.
·         How to create beautiful ray trace renders of your finished projects after lighting calculations.


And once you are through all these steps, you will be able to do the lighting design of your home or office like a professional lighting designer.
So join me along to add the skill of lighting design in your arsenal.
target_audience: This is a great course for for all levels of individuals Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced with an interest in Lighting Design principles and tools.
This course would also be of great value for interior design students, professionals, artists, hobbyists.
This course would also be of great value for DIY Enthusiasts interested in doing the lighting design of their home and office.

courses.title: Photoshop for Interior Designers
courses.bio: quick strategies for busy professionals
objectives: 1-Rendering layouts Autocad layouts are not presentation material, they are most of the time cold, technical and often, hard to understand for clients. Renderin
2-Photoshop for Interior Design – A Professional Standard of Presentation Using a combination of CAD software and Photoshop, you can create successful presentat
3-Adobe Photoshop is a program that allows you to edit many different types of images, from photographs to original drawings and artwork. Photoshop is used by a
4-Special Effects Photoshop can also be used to also add colour, finishes and effects to your visuals.  The images above show how a basic line drawing can be re

Eiliminating content: fiiling selection with the content aware option

requirements: not requirements
courses.description:
This course is dedicated to Interior Designers and students that wish to improve their presentation skills in a quickly and efficient way.
Every chapter will introduce the student to fundamental techniques that will help to elevate the quality of their presentation material that without doubt will have an instant impact in colleges and clients.
We will start by learning how to eliminate and addition elements, furniture, lighting fixtures, etc to an existing compositions. We also will learn how to create and utilize patterns to create different finishes such as wallpaper, tile or wood flooring. I addition, the student will learn how to change colors of different surfaces such as furniture. Finally the student will learn how to render layouts from autocad. We all know how cold an autocad drawing can be and how difficult it is to sell an idea using cad drawing.
Photoshop for Interior Designers introduces step-by-step techniques for interior designers to successfully use Adobe Photoshop to visually communicate their design concept through graphic images and to illustrate design ideas through a visual thinking process. Instructions show how to integrate hand drawings and freehand sketches into digital drawings. Basic and advanced techniques presented include creating floor plans and elevations, preparing perspectives or isometric drawings, and applying materials, lightings, background and entourages for interior design presentations.
target_audience: Interior Designers, Students, Designers

courses.title: Sketchup 2021/2022 - Atelier N° 1
courses.bio: Apprenons à modéliser des objets simples avec couleur et texture, création d'une scène finale avec rendu réaliste
objectives: Etant seul, je vais tout gérer moi-même
A part du temps, c'est la seule chose dont j'ai besoin
Aucuns risques pour ce projet
La conception, la réalisation et le montage vidéo a été fait par mes soins

Sketchup - Outils de base - Suite: Gestion de l'outil arc de cercle ou arc 2 points
Sketchup - Création du jouet en bois: Création du jouet en bois + couleur
Gestion des textures du jouet en bois
Sketchup - Création de la scène finale: Mise en place des objets + importation d'objets de la communauté 3D Warehouse
Gestion de la scène avec un moteur de rendu
Conclusion: Conclusion

requirements: Aucun prérequis sur le logiciel Sketchup Pro, par contre il faudra acheter la license ou utiliser celle-ci pendant 30 jours
courses.description:
Bienvenue dans cette nouvelle formation qui portera sur l'apprentissage du logiciel Sketchup 2021/2022.

Chose importante: Sketchup étant un logiciel Payant, mais vous pouvez télécharger la version d'essai de 30 jours afin de pouvoir jouer avec les différentes fonctions et outil de ce superbe logiciel,
Ce logiciel est destiné aux architectes, cuisinistes, décorateurs d'intérieurs, menuisiers, impression 3D,et ainsi de suite, les possibilités sont titanesques.

Qu'allons nous apprendre dans cette formation, on verra au départ l'installation du logiciel, puis la configuration de celui-ci, ensuite on étudiera quelques outils de base afin de pouvoir créer des objets de base, pour finir on fera la conception d'un jouet en bois afin d'y intégrer la couleur et textures.

En premier, on verra comment gérer :
Installation et Login
Aperçu de l'interface
Gestion de la scène et module Préférences
Outils de base (ligne, rectangle, cercle)
Exercice - création d'une chaise et table
Outils de base (sélection, rotation, groupe, tirer/pousser, suivez-moi, arc de cercle)
Création d'un jouet en bois
Mise en place des textures du jouet en bois
Histoire de continuer la formation, on continuera à apprendre à modéliser des objets comme :

Des tabourets de  différents types
Des chaises et table d'enfants
Viendra ensuite la création de la scène finale, où l'on placera différents objets, on verra donc pour finir

Création des murs, du sol, et des plinthes
Mise en place des différents objets
Importation d'objets sur la communauté web 3D Warehouse
Mise en place de la caméra avec la gestion des scènes et styles
Rendu final sous le moteur de rendu Twilight Render 2
Et voilà c'est fini pour le premier atelier, je ne peux que vous conseiller de vous entrainer à faire pleins d'objets à taille réelle, afin de bien maitriser les outils de base.

Le prochain atelier, on fera des objets plus complexes et continuera à apprendre les outils et fonctions sur Sketchup.
Bien entendu, si vous avez des questions à poser, je me ferais un plaisir de vous répondre,

Bonne formation et bon apprentissage,
target_audience: Ce cours s'adresse aux débutant(e)s souhaitant commencer à comprendre les bases du logiciel Sketchup afin de créer pour commencer des objets à taille réelle.

courses.title: UE5 Animation Interior & Furniture: Build Rooms Step by Step
courses.bio: Learn how to animate an interior in the Unreal Engine: where furniture and details gradually appear from an empty room
objectives: Learn how to create spectacular interior animations from scratch: from an empty room to a complete furnishing with furniture and decor.
Master the work with Unreal Engine 5 and 3Ds Max to assemble scenes and step-by-step animation of objects in the interior.
Get the in-demand skills you need in design studios, 3D Visualizers, and brand marketing content.
You will understand how to create trending animations for TikTok, YouTube, presentations and portfolios that attract the attention of customers.
Master the style of Home Designer and create a video where the interior is assembled piece by piece: furniture, decor, light - everything comes to life.

Step 1. Preparation: 1. Setting up units of measurement in 3Ds Max
2. We remove unnecessary items and clear the stage of debris.
Step 3. Transfer the project to Unreal E: Importing a scene into the Unreal Engine (DataSmith)
Step 4. Lighting in Unreal Engine: 1. Directional Light. Overview of lighting tools
2. Point Light. Overview of lighting tools
3. Spot Light. Overview of lighting tools
4. Rect Light. Overview of lighting tools
5. Sky Light. Overview of lighting tools
6. HDRI BackDrop. Overview of lighting tools
7. Sun and Sky. Overview of lighting tools
8. Illumination implementation (2 ways)
9. PostProcess. Detailed setup
10. Lumen Settings
11. We fix the inverted normals. Reimport
12. Background outside the window (360°)
Step 5. Shaders. Creating realistic mate: 7. Blend MTL. Mixing materials through a mask
Step 6. Create Animation: 3. Movie Render Queue. Settings and rendering
4. Setting up Actors for complex animations
6 Secant Range of Slice Material Unreal Engine

requirements: Must have experience working in 3ds Max + Corona/Vray. Ideally, you should have experience working with interiors, an understanding of lighting, camera angles, and an artistic appreciation. The higher the starting point, the easier and more productive the training will be.
When working in the UE, the main role is played by the graphics card. It must be from Nvidia and must support RTX and CUDA technologies. Video memory - at least 6 GB.
RAM: the critical minimum is 32 GB
Processor: can be ranked 2nd in terms of impact. It works in conjunction with a video card, and it can either fully unleash its potential or not fully. You can use both Intel and AMD.
courses.description:
Have you ever seen how the interior is literally assembled before your eyes?
First, an empty room, and then walls, furniture, light, textiles, and details appear.…
And as a result — a full-fledged, stylish space, as in the best Home Designer videos.
This course will teach you how to create such animations from scratch.


This course is suitable for anyone who wants to learn how to make spectacular interior animations for portfolios, advertising, YouTube and TikTok. You'll learn a professional approach, even if you've never done animation before.




You will learn:
— how to build a stage correctly in 3ds Max and Unreal Engine;
— how to animate the appearance of objects and cameras step by step;
— how to create spectacular camera angles and light accents;
— how to make videos for YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, portfolio and customers.
— how to structure animation, set the pace and build a logical sequence of objects' appearance.


These skills are in demand in studios, designers, visualizers, and marketers.
Such videos boost sales, gain views, and inspire trust among customers.


You don't need to be an animation expert — everything is explained easily and step by step.
You just take a scene and assemble it into a dynamic video.


As a result, you will be able to:
— animate interiors of any complexity.;
— work with cameras, transitions, and set design;
— and create professional content that surprises and inspires.


Join us and learn how to transform empty spaces into exciting interior stories. Start right now and create your first interior video.
target_audience: For 3D Visualizers who want to master spectacular interior animation and reach a new level of project presentation.
For interior and graphic designers who need to create presentations, portfolios and videos for social networks or customers.
For freelancers and design studio employees who are tasked with creating selling videos but lack animation skills.,
For architects and students of architectural universities who want to learn how to assemble dynamic scenes with furniture and decor.

requirements: Orta Düzeyde 3ds Max Bilgisi
courses.description:
3ds Max'te Mutfak | Bölüm 1/2
A'dan Z'ye Mutfak Tasarım ve Modelleme


Sadece "güzel görünen" değil, aynı zamanda teknik olarak doğru, fonksiyonel ve imalata uygun 3D mutfaklar modelleyerek uzmanlığınızı bir üst seviyeye taşımak ister misiniz?
Bu eğitim, genel modelleme tekniklerinin ötesine geçerek, endüstri standardı Neufert gibi mimari referansları temel alan profesyonel bir iş akışı sunar. AutoCAD'deki teknik çizimden yola çıkarak, 3ds Max içinde her detayı düşünülmüş, ergonomik ve gerçekçi bir mutfak projesini sıfırdan nasıl modelleyeceğinizi adım adım öğreneceksiniz.


ÖNEMLİ NOT: Bu kurs, iki bölümlük bir serinin SADECE modelleme odaklı ilk bölümüdür (1/2) ve ORTA DÜZEY 3ds Max bilgisi gerektirir. Bu kursta render veya malzeme (kaplama) öğretilmemektedir. Modelleme temelini burada attıktan sonra, projenizi fotogerçekçi görsellere dönüştürmek için serinin ikinci bölümü olan "Profesyonel Mutfak Render ve Görselleştirme (2/2)" kursumuza devam etmeniz tavsiye edilir.


Bu Eğitimde (Bölüm 1/2) Neler Öğreneceksiniz?
Proje Hazırlığı: AutoCAD (DWG) kat planlarını analiz etme, temizleme ve 3ds Max'e doğru ölçekte aktarma.
Neufert Standartları: Ergonomi ve fonksiyonellik için Neufert prensiplerini kullanarak mutfak yerleşimi ve modüler dolap tasarımı.
Detaylı 3D Modelleme: Standartlara uygun dolap gövdeleri, kapaklar, çekmeceler, kulplar, menteşeler, tezgah ve süpürgeliklerin hassas modellemesi.
Ankastre ve Ekipman: Lavabo, batarya, fırın, ocak, davlumbaz gibi ekipmanların gerçekçi modellemesi.
Mimari Detaylar: Sahneyi tamamlayan pencere, kapı ve diğer mimari elemanların doğru tekniklerle oluşturulması.
Bu Kurs Kimler İçin İdeal?
İmalata uygun, detaylı mutfak modelleri oluşturmak isteyen Mimarlar ve İç Mimarlar.
Mutfak mobilyalarını 3D ortamda doğru ölçülerle tasarlamak isteyen Endüstriyel Tasarımcılar.
Portfolyoları için yüksek detaylı, teknik olarak doğru mekanlar modellemek isteyen 3D Sanatçılar.
AutoCAD becerilerini 3ds Max modelleme ile birleştirmek isteyen Mühendisler ve Teknik Çizerler.
Bu Kursu Benzersiz Kılan Nedir?
Profesyonel İş Akışı: AutoCAD'den 3ds Max'e entegre çalışmayı öğretir.
Standartlara Uygunluk: Neufert gibi referansları kullanarak sadece estetik değil, fonksiyonel tasarımlar yapmanızı sağlar.
Detay Odaklı Eğitim: Sizi genelcilikten uzaklaştırıp, ince detaylarda ustalaştırır.
Uygulamalı Proje: Baştan sona komple bir mutfak projesi ile pratik deneyim kazandırır.
Mutfak görselleştirme yolculuğunuzun ilk ve en önemli adımı olan profesyonel modelleme becerilerini kazanmak için bu kursa (1/2) katılın!


Eğitmen Hakkında: Emre Timur
Mimar, yazar ve eğitmen Emre Timur, 15 yılı aşkın mesleki tecrübesiyle tasarımdan yapay zekaya uzanan geniş bir yelpazede eğitimler vermektedir. Udemy'de 35.000'den fazla öğrenciye ulaşan ve Bestseller rozetine sahip olan Timur, yayımlanmış dokuz kitabın yazarıdır. Eğitim felsefesi; zamanınıza değer veren, tempolu, küresel kalitede ve en güncel bilgileri sunarak size sadece bir programı değil, o programla neler yapabileceğinize dair özgüven kazandırmayı hedefler.

courses.title: Everything Small Home Design
courses.bio: Small Home Living at its Best
objectives: Great design tips/techniques for every room in your home, including your outdoor area
How to make your small rooms appear bigger
Best storage hacks for your small home
Learn where to go "big" and where to go "small" when selecting furnishings
How to strategically use color/patterns in your home
Understand the most effective ways to divide open spaces
How to select the best lighting fixtures for each room of your home
How to most effectively use open shelving in your home
requirements: Pen/Pencil
courses.description:
Are you challenged on how to most effectively design your small room or home?
Do you feel constrained functionally and/or aesthetically by your smaller space?
Do you feel paralyzed for fear of making the wrong design decisions in your small home?

If you answered yes to any of these questions, this course is here to help!
Whether you live in an apartment, condo, flat, townhouse, loft, or single family home, this course has been designed to give you the right tips, techniques, and approaches to make the most out of your space both functionally and aesthetically.
**PLEASE NOTE:  This course does NOT include "tiny house" design/decoration.  As stated above, this course is for those who live in smaller homes, such as apartments, condominiums, flats, townhouses, lofts, or single family houses.**
This course covers a wide range of topics related to small home design and decoration, including, but not limited to:
4 pro ways to make a room look bigger and the 4 biggest mistakes to avoid in your small home
Design techniques and approaches for every room in your small home, including your outdoor space
How to make your small rooms appear bigger
Where to go "big" and where to go "small" when selecting furnishings
Best storage hacks for your small home
Great "double duty" pieces
How to strategically use color and patterns in your home
Best approaches for effectively dividing open spaces
Excellent lighting techniques for every room of your home
How to most effectively use open shelving in your home
You will also be guided through two hands-on activities in this course.  First, you will have the opportunity to immediately apply your learning in three guided small room case studies.  Then, using a customized planner that I created especially for this course. you will create a comprehensive room design for one of your own small rooms, as nothing will help you to cement the concepts and techniques you learned in this course more quickly than immediately applying them to a real world situation.
In short, my goal with this course is to help you fall in love with your small home by showing you the techniques and approaches that interior design professionals regularly use to create small home magic.  I look forward to seeing you in the course!

IMPORTANT NOTES:
If you are interested in taking most or all of my courses, I have a recommended order in which to watch them (although it's certainly not required).  I would start with "How to Design a Room in 10 Easy Steps" because most of my other courses are in-depth classes of the concepts touched on in this 10 step class.  Following the 10 Step Course, I suggest moving on to "How to Use Color Like a Pro", followed by "How to Work with Interior Design Styles Like a Pro", then "How to Use Lighting Design to Transform your Home", and finally "Design is in the Details".

My other five courses, "How to Use Minimalist Interior Design to Live your Best Life",  "Use Eco-friendly, Sustainable Design to Improve Your Life", "How to Design Your Dream Kitchen", "How to Design Your Dream Bathroom", and "Everything Small Home Design" are all stand alone classes on specialty topics within interior design, and therefore, can be taken in any order.

Please be aware that this course, or any of my courses, is not intended to provide all of the knowledge needed to become a professional interior designer.  As with any professional field, there is a significant amount of education and/or experience that is needed to achieve competency in this field.  My intention with these courses is to provide some solid foundational knowledge to assist either those individuals interested in "DIY" interior design to work on their own projects more effectively, or to provide supplemental education to both interior design students and professionals.
target_audience: This course is ideal for anyone who wants to learn how to great design techniques for small homes
This course is also ideal for interior design students and professional interior designers who are new to their field

In this video Feng Shui basics course, I will show you how I arrange each of these rooms: the entrance way and front door, the living room, family room and master bedroom, a child’s bedroom, a teenager’s room and a guest bedroom, plus the kitchen, bathroom and home office. requirements: No previous experience in SketchUp is required
Basic knowledge in 3D modelling
courses.description:
Welcome to Designing Building, Interiors and Furniture with SketchUp course. This is a comprehensive project based course where you will learn how to design and model building exteriors, interior spaces, and custom furniture using SketchUp. This course is a perfect combination between architecture and interior design, making it an ideal opportunity for practicing your design skills while improving your technical knowledge in 3D modeling and spatial planning. In the introduction session, you will learn the basic fundamentals of SketchUp, such as getting to know its use cases, key features, and AI integrations in design workflows. Then, in the next section, you will learn to draw basic shapes in SketchUp, specifically, you will learn how to draw lines, rectangles, circles, and polygons. Additionally, you will also modify dimensions and set exact measurements to ensure proportionate shapes and well structured designs. Afterward, you will learn to create and modify 3D objects by converting 2D shapes into 3D models with the Push and Pull tools. You will use move, rotate, scale, and mirror tools for precise adjustments and organize objects into groups or components for efficient model management. Once we have learnt the basic skills, then we will start designing building exteriors using SketchUp, we will create realistic architectural models with accurate proportions and detailing. We will begin with a simple one story house, adding essential elements like windows and a front door, before progressing to a modern office building with large glass panels, incorporating structural components and materials for a more professional look. Following that, we will design interior spaces, arranging furniture and decor to create functional and visually appealing layouts. We will start with a bedroom setup, carefully positioning a bed, nightstands, and a wardrobe to optimize space and ensure a comfortable design. Then after that, we will design a small office setup, placing a desk, chair, and bookshelves to create an efficient and productive workspace while maintaining proper spatial organization. In the next section, we will design furniture in SketchUp, modeling custom pieces with precise dimensions and realistic textures. We will start by creating a basic chair with a flat seat and a straight backrest, ensuring proper structure and proportion. Then, we will also design a wooden dining table with four matching chairs, focusing on balance, stability, and aesthetics. Last but not least, at the end of the course, we will bring our designs to life in virtual reality, enabling us to assess proportions, spatial arrangements, and details in an immersive 3D environment. By doing so, it will help us identify potential design flaws and make necessary refinements before finalizing our project.
Before getting into the course, we need to ask this question to ourselves, why should we design building exteriors and interiors using SketchUp? Well, here is my answer, SketchUp is an intuitive and versatile tool that allows us to create detailed 3D models quickly and efficiently, making it ideal for architects, interior designers, and urban planners. Beyond just using the software, mastering design skills is equally important, as it sharpens our ability to plan layouts effectively, optimize space utilization, and create functional yet visually appealing environments.
Below are things that you can expect to learn from this course:
Learn the basic fundamentals of SketchUp, such as getting to know its use cases and key features
Learn how to draw basic shapes like line, rectangle, circle, and polygon in SketchUp
Learn how to create 3D objects in SketchUp
Learn how to use move, rotate, scale, group, and component
Learn how to import pre made 3D model from SketchUp 3D Warehouse
Learn how to design one story house using SketchUp
Learn how to design office buildings using SketchUp
Learn how to design bus stop using SketchUp

Learn how to design bunk bed using SketchUp
Learn how to design kitchen interior using SketchUp
Learn how to design home office using SketchUp
Learn how to design bathroom interior using SketchUp
Learn how to design chair and sofa using SketchUp
Learn how to design dining table using SketchUp
Learn how to display 3D design in virtual reality

courses.description:
Nada acontece por acaso!
Se você está aqui lendo, provalvelmente é porque quer mudar de carreira e transformar sua paixão em decoração em uma profissão. Imagine agora você projetando ambientes e ainda ganhando com isso?
Prepare-se agora para aprender o conteúdo certo para desenvolver idéias e elaborar projetos através do aprendizado prático e eficaz. A partir de agora, você vai deixar sua insegurança de lado e dar um passo em direção ao seu sucesso!
Apresentamos a você o nosso emocionante mini curso de Designer de Interiores, uma oportunidade única de mergulhar no universo do design e transformar espaços com estilo e personalidade.
Se você sempre sonhou em criar ambientes deslumbrantes, cheios de harmonia e beleza, este curso é perfeito para você. Com a orientação dos melhores profissionais do ramo, você aprenderá as técnicas mais atualizadas e as tendências mais quentes do design de interiores.
Ao longo deste mini curso, vamos explorar os principais elementos do design de interiores, desde a escolha dos materiais até a criação de layouts funcionais e esteticamente agradáveis. Você descobrirá como combinar cores, texturas, mobiliário de maneira inteligente, para criar espaços únicos e impactantes. E também, iluminação para dar vida aos seus projetos. Aprenda a utilizar a luz de forma estratégica, realçando pontos focais e criando ambientes envolventes e aconchegantes.
target_audience: O Mini Curso Design de Interiores para Iniciantes é destinado a pessoas que desejam aprender sobre design de interiores e decoração, independentemente do nível de conhecimento prévio na área. Ele é adequado para iniciantes que desejam iniciar uma carreira no design de interiores, bem como para aqueles que desejam decorar suas próprias casas ou espaços pessoais.

courses.title: Use Minimalist Interior Design to Live your Best Life
courses.bio: Minimalist Interior Design Deconstructed
objectives: Create a minimalist interior design plan for any room of their home.
Identify the main principles of minimalist interior design.
Apply successful decluttering techniques to their own home.
Understand what makes a great focal point for a room.
Understand how to use negative space as a design element.
Understand how to incorporate harmony and balance in their interior design.

Welcome and Introduction: Introduction and Course Overview: Is Minimalist Interior Design Right for You?
Frequently Asked Questions
3 Easy Ways to Begin your Minimalist Interior Design Journey Today!
What is Minimalist Interior Design Anywa: Why Minimalist Interior Design? Less is More
Is Minimalist Design Just Another Way of Saying Contemporary Design?
Main Principles of Minimalist Interior Design
Activity #1 - A Study of Minimalist Rooms - Can you Spot the Principles?
Let's Get Started: The Art of Declutteri: Start with the Vision: What Does Your Minimalist Home Look Like?
My Favorite Decluttering Techniques for the Home
How to Deal with your Favorite Collections, Sentimental, and Just in Case Items
Everything has its Place: Home Organization is Essential
Activity #2 – Let's Begin Working on your own Minimalist Room
Now Let’s Design your Minimalist Dream H: Choose your Most Calming Interior Design Color Scheme
Determine the True Furniture Essentials for Your Room
Activity #3 – Select your Color Scheme and True Essentials
Include Some Negative Space in Your Interior Design
Activity #4 – Create your Focal Point and Negative Space
Add the Finishing Touches to Your Minimalist Room
Achieving Perfect Harmony and Balance in Your Minimalist Room
Activity #5 – Complete your “Minimalist Interior Design Plan”
Conclusion: Additional Minimalist Resources
Conclusion: Thank you for Joining Me on this Minimalist Journey!
Bonus Lecture - Do You Love Interior Design?

requirements: Pen/pencil
Scratch paper
courses.description:
Do you want to learn how minimalist interior design can help to create mental clarity, calmness and increased productivity?
Do you want a home that is beautiful, stress-free, and easy to clean?
Do you love minimalist design but are worried that your room will look cold and bare, rather than stylishly pulled together?
If you answered yes to any of these questions, then I encourage to check out this course!  Minimalist interior design is a hot design trend right now, and for good reason.  In this course I will show you exactly why it's so popular today, but more importantly, I will help you translate this beautiful and chic design style into your own home.  By the end of this class, you will be able to:
Use 3 Easy Ways to Begin your Minimalist Journey Today!
Understand why Minimalism is such a Popular Design Trend
Articulate the Main Principles of Minimalist Interior Design
Utilize my Favorite Decluttering Techniques
Effectively Deal with Favorite Collections and Sentimental Items
Choose a Calming Color Scheme
Create a Focal Point
Use Negative Space as a Design Element
Achieve Balance and Harmony in a Room
In this course, you will be encouraged to print out a template that will allow you to create your own minimalist interior design plan for a room of your home, via activities through which I will guide you throughout this course.
This is a great course for all levels of individuals who are interested in learning more about how to use minimalist interior design to improve their homes and their lives.
Join me for a journey into the beautiful world of minimalist interior design!
IMPORTANT NOTES:
If you are interested in taking most or all of my courses, I have a recommended order in which to watch them (although it's certainly not required).  I would start with "How to Design a Room in 10 Easy Steps" because most of my other courses are in-depth classes of the concepts touched on in this 10 step class.  Following the 10 Step Course, I suggest moving on to "How to Use Color Like a Pro", followed by "How to Work with Interior Design Styles Like a Pro", then "How to Use Lighting Design to Transform your Home", and finally "Design is in the Details".

My other five courses, "How to Use Minimalist Interior Design to Live your Best Life",  "Use Eco-friendly, Sustainable Design to Improve Your Life", "How to Design Your Dream Kitchen", "How to Design Your Dream Bathroom", and "Everything Small Home Design" are all stand alone classes on specialty topics within interior design, and therefore, can be taken in any order.

Please be aware that this course, or any of my courses, is not intended to provide all of the knowledge needed to become a professional interior designer.  As with any professional field, there is a significant amount of education and/or experience that is needed to achieve competency in this field.  My intention with these courses is to provide some solid foundational knowledge to assist either those individuals interested in "DIY" interior design to work on their own projects more effectively, or to provide supplemental education to both interior design students and professionals.
target_audience: This course is for anyone looking to create a simplified, cohesive interior design for their home

courses.title: SketchUp - From Floor Plan to 3D Model
courses.bio: Kitchen, apartment or tiny house - plan, develop and visualize your ideas in SketchUp!
objectives: Basic tools for working in SketchUp
Import and scale an existing floor plan
Create a 2D plan in SketchUp
Build a 3D model from a 2D floor plan
Customize the model with objects from the 3D Warehouse
Make your model appealing with colors and textures
Visualize and present your kitchen, apartment or house in an engaging way

Introduction and first steps: How to get to SketchUp Free
Building the 3D Model: Apply a Style and Export Images

requirements: Basic knowledge of SketchUp is helpful but not a must!
courses.description:
Would you like to remodel your apartment, redesign your kitchen, or build your dream home? Then this is the course for you: Using SketchUp Free, the web-based and free version of the popular 3D modeling tool, we will recreate a realistic living situation from scratch in just under 1.5 hours.
This is not a complete SketchUp course, but a comprehensive exercise to get to know how to work quickly with the simple CAD program on a concrete example, so that you can start your own projects with it.
Instead of a lot of theory, we will start immediately with a practical approach and import an existing floor plan as a template (you are also welcome to work with your own floor plan) and bring it to the right scale. On top of that we will build our 2D plan, including furniture, dimensions and labels. We will also work with tags to bring order and clarity to the plan.
From the finished 2D plan, we'll move on to building our 3D model. Here we will mainly practice working quickly in SketchUp: How we build different layers in minutes, from the walls to the furniture, and how you can save yourself a lot of work with the pre-built models from the 3D library and customize them as you like. Last but not least, you want the model to look good: You'll learn how to use colors and textures, and different ways to present your model in different styles in an appealing way.
This course is for you if you have little or no SketchUp knowledge and want to get some hands-on practice with floor plans and modeling.


What are the benefits of SketchUp?
No other software allows you to build impressive 3D models so quickly that instantly convey the spatial impact of your project. The advantages of SketchUp:
there is a free, web-based version
it's probably the easiest of all CAD programs to use
you are immediately in 3D and see your results
There is a huge library of pre-built 3D models
you can do a lot with it - nothing you can't design with it!


What do you need?
Not much! With the following tools you can start 3D modeling right away:
a computer mouse with clickable mouse wheel (trackpad works too, but mouse is easier and faster ;)
not a must, but handy: a big screen


Have fun ;-)
target_audience: Anyone who wants to plan a room, apartment or house starting from the floor plan
Anyone who wants to quickly model and visualize their own four walls or an interior design project in 3D
Anyone who wants to gain first, practical (free) SketchUp experiences on an architectural example

courses.description: This class is for beginning kitchen designers to advanced. You must have access to the 2020 Kitchen Design software to learn the program.  The focus is on cabinets, and we will also demonstrate the basics on countertops, however we will not delve into detail on countertops.  If you have found yourself trying to figure out how to do things in 2020 and frustrated, this course is for you.  I try to make it as standard and simple as possible.  We go over the following areas in this class.  wall drawing, window placement, door placement, ceiling height, terms, cabinet descriptions, cabinet types, using crown molding, buildup of Crown molding and more.  I try to address all the things that I have learned after 15 years in kitchen design and how to draw it in 2020 design software.  My goal is to teach a student at any stage things that will help them in their occupation as a Kitchen Designer.  If you are pursuing this as a career field, I can train you in the program beyond this course and there will be another courses focused on advanced design capabilities in 2020 as well.  My desire is that you find this class enjoyable and that it helps to get you to where you are confident in design and 2020 software.
target_audience: Cabinet and Kitchen Designers or those wishing to enter it as a career.

Para la realización de este curso no vas a necesitar el equipo informático más potente del mercado, ya que el software empleado en la formación se encuentra perfectamente optimizado y su uso es muy fluido en todo tipo de equipos, tanto en PC como en Mac.

El más importante requisito para realizar este curso es el entusiasmo y la motivación por aprender nuevas habilidades que aumenten tus competencias profesionales.
courses.description:
Ejecución y Planificación de Obras y Reformas en Viviendas
Aprende a Diseñar y Organizar un Proyecto de Reforma y Edificación desde tu Idea hasta su Ejecución
Instructores: Arq. Álvaro García, Arq. Lucía Fernández, Arq. Int. Mariangeles Blanco. Actualizado: Octubre del 2025  Estudiantes: +6.000 Requisitos previos: Ninguno


Descripción del Curso:
Domina la planificación y ejecución de obras y reformas en viviendas con un método claro: definición de alcance, presupuesto, cronograma, licencias, contratación de proveedores, control de calidad y gestión de riesgos. Aprenderás a coordinar gremios, optimizar tiempos y costes, y documentar con mediciones, pliegos y actas de obra para entregar resultados profesionales.
En Udemy, 100% online, global y para todos los niveles, avanzarás a tu ritmo con plantillas, checklists y casos reales. Saldrás preparado para dirigir tu proyecto de reforma de principio a fin, negociar con contratistas, evitar sobrecostes y retrasos, y aumentar el valor de la vivienda con decisiones seguras y una gestión de obra eficiente.
La decoración de interiores no abarca solo decoración, sino también la Ejecución de Obras y Reformas. Se trata de crear espacios, ambientes, desarrollando todo un discurso empleando diferentes elementos decorativos, acorde a un gran número de factores y puntos a evaluar por parte del decorador/a de interiores.
El profesional de la decoración de interiores es capaz de analizar, investigar y proyectar diseños ajustados a las necesidades y a los espacios, además de dirigir equipos multidisciplinares en el ámbito de su profesión.
Como paso preliminar a la proyección del diseño y decoración, se analizan los factores o los objetivos funcionales de uso, mediante un estudio detallado del espacio, siempre teniendo en cuenta las peticiones del cliente. Por otra parte, la decoración de interiores requiere necesariamente estar al día de las últimas tendencias, modas y novedades de este campo sobre los que fundamentar los procesos creativos.
En este curso aprenderás esta fascinante disciplina capaz de crear proyectos de decoración y diseño de interiores impresionantes. A través de esta  formación relacionada con la decoración de interiores lograrás adquirir todos los conocimientos además de las habilidades necesarias para desenvolverte en este ámbito e incrementar tus oportunidades laborales. Entre las principales profesiones relacionadas con la decoración de interiores así como el diseño de interior podrás aprender todo acerca de las reglas del interiorismo.

Objetivos del curso:
Dominarás la planificación y ejecución de reformas de principio a fin: definición de alcance y presupuesto, mediciones y pliegos, cronograma (Gantt), licencias y contratación de gremios. Aprenderás control de calidad, gestión de riesgos, coordinación en obra, seguimiento de costes/plazos y cierre con actas y postventa mediante plantillas y checklists.


Salidas profesionales:
Podrás desempeñarte como jefe de obra residencial, project manager de reformas, presupuestista/medidor, coordinador de contratistas o consultor para promotoras, inmobiliarias y particulares. Aumentarás tu empleabilidad, mejorarás ROI y tiempos, y ofrecerás entregas documentadas y verificables.


Dirigido a:
Estudiantes y profesionales de arquitectura, interiorismo, ingeniería y arquitectura técnica, contratistas y autónomos; propietarios e inversores que desean gestionar su reforma con criterio. Formato Udemy, 100% online, global y para todos los niveles, con enfoque práctico y resultados listos para implementar.


Metodología de Aprendizaje:
Recuerda que este curso incluye lecciones en vídeo fullHD con audio de estudio (compatible con TV, PC, Mac, tablet y smartphone), artículos didácticos, actividades, animaciones, ilustraciones, proyectos paso a paso, recursos descargables, links de interés, acceso de por vida, certificado de finalización, tutorización online, y una exclusiva comunidad de aprendizaje privada que nos ayudamos aportando nuestras experiencias en el foro de comunicación del curso.
La modalidad de este curso te permite que empieces y acabes cuando tú quieras, marcando el ritmo de la clase según tu disponibilidad. Puedes volver a visualizar lo que te interese, saltar el contenido que ya domines, hacer preguntas, resolver dudas, compartir tus proyectos... Puedes elegir ver todas las lecciones de forma secuencial (lineal) y aprovecharlas al máximo la formación, pero también puedes decidir ver este curso como una guía de referencia.
Las clases están claramente organizadas en secciones y lecciones, puedes decidir visualizar solo las clases que te resulten más importantes según tus necesidades formativas. La mayoría de las lecciones son independientes para que puedas comprender los conceptos de cada lección sin tener que ver las lecciones anteriores del curso.
Para seguir el programa formativo propuesto no ser requieren conocimientos previos, ya que la formación se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0. El curso está orientado a aquellos creativos que quieran ampliar sus skills (habilidades) y conocer múltiples trucos, consejos, recursos y recomendaciones, de la mano de los instructores Álvaro García y Lucía Fernández. Además la formación disponen de acceso automático al contenido, sin limitación de tiempo, disponibilidad 24/7 (24 horas al día los 7 días de la semana), sin caducidad y con garantía de devolución.
Con esta formación disfrutarás aprendiendo desde dónde quieras, sin tener que desplazarte, sin horarios, con quién quieras, según tus necesidades y disponibilidad. Aprenderás con un instructor avalado por miles da alumnos satisfechos en todo el mundo (comentarios certificados). Conocerás las técnicas, métodos, trucos y flujos de trabajo de este sector creativo. El docente te transmitirá su sabiduría y conocimientos con pasión a la vez que las explicaciones concisas, claras, sencillas y con un enfoque profesional en cada clase. Podrás conseguir un  certificado homologado personalizado y firmado por tu instructor en cada formación. De está forma podrás compartir tu título en tu portafolio, currículo, en redes sociales...
Con la alta definición de los vídeos (vídeo fullHD y audio de estudio) conseguirá no te perder detalle. Podrás ver las clases las veces que requieras para recordar y perfeccionar tus habilidades como diseñador. Tendrás la posibilidad de preguntar, pedir opinión y ayuda al instructor, además de compartir tu experiencia de aprendizaje con los demás alumnos del curso, tan apasionados como tú, repartidos por todo el mundo. Seleccionamos cuidadosamente los contenidos y producimos cada curso para garantizar una experiencia de aprendizaje online integral y de la máxima calidad.


¿A qué esperas?, este curso es ideal para ti, atrévete a convertirte en un experto y expresa tus ideas de la forma que siempre has deseado. Adelante, nos vemos dentro de la formación ;)

Movable and Built-in Furniture Drawings

requirements: Being interested in interior design
courses.description:
In this course, we will be sharing a café project which has been applied Teamwork Architects. We will share all the 2D AutoCAD drawings, 3D render visuals and the 3Ds MAX model that we have used while creating these visuals with you in our course documents and bringing them into your use. Our AutoCAD files are including survey plan, schematic plan, application drawings and detail drawings. Besides, our model is a ready to render scene which is including all the materials and rendering, lighting and camera settings.
Within the context of our project, we start with the interior architectural project phases and we detail that process in terms of our café. We talk about the importance of the first meeting that you would have with your employer, important points of surveying stage and share the survey images and drawings with you on the project development phase. On the conceptual project phase, we specify the factors that would affect our design decisions while organizing the café and we will be talking about the planning process. On the application phase, we are explaining the content of the application drawing package and detailing this phase by referring to the café project.
On the last part of our course, we are sharing the photographs from the site which is a running business at the moment and has been built according to our projects.
Our goal is to give information about the parameters that you should take into consideration while preparing an interior café project and making a contribution to your development on design. See you on our course.

دبلومة Rhino 3d الخاصه بمجال ال CNC.
- لو انت شغال فى مجال ال CNC سواء ( روتر- ليزر- أخشاب ليزر- معادن بلازما - 3d printing)  .
-  قمنا بدراسة وتحليل المشاكل اللي بتواجة صناعة CNC فى مصر وكانت الأسباب :
- ناس كتيرعندها مكن ليزر وخشب ومش قادرة توصل أنها تحترف التصميم الى يقدر من خلاله يطلع تصميمات جديدة وبسرعة عشان عامل الوقت مهم جدا فى مجالنا.
- وعشان كده تلاقى معظم المصممين بيشتغلوا بنفس التصميمات والموضوع ده بيزود المنافسة وللاسف اللجوء لتخفيض سعر الشغل عشان يقدر ينافس السوق لأن التصميم الى معاه مع كل الناس.
- وعشان مجالات السوق مختلفه فالاول كان فيه اكتر من برنامج تصميم عشان تقدر تعمل التصميم المطلوب، وللاسف عشان تتعلم كل البرامج دي فبتاخد وقت كبيرعشان تقدر تاخد الخبره في كل البرامج ديه غير كمان التكلفه وفي الاخر صعب انك تحترف كل البرامج ديه غير بعد فتره كبيره جدا.
- والمشكله الكبيره واللي تقريبا قابلت كل الناس مش بس في مجال ال CNC انه ياخد كورس وفي الاخر ميعرفش يطلع شغل بيه وفي الغالب بيكون نتيجة ان المدرب دارس البرنامج نظريا فمش هيقدر يخليك تطلع شغل.
- قدرنا نوصل لحل المشاكل ديه مع اقوي برنامج للتصميم برنامج الرينو لانه ببساطه برنامج معمول لكل التصميميات الصناعية.
- مع كورس الرينو هتوفر وقتك وفلوسك ومجهودك وتعمل شغلك كله على برنامج واحد وتعمل تصميمات جديدة ومختلفه بمنتهى السهولة.
- مع كورس الرينو هتقدر تشتغل 2d و 3d وشغل الاويما للاخشاب والبراميترك و4axis و 5axis وهناخد أكثر من 40 تطبيق مختلف.
- في كورس واحد فقط كل احتياجاتك في ال CNC.

courses.title: Transform Your Space, Transform Your Life
courses.bio: A Guide to Creating Your Best Home Using Feng Shui Inspired Design
objectives: You will have a space that they're proud of, that makes their daily lives run smoothly, that supports their higher aspirations.
You will have the confidence and know-how to redesign other spaces.
requirements: A room to fix up

courses.description:
Do you live in a home that is messy, disorganized, dysfunctional, or just plain ugly? Do you feel embarrassed, frustrated, or fed up every time you come home?
Most people just don’t have the time or the resources to sink into a full-on interior design degree or even to hire someone for a one-off design that can be hit-or-miss.
And although there’s so much information online about design, it’s too darn overwhelming for most people to sort through it all and figure out how to apply what’s out there to their own homes.
That’s why I created Transform Your Space, Transform Your Life, an online class that walks you step by step through my feng shui-inspired design method. If you are ready to take back control of your space, you’ll want to learn this method that combines modern design theories and age-old feng shui principles to help you create a home that looks and feels great.
No more overwhelm. No more shame. No more design paralysis.
With the guidance of my class, your home will become what you've always wished for: your soft landing place, your getaway, the center of your vibrant social life, the place where your new business blooms or family grows, or whatever else you dream of for your best life.
target_audience: Beginner and intermediate home improver
DIY enthusiasts
People frustrated, embarrassed, or overwhelmed by their less-than-ideal homes
People who seek to live their best lives and want a space that supports their aspirations
