courses.description:
EXPERTO Diseño y Planificación Proyectos Comerciales Retail
Convierte en Profesional del Diseño de Interiores, Decoración y Planificación de Proyectos Comerciales Retail.
Instructores: Arq. Álvaro García y Arq. Lucía Fernández  Actualizado: Octubre del 2025 Estudiantes: +4.700 Requisitos previos: Ninguno


Descripción del Curso:
Impulsa tu carrera con “EXPERTO Diseño y Planificación Proyectos Comerciales Retail”, una formación online en Udemy diseñada para convertir espacios en puntos de venta rentables. Aprenderás a unir estrategia, interiorismo comercial y visual merchandising para aumentar tráfico, permanencia y conversión; a planificar layouts eficientes, iluminación impactante y recorridos de cliente memorables; y a seleccionar materiales, paletas y branding que transmitan valor. El enfoque es práctico y orientado a resultados, con ejercicios inspirados en escenarios reales de tiendas, restaurantes, showrooms y boutiques. Es un curso apto para principiantes y profesionales, pensado para todas las edades y niveles, y 100% online para aprender a tu ritmo y desde cualquier país.
Al finalizar, tendrás competencias clave que demanda el mercado: planificación integral de proyectos comerciales, lectura del comportamiento del consumidor en tienda, criterios de sostenibilidad y gestión estética-funcional del espacio. Potenciarás tu portfolio profesional, mejorarás tu empleabilidad y podrás presentar propuestas con mayor seguridad y claridad. Esta formación te posiciona en búsquedas como curso de diseño de interiores comercial online, retail design en español y planificación de proyectos comerciales, ayudándote a destacar en Google y ante clientes. Inscríbete hoy y obtén la ventaja competitiva de un perfil especializado en Retail con certificado de finalización en Udemy.
El retail o comercio minorista, es una industria que genera millones de empleos alrededor del mundo y con la que la mayoría de personas ha tenido contacto como cliente, es una industria que crece y se transforma constantemente involucrando tecnología de comercio y nuevas formas de entender a sus clientes objetivos para poder satisfacer sus necesidades de forma asertiva. Este curso se centra en el diseño de espacios comerciales eficaces y atractivos que potencien las ventas y mejoren la experiencia del cliente.
El curso de interiorismo comercial, visual y retail design prepara a los alumnos para obtener los conocimientos y las capacidades necesarias para diseñar, planificar y dirigir proyectos globales de interiorismo comercial, consiguiendo así mejores objetivos comerciales y mayores ventas. Las herramientas y técnicas te permitirán diseñar una tienda, el hall de un hotel, un gimnasio, etc.
El interiorismo comercial es una práctica creativa que analiza la información de un espacio abierto al público, establece una dirección, marca un diseño y elabora documentos gráficos de comunicación y de construcción. Además, tiene en cuenta la marca, los estilos, la funcionalidad, el espacio, el cliente, las bases del diseño y la imagen en conjunto.
Con este curso podrás conocer la estructura y el funcionamiento del mundo de las tiendas de retail, abarcando sus principales áreas, funciones y objetivos. El funcionamiento de las tiendas desde el ángulo de exhibición y logística. Con la finalidad de entender la definición del espacio de la tienda, el valor para el cliente en el autoservicio, la organización de las góndolas y cómo funciona la clusterización para retail.


Objetivos:
Formar a los alumnos en el campo específico del interiorismo comercial.
Mostrar el proceso de diseño y el plan de trabajo para llevar a cabo un proyecto.
Desarrollar en ellos la capacidad de tratar el espacio y los distintos materiales.
Aportar conocimientos en tendencias, imagen corporativa, mobiliario y diseño.
Crear la capacidad para fusionar funcionalidad y diseño introduciendo los conocimientos del campo del Visual Merchandising.
Aprender a diseñar espacios que respondan a las necesidades de cada cliente y que lo diferencien de la competencia.
Trabajar la creatividad desde un punto de vista empresarial y de desarrollo de proyectos de interiorismo.
Estimular al alumno a crear nuevas tendencias de venta y posicionarlo en un marco global competitivo.


Itinerario Formativo:
Introducción a Udemy y al Curso de Diseño y Planificación de Proyectos Retail.
La Iluminación en los Proyectos Retail.
El Color en el Diseño de Proyectos Retail.

Diseño 3D de Proyectos Retail.

Objetivos del curso:
Dominar una metodología integral para diseñar y planificar espacios comerciales rentables, transformando un briefing en concepto, layout, recorrido del cliente, visual merchandising, iluminación, materiales y presupuesto. Aprenderás a justificar tus decisiones con KPIs de retail (tráfico, conversión, ticket medio), a presentar propuestas convincentes y a documentar obra y montaje. Terminarás con portfolio listo para clientes, plantillas descargables y un enfoque orientado a resultados medibles.


Salidas profesionales:
Interiorista comercial, store planner, visual merchandiser, project manager de retail, consultor de experiencia de compra, escaparatista o diseñador de tiendas, restaurantes y showrooms. Podrás trabajar como freelance especializado, en estudios de interiorismo, cadenas y franquicias, agencias de branding o equipos in-house de marcas omnicanal en sectores como moda, belleza, tecnología, hogar y restauración. Potencia tu empleabilidad global con un perfil práctico y certificado en Udemy.


Dirigido a:
Estudiantes y profesionales de diseño de interiores, arquitectura, decoración y marketing, así como emprendedores y propietarios de tiendas que buscan optimizar su punto de venta. Apto para todos los niveles y edades: no necesitas experiencia previa; si ya trabajas en el sector, actualizarás procesos y criterios con una visión estratégica. 100% online en Udemy, para aprender a tu ritmo y desde cualquier país, con un enfoque directo, aplicable y listo para llevar a obra.

courses.title: Material Trends For Interiors
courses.bio: A detailed course on bricks, concrete, wood products & finishing, glass, metals etc. (Hindi + English)
objectives: Building materials- bricks, concrete, stone & tiles
Wood products- plywood, mdf, particle board uses with finishes.
Various other materials used for finishing surfaces -metal, glass, wallpaper.
Nature of materials -natural and artificial both.
How it can be used in our designs safely and aesthetically.
requirements: No Requirement
courses.description:
In this will explore the general information about materials which are used in interior design, in this course will familiarize the student with the properties of bricks, stones, concrete, wood, fabric, etc.
Conventional materials would be discussed with an outline of its manufacturing or procuring process, properties, applications and simultaneously the alternative materials replacing them. A number of engineered materials have come up in use in the building industry as a substitute of the original material like engineered wood replacing wood or AAC and flash bricks replacing clay bricks. A coverage on such alternate materials would be included. Finishes as in floors and walls like tiles, stone and clay tile cladding, paints and their appropriateness on different surfaces would be discussed. Nanotechnologies used in this trade would also be mentioned for specific materials like wallpapers, solid surfaces and fabrics for carpets stating their use. Specific ways of combination of different materials would also be highlighted to give consolidated knowledge. Methods to protect materials and alter their properties will be investigated. The menu of materials available to designers in their profession to the many mechanical and electrical properties of materials important to their use in various areas. Will also learn about the nature of the material and how to use it in your design.
The course is divided in different categories -
Introduction to materials
Bricks
Stones
Metals
Concrete
tiles
Wood
Fabric
Plastic
Glass
Carpet and rug
Paneling material
Combination of material
Wallpapers
Window covering
Solid surfaces
Epoxy resin
Paints
Individuals will also get acquainted with different career prospects of different materials.
target_audience: Anyone who wants to learn about Interior designing
Aspiring and professional artists, students, architects, interior decorators, interior designers and set designers
Enthusiasts who want to pursue a career in different domains of Interior Design
Anyone who wants knowledge about colors, textures, painting, and waterproofing
For all entry level to advanced Interior Designers

courses.title: Home Office Interior Design for More Creativity.
courses.bio: Workspace & Studio Tips to Unlock Creativity.
objectives: Understand the influence of workspace design on creativity and work efficiency.
Learn to personalize your workspace to cater to your creative needs and boost productivity.
Discover the impact of physical movement on creativity and how to design for it.
Appreciate the role of aesthetics and art in enhancing cognition and positivity.
Learn to incorporate 'open spaces' in your design for stimulating creative thinking.
Understand the importance of rest in the creative process and design features that support it.
Gain insights from successful creatives on how they optimize their workspace for better productivity.
Develop practical skills to implement changes in your workspace, promoting a more efficient and creative workflow.
requirements: There are no specific prerequisites for taking the "Home Office Interior Design for More Creativity" course. This class is designed to be accessible to everyone, regardless of their design experience or creative background.
courses.description:
In this class you will explore the intrinsic relationship between your workspace and your creative output. Additionally, you will uncover how subtle tweaks to your environment can affect your mood, mindset, and overall work efficiency.


A short overview of each of the lessons:


"Creativity" - is about understanding how and why the design of our environment has an impact on how we feel and what are the prerequisites for more creativity. Here we are also going to discuss the concept of 'brain priming' and debunk the myth of the 'tortured artist’.


"Personalisation" The lesson underscores the value of personalising workspaces to boost creativity. It covers physical comfort, task-specific designs, and catering to psychological needs, leading to increased productivity.

“Move” This lesson highlights how the different positions of the body and moving the body influence creativity and how we might design our creative space to support that.


"Beauty" This lesson discusses an interesting study about how the aesthetics of our environment and art cultivates positivity, enhances cognition and influences creativity. It also gives examples of how to achieve a sense of beauty and how to incorporate art in the workspace.


"Open Spaces" - This lesson shows how tall ceilings and outward views stimulate creative thinking and gives examples of how we might be able to achieve that even if we live in small spaces with limited budgets.


"Take a Break" - Besides working, relaxing is one of the best mental states for creative ideas. Here we discuss the design features that support comfort and internal focus.


"The Florist" - interview with high end British florist and Netflix Show winner “The Big Flower Fight” Henk Rolling about his creative process and how his workspace supports him to do that.


"The Urban Sketch Artist" - Interview with James Richards, a talented sketch artist from Florida USA doing beautiful art all over the world. He talks about his daily sketching routine and how he designed his environment to help him do his best work.


"The Watercolour Artist" - here we talk to Elise Aabakken, a Norwegian artist living in Paris about her creative process and how she structured her space to keep her watercolour routine easy and fun.


"The Brand Strategist" - Interview with Leiry Seron, a brand identity designer living in Finland. She talks about how the light fluctuations in her country influence her work process and how her other creative hobbies inspire her work.


Enrolling in "Home Office Interior Design for More Creativity" offers an opportunity to refine your workspace, optimize your productivity, and inspire your creative journey. It equips you with practical tools to reshape your environment in alignment with your creative goals. Start this exploration today, and take a step towards a more productive and creative future.
target_audience: Artists and Creatives: Artists, writers, designers, or anyone engaged in a creative profession or hobby seeking to enhance their creative output through the design of their work environment.
Remote Workers: Individuals who work from home and are keen to boost their productivity and creativity by optimizing their workspace.
Design Enthusiasts: People interested in interior design or those wanting to understand how space design impacts cognition and creativity.
Productivity Seekers: Those interested in personal development, particularly in enhancing productivity and creative thinking, will find practical value in this course.

courses.title: Interior Lighting Design 101
courses.bio: Unlock the Power of Light: Become a Pro Lighting Designer with Energy-Efficient and Aesthetically Pleasing Designs.
objectives: You will a develop strong interior lighting design foundation with key concepts for success.
You will learn how to create both functional and aesthetic lighting designs by understanding the specific impacts and effects of lighting design.
You will acquire technical knowledge in interior lighting design, including color qualities of lamps, lighting systems, and other important concepts.
You will apply interior lighting design principles to practical projects, including optimal lighting layouts and luminous flux calculations.
You will learn about the concept of glare rating and its importance in creating safe and comfortable illumination.
You will earn CPD points upon completion.
requirements: No design experience needed! Our course is designed for students of all levels. You'll learn everything you need to create stunning visuals using industry-standard tools. Start your journey towards becoming a design pro today!
courses.description:
Get ready to illuminate your career with our comprehensive Interior Lighting Design 101 Deep Dive!

Our three-part program is designed to equip you with the essential knowledge and skills you need to succeed in the field of lighting design. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced designer looking to expand your skills, this course is perfect for you!
Part I covers the fundamentals of interior lighting design:
Learn what constitutes a good lighting design.
Discover key concepts that guide successful lighting design.
Explore the effects of luminance patterns.
Understand the role of typical illuminance recommendations.
Develop a strong foundation in the subject.
Part II delves deeper into the specific impacts and effects of lighting design:
Learn how changes in direction can impact an object's form and texture.
Discover how to create delightful modeling in modern buildings with good lighting.
Explore the effects of glare on visual performance.
Empower yourself to create functional and aesthetically pleasing lighting designs.
Part III focuses on the technical aspects of interior lighting design:
Learn about the colour qualities of lamps.
Understand the different types of lighting systems.
Explore the role of luminance in lighting installation design.
Discover how to design energy-efficient lighting installations.
Learn techniques to extend the life of a lighting installation.
Develop skills to create sustainable and cost-effective lighting designs.
Enroll now in our Interior Lighting Design 101 Deep Dive and take the first step towards an illuminating career!
target_audience: Interior lighting designers
Architects and Interior Designers
Electrical Engineers

courses.title: Der große SketchUp-Kurs: Alles was du wissen musst!
courses.bio: Lerne die wichtigsten Werkzeuge und Techniken um deine eigenen Projekte sofort in 3D zu konstruieren
objectives: Du lernst die wichtigsten Werkzeuge und Funktionen um deinen eigenen Projekte in SketchUp umzusetzen
Modelle importieren, bearbeiten und im passenden Stil präsentieren
Du lernst den Unterschied zwischen Gruppen und Komponenten kennen und lernst wie du professionelle Modelle baust
Du lernst wie du dir mit Einsatz der 3D-Modellbibliothek jede Menge Zeit sparen kannst und gute Texturen findest
Du entdeckst wie intuitiv die Benutzung von SketchUp ist und wieviel Spaß das Arbeiten mit dem Programm machen kann

Einleitung: Herzlich Willkommen zum großen SketchUp Kurs!
Gruppen und Komponenten: Bauen zum Schauen vs. Bauen zum Bauen

requirements: Für diesen Kurs sind keine Vorkenntnisse nötig.
courses.description:
Du willst gerne spielerisch einfach deine eigenen Möbel am PC entwerfen? Willst dein Gesellen- oder Meisterstück planen oder deine Wohnung neu gestalten und sofort in 3D visualisieren?
Dann ist SketchUp genau das richtige Programm für dich. Mit keiner anderen Software lassen sich so schnell beeindruckende 3D-Modelle bauen, die sofort eine räumliche Wirkung deines Projektes vermitteln. Die Vorteile von SketchUp:
es gibt eine kostenlose, webbasierte Version
es ist wahrscheinlich das einfachste aller CAD-Programme
du bist sofort in 3D unterwegs und siehst deine Ergebnisse
es gibt eine riesige Bibliothek mit unzähligen vorgefertigten 3D-Modellen
du kannst enorm viel damit machen - nichts was man damit nicht konstruieren könnte!
Wie ist dieser Kurs aufgebaut?
In diesem 5-stündigen Kurs lernst du die Funktionsweise sowie die wichtigsten Werkzeuge von SketchUp kennen und anwenden. Anhand von realen Beispielen wirst du Schritt für Schritt sicher im Umgang mit Linie, Rechteck, Kreis und dem Drücken/Ziehen Werkzeug. Wir lernen den Umgang mit Gruppen und Komponenten, wir schauen in die praktische Modellbibliothek, nutzen verschiedene Spezialwerkzeuge und lernen unsere Projekte ansprechend darzustellen und zu visualisieren. Letztendlich soll dich der Kurs dazu fit machen, dass du deine eigenen Ideen in SketchUp umsetzen und zum Leben erwecken kannst.
Damit es nicht langweilig wird und du sofort Ergebnisse siehst, basiert alles auf Learning by Doing - wir werden uns also nicht lange mit der Theorie aufhalten, sondern zeichnen immer direkt reale Objekte. Von der einfachen Box mit Schwalbenschwanz-Verbindung, über den Schreibtisch, die Treppensituation bis hin zur Innenraumgestaltung - mittels projektbasiertem Lernen erhältst du eine ganzheitliche Herangehensweise an das Konstruieren in SketchUp und wirst direkt das neue Wissen in die Praxis umsetzen für deine optimale Lernerfahrung.
An wen richtet sich dieser Kurs?
Tischler/Schreiner*innen
Auszubildende und Lehrlinge im (Holz-)Handwerk
Designer*innen
Innenarchitekt*innen
Hobbyholzwerker und DIY-Enthusiasten
Was brauchst du dazu?
Nicht viel! Mit folgenden Tools kannst sofort mit dem 3D Modellieren loslegen:
eine Computermaus mit klickbarem Mausrad (Trackpad geht auch, aber Maus ist einfacher und schneller ;)
kein Muss aber praktisch: ein großer Bildschirm
target_audience: Dieser Kurs richtet sich an alle, die ein einfaches und kostenloses Programm suchen um eigene Entwürfe digital und DIREKT in 3D zu zeichnen.
Tischler, Schreiner, Hobbyhandwerker, Bastler, Maker und DIY-Enthusiasten
Designer, Architekten, Innenraumgestalter

courses.description:
Курс включает в себя темы:
История возникновения дизайна, от самых древних стилей до современных. Особенности каждого стиля, как распознавать их в интерьере, как компоновать и сочетать между собой.


Композиция, законы композиции в интерьере, Золотое сечение, Числа Фибоначчи, Как применять эти знания в интерьере. Как сделать, что бы интерьере был гармоничным и сбалансированным, поделюсь своими секретами на примерах. Цвет в интерьере, Как сочетать цвета между собой, Круг Иттена, психология цвета, Какие цветовые решения никогда не выйдут из моды.


Развертки стен, как нарисовать развертку стены от руки, перенести свою задумку интерьера на лист с применением знаний с курса. На примере покажу как я рисую развертки для своих проектов, они помогают придумать идею и воплотить ее на лист. Знаний по рисованию не нужно, схематически задумка будет понятна, справится и новичок.


Отделочные материалы, какие материалы есть, виды обоев, виды краски, декоративная штукатурка, виды декоративной штукатурки, преимущество и недостатки каждого из материалов, какой материал лучше где применять стеновые панели, виды материалов для мебели, из чего лучше изготовить мебель, растения в интерьере, фито-панели. Как компоновать материалы между собой.


Дополнительное занятие в подарок по Adobe Photoshop 2024, научимся создавать интерьеры в формате коллажа и формате перспективы, дам ссылку где скачивать красивые модели мебели и картинок для коллажа, так же дам архив для скачивания картинок которые применены в уроке, вы сможете создать свою комнату перенеся свою задумку в картинку.


После прохождения курса, вы расширите свой кругозор в области дизайна, создадите свой интерьер в фотошопе. В этом курсе я собрала свои любимые темы в области дизайна которые уверенна пригодятся как и дизайнеру, так и человеку который делает дизайн для себя, курс раскроет секреты хорошего дизайна и сочетаний.
target_audience: Курс предназначен для новичка, для того, что бы познакомиться с историей и стилистикой дизайна изучим основы композиции, психологию цвета и применить на практике уже на своем первом коллаже и перспективе в фотошоп.

courses.title: Professional Design Portfolios
courses.bio: Visually Compelling Professional Design Portfolios that Effectively Communicate Design Skills, Style, and Expertise.
objectives: Develop a visually compelling professional portfolio that effectively communicates design skills, style, and expertise.
Gain proficiency in visual communication, presentation techniques and content organization.
Understand the importance of branding, marketability, and psychological considerations in portfolio creation.
Construct portfolio grid layouts, incorporate project colour schemes and fonts, and filter project images.
requirements: Knowledge of creating Digital Presentation using Adobe Creative Suite or similar programs.
Knowledge in Digital Online Platforms.
Having existing Design Projects to be documented through Digital Portfolio Banners.
Knowledge in converting scans and digital drawings to pdf and image files.
courses.description:
A professional design portfolio is essential for architects and interior designers to showcase their skills and expertise, build credibility, market their brand, communicate with their clients and collaborators as well as gain a competitive advantage in the industry.
Architects and interior designers will highly benefit through this course in professional portfolio development to advance career opportunities in their industries, attract new clients, meet educational requirements, showcase diverse skills and project types and stay current with the industry advancements.
The course content covers working with various portfolio grid layouts, incorporate project colour schemes, appropriately use fonts and text sizes, filter design project images, and identify the main design aspects to include.
By the end of this course, professional as well future architects and interior designers will be able to develop a visually compelling professional portfolio that effectively communicates their design skills, style, and expertise. They will gain proficiency in visual communication, presentation techniques and content organization, while also understanding the importance of branding, marketability, and psychological considerations in portfolio creation.
Participants will leave the course equipped to present their work confidently, adapt to digital platforms, and continually update and improve their portfolios to meet industry standards and achieve their career and educational goals.
target_audience: Architects and Interior Designers.
Design school Students in Architecture and Interior Design.

How to create a design board in Canva

requirements: no
courses.description:
How To Create An Interior Design Mood Board And Design Board
Create your professional designs for your own projects or your clients


This course is made for you if:
You are starting to renovate your home
You are building your new home
You want to redecorate your room
You want to plan and visualize your interior design ideas
You are an interior designer
You are an interior design student


What can you learn and what skills will you get by completing this course:
You will get an amazing tool to plan and visualize your interior design ideas
You will learn the basics of interior design mood boards and how can you utilize them for yourself in the best way
You will get a step-by-step guide to create your mood boards and design boards in Canva
You will get a step-by-step guide to create your mood boards and design boards in Photoshop
You will be able to create a professional-looking shopping list that is organized and well-planned


This course is for:
People, who are renovating or building a new home:
You can definitely utilize making a mood board or design board if you are not a professional but do it for yourself, because you are building a new house, renovating, or just refreshing your home, your room.
You can hire someone to do the design process for you. But if you know what you like and what you want to go for, you can use these tools to see how your ideas look together. You can make a board, see how it looks and if you don’t like something, you can easily change them.
Did it ever happen to you that you bought nice things for your home, that you thought will look amazing, but space didn’t come together and something didn’t feel right?
Believe me, this happens to most people. But with this course, you can learn how to plan and visualize the beautiful room you want to decorate – with just a few clicks. You don’t need a designer, you can do it for yourself – even for free!
I’ve been using mood boards and design boards for years to present my designs to my clients. More than a hundred and twenty 5star reviews prove on Fiverr, how effective these boards are! I’ve presented these to my clients, they brought them to life and they are happy and satisfied with the results!


Professionals:
If you are a professional interior designer, decorator, home staging expert, or stylist, you can definitely make the most of using these tools.
If you are doing a longer design process, a mood board can help you show your client what direction you would like to take with the design. It is great because if your client doesn’t agree with something, in the beginning, you can change right ahead and you won’t build an entire design and waste a lot of time with it to show the client and see that this is not the direction they wanted to go for.
A design board can be even the core of your design process along with a floor plan and a shopping list since you can represent your whole exact design with it. It is not as precise as a 3D plan, but with lower price services or where there is not much time, a design board can really show how the design will come together. It is also much easier to edit if your client doesn’t like it than a 3D rendering, since you just change the certain pictures on the design board.


If you feel like this is for you and you want to try these tools, let's meet in this course and learn them together!
target_audience: Interior designers
People who renovate
People who build a new home
Interior stylists
Interior design students
Interior decorators

courses.title: HVAC Training Course
courses.bio: Know how chillers, pumps, FCUs and control valves work together to form a competent HVAC system
objectives: HVAC system introduction
know the main components of any hvac system
know the working principle of all main equipment
best control valve type in HVAC industry

HVAC Complete Course: Learn refrigeration cycle and how chiller works
Best chiller Arrangement and Compressor lift

requirements: No experience required. you will learn everything you want to know.
courses.description:
this HVAC course is organized in a way even people with no experience in this field can build a profound foundation once completing it.
starting with a clear and simple introduction about how chiller works and the basics of refrigeration cycle, then going through the main equipment in the hvac system with a detailed explanation on each item: chillers, control valves, fan coil units and VRF or VRV system.
You can go directly to the lecture you are interested in, but I would advise to go through the eight lectures one by one.
Lecture 1: chillers working principle and refrigeration cycle
Lecture 2: types of chiller compressors
Lecture 3: How Cooling towers works
Lecture 4: Different chiller arrangements and their effect on compressor work.
Lecture 5: Know how Fan coil units works
Lecture 6: Know how Air handling units works
Lecture 7: everything you need to know about VRF/VRV units
Lecture 8: Control valves used in HVAC industry
Whether you are student, fresh graduate engineer, technician or even an experienced engineer, there is a lot that you can benefit from. The content of the course is the product of more than 12 years of expertise in HVAC and district cooling field.
I tried my best to put a valuable asset between your hands which really took me a lot of effort and time to prepare it.
Appreciate your time spent reading this description and hope it is going to encourage you to select the course.
Best Regards.
target_audience: this course is for engineers, technicians or anybody curious about HVAC systems.

courses.description:
Estilo Rústico Moderno en Diseño de Interiores
Aprende a fusionar lo rústico y lo contemporáneo: domina materiales naturales, paletas neutras y mobiliario moderno
Instructor: Arquitecto Álvaro García  Actualizado: Octubre de 2025 Requisitos previos: Ninguno


Descripción del Curso:
Fusiona lo rústico y lo contemporáneo para crear interiores únicos. En este curso de Udemy, aprenderás a diseñar espacios que combinen la calidez de los materiales naturales con la elegancia del diseño moderno. Descubre cómo utilizar paletas de colores neutros, texturas orgánicas y mobiliario sofisticado para transformar cualquier ambiente en un espacio acogedor y actual. Si eres diseñador, interiorista, decorador o arquitecto, este curso te brindará las técnicas y conocimientos necesarios para dominar el estilo rústico moderno, una tendencia en auge que enamora a clientes por su equilibrio entre tradición y modernidad.
Además, este curso te permitirá diferenciarte en un mercado competitivo, ofreciendo proyectos que conecten con las emociones de tus clientes al crear espacios funcionales, estéticos y llenos de personalidad. Ya sea para interiores residenciales, comerciales o proyectos de hospitalidad, las habilidades adquiridas te posicionarán como un experto en un estilo versátil y demandado. Inscríbete ahora y lleva tus proyectos al siguiente nivel, combinando tradición, innovación y diseño de alta calidad.


Objetivos del Curso:
El curso “Estilo Rústico Moderno en Diseño de Interiores” tiene como propósito principal enseñarte a combinar lo mejor del diseño rústico y moderno para crear espacios únicos y funcionales. Aprenderás a trabajar con materiales naturales como madera y piedra, a elegir paletas de colores neutros y a integrar mobiliario contemporáneo con toques artesanales. Además, desarrollarás habilidades para equilibrar tradición y modernidad, logrando interiores cálidos, sofisticados y adaptados a las necesidades actuales.


Itinerario Formativo:
Introducción a la plataforma de formación Udemy


Dibujo 2D Asistido por Ordenador con AutoCAD
Diseño 3D
Renderizado de Imágenes Fotorrealistas de nuestros Diseños
Edición Fotográfica de Nuestros Proyectos y Diseños
Recursos para el Alumno del Curso
Consultas, Dudas y Sugerencias de los Alumnos de la Formación
Emisión del Certificado de Finalización del Curso


Salidas Profesionales:
Con este curso, podrás destacar como diseñador especializado en estilo rústico moderno, una tendencia muy demandada en proyectos residenciales, comerciales y de hospitalidad. Estarás preparado para trabajar en estudios de diseño, colaborar con arquitectos o emprender tu propio negocio ofreciendo soluciones que combinen estética y funcionalidad. Además, tendrás las herramientas necesarias para diseñar espacios únicos en viviendas rurales, hoteles boutique, restaurantes y locales comerciales que busquen un toque distintivo y acogedor.


Dirigido a:
Este curso está dirigido a diseñadores de interiores, decoradores, arquitectos y estudiantes que deseen explorar y dominar el estilo rústico moderno. También es ideal para emprendedores y profesionales creativos interesados en ampliar sus conocimientos y ofrecer propuestas innovadoras a sus clientes. No importa si eres principiante o tienes experiencia: este curso está diseñado para ayudarte a perfeccionar tus habilidades y convertirte en un referente en la creación de espacios que combinan lo natural y lo contemporáneo.


Metodología de Aprendizaje:
Recuerda que este curso incluye lecciones en vídeo fullHD con audio de estudio (compatible con TV, PC, Mac, tablet y smartphone), artículos didácticos, actividades, animaciones, ilustraciones, proyectos paso a paso, recursos descargables, links de interés, acceso de por vida, certificado de finalización, tutorización online, y una exclusiva comunidad de aprendizaje privada que nos ayudamos aportando nuestras experiencias en el foro de comunicación del curso.
La modalidad de este curso te permite que empieces y acabes cuando tú quieras, marcando el ritmo de la clase según tu disponibilidad. Puedes volver a visualizar lo que te interese, saltar el contenido que ya domines, hacer preguntas, resolver dudas, compartir tus proyectos... Puedes elegir ver todas las lecciones de forma secuencial (lineal) y aprovecharlas al máximo la formación, pero también puedes decidir ver este curso como una guía de referencia.
Las clases están claramente organizadas en secciones y lecciones, puedes decidir visualizar solo las clases que te resulten más importantes según tus necesidades formativas. La mayoría de las lecciones son independientes para que puedas comprender los conceptos de cada lección sin tener que ver las lecciones anteriores del curso.
Para seguir el programa formativo propuesto no ser requieren conocimientos previos, ya que la formación se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0. El curso está orientado a aquellos profesionales que quieran ampliar sus skills (habilidades) y conocer múltiples trucos, consejos, recursos y recomendaciones, de la mano del instructor best seller Álvaro García, con más de 150.000 estudiantes formados. Además la formación disponen de acceso automático al contenido, sin limitación de tiempo, disponibilidad 24/7 (24 horas al día los 7 días de la semana), sin caducidad y con garantía de devolución.
Con la alta definición de los vídeos (vídeo fullHD y audio de estudio) conseguirá no te perder detalle. Podrás ver las clases las veces que requieras para recordar y perfeccionar tus habilidades como diseñador. Tendrás la posibilidad de preguntar, pedir opinión y ayuda al instructor, además de compartir tu experiencia de aprendizaje con los demás alumnos del curso, tan apasionados como tú, repartidos por todo el mundo. Seleccionamos cuidadosamente los contenidos y producimos cada curso para garantizar una experiencia de aprendizaje online integral y de la máxima calidad.


¿A qué esperas?, este curso es ideal para ti, atrévete a convertirte en un experto y expresa tus ideas de la forma que siempre has deseado. Adelante, nos vemos dentro de la formación ;)

courses.title: Learn How to Make Air Dry Clay Jewelry Dishes for Beginners
courses.bio: Learn How to Make Air Dry Clay Jewelry Dishes
objectives: How to make DIY jewelry dishes using air dry clay
What the clay modelling tools are and how to use them
What the brushes, colors and the accessories are and how to use them
Understand the basic techniques of working with air dry clay
Introduce a range of clay working techniques

Triangular Jewelry Dish with Lava Colors: Triangular Jewelry Dish with Lava Colors

requirements: no experience is necessary
the course will provide all the necessary information
courses.description: Working with clay is fun and relaxing. In this course, I will show you a few techniques for creating air-dry clay jewelry dishes. The best part about clay is that you can literally create any shape and style of decorations you like. With clay, there are very few limitations. You will also need to decorate your jewelry dishes with some colors. If you are unsure about the use of colors, then think about the basic color theory. If you do not know what colors to go with then just stick with the primaries, along with black and white. You can always mix your own colors. You only need some brushes or a sponge. You will also need some tools and accessories, in order to shape and cut the clay. You can actually find a lot of these tools in your kitchen, so it's not necessary to spend a lot of money before you even start working. It is advisable to have your own working space, where you can keep all the things you need to create your clay items. It does not have to be anything special or expensive, but it is good to have a table where you can place all your tools and materials so that you don’t need to put them all away each time you're finished with work.
target_audience: People who want to learn how to make DIY jewelry dishes using air dry clay
People who want to create their own clay jewelry dishes that they can use at home or sell online

courses.title: The Complete Course of AutoCAD الاوتوكاد
courses.bio: تصميم مخططات داخلية وخارجية حدائق ومنازل
objectives: تخطيط البيوت والحدائق داخلي وخارجي
requirements: basic knowledge
courses.description:
تعلم اوتوكاد تعلم اوتوكاد من المبتدئين للإحتراف لاستخدامه في جميع التطبيقات الهندسية حيث يعتمد ملايين الأشخاص في مختلف أنحاء العالم على هذا البرنامج لرسم وإعداد اللوحات الهندسية وخلال السنوات القليلة الماضية تم تطوير برنامج اوتوكاد بطريقة سريعة وفعالة، حيث أصبح التعامل مع البرنامج يمثل متعة حقيقية لكل مستخدم، وسنتعرف في هذه المجموعة التعليمية لبرنامج اوتوكاد على كيفية الرسم والتعديل، الابعاد والبلوكات، كيفية طباعة اللوحات وربط الرسومات بقواعد البيانات
تهدف هذه الدورة التدريبية إلى تزويد المشاركين بالمعارف والمهارات الأساسية والمتقدمة لاستخدام برنامج AutoCAD بكفاءة في تصميم الرسومات الهندسية ثنائية وثلاثية الأبعاد. سيتعرف المتدربون على بيئة العمل وأدوات الرسم والتحرير، وكيفية تنظيم الطبقات وإدارة الملفات، بالإضافة إلى أساليب الطباعة وإخراج المخططات باحترافية.
خلال الدورة، سيتم تنفيذ تطبيقات عملية تحاكي احتياجات المشاريع الواقعية في مجالات الهندسة المعمارية، الهندسة المدنية، والهندسة الميكانيكية، مما يساعد المشاركين على تحويل أفكارهم ومخططاتهم إلى رسومات دقيقة ومتكاملة.


أهداف الدورة:
التعرف على واجهة برنامج AutoCAD وأساسيات العمل به.
إنشاء وتعديل الرسومات الهندسية ثنائية الأبعاد (2D) وثلاثية الأبعاد (3D).
تنظيم العمل باستخدام الطبقات والكتل (Layers & Blocks).
استخدام أوامر القياس والتعليقات التوضيحية.
إعداد المخططات للطباعة والعرض الاحترافي.
الفئة المستهدفة:
المهندسون والمعماريون والمصممون.
طلاب كليات الهندسة والتصميم الداخلي.
أي شخص يرغب في اكتساب مهارات احترافية في الرسم باستخدام AutoCAD.
رنامج أوتوكاد (AutoCAD) هو برنامج تصميم ورسم هندسي بمساعدة الحاسوب (CAD – Computer Aided Design) تطوره شركة Autodesk.
يُستخدم أوتوكاد لإنشاء وتصميم الرسومات الهندسية والمخططات الفنية بدقة عالية، سواء كانت ثنائية الأبعاد (2D) أو ثلاثية الأبعاد (3D).
أبرز استخداماته:
رسم المخططات المعمارية للمباني والمنشآت.
إعداد التصاميم الميكانيكية وقطع الغيار.
تصميم شبكات الكهرباء والسباكة.
إعداد خرائط المساحة والطرق.
مميزات أوتوكاد:
دقة عالية في القياسات والتصميم.
سهولة تعديل الرسومات وتحديثها.
دعم واسع لمجموعة كبيرة من الصيغ والملفات.
إمكانية الطباعة وإخراج المخططات باحترافية.
باختصار، أوتوكاد هو لغة المصممين والمهندسين لتحويل الأفكار إلى رسومات ومخططات جاهزة للتنفيذ.
target_audience: college students

requirements: Already familiar with drawing plans in Autocad
courses.description:
AutoCAD for Mac: Printing to PDF" is a course designed for users who are familiar with the AutoCAD software and are looking to learn how to effectively print their drawings to PDF format on a Mac computer.


The course will cover topics such as setting up print options, configuring PDF export settings, and troubleshooting common printing issues.


By the end of the course, students will have the skills and knowledge necessary to confidently print their AutoCAD drawings to PDF on a Mac.


Printing in Autocad can be confusing with so many settings and so many steps. I designed this course to teach you how to print step-by-step with an easy-to-follow process.


Autocad printing has another name as well - PLOT - yup, plot command is used to print your drawing to a pdf file.


I go over everything you need to know from setting a paper size to printing multiple layouts across multiple CAD drawings.


Titleblocks with attributes are included in the course to make it easy to create layouts and follow along. If you are not familiar with attributes, that's okay! You will actually love with Attributes once you learn it - I promise you, it's worth your time!

This course is made for interior designers & architects and the material referenced is an architectural floor plan. Professionals & students from other majors should be able to follow along and apply all the concepts mentioned in this course.
target_audience: Beginner Autocad For Mac Users
Advanced Autocad Users
Autocad Mac Users

courses.description:
Introducción a la Biofilia en el Diseño de Interiores
Descubre cómo integrar naturaleza, luz y materiales orgánicos para crear interiores biofílicos que mejoran tu bienestar.
Instructor: Arquitecto Álvaro García  Actualizado: Octubre del 2025 Requisitos previos: Ninguno


Descripción del Curso:
Transforma interiores con la esencia de la naturaleza: Domina el diseño biofílico
En un mundo donde el bienestar y la conexión con la naturaleza son más importantes que nunca, este curso en Udemy te enseñará a crear interiores que mejoren la calidad de vida de sus usuarios. Aprenderás a integrar elementos naturales como plantas, luz, agua y materiales orgánicos en tus proyectos, creando espacios que no solo son funcionales, sino que también promueven tranquilidad, salud y productividad. Descubre cómo el diseño biofílico puede transformar hogares, oficinas y espacios comerciales en ambientes armoniosos y revitalizantes.
Dirigido a diseñadores, arquitectos y decoradores, este curso te permitirá diferenciarte en el mercado del diseño de interiores, respondiendo a las crecientes demandas de sostenibilidad y bienestar. A través de ejemplos prácticos y técnicas innovadoras, dominarás las claves para incorporar la biofilia en tus proyectos, añadiendo valor y atractivo a cada diseño.
Inscríbete ahora y lleva tus habilidades al siguiente nivel, creando interiores que conectan con la naturaleza y marcan la diferencia!


Objetivos del Curso:
Este curso tiene como objetivo enseñarte a diseñar interiores biofílicos que integren elementos naturales como luz, plantas, agua y texturas orgánicas. Aprenderás a crear espacios que promuevan el bienestar, la productividad y la conexión con la naturaleza, aplicando técnicas que mejoran la estética y funcionalidad en entornos residenciales, comerciales y corporativos. Además, desarrollarás habilidades para incorporar estrategias sostenibles y materiales ecológicos en tus proyectos.


Itinerario Formativo:
Introducción a la plataforma de formación Udemy
Fundamentos de la Biofilia
Elementos naturales en el espacio interior
Aplicaciones prácticas en diferentes espacios
Estrategias avanzadas y certificaciones
Perspectivas profesionales y proyecto final

Recursos para el Alumno del Curso
Consultas, Dudas y Sugerencias de los Alumnos de la Formación
Emisión del Certificado de Finalización del Curso


Salidas Profesionales:
Con este curso, estarás preparado para trabajar como diseñador de interiores especializado en proyectos biofílicos, respondiendo a la creciente demanda de espacios sostenibles y orientados al bienestar. Podrás colaborar con estudios de diseño, desarrollar propuestas innovadoras para oficinas, viviendas y espacios comerciales, o desempeñarte como consultor freelance ofreciendo soluciones únicas que combinen estética y funcionalidad natural.


Dirigido a:
Dirigido a arquitectos, diseñadores de interiores, decoradores y estudiantes interesados en incorporar la biofilia en sus proyectos de diseño. También es ideal para profesionales que busquen diferenciarse en el mercado con propuestas sostenibles y centradas en la salud y el bienestar de los usuarios. Perfecto para quienes desean ampliar su portafolio con diseños innovadores y comprometidos con el medio ambiente.


Metodología de Aprendizaje:
Recuerda que este curso incluye lecciones en vídeo fullHD con audio de estudio (compatible con TV, PC, Mac, tablet y smartphone), artículos didácticos, actividades, animaciones, ilustraciones, proyectos paso a paso, recursos descargables, links de interés, acceso de por vida, certificado de finalización, tutorización online, y una exclusiva comunidad de aprendizaje privada que nos ayudamos aportando nuestras experiencias en el foro de comunicación del curso.
La modalidad de este curso te permite que empieces y acabes cuando tú quieras, marcando el ritmo de la clase según tu disponibilidad. Puedes volver a visualizar lo que te interese, saltar el contenido que ya domines, hacer preguntas, resolver dudas, compartir tus proyectos... Puedes elegir ver todas las lecciones de forma secuencial (lineal) y aprovecharlas al máximo la formación, pero también puedes decidir ver este curso como una guía de referencia.
Las clases están claramente organizadas en secciones y lecciones, puedes decidir visualizar solo las clases que te resulten más importantes según tus necesidades formativas. La mayoría de las lecciones son independientes para que puedas comprender los conceptos de cada lección sin tener que ver las lecciones anteriores del curso.
Para seguir el programa formativo propuesto no ser requieren conocimientos previos, ya que la formación se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0. El curso está orientado a aquellos profesionales que quieran ampliar sus skills (habilidades) y conocer múltiples trucos, consejos, recursos y recomendaciones, de la mano del instructor best seller Álvaro García, con más de 150.000 estudiantes formados. Además la formación disponen de acceso automático al contenido, sin limitación de tiempo, disponibilidad 24/7 (24 horas al día los 7 días de la semana), sin caducidad y con garantía de devolución.
Con la alta definición de los vídeos (vídeo fullHD y audio de estudio) conseguirá no te perder detalle. Podrás ver las clases las veces que requieras para recordar y perfeccionar tus habilidades como diseñador. Tendrás la posibilidad de preguntar, pedir opinión y ayuda al instructor, además de compartir tu experiencia de aprendizaje con los demás alumnos del curso, tan apasionados como tú, repartidos por todo el mundo. Seleccionamos cuidadosamente los contenidos y producimos cada curso para garantizar una experiencia de aprendizaje online integral y de la máxima calidad.


¿A qué esperas?, este curso es ideal para ti, atrévete a convertirte en un experto y expresa tus ideas de la forma que siempre has deseado. Adelante, nos vemos dentro de la formación ;)

courses.description:
Wujudkan Kitchen Set Impian Anda: Kursus DIY Lengkap untuk Pemula
Apakah Anda bermimpi memiliki kitchen set impian namun terhalang biaya yang mahal? Kursus ini hadir untuk menjawab masalah tersebut! Pelajari cara membuat kitchen set sendiri (DIY) langkah demi langkah, dan kagumlah dengan penghematan biaya hingga 50% dibandingkan membeli dari jasa profesional. Saya sendiri telah membuktikannya!
Dalam kursus ini, Anda akan dibimbing untuk:
Menguasai Pemilihan Material: Pelajari berbagai jenis material yang umum digunakan untuk kitchen set, mulai dari kayu solid yang kokoh, multipleks yang serbaguna, hingga MDF yang ekonomis. Anda akan memahami kelebihan dan kekurangan masing-masing material serta cara memilih yang paling sesuai dengan budget dan gaya dapur Anda.
Teknik Finishing Profesional: Kuasai berbagai teknik finishing untuk kitchen set Anda, mulai dari cat duco yang mewah, HPL yang modern, hingga veneer kayu alami yang elegan. Pelajari cara aplikasi yang benar agar hasil akhir tahan lama dan memukau.
Perkakas Hemat Budget & Efektif: Temukan daftar perkakas esensial yang wajib dimiliki untuk proyek DIY kitchen set, tanpa harus mengeluarkan biaya besar. Pelajari trik memilih perkakas berkualitas dengan harga terjangkau.
Desain 3D Kitchen Set Impian: Gunakan software desain 3D sederhana untuk memvisualisasikan kitchen set impian Anda sebelum mulai membangun. Pelajari prinsip dasar desain kitchen set yang ergonomis dan fungsional.
Praktik Langsung: Bangun Kitchen Set Anda! Ikuti panduan praktik langkah demi langkah untuk membangun kitchen set dapur Anda sendiri. Dari pengukuran, pemotongan, perakitan, hingga pemasangan, semuanya akan dibahas secara detail.
Dengan panduan kursus ini, Anda akan mampu menghasilkan kitchen set berkualitas profesional dengan sentuhan personal. Setelah lulus, Anda tidak hanya menghemat biaya renovasi dapur, tetapi juga memiliki keterampilan baru yang bernilai. Bahkan, Anda bisa membuka jasa pembuatan kitchen set dan meraih penghasilan tambahan! Siapkan diri Anda untuk berkreasi lebih jauh, karena kursus ini akan membuka ide-ide proyek DIY lainnya di rumah Anda. Daftar sekarang dan mulai transformasi dapur Anda!

courses.title: Interior design for small apartments.
courses.bio: Space saving hacks for studio and one bedroom apartment.
objectives: Understand how to assess the needs and lifestyles of inhabitants to design a space that is both functional and personalized
Gain proficiency in prioritizing design choices based on a variety of factors including space, budget, lifestyle needs, and aesthetic preferences
Acquire the skills to read and sketch on a floor plan, enabling them to visualize different layouts and furniture placements
Comprehend the significance of alignment and order in design to create visually appealing and functional interiors.
Learn how to strategically remove walls or utilize open-plan concepts to enhance natural light and create an illusion of larger space.
Explore various partition options and understand their uses in defining spaces while preserving an open, airy feel.
Discover how to select and incorporate compact and convertible furniture to maximize the use of small spaces.
Develop an ability to identify and implement optimal storage locations, optimizing underutilized spaces and minimizing clutter.
Master the use of optical illusions through color schemes, mirrors, and furniture placement to enhance the perceived spaciousness of a room.
Develop a creative and innovative mindset that allows them to design small spaces effectively, blending style, functionality, and space optimisation techniques.
requirements: For this course, there are no rigid prerequisites. Whether you're a seasoned interior design enthusiast or a complete beginner, this course is designed to provide valuable insights into maximizing small living spaces.
Pen and Paper: all the exercises can be done using simple sketching on paper.
Access to the space you wish to redesign: Whether it's your current apartment or a future property, having a real-life context to apply your learning would be advantageous.
courses.description:
Master the art of maximizing small spaces with 'Interior Design for Small Apartments: Space Saving Hacks for Studio and One Bedroom Apartments'. Discover innovative solutions for organizing, multi-functional living, and aesthetic appeal, without feeling cramped or compromising on style. During this class, I will take you through my problem-solving approach for a small 33 sqm (361 sqft) apartment.
Anyone dwelling in a compact living space, whether by choice or circumstance, faces three major conundrums:
Where can I store all my belongings in such a limited space?
How do I make the space I have available multifunctional? It has to serve as a bedroom, a living room, a play area for children, an entertainment zone... and so much more!
How do I keep my space look tidy and beautiful despite its size? How do I prevent my cosy apartment from feeling like a claustrophobic shoebox?
These are genuine concerns, and I am here to offer you viable solutions that enable you to enjoy the best of both worlds.


The focus of the course:
Small spaces often demand ingenious, compact or flexible solutions to make life at home truly pleasant. While such solutions may not be as affordable as Ikea, their long-term value to your quality of life and budget is immense. Not only can they ease the pressure of needing to upgrade to a larger place, but they can also save you substantial amounts of money that you would otherwise spend on renting and decorating a bigger place.


Tools used in this course:
In this class, I'll illustrate my problem-solving approach using paper sketching and 3D modelling in Sketchup. While the focus is not to provide an in-depth tutorial on Sketchup, it will serve as a platform to demonstrate how various design solutions could transform your living space. Should you wish to learn more about using Sketchup, there are abundant free tutorials available on the Sketchup website.


Course structure:
During this exploration of design possibilities, I'll delve into a range of pertinent topics, such as:


Identifying the needs of the inhabitants and working within the boundaries of the available space: This involves a deep understanding of your lifestyle, routines, preferences, and the activities you undertake within your living area. It's about shaping the space around you rather than trying to fit into it, all while respecting the inherent constraints of the area.
Learning how to prioritize your design choices: Prioritization is key in space-saving interior design. We will delve into determining what aspects of design are most important to you – is it storage, aesthetics, functionality, or perhaps, a combination of these factors? The aim is to create a balance that brings you satisfaction.
Deciphering a floor plan and sketching on it: Interpreting a floor plan is crucial in visualizing and planning your space. By understanding its dimensions and sketching on it, we can brainstorm and experiment with different layouts and furniture placements. This practice becomes a powerful tool for testing your ideas before execution.
The importance of alignment and order in your design: Good design goes beyond mere aesthetic appeal. It also means creating harmony and coherence in your space. An orderly arrangement and thoughtful alignment of elements can significantly enhance both the functionality and visual appeal of your interior.
The potential benefits of removing walls to increase natural light: Walls can sometimes become barriers that prevent natural light from flooding your space. We'll consider how knocking down certain walls can create an open-plan design, fostering a more airy, spacious, and brighter environment.
Compactness: Here, we explore how custom-made design can help reduce space by combining multiple pieces of furniture, like the bed with a piece of storage and a table, and an extensible bed and bookshelves. The variations can be endless, and they can truly save a lot of space.
Exploring partition options: Partitions can be fantastic tools for defining different areas within your space without the permanence of walls. We'll investigate various partition types – from bookshelves to folding screens – that can offer a sense of privacy while maintaining an open feel.
Utilizing convertible furniture: Convertible furniture pieces are indispensable for small spaces. They offer the flexibility to change according to your needs and the occasion. We'll look into furniture serving multiple functions, such as beds that transform into desks or ottomans that provide hidden storage.
Deciding optimal storage locations: Clever storage solutions can be a game-changer in small spaces. We'll explore strategies to utilize underused areas, like under beds or above doors, and how to incorporate storage in furniture and fixtures to minimize clutter.
Employing optical illusions to give a sense of spaciousness: Perception can often be as important as reality. Through the use of mirrors, colour schemes, and strategic furniture placement, we can create optical illusions that make your space appear larger and more expansive than it actually is.


There's no need for a larger place; you need a smarter design strategy.
After all, how spacious a place FEELS carries more weight than its actual size.
target_audience: People who own or rent long term small apartments such as studio or one-bedroom spaces and wish to maximize their living areas. Whether you're a seasoned homeowner or just starting out in your first apartment, you'll find this course valuable in helping you create a functional, organized, and aesthetically pleasing environment.

Individuals who are interior design enthusiasts keen to understand and implement space-saving design strategies. If you're passionate about creating harmonious and practical spaces, this course will provide you with concrete, actionable strategies to turn small spaces into comfortable living areas.

Architects, interior designers, or students in these fields looking to gain specialized knowledge in designing for small spaces. The practical and comprehensive nature of the course makes it a valuable resource for professionals looking to expand their skill set.
People who are planning to downsize and need guidance on how to adapt to a smaller living area. This course will equip you with the necessary tools to make the transition smoother and more enjoyable.

People who enjoy DIY projects and are looking for innovative, practical solutions to improve their living spaces. If you love taking matters into your own hands and creating customized spaces, this course will provide you with plenty of inspiration and guidance.

courses.description:
The Complete Beginner's Guide to 3D Design
This is well detailed 3D modelling course in Interior design created for absolute beginners who have interest in Interior Design and 3D Design. In this course, students will learn how to model and render a complete photorealistic home in Sketchup from scratch. This would include the living room, bedroom, kitchen and bathroom.
The course will explain in detail how to model components like TV panels and Kitchen units from scratch in Sketchup, as well as how to import ready-made models into your project.
Detailed lighting settings were touched in Vray, and by the end of the course you will have a solid understanding of Sketchup and would be able to create amazing photorealistic renders using Sketchup & Vray.
This course is taught using Sketchup 2021 Application as well as Vray 5 render software.
It is suitable for
Beginner Sketchup users

courses.title: Design Thinking: Solusi Inovatif Untuk Pemecahan Masalah
courses.bio: Ubah Ide Jadi Solusi Nyata dengan Design Thinking

Metode Design Thinking: Metode-metode yang digunakan dalam Design Thinking
Studi Kasus: Penerapan Design Thinking dalam Proyek Nyata

requirements: Tidak dibutuhkan syarat khusus
courses.description:
Cuorse ini memberikan informasi dan pengetahuan tentang metode Design Thinking dan teknik penggunaannya dalam proses perancangan desain maupun untuk membuat landasan sistematis pada project lainnya.


Di awalnya, kita akan mempelajari apakah itu Design Thinking, apa fungsi dan kegunaannya dalam membangun sebuah project desain secara sistematis dan memiliki langkah yang terstruktur. Design Thinking digunakan oleh para desainer dan pekerja kreatif untuk mendapatkan Solusi yang inovatif dan berdampak di dunia yang bergerak begitu cepat saat ini. Mata Kuliah ini amat bermanfaat bagi Anda untuk menghadapi tantangan dari perspektif yang berpusat pada pengguna, mendorong rasa ingin tahu, empati, dan kreativitas. Anda akan belajar bagaimana mendefinisikan masalah, menghasilkan ide-ide kreatif, membuat prototipe solusi, dan mengembangkan hasil berdasarkan umpan balik.
Apapun minat Anda—baik dalam teknologi, bisnis, desain interior, maupun inovasi sosial—Design Thinking memberikan kerangka kerja yang kuat untuk membantumu mewujudkan ide-ide menjadi kenyataan. Di akhir kursus, kamu akan mendapatkan keterampilan berharga dalam kolaborasi, berpikir kritis, dan pemecahan masalah kreatif yang sangat dibutuhkan dalam karier modern.
Video pembelajaran Design Thinking ini akan berlangsung selama kurang dari 2 jam dengan materi-materi yang telah disusun sedemikian rupa agar dapat mudah dicerna, dipahami dan dijalankan dengan mempelajarinya sungguh-sungguh. Diharapkan dari materi pembelajaran ini, Anda dapat mewujudkan ide menjadi kenyataan melalui metode Design Thinking.
target_audience: Course ini ditujukan untuk mahasiswa, profesional, dan individu kreatif dari berbagai bidang yang ingin menguasai metode Design Thinking untuk menghasilkan solusi inovatif dan berpusat pada pengguna.

requirements: Completion of both the Colour Essentials and Colour Psychology Principles courses is highly recommended and will provide you with a great foundation for understanding colour harmony and embedding the basic principles of Applied Colour Psychology before continuing your learning journey with Colour and Interior Design.
courses.description:
Are you ready to take your interior designs to the next level? This course will boost your confidence in selecting colours with clarity and precision, helping you craft harmonious palettes with greater intention—enhancing mood, atmosphere, and overall appeal.
Using real-world designer examples and expert insights, you'll discover professional techniques and practical tips for creating successful and consistent colour schemes that truly resonate with your clients. Whether you're designing for a commercial project or your own home, this course provides the tools to build cohesive, impactful designs with confidence.
Learn to plan aesthetically pleasing colour schemes that not only captivate but also strategically shape mood and emotional responses. Whether you're an interior designer, a student, or a home decorator, you'll discover the science-backed principles and artistic flair needed to elevate your designs to a whole new level.


Why Choose This Course?
While colour theory is widely discussed, few approaches truly integrate practical application with deep insight into applied colour psychology. This course bridges that gap—bringing together an exciting mix of art and science to empower you with knowledge, interactive activities, and professional strategies.
By the end, you’ll feel assured in your colour choices, with the confidence to present and implement stunning schemes that leave a lasting impact.


What You’ll Gain


Classify Colours with Confidence – Learn how to identify colour characteristics and group them into harmonious palettes, making colour coordination much easier and more intuitive.
Develop Creative Tools – Learn how to create a personalised tool to inspire and guide you in crafting unique and captivating colour palettes.
Plan Colour Schemes Effectively – Master diverse approaches for creating well-balanced and aesthetically pleasing colour combinations.
Understand Personality & Colour Preferences – Learn how colour connects with personality traits and tailor designs accordingly.
Shape Mood & Atmosphere – Use colour strategically to evoke emotions and enhance the function of a space.
Boost Client Communication & Design Confidence – Present your colour choices with clarity and a solid rationale.
Whether designing for clients or curating your own dream home, this course will equip you with the skills to create colour-rich environments that inspire.


This course is suitable for:
Interior designers/decorators interested in learning a little more about colour
Design students
Anyone who wants to learn about colour for interiors for their own home


What We’ll Cover:


Module 01: Introduction
Introduction and overview with course author, designer and colour consultant expert Bernay Laity


Module 02: Colour Theory
In this section we will be learning about:


Colour terms - the different words and phrases used to describe the different aspects of colour and its characteristics
Colour Models – what they are and the difference between them
The Colour Wheel – the concept of basic colour theory


Module 03. Cool and Warm Colours
The nuances between different colours are often very subtle, yet can completely change the impact of a design. In this section we’ll be learning how to identify this first characteristic of colour, which will help to build your skills for confidently selecting colours for your design projects.


What is meant by cool and warm colours?
How to tell the difference between them
Practice activity


Module 04. Clear and Muted Colours
In this section we’ll be learning how to identify this second characteristic of colour, which will help to build your skills for confidently selecting colours for your design projects.


What is meant by muted and clear colours?
How to tell the difference between them
Practice activity


Module 05. The Harmonising Colour Groups
In this section we discover more about the composition of individual colours and how this is integral to creating harmonious colour combinations for your projects.


How colour characteristics like warm, cool, clear, and muted can be divided into four distinct groups
How colours create visual harmony or disharmony based on whether they share similar characteristics within their group


Module 06. Classifying Colours into Four Harmonising Groups
In this section, you'll gain proficiency in categorising colours into their respective groups and ultimately build your confidence for coordinating colour schemes.


Tips for classifying colours
Practice activity


Module 07: Colour Psychology and Interior Design
In this section we look at what we mean by the term “colour psychology” and how this relates to our understanding of the four Colour Groups and in turn, how this affects personality preferences for not just colour, but shape, form and style. We also take a look at some of the effects of colour on mood and behaviour.
Understanding these principles will add another powerful layer to your design decisions!


The four Colour Groups – key personality traits and preferences for shapes, finishes, forms and styles
Key positive effects of individual colours


Module 08. Practical Design Elements: Evaluating the Room
In this section we take a look at the first step when starting your project – which is to evaluate the room or space you will be designing.


Which practical features and elements to take into consideration
What you need to know about light and how it affects your colour choices
How colour affects the perception of space


Module 09. Creating Your Colour Scheme
This section breaks down the process for planning a colour scheme in to simple, practical steps based on colour theory and professional experience.


What makes an interesting colour scheme? How top designers use colour
Selecting the Colour Group from which to base your design
How to find inspiration for creating a colour scheme
How to use the colour wheel for inspiration
Top tips for successful colour schemes
“Risk free” experimenting with colour


Module 10. Colour and Commercial Interiors
In this section we look at how to apply the concept of the four Colour Groups and colour psychology to commercial design projects.


What is a commercial interior?
How Colour Psychology can be applied to commercial interior design


Module 11: Course Summary
A recap of the key learnings from this course with designer and author Bernay Laity.


Discover Colour
NB. The Colour Essentials and Colour Psychology Principles courses form a comprehensive two-part programme, providing a deeper foundation in colour application and behaviour. Completing both courses is highly recommended for a thorough understanding of how to use colour psychology effectively in design.
target_audience: This course is suitable for professionals working with colour including interior designers and students, as well as home decorating enthusiasts.
Interior Designers & Decorators
Colour Specifiers
Design Students

courses.description:
Premium Home staging Course & Training on using lighting design to transform homes!
Unlock the transformative power of light and elevate your Home Staging skills with our specialized course on environment lighting design.
Light is an essential element that can shape, enhance, and evoke emotions within a space, and understanding how to harness its potential is key to creating captivating and functional environments.
Whether you are a home stager, interior designer, real estate professional, or decorator, this home staging course will teach you the art and science of lighting design.
In this home staging class, you will embark on an illuminating journey through the principles, techniques, and artistry of lighting design. Whether you are an aspiring interior designer, architect, or simply have a passion for creating beautiful spaces, this course will equip you with the knowledge and skills needed to craft stunning lighting designs that leave a lasting impact.


Key Course Features:


Fundamentals of Lighting: Gain a solid foundation by exploring the fundamental concepts of lighting, including light sources, color temperature, intensity.
Designing with Light: Discover the psychology of lighting and its profound impact on human emotions, well-being, and productivity.
Layering and Techniques: Delve into the art of layering light, combining ambient, task, and accent lighting to achieve visually dynamic and functional designs.
Natural and Artificial Lighting: Understand the unique qualities of natural and artificial lighting sources and learn how to maximize their potential in interior design. Discover strategies for incorporating natural light and balancing it with artificial lighting for optimal visual comfort and energy efficiency.
Practical Applications: Apply your knowledge to real-world scenarios through practical exercises and case studies. Design lighting calculations for residential and commercial spaces, retail environments, venues, and more.
Who Should Take This Course?
Home Stagers & Interior Designers wanting to master lighting techniques.
Real Estate Agents & Property Sellers looking to improve home marketability.
Furniture Designers & Decorators who need expert staging techniques.
Homeowners Preparing to Sell and wanting to boost home appeal with lighting.
Anyone Interested in Home Staging, Interior Design & Lighting Design.
The course provides a Highly Specialized Application of Lighting Design which is essential for aspiring Engineers , Designers , Architects and Interior Designers.


Why Take This Course?


Best Home Staging Lighting Course – Designed for professionals & beginners.
Master Home Staging & Interior Lighting – Essential for designers & home stagers.
Step-by-Step Lighting Training – Covers home staging, interior decoration & lighting impact.
Exclusive Downloadable Resources – Access lighting guides, staging templates & project files.




Why Join our global community of experts and professionals?


Experienced and Licensed Educators: Learn from experienced and licensed teachers who bring extensive knowledge and expertise in lighting design to the course.
Quality Teaching Methods: Benefit from high-quality teaching methods, including engaging lectures, practical exercises ensuring an effective and immersive learning experience.
Globally Diverse Student Community: Join a vibrant community of students from around the world, providing opportunities for cultural exchange and diverse perspectives on lighting design.
Highly Reviewed Academy: Gain confidence in the course's credibility through positive reviews and feedback from previous students who have successfully completed and benefited from our program.
Industry-Relevant Curriculum: Access a curriculum designed to align with industry practices and helpful skills that will make a difference in your professional Development.
Personalized Feedback and Support: Receive personalized feedback and guidance from instructors, ensuring your progress and addressing any questions or challenges you may have along the way.
Recognized Certification: Upon successful completion of the course, earn a recognized certification that can enhance your professional credentials and demonstrate your proficiency in lighting design.
Continuous Learning and Updates: Access ongoing learning resources, updates, and alumni benefits to stay connected to the latest advancements.
Whether you aspire to become a professional home stage, lighting design specialist or simply want to elevate your interior design skills, this course will empower you to transform spaces into captivating, functional, and immersive environments through the art and science of lighting design. Embark on this illuminating journey and master the intricate interplay between light, space, and emotions. Join Us and Unleash your creativity with the power of light!

courses.description:
Diseño de Interiores Basado en Naturaleza Biophilic Design
Integra la Naturaleza en Tu Hogar: Explora Luz, Plantas y Materiales Naturales
Instructor: Arquitecto Álvaro García  Actualizado: Octubre del 2025 Requisitos previos: Ninguno


Descripción del Curso:
Si deseas integrar la naturaleza en tu hogar y explorar cómo la luz, las plantas y los materiales naturales pueden transformar tus espacios, este curso es perfecto para ti. Imagina crear ambientes que no solo sean estéticamente agradables, sino que también promuevan tu bienestar y conexión con el entorno natural. Bajo la guía del Arquitecto Álvaro García, un profesional con más de 150,000 estudiantes formados, aprenderás paso a paso cómo aplicar el diseño biofílico en interiores, fusionando armoniosamente la naturaleza con la arquitectura.


No necesitas tener experiencia previa para embarcarte en esta formación. Este curso está diseñado tanto para principiantes como para profesionales que desean profundizar en el diseño basado en la naturaleza. Con contenido actualizado a julio de 2023, te asegurarás de estar al día con las últimas tendencias y técnicas que están revolucionando el mundo del diseño de interiores.


A lo largo del curso, comprenderás los fundamentos del diseño biofílico, explorando sus componentes clave y aprendiendo a planificar y diseñar espacios que integren elementos naturales de manera efectiva. Aplicarás estos conocimientos en proyectos reales, considerando aspectos técnicos y prácticos que garantizarán el éxito de tus diseños. Te sumergirás en niveles avanzados del diseño biofílico, trabajando en proyectos y estudios de campo que te permitirán especializarte y descubrir nichos de mercado en este creciente ámbito.


Dominarás herramientas profesionales como AutoCAD para dibujo 2D, diseño 3D y técnicas de renderizado de imágenes fotorrealistas, lo que te permitirá visualizar y presentar tus proyectos con un alto nivel de detalle y realismo. Además, mejorarás tus habilidades en edición fotográfica para enriquecer la presentación de tus diseños y captar la atención de clientes y colegas.


Una de las grandes ventajas de este curso es su flexibilidad. Tendrás acceso al contenido de por vida, sin horarios fijos y desde cualquier dispositivo, ya sea tu computadora, tableta o smartphone. Podrás avanzar a tu propio ritmo, seleccionando las secciones que más te interesen y revisando las lecciones siempre que lo desees. Si surgen dudas o necesitas asesoramiento, contarás con el soporte personalizado del instructor y formarás parte de una exclusiva comunidad de aprendizaje, donde podrás compartir experiencias y proyectos con otros apasionados del diseño biofílico.


El curso te ofrece recursos adicionales, como materiales descargables, actividades prácticas y enlaces de interés que enriquecerán tu formación. Al completar el curso, recibirás un certificado que acreditará tus nuevas competencias en diseño de interiores basado en la naturaleza, potenciando tu perfil profesional y abriendo nuevas oportunidades en un mercado cada vez más consciente de la importancia del bienestar y la sostenibilidad.


Esta formación está dirigida a diseñadores de interiores, arquitectos, paisajistas y cualquier persona interesada en integrar la naturaleza en los espacios habitables. No importa si estás iniciando tu carrera o si ya cuentas con experiencia; este curso te proporcionará las herramientas y conocimientos necesarios para crear ambientes que mejoren la calidad de vida de las personas y contribuyan al cuidado del medio ambiente.


No pierdas la oportunidad de aprender con uno de los instructores más reconocidos en el sector. Conviértete en un experto en Diseño de Interiores Basado en Naturaleza Biophilic Design y lleva tus habilidades al siguiente nivel. Atrévete a dar este importante paso en tu carrera y comienza a crear espacios que inspiren y conecten a las personas con la naturaleza. Te esperamos dentro del curso para iniciar juntos este apasionante viaje hacia la fusión del diseño y el entorno natural. ¡Inscríbete ahora y comienza a transformar tus ideas en realidad!


Itinerario Formativo:
Introducción a la plataforma de formación Udemy

Planificación y Diseño
Aplicaciones del Diseño Biophilic
Aspectos Técnicos y Prácticos
