Metodología de Aprendizaje:
Recuerda que este curso incluye lecciones en vídeo fullHD con audio de estudio (compatible con TV, PC, Mac, tablet y smartphone), artículos didácticos, actividades, animaciones, ilustraciones, proyectos paso a paso, recursos descargables, links de interés, acceso de por vida, certificado de finalización, tutorización online, y una exclusiva comunidad de aprendizaje privada que nos ayudamos aportando nuestras experiencias en el foro de comunicación del curso.
La modalidad de este curso te permite que empieces y acabes cuando tú quieras, marcando el ritmo de la clase según tu disponibilidad. Puedes volver a visualizar lo que te interese, saltar el contenido que ya domines, hacer preguntas, resolver dudas, compartir tus proyectos... Puedes elegir ver todas las lecciones de forma secuencial (lineal) y aprovecharlas al máximo la formación, pero también puedes decidir ver este curso como una guía de referencia.
Las clases están claramente organizadas en secciones y lecciones, puedes decidir visualizar solo las clases que te resulten más importantes según tus necesidades formativas. La mayoría de las lecciones son independientes para que puedas comprender los conceptos de cada lección sin tener que ver las lecciones anteriores del curso.
Para seguir el programa formativo propuesto no ser requieren conocimientos previos, ya que la formación se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0. El curso está orientado a aquellos profesionales que quieran ampliar sus skills (habilidades) y conocer múltiples trucos, consejos, recursos y recomendaciones, de la mano del instructor best seller Álvaro García, con más de 150.000 estudiantes formados. Además la formación disponen de acceso automático al contenido, sin limitación de tiempo, disponibilidad 24/7 (24 horas al día los 7 días de la semana), sin caducidad y con garantía de devolución.
Con la alta definición de los vídeos (vídeo fullHD y audio de estudio) conseguirá no te perder detalle. Podrás ver las clases las veces que requieras para recordar y perfeccionar tus habilidades como diseñador. Tendrás la posibilidad de preguntar, pedir opinión y ayuda al instructor, además de compartir tu experiencia de aprendizaje con los demás alumnos del curso, tan apasionados como tú, repartidos por todo el mundo. Seleccionamos cuidadosamente los contenidos y producimos cada curso para garantizar una experiencia de aprendizaje online integral y de la máxima calidad.


¿A qué esperas?, este curso es ideal para ti, atrévete a convertirte en un experto y expresa tus ideas de la forma que siempre has deseado. Adelante, nos vemos dentro de la formación ;)

courses.title: Design Principles for a Simple and Organised Room
courses.bio: Step-by-Step Ideas to Redesign with Purpose
objectives: Diagnose why a room feels cluttered or chaotic—and what to do about it.
Apply key design principles like zoning, alignment, and simplification.
Choose storage solutions that match real-life use, not just aesthetics.
Create a visually calm space using shape, color, and unified styling.
requirements: There are no prerequisites for this course—it's designed to be beginner-friendly and accessible to anyone interested in home design.
courses.description:
Design a room so well it never needs decluttering. Learn to diagnose visual clutter, master spatial clarity, and choose storage that truly fits your lifestyle. Discover how design—not constant tidying—creates lasting calm.
What is this class about?
In “Design Principles for a Simple and Organised Room,” architect Ana Marcu invites you behind the scenes of a real-life family room transformation. This in-depth course reveals how to design interiors that feel effortless, tidy, and harmonious—without the endless cycle of decluttering. Ana challenges the myth that organizing starts with purging and instead guides you through the essential design principles that naturally keep a space simple and functional.
What will you learn?
How to analyze what’s working and what isn’t in any room
The hidden design reasons why rooms look messy or disjointed
Key principles like zoning, visual alignment, and simplification
How to choose and place storage that suits your lifestyle
Techniques using shape, style, and color to create unity and calm
Who is this class for?
This class is for anyone overwhelmed by visual clutter, confused by interior layout, or striving for a more peaceful and intentional home. Whether you're decorating a new room or refining an existing one, you’ll walk away with practical strategies and deep insights into design logic.
Why should you take this class?
Rather than chasing minimalism or organizing fads, you’ll learn to apply foundational design principles that lead to a space that feels easy to maintain. The lessons are grounded in Ana’s architectural training and extensive experience—and are delivered in a friendly, thoughtful format designed to transform how you see your home.
target_audience: This course is for anyone who feels frustrated by constant clutter, confused by room layout, or wants a space that feels calm and easy to maintain. It’s ideal for renters, homeowners, creatives, parents, or anyone designing or rethinking a room—no design experience needed. If you’re tired of tidying and want to design your way out of chaos, this class is for you.

Learn the basics of bedroom interior design — no expensive software or high-end computer needed. This practical online course is perfect for beginners and anyone planning a home renovation. You’ll explore color theory, create a moodboard in Canva, develop a layout plan, and bring your design to life with a 3D render using HomeStyler — a simple, intuitive online tool.
The course also covers fundamentals of ergonomics and key principles of functional layout design, helping you create spaces that are not only beautiful but also comfortable and practical.
Whether you dream of becoming a designer or just want to create a beautiful space for yourself, this course will guide you through the essential steps in a clear, accessible way.
Your instructor is Anna Rokha, a professional interior designer with over 15 years of experience. She holds a Master’s degree from a Spanish university and runs her own studio, Rokha Interiors, which has been featured in Ideas for DESIGN + DECOR and CASAVIVA. Anna is known for her practical teaching style and ability to make complex design concepts simple and engaging.
This course is designed to spark your creativity and give you real, hands-on skills — even if you’ve never opened a design program before. All you need is internet access and your imagination.
Join now and start creating beautiful, functional interiors — for yourself or your future clients!

It’s perfect for: Aspiring interior designers with no prior experience Creative individuals who want to try designing their first room Students or hobbyists interested in layout, color, and 3D visualization Anyone who wants to create a beautiful bedroom design step by step using free tools like HomeStyler and Canva No professional background required — just a desire to learn and create!

courses.bio: Create Practical Kitchens, Layout Principles, 3D Models and Realistic Rendering for Architects & Interior Designers
objectives: Master the fundamentals of SketchUp kitchen design and professional modeling techniques.
Learn cabinet placement principles and the optimal positioning of key kitchen elements like refrigerators, stoves, and sinks.
Work with materials, textures, and colors to create aesthetically pleasing and practical kitchen designs.
Apply advanced lighting techniques to enhance the atmosphere and usability of your kitchen.
Dive into kitchen rendering in Lumion to produce realistic visualizations of your models.

Explore interior design Styles to create customized kitchens for diverse preferences.
Practical tips for cabinet makers, interior designers, and students working on academic projects.

courses.description:
Note: In this course, we go beyond simple modeling – we teach you how to create highly detailed kitchen designs in SketchUp with advanced techniques and expert tips, ensuring your projects stand out with precision and realism.


Have you ever found it challenging to design the perfect kitchen layout or accurately model your kitchen components?
Do you want to master professional kitchen design using SketchUp and create realistic renderings of your models?
Would you like to design a kitchen that is both functional and visually stunning, with every component in its ideal place?


If you answered "yes" to these questions, this course is exactly what you’ve been looking for! In this course, you will learn step-by-step how to model a kitchen in SketchUp, from cabinet placement and ergonomic layout to material selection and lighting techniques. We will also dive deep into rendering your kitchen in Lumion to create photorealistic visualizations. This course is packed with real-world examples and practical applications, designed to help you develop precise, customizable kitchen models that can be used in both professional and personal projects.


Headlines:
Learn how to model a professional kitchen layout with the correct dimensions and component placement using SketchUp.
Master the art of Placing detailed kitchen components such as cabinets, sinks, stoves, and more with SketchUp 3D modeling.
Discover how to use materials and textures to create realistic kitchens, and apply lighting techniques to enhance the design.
Understand how to create a functional kitchen by working with ergonomic principles and practical design tips.
Learn to create stunning Lumion renderings that showcase your kitchen designs in photorealistic quality.


By the end of this course, you'll have the skills to design a fully functional and aesthetically pleasing kitchen and render it in Lumion for professional-grade visualizations. Whether you're a cabinet maker, interior designer, or a student, you'll be ready to create impressive kitchen models that stand out.
And remember: when you purchase this course, I'll be here to help answer any questions and guide you through the process!

requirements: 特になし
courses.description:
こんにちは、Udemy講師の亀井泉です。
「差別化する店舗デザインに！色彩理論を生かした内装＆インテリアマスター講座」に興味を持っていただき、ありがとうございます。


みなさんは今までにこんな悩みを感じたことはありませんか？


・インスタ映えした投稿で人気が出たあのお店、うちのお店もそんな写真を撮ってもらいたいけど、どうしたらいいのだろう？


・せっかくお店に来てもらっても、なぜかゆっくりしてもらえない、もっとゆっくりしてもらえたら商品の売り上げも上がるのに。


・壁の色を変えてみたい、でもリフォームはやってみないとわからないから、高いお金を払って失敗したくない、選ぶ時にわかれば経費の節約になるのに。
こんな悩みに対して、自分では解決できないな、とあきらめてしまっていませんか？


この講座ではそんなお悩みや困り事を、色彩理論を取り入れて解決する方法がわかります。


「色でそんなこと解決できるの？」と思った人もいることでしょう。
実は人は、自分が思っている以上に色に誘導されたり、影響されています。
例えば缶ジュースの自動販売機、寒くなってくると『温かい』と書いてある赤やオレンジの文字を探しますよね？
お客様にアピールして買ってもらうために、温かさを感じる赤を使っているのです。夏は逆に冷たさを感じる青でアピールしています。これも色の効果を使った一例で、講座の中でも詳しく解説しています。


お店の宣伝するために目立つ看板を作りたいと思っても、それがお店のイメージに合っていなかったら、逆に品格を下げてしまうものになってしまいます、どんな色を使って宣伝するかも他店と差別化するために大切なことです。（プロモーション動画では、看板についても詳しく説明していますのでぜひそちらもご覧ください）
お店の品格を上げながら、さらに目立つ宣伝もでき、他店との差別化をする、これらもすべて色の効果を使ってできることなのです。


色の効果を使いこなすには、持って生まれたセンスが必要なのではと思われがちですが、そんなことは全くなくて、学んで磨くことができます。
色彩感覚、色彩センスと呼ばれるものは、もともとある人の場合は知識がなくても感覚で色を組み合わせることができます。
ない場合でも、学べば同じことです。今は色彩関係の仕事をしている私も、持って生まれたセンスはなかったからです。


自分の配色センスに自信がなかった私は、いつも同じ色の組み合わせばかりでした。「世の中にある色全部をどう組み合わせたら良いのか書いてある本があったらいいのに」と思っていたほどです。
クラフト作りをしていた時に「並んだ素材から自由に色を選んでね」と言われても、いつも同じ色しか選べなかったのは、自由に選ぶその方法がわからなかったからでした。
そんな状態をなんとかしたくて、色相環を使った色彩の勉強を始めましたが、すぐに役立つ内容ではありませんでした。


色相環は知識として色彩理論を覚えるためには大切なものです。しかし色相環を覚えてもすぐに使えないのは、色を使うための肝心な部分が抜けているからなのです。


私はこれまでの10年間に、本屋さんのコーナーが一角作れるくらいに色彩関連の本を買って読んだり、多くの色彩の講座を受講して勉強しています。しかしそのほとんどは、一般的な色彩理論と色の効果の解説といった同じような内容になっているのが現状です。
もちろん知識を覚えることも理解を深めるためには大切ですし、私も色彩理論の講座をしていますので必要なことはわかった上で言えるのは、
ダイアード、トライアドといった配色技法を覚えたり、たくさんある色の名前を覚えたりといった、一般的な広い知識だけでは、それを応用することができないのです。
なぜなら色はあらゆるものについているため、具体的に関連付けて説明されなければ応用して使うことはできないからです。
例えば、
・赤は勝負の色だから、商談を決めたい時にはネクタイは赤に、とか、色の効果は聞いたことがある、でもインテリアに関係ないよね？どう結びつけるの？
となりますよね。
この講座は、私自身がこれまでに「なぜそうなるのだろう、あーこれが理由だったのか」と学びながら納得したこと、色を視点にしたコンサルティングで得た実際の経験、実績から、すぐに見た目を変えることができた方法をまとめたものです。
もともと私自身が感覚で選べるような色彩センスもなく、色選びが苦手だったからこそ、何を知ったら応用できるのか、その部分が良くわかるのです。


最後に講座内容のまとめです、
色彩理論の本質的な部分、何を知っていたら理解できるか、をシンプルに無駄のない内容にしてまとめました。
本質とは短い言葉でまとめられるもので、必要以上に長く説明しなくても伝わります。
本質を知って初めて、細かなテクニックがなぜそうするのかの、理由がわかります。
そして、なぜその色なのか、の理由がわかると、その色を選んだ意味がわかります。
なんとなく選んでいた色から、根拠を持って選んだ色に変わることで自分の選んだものに自信を持てるようになるのです。


また、本質の知識は一度学べばずっと使える知識です。
樹木に例えれば、幹の部分をしっかり学べるように作ったのがこの講座です。この後、専門分野を知る必要があれば枝葉の部分、たくさんある細かなテクニックや専門用語を学ぶことをおすすめします。

学んだだけではなく、学んで生かす、使える、までを考えていますので、長時間の講座ではなく短時間で何度も見てもらえるように、必要なことだけを凝縮しました。
何が違うから合わないのか、どうすれば合うのかを、全て画像を使いながら解説しているので、感覚ではなく自分の眼で見て理由がわかります。

色を使わないのはもったいない、宝の持ち腐れ、です。
店舗内やオフィスなど、宝である色を使う場面はあらゆる場所にあります。
エントランス付近の看板、ポスター、店舗内ではインテリア、椅子やテーブル、メニューやチラシ類、他にもトイレ、バックヤードの従業員スペース、などがありますよね。


お金のかからない、太陽からのめぐみ、宝である色の効果を使いこなして、あなたのイメージする未来を手に入れてください。
それでは、コースの中でお会いしましょう。
target_audience: 内装やインテリアに悩む店舗経営者、担当者
集客力を伸ばしたい店舗経営者、担当者
居心地のよいお店を作りたい店舗オーナー
SNS映えする写真を撮れるお店にしたい
従業員が気持ちよく働ける環境を作りたい

courses.title: Basics of Service system
courses.bio: Different types of building services that we use in the buildings to make buildings more functional, comfortable.
objectives: Have keen knowledge of each and every aspect of your site.
Use of multiple services in your design for the better output.
Installation of the equipment’s associated with the services should be done properly to achieve a good design output.
Services are linked to one another, so if you end up with one error it can disturb the chain.
Do provide with necessary amount of equipments for the purpose, use of overcapacity in any equipment will result in loss of energy.

Basics of Service System Hinglish Versio: Essentials of Drainage System - Traps and inspection chamber
LPG, Solar heaters and refuse chute system
Basics of Service System English Version: Essentials of Drainage System - Traps and inspection chamber
LPG, Solar heaters and refuse chute system

requirements: No Requirement
courses.description:
Building service system are the systems installed in buildings to make them comfortable, functional, efficient and safe. They can include fire safety, HVAC (heating, ventilation and air conditioning), lighting, plumbing, ICT (information and communications technology).
Building service system play a central role in contributing to the design of a building, not only in terms of overall strategies and standards to be achieved, but also in the position of vertical service risers, routes for the distribution of horizontal services, drainage, energy sources, sustainability.
Building services engineers influence the architecture of a building and play a significant role on the sustainability and energy demand of a building. Within building services engineering, new roles are emerging. Building services engineers play a significant role in combating climate change. As such, a typical building services engineer has a wide-ranging career path in five categories: -


Design: designing layouts and requirements for building service system for residential or commercial developments.
Construction: supervising the construction of the building service system, commissioning systems and ongoing maintenance.
Environmental: developing new energy saving methods for construction, designing new and improved energy conservation building service system.
Heating, ventilation and air conditioning (HVAC): specializing in the design, development, construction and operation of HVAC systems.
Electrical technology: specializing in the design and development of electrical systems required for safe and energy sustaining operation of buildings and ensures that they are not using low quality materials for the safety of a project.
target_audience: Anyone who wants to learn about Building service system.
Aspiring and professional artists, students, architects, interior decorators, interior designers and set designers
Enthusiasts who want to pursue a career in different domains of Interior Design
Anyone who wants knowledge about colors, textures, painting, and waterproofing
For all entry level to advanced Interior Designers

courses.title: Principles and Elements of Interior Design
courses.bio: Foundation course exposing the students to the Principles and Elements of Interior Designing
objectives: Study of the various principles of designing
Guidelines for creating design
Study of the various elements of designing
Applying the elements of designing
Putting it to use - creating your own personal style

Principles & Elements of Interior Design: Which one is more appealing & why?

requirements: None
courses.description:
To create beautiful designs consistently, we need to follow a pattern, we have to select some elements and then arrange them in an orderly way to create design which meet some standards
There are 5 elements and 7 principles, which are the foundation for creating a successful plan and should be considered at every step in the design process
These guidelines for creating designs are termed as principles of design. Knowing designing is not enough, there are some rules and must adhere to, while designing these are called design principles
Of course, while it is true that rules are made to be broken, until you have a solid understanding of what those rules are and why they exist, you will never understand how best to bend them to your advantage
Understanding the basic elements and principles of interior design will bring you one step closer to understanding how and when to break the rules in creating your own personal style statement.... and that is where the creativity lies
This course covers all of the above in a very succinct and comprehensive way
target_audience: Anyone interested to know about home decoration & wants to have a foundational knowledge

courses.title: Furniture Planning & Procurement
courses.bio: Transform Spaces Through Thoughtful Furniture Design
objectives: Understand the Principles of Furniture Planning
Explore the Role of Furniture in Storytelling and Experience Design
Develop a Designer’s Eye for Style, Scale, and Harmony
Master the Furniture Procurement Process
requirements: A basic understanding of interior and architectural design
courses.description:
Have you ever stepped into a beautifully designed space—a chic office, a cozy library, or a stylish hotel—and wondered what makes it feel so special? The secret often lies in the artful selection and placement of furniture. Furniture Planning and Procurement in Architectural Design is a comprehensive course designed to help you master this essential but sometimes overlooked aspect of interior and architectural design.
Led by Branka Knezevic, a licensed architect and founder of Plana Architects in Los Angeles, this course will guide you through the process of designing with furniture in a way that balances aesthetics, function, and storytelling. Whether you’re an aspiring designer, an architecture enthusiast, or someone with a passion for beautiful spaces, you’ll gain practical skills and valuable insights to turn your design ideas into reality.
Throughout the course, you will learn how to thoughtfully select furniture pieces that complement architectural intent and support user experience. You’ll explore principles such as scale, proportion, flow, and style harmony, ensuring every piece contributes to the overall narrative of the space. Beyond design, the course also covers the procurement process—how to source, budget, and collaborate with vendors to bring your vision to life efficiently and sustainably.
By the end of this course, you’ll have the confidence and knowledge to approach furniture planning as a strategic design tool. You’ll be ready to transform ordinary interiors into extraordinary environments that leave lasting impressions—spaces that look fantastic, function seamlessly, and tell compelling stories. Join me on this exciting journey to unlock the magic of furniture design and procurement in architecture!
target_audience: Anyone who’s passionate about creating beautiful, meaningful spaces

courses.title: 20 Consejos para el DISEÑO de TU CASA
courses.bio: Asegúrate de conocer los principios básicos de Diseño para Tu Hogar ¡antes de comenzar con la Reforma!
objectives: Encontrar tu Estilo y tu Idea de proyecto, apoyándote en Referencias y Tendencias actuales.
Distribuir tu vivienda: Dormitorios, Baño y Cocina. Además de muchos trucos de Interiorismo y Decoración.
Crear una Paleta de Colores y Materiales, conociendo la teoría del color y cómo influye a tus estados de ánimo.
Diseñar espacios y ambientes jugando con la LUZ. ¡Tanto Natural como Artificial!

20 Tips para el Diseño de Tu Hogar: Tip 10. Pasillos y otros espacios de transición

requirements: No se necesita experiencia previa. Únicamente muchas ganas de aprender trucos profesionales para majorar tu hogar y tener una mente abierta!
courses.description:
Quiero compartir contigo mis tips de Diseño como Arquitecto con más de 10 años de experiencia en el Diseño de casas, tanto de obra nueva como de reformas, ayudando a personas como tú a renovar su hogar.


Averiguaremos si Las ideas que tienes en mente sobre la Distribución de tu hogar son las mejores, si puedes sacar provecho a los pasillos, de qué color (y por qué) vas a pintar las paredes de casa, si hay demasiadas tendencias y estilos por todas las redes que no sabes ni por dónde empezar, o cómo debes priorizar tu presupuesto en cuanto a Obra y Decoración, y si conoces los tres niveles de Decoración...
Todas estas preguntas son un breve resumen de las inquietudes que tenían mis clientes antes de trabajar conmigo, y es muy probable que tú también te sientas identificado con alguna de ellas.


Te daré consejos fundamentales sobre Distribución de Tu Hogar, Tendencias y Estilos, Materiales y Texturas, Aprovechar la LUZ Natural y Crear Ambientes con la LUZ Artificial, además de a Priorizar Tu Presupuesto ¡entre otros muchos consejos y trucos más!


El curso lo he desarrollado con muchísimo cariño y está desarrollado en vídeos cortos y amenos para que disfrutes del proceso y lo puedas seguir a tu propio ritmo

courses.title: How to Use Interior Design for Mental Health
courses.bio: Unlock the Power of Design: Transform Your Home into a Haven for Well-being

MODULE 1: FOUNDATIONS OF EMOTIONAL DESIG: 1.1 Understanding the emotional impact of interior design
MODULE 3: HOLISTIC APPROACH TO INTERIOR: 3.1 Addressing the 7 dimensions of wellness in interior design
CONCLUSION: Congratulations—you've made it through the course!

requirements: Open to all levels, this course is tailored to inspire and empower everyone.
courses.description:
Have you ever walked into a space and felt instantly at ease, energized, or inspired? That's the power of emotional design, and it's at the heart of this unique interior design course. This isn't just about aesthetics; it's about understanding the profound impact of our surroundings on our mental and emotional well-being.
This course is designed for anyone who wants to create a home that truly supports their well-being, regardless of their design experience. Across four transformative modules, we'll explore the science behind emotional design, delving into the key principles of color psychology, lighting design, ergonomics, biophilic design, and more. You'll learn how these elements interact to create spaces that influence our mood, energy levels, and cognitive function.
More than just theory, this course is about practical application where you'll learn how to implement design strategies to create a more nurturing and supportive home environment. We'll cover everything from optimizing sleep and improving air quality to creating personalized spaces that reflect your unique personality and promote emotional balance. By the end of this course, you'll have the knowledge and confidence to transform your home into a sanctuary for well-being.

Join me on this journey to create a home that you not only love, but that also makes you feel good and thrive.
target_audience: This course is for anyone who wants to create a more supportive and nurturing home environment. Whether you're a homeowner, renter, design enthusiast, wellness practicioner, or simply someone seeking greater well-being, you'll find practical tools and actionable insights to transform any space.

courses.description:
Bahubali, Bajirao Mastani, Padmavat, Devdas, the Great Gatsby, Gone Girl, Eat Pray Love, etc. yeh kuch aisi films hai, where you can find the apt placement of accessories. Kisi film mein parde, rugs, cushions, candles, vases, sculptures, artefacts, etc. yeh jahan aur jis tarah se rakhe gaye hai usse uss jagah mein rehne wale ya kaam karne wale logon ki lifestyle clearly samajh aati hai.
Hum jis nazariye se cheezon ko dekhte hai wahin hum indirectly absorb karne lagte hai. Toh agar aapko ek kaabil Interior Stylist banana hai, then these films are a must-watch for you aur agar aap kisi jagah ko visit karte hai in the future, then you need to have a keen eye for the detailing in all the décor aspects.
Selection aur placement of accessories se na sirf aapki lifestyle bayan hoti hai balki, they are a reflection of your personality. Isiliye, aapko kaafi mindfully inko select aur place karna chahiye. Kya aapko art and accessories ki poori variety, aur unse related styling ideas ke bare mein janana hai?


IDL ke Art & Accessories module se aap seekhenge bahut kuch, baat hogi variety of art and accessories, their significance, purpose, challenges, solutions, do’s and don’ts, and styling ideas ki, aur hamare liye bahut saare gyan ki.

2. Aspiring and Professional Artists, designers, stylists, students, architects, set designers, entrepreneurs, and other learners
3. One for All – beginner to proficient individuals in the domains of Interior Design
4. Enthusiasts who want knowledge on furniture and furnishings in residential and commercial spaces

courses.title: Designterior: De la zero la locuința perfecta
courses.bio: Du-ți pasiunea pentru design interior la următorul nivel
objectives: Înțelegerea principiilor fundamentale ale designului interior modern.
Dobândirea abilităților practice pentru planificarea spațiului și aranjarea mobilierului.
Dezvoltarea capacității de a aplica teoria culorilor și a conceptelor de iluminare în amenajarea interioarelor.
Familiarizarea cu utilizarea platformei Homestyler pentru crearea de planuri de pardoseală și simularea decorării virtuale a spațiilor.
Învățarea tehnicilor de maximizare a spațiului și de optimizare a funcționalității în diferitele încăperi ale unei locuințe.
Dezvoltarea capacității de a crea designuri de interior moderne, echilibrate estetic și funcțional, potrivite pentru diverse stiluri de viață.

Teoria Designului Interior: Culorile și Semnificația lor în Designul Interior
Lumină și Iluminare în Designul Interior
Materiale și Texturi în Designul Interior
CELE MAI IMPORTANTE ASPECTE DE LUAT ÎN CONSIDERARE ÎN AMENAJAREA UNEI LOCUINȚE
Antreprenoriat în Designul Interior: Primii Pași în Afacerea de Design Interior

requirements: Experiența anterioară în design interior nu este necesară. Cursul este potrivit atât pentru începători, cât și pentru cei cu cunoștințe minime în domeniu.
courses.description:
"Designterior: De la zero la locuința perfecta" este cursul ideal pentru toate categoriile de cursanți, de la amatorii pasionați de design interior până la profesioniștii în imobiliare, oferindu-le oportunitatea de a-și dezvolta abilitățile și cunoștințele în acest domeniu fascinant.
Indiferent dacă sunteți un începător curios, un proprietar de casă în căutare de inspirație, un student de design sau un profesionist în imobiliare interesat să vă extindeți competențele, acest curs vă va ghida pas cu pas în călătoria dvs. către excelență în designul interior modern.
Veți explora fundamentul designului interior, învățând principii de bază precum echilibrul, proporția și armonia și cum să le aplicați în crearea de spații estetice și funcționale. Veți descoperi diverse stiluri de design interior și veți învăța cum să le integrați în proiectele dvs. pentru a satisface nevoile și preferințele clienților.
Cursul va aborda, de asemenea, aspecte practice esențiale, cum ar fi planificarea și proiectarea spațiilor interioare, utilizarea instrumentelor și tehnologiilor moderne de design, dezvoltarea portofoliului și marketingul personal.
Pe parcursul cursului, veți beneficia de îndrumare și suport personalizat, feedback și ghidare pentru a vă ajuta să vă îmbunătățiți abilitățile și să vă dezvoltați în continuare în cariera dvs. de designer de interior.
Cu "Designterior: De la zero la designer de interior", veți obține fundația solidă de cunoștințe și abilități de care aveți nevoie pentru a vă lansa o carieră de succes în designul interior. Aștept cu nerăbdare să vă ghidez în această călătorie captivantă în domeniul designului interior!
target_audience: Amatorii de Design Interior: Persoanele pasionate de design interior care doresc să-și dezvolte abilitățile și cunoștințele pentru a-și decora propriile locuințe într-un stil modern și funcțional.

Proprietarii de Case: Persoanele care dețin sau intenționează să dețină o casă și doresc să învețe cum să proiecteze și să amenajeze diferitele încăperi pentru a le transforma în spații confortabile și atrăgătoare.

Studenții de Design: Studenții sau absolvenții de facultate cu interes în designul interior care doresc să-și completeze cunoștințele teoretice cu abilități practice și să își îmbunătățească portofoliul.

Profesioniștii în Imobiliare: Agentii imobiliari, designeri de interior sau alte persoane din domeniul imobiliar care doresc să își extindă competențele pentru a oferi consultanță și servicii suplimentare clienților lor în domeniul designului interior.
Entuziaștii de DIY: Cei pasionați de bricolaj, dornici să învețe să-și decoreze spațiile în mod creativ și economic.

courses.title: Interior Lighting Design 102
courses.bio: Radiate Creativity: Elevate Your Skills as a Lighting Design Expert.
objectives: You will understand how the function of a space affects lighting designs.
You will learn how to optimize daylight, and create maintenance plans to prolong the life of your lighting installations.
You will gain the practical skills needed to design a lighting installation that is both functional and visually pleasing.
You will explore the concept of glare rating and understand its importance in creating a safe and comfortably illuminated space.
requirements: You need to have completed Interior Lighting Design 101.
courses.description:
Building upon the solid foundation established in Interior Lighting Design 101, this advanced course delves deeper into the captivating realm of interior lighting design. By enrolling in Interior Lighting Design 102, students will take their proficiency to new heights, gaining invaluable insights and honing their skills to create awe-inspiring lighting experiences.
Part I: Understanding Visual Requirements and Integration
Explore the visual demands of a space and its impact on lighting design.
Learn to effectively design for the interplay between natural and electric lighting.
Discover the benefits of integrated lighting and air conditioning systems.
Understand the factors influencing the depreciation rate and maintenance schedule of lighting installations.
Part II: Applying Principles to Designs
Apply the acquired knowledge and skills to your own designs.
Utilize the lumen method for calculating the required luminous flux.
Implement recommended minimum-maintained illuminance values.
Create designs that meet industry standards using Universal Glare Rating values.
Learn the proper methods to ensure appropriate luminaire spacings.
By the end of the course, you will be equipped with:
In-depth understanding of visual requirements and their influence on lighting design.
Proficiency in integrating natural and electric lighting effectively.
Knowledge of the advantages of integrated lighting and air conditioning systems.
Insights into the factors affecting lighting installation depreciation and maintenance.
Practical skills in applying recommended illuminance values and Universal Glare Ratings.

courses.title: A Hygge Home.
courses.bio: Danish Interior Design Principles for Cosiness & Comfort.
objectives: Understand the concept of Hygge and its significance in Danish culture and interior design.
Identify and apply the four principles of Hygge to create a cozy and inviting home atmosphere.
Explore the five key elements of Hygge interior design, including ambience, natural materials, textiles, vintage items, and cozy nooks.
Gain practical knowledge and tips for incorporating Hygge elements into your home decor.
Develop an appreciation for the role of lighting, color schemes, and textures in creating a Hygge-inspired space.
Complete a class project, using a worksheet, to personalize your home and make it more Hygge, enhancing comfort and well-being.
requirements: There are no specific requirements or prerequisites for taking this course. It is designed to be accessible to learners of all levels, including beginners. No prior knowledge or experience in interior design is necessary.
courses.description:
Hygge is a Danish word describing a mood of contentment, cosiness and comfort and it covers many dimensions of a person's life. In this class, I explain the interconnection between Hygge and the Danish culture and focus on the elements of design that make a home, particularly Hygge.
Along the way, you will learn fun facts about Denmark and some great examples of Danish Design.
This class is divided into three parts:
1. The 4 principles of Hygge and the activities that describe them
2. The 5 elements of interior design that make a home, particularly Hygge
These are Ambience, Natural Materials, Textiles, Vintage ( plus Antique and Handmade) things and The Nook.
3. Class project. A worksheet for you to go through and start making your home more Hygge
According to the European Social Survey, the Danes are the happiest people in Europe. While there are many political, cultural and social reasons why that is, Hygge is also one aspect that contributes to that. Hygge is about creating a feeling, not a style, so why not actively design your home for more comfort and cosiness?
For more reading, have a look at the book "The Little Book of Hygge: The Danish Way to Live Well." by Meik Wiking.
target_audience: People who wish to understand where to focus their attention to create a more cosy and comfortable home.

This course is designed for individuals who have an interest in interior design and wish to create a cozy and comfortable home environment. Whether you are a homeowner, renter, or simply looking to enhance the ambiance of your living space, this course is perfect for you.

courses.description:
Dans cette formation de Samuel Logossou, vous allez apprendre, comment modéliser de A à Z l’intérieur réaliste d’un salon sous Cinema 4D. Vous allez explorer les différentes étapes de création d’un intérieur pour le rendu photo réaliste dans Cinema 4D.
Vous commencerez par la modélisation des murs et des fenêtres du salon, ensuite vous apprendrez à modéliser étape par étape un sofa vintage, puis vous terminerez par la modélisation de fournitures et accessoires tels que les tables, les lampes (lampes de tables et murales), les livres, les vases de décoration, les tasses à thé, les coussins, les couvertures, les rideaux, la moquette et plus encore.
Ce cours est dédié au design d’intérieur et vous permettra de maîtriser les différentes techniques de modélisations utilisées dans ce domaine pour mener à bien vos futurs projets.
Au cours de cette formation, vous apprendrez à modéliser des objets simple et complexe. vous apprendrez les techniques de modélisation qui vous permettrons de modéliser tout type d'objet. le but ici est de vous familiariser avec les outils de modélisation dans Cinema 4D. Que vous soyez débutant ou expérimenté, ce cours est fait pour vous.
A la fin de cette formation, vous allez modéliser un salon complet prêt à être texturé, éclairer et rendu avec V-Ray.
target_audience: Tous ceux qui désirent apprendre à modéliser pour le Design d'intérieur

requirements: Preferably a diploma or degree in interior design.
Complete freshers with design experience can also join but might find the course challenging
courses.description:
I am Seema Khosla, the head designer, and director of Ideas Kitchens. In this modular kitchen design course, I will impart the expertise and knowledge that I have gained over 20 years of creating customized modular kitchens for hundreds of clients.
The modular kitchen designing course is divided into three modules and then goes on to a case-study section.
Module 1 - Structure
a) Utility - Which areas need to be planned in the kitchen and how?
b) Work triangle - Where should the cooking, cleaning, and refrigeration area be located? The ergonomic design will also be taught.
c) Vaastu -Basic guidelines of the ancient Indian architecture system regarding kitchen design.
d) Layouts - What are the basic layouts one can opt for according to the room size available.
e) Appliances - What are the different kinds of kitchen appliances that need to be planned and how much space needs to be left for them.
f) Client need assessment - What questions to ask your client so that you can assess their needs and design a kitchen in accordance to those


Module 2 - Engineering
a) Modules - How is a module made and what are the different kinds that make up a modular kitchen?
b) Material - What is the material that your kitchen modules should be made of and why? You will be taught the advantages and disadvantages of each and which material to use under what site conditions.
c) Shutter finishes - What are the outer finishes one can opt for? From laminates to the latest finishes all will be discussed. How it needs to be used and what are the advantages and disadvantages of each will be taught.
d) Countertops- Material that will be used for your working counter and how it should be installed
e) Base module - Sizes and hardware that can be installed
f) Wall module - Sizes and hardware that can be installed
g) Tall module - Sizes and hardware that can be installed


Module 3 -  Aesthetic
a) Shapes - Which layout should you select and for what function. Everything from an island, a peninsular to a breakfast counter will be discussed. How modules can be altered to create your own unique design
b) Colour - The design element and color come from different aspects of a kitchen. Cabinetry is just one part of it.
c) Light - How and where to use lights to give your design an extra edge
d) Themes - How different elements of design can be used to create a cohesive theme.


Case-studies
In the last part of the course, we will discuss 3 kitchens that were executed by us. We will discuss it in accordance with the three modules that have been taught to you so that you get an idea about how modular kitchen design is executed.
I am confident that after completing this course you will be able to design kitchens that will cater to all the needs of your clients and advance your career.
target_audience: Students
Interior designers
Architects
Kitchen Designers
Design professionals
People building a home
Modular Kitchen makers
Home makers

courses.title: Experto Diseño e Iluminación en Arquitectura e Interiorismo
courses.bio: Convierte en un Experto en Iluminación de Espacios y Ambientes Interiores de la mano de Arquitectos. ¡Domina la Luz!
objectives: Planificar iluminación interior con capas: ambiente, tarea y acento, creando atmósferas coherentes y funcionales.
Este curso cubre cómo la iluminación puede afectar la percepción de un espacio, y cómo usar la iluminación de manera efectiva en el diseño de interiores.
Ofrecer las herramientas para ser capaz de dirigir, diseñar e implementar un proyecto de iluminación desde el inicio hasta la entrega de la obra al cliente.
Calcular lux, uniformidad y UGR; ajustar ópticas, potencias y distribución para confort visual y eficiencia.
Capacidad para otorgar un carácter diferenciador al espacio, mediante el dominio de los registros sensibles de la luz, los materiales, y el color.
Seleccionar luminarias por CRI, CCT, flujo y fotometría; interpretar IES/LDT con criterio profesional.
Integrar control: dimerización, escenas, sensores y horarios para ahorro energético y experiencia adaptable.
Diseñar luz para vivienda, retail, oficinas y hospitality con criterios estéticos, técnicos y de marca.
Cumplir normativa (EN 12464-1, CTE, WELL) y documentar proyectos con informes y planos claros.
Resolver deslumbramientos, sombras y puntos calientes mediante iteración guiada y pruebas de campo.

requirements: Interés por adquirir conocimientos de iluminacióm a nivel profesional.
Para la realización de este curso (Iluminación en Arquitectura e Interiorismo) no ser requieren grandes conocimientos previos, ya que la formación se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0.

Para la realización de este curso no vas a necesitar el equipo informático más potente del mercado, ya que el software empleado en la formación se encuentra perfectamente optimizado y su uso es muy fluido en todo tipo de equipos, tanto en PC como en Mac.
Cuando compres el curso vas a poder acceder a las clases cuando y donde quieras. El curso se queda en tu cuenta de Udemy para siempre. :)
Muy recomendable si ya trabajas en el sector de la decoración y el interiorismo y deseas actualizar y mejorar tus conocimientos teórico-prácticos para progresar en tu trabajo.

Un curso que profundiza en cómo la iluminación puede cambiar la percepción y la utilidad de un espacio, cubriendo tipos de luces, posicionamiento, y cómo combinarlas con los colores y materiales del espacio.
courses.description:
Experto Diseño e Iluminación en Arquitectura e Interiorismo
"Convierte en un Experto en Iluminación de Espacios y Ambientes Interiores de la mano de Arquitectos. ¡Domina la Luz!"
Instructores: Arq. Álvaro García y Arq. Lucía Fernández. Actualizado: Octubre del 2025 Estudiantes: +6.100 Requisitos previos: Ninguno


Descripción del Curso:
Convierte la luz en tu herramienta más poderosa. En este curso de diseño de iluminación para arquitectura e interiorismo aprenderás a planificar escenas que realzan espacio, marca y bienestar: luz natural y artificial, temperatura de color, CRI, control de UGR y niveles de lux. Dominarás criterios estéticos y técnicos, selección de luminarias, control y eficiencia energética, con ejercicios guiados y renders que comunican tu propuesta con claridad.
Impartido en Udemy y orientado a todas las edades y niveles, obtendrás un método paso a paso con plantillas, checklists y casos reales (vivienda, retail, oficinas y hospitality) para aplicar desde el primer día. Saldrás con un portafolio demostrable, criterios para cumplir normativa y un proceso repetible que aumenta tu valor profesional. Si buscas dominar la luz y diferenciar tus proyectos, este curso experto de iluminación es tu siguiente salto.
Con esta formación Iluminación en Arquitectura e Interiorismo, adquirirás los conocimientos teóricos y las competencias necesarias para desarrollar una profesión de futuro, como es la de diseño de iluminación. Es la formación que se necesita para especializarse en el sector y encontrar un empleo que supere las expectativas.
El sector del diseño y la decoración, así como sus oficios y profesiones, están íntimamente relacionados con el mundo artístico y de la creación, para ello la iluminación cobra un aspecto fundamental en nuestros ambientes. Si te planteas formar parte de este ámbito en plena expansión y quieres potenciar tus inquietudes artísticas, no pierdas la oportunidad de estudiar diseño de iluminación. Un curso centrado en la iluminación, su impacto en los espacios y cómo utilizarla correctamente para lograr diferentes efectos y estados de ánimo. Un curso que aborda cómo utilizar la iluminación de manera efectiva para mejorar la estética y la funcionalidad de un espacio.
En el curso aprenderás a manejar paso a paso una herramienta gratuita de iluminación profesional: Dialux.  La iluminación es una herramienta muy útil, y más ahora cuando los decoradores, diseñadores y arquitectos han potenciado sus ventajas para recrear espacios atractivos a través del manejo de la luz. Se entiende la iluminación arquitectónica como un instrumento de diseño arquitectónico, pudiendo conseguir interesantes resultados sin necesidad de realizar grandes inversiones en la edificación.
Entre los principales softwares de iluminación encontramos: AGI32, Calculux Radiance, Microlux, LightCalc, Visual 3D DialuxEvo, G2 Deals, Lumenlux, etc.


Itinerario Formativo:
Introducción y Bienvenida al curso "Experto en Iluminación en Arquitectura e Interiorismo"
La Iluminación Natural y Artificial en la Arquitectura de Interiores
Introducción al Software de Diseño de la Iluminación
Diseño de Iluminación de Sala Salón-Cocina
Diseño de Iluminación de Vivienda
Diseño de Iluminación en Uso Terciario. Oficinas
Finalización y Salidas de Nuestro Proyecto de Iluminación
Recursos para el Alumno del curso "Experto en Iluminación en Arquitectura e Interiorismo"
Emisión del Certificado de Finalización del Curso "Experto en Iluminación en Arquitectura e Interiorismo"


Objetivos del curso:
Dominar el diseño de iluminación interior de principio a fin: análisis de luz natural, capas de iluminación (ambiental, tarea y acento), selección de luminarias, lectura fotométrica (lux, CRI, CCT), control de deslumbramiento (UGR), cálculos y eficiencia energética. Aprenderás a construir una narrativa lumínica coherente y a comunicarla con renders e informes profesionales.


Salidas profesionales:
Prepárate para roles como Lighting Designer, Técnico de Iluminación, Prescriptor o Consultor en vivienda, retail, oficinas, hospitality y museografía. Construirás un portafolio demostrable, dominarás normativa (p. ej., EN 12464-1, CTE) y aportarás valor en experiencia de usuario y ahorro energético, tanto en freelance como en estudios de arquitectura e ingenierías MEP.


Dirigido a:
Arquitectos, interioristas, ingenieros, instaladores y estudiantes de todos los niveles que quieran pasar de “colocar luminarias” a diseñar atmósferas medibles, saludables y estéticas. Impartido en Udemy, con casos reales, plantillas y checklists para aplicar de inmediato y dominar la luz con seguridad técnica y criterio creativo.


Metodología de Aprendizaje:
Recuerda que este curso incluye lecciones en vídeo fullHD con audio de estudio (compatible con TV, PC, Mac, tablet y smartphone), artículos didácticos, actividades, animaciones, ilustraciones, proyectos paso a paso, recursos descargables, links de interés, acceso de por vida, certificado de finalización, tutorización online, y una exclusiva comunidad de aprendizaje privada que nos ayudamos aportando nuestras experiencias en el foro de comunicación del curso.
La modalidad de este curso te permite que empieces y acabes cuando tú quieras, marcando el ritmo de la clase según tu disponibilidad. Puedes volver a visualizar lo que te interese, saltar el contenido que ya domines, hacer preguntas, resolver dudas, compartir tus proyectos... Puedes elegir ver todas las lecciones de forma secuencial (lineal) y aprovecharlas al máximo la formación, pero también puedes decidir ver este curso como una guía de referencia.
Las clases están claramente organizadas en secciones y lecciones, puedes decidir visualizar solo las clases que te resulten más importantes según tus necesidades formativas. La mayoría de las lecciones son independientes para que puedas comprender los conceptos de cada lección sin tener que ver las lecciones anteriores del curso.
Para seguir el programa formativo propuesto no ser requieren conocimientos previos, ya que la formación se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0. El curso está orientado a aquellos creativos que quieran ampliar sus skills (habilidades) y conocer múltiples trucos, consejos, recursos y recomendaciones, de la mano de los instructores Álvaro García y Lucía Fernández. Además la formación disponen de acceso automático al contenido, sin limitación de tiempo, disponibilidad 24/7 (24 horas al día los 7 días de la semana), sin caducidad y con garantía de devolución.
Con esta formación disfrutarás aprendiendo desde dónde quieras, sin tener que desplazarte, sin horarios, con quién quieras, según tus necesidades y disponibilidad. Aprenderás con un instructor avalado por miles da alumnos satisfechos en todo el mundo (comentarios certificados). Conocerás las técnicas, métodos, trucos y flujos de trabajo de este sector creativo. El docente te transmitirá su sabiduría y conocimientos con pasión a la vez que las explicaciones concisas, claras, sencillas y con un enfoque profesional en cada clase. Podrás conseguir un  certificado homologado personalizado y firmado por tu instructor en cada formación. De está forma podrás compartir tu título en tu portafolio, currículo, en redes sociales...
Con la alta definición de los vídeos (vídeo fullHD y audio de estudio) conseguirás no perder detalle. Podrás ver las clases las veces que requieras para recordar y perfeccionar tus habilidades como diseñador. Tendrás la posibilidad de preguntar, pedir opinión y ayuda al instructor, además de compartir tu experiencia de aprendizaje con los demás alumnos del curso, tan apasionados como tú, repartidos por todo el mundo. Seleccionamos cuidadosamente los contenidos y producimos cada curso para garantizar una experiencia de aprendizaje online integral y de la máxima calidad.


¿A qué esperas?, este curso es ideal para ti, atrévete a convertirte en un experto y expresa tus ideas de la forma que siempre has deseado. Adelante, nos vemos dentro de la formación ;)
target_audience: Arquitectos e interioristas que desean dominar diseño de iluminación interior: capas de luz, confort visual y eficiencia energética.
Estudiantes y recién graduados que buscan un curso de lighting design en español para crear portafolio y dar el salto profesional.
Ingenieros, instaladores y técnicos que necesitan justificar proyectos con lux, UGR, CRI y planos claros para obra.

courses.title: İçMimari Tasarım ve Uygulama Süreçleri - Kafe/Restaurant
courses.bio: Eğitimde, boş bir mekanın, tüm iç mimari süreçleri üzerinden bir fast-food restaurantına dönüştürülmesi anlatılmaktadır.
objectives: Bir Kafe/Restaurant Projesi'nin İçMimari Tasarım Süreçleri (+Proje Dosyaları)
İçMimari Proje Süreçleri
Proje Hazırlık Aşamaları
Konsept Proje ve Planlama
İçMimari 3D Modelleme Aşamaları ve Sahne Oluşturma
Malzeme, Işık ve Kamera Ayarları
Vray Render Ayarları
Uygulama Proje Paketleri: Döşeme-Duvar-Tavan Planları
Hareketli ve Sabit Mobilya Plan ve Detayları
Elektrik Süperpoze
Islak Hacim Detayları
Asma Tavan Detayları
Endüstriyel Mutfak Çözümü
Doğrama Detayları
Uygulama ve Bitmiş Mekan Görselleri
requirements: İçMimari Proje Sektörüne İlgi Duymak
courses.description:
*Proje dosya indirme linkleri güncellenmiştir.
Bu eğitimimizde, sizlerle, daha önce Teamwork Architects olarak, hayata geçirdiğimiz bir Kafe Projesini paylaşıyor olacağız. Bu projeye ait tüm 2 boyutlu Autocad çizimlerini, 3 boyutlu render görsellerini ve bu görselleri oluşturmakta kullandığımız 3Ds Max modelini, eğitim dosyalarının içinde, sizlerin kullanımına sunuyoruz. Autocad dosyalarımız; rölöve çizimi, şematik plan çizimi, uygulama paketleri ve detay projelerini içeriyor. Modelimiz ise, mekânımızda kullandığımız tüm malzemeleri ve objeleri içermekle birlikte, ışık ve kamera ayarları yapılmış olarak, render almaya hazır bir sahne olarak sizlere sunuluyor.
Eğitimimizin içeriğinde, öncelikle İç Mimari proje süreçlerini anlatıyor ve Kafe Projemiz üzerinden bu süreçleri detaylandırıyoruz. Proje hazırlık aşamaları kapsamında, tüm iç mimari süreçler için geçerli olan, işvereninizle yapacağınız ilk toplantı ve bu toplantının öneminden bahsediyor, rölöve sürecinde dikkat etmeniz gereken noktaların üzerinde duruyor ve sizlerle kafemize ait rölöve görsellerini ve çizimleri paylaşıyoruz. Konsept sürecinde, mekânda plan organizasyonumuzu oluştururken aldığımız kararları etkileyen unsurlar üzerinde duruyor ve bu kafe projesinin planlama sürecini anlatıyoruz. Uygulama projelerinde ise, iç mimari uygulama proje paketleri içeriğinden bahsediyor ve bu kafe için hazırladığımız uygulama paketleri üzerinden, bu süreci detaylandırıyoruz.
Eğitimimizin son aşamasında ise, bu mekânın, teslim edilen çizimlere göre yapılan uygulamasına ait, şu anki kullanımını gösteren görselleri ve videoları paylaşıyoruz.
Amacımız, bu eğitimin sonunda, iç mimari kafe projesi oluştururken esas almanız gereken parametreler hakkında bilgi sahibi olmanız ve teslim ettiğimiz proje dosyaları ile tasarım konusundaki gelişimize katkı sağlamak. Eğitimimizde görüşmek üzere.
target_audience: İçMimari Proje Sektörüne İlgi Duyan Herkes

courses.title: Learn Shopping Mall & Office Lighting Design System
courses.bio: A complete beginners guide to commercial professional lighting designing system.
objectives: You can learn the whole industrial lighting design system
You can design your own home or office ligting system
You will learn to use the DiaLux Evo software
A complete beginner to expert course
requirements: A laptop or a mobile is all you need
courses.description:
1.Luminaires Selection For Rooms
Luminaires selection depends on the various factor like room size and area and lux value, polar curve , color temperature in Kelvin, IP ratings , so we will learn all these terms then we will go into the next step .
2. Fixture Selection
In this section we learn all three things that is required for lighting system like Lamps , Distributors or Diffusers and about     the enclosure . And each part has many different types and categories depending on the application.
3. Calculation Of Loads
After selection the luminaires, will show you the exact procedure to find out the power those lams are going to consume, and depending on that next steps will be carried out.
4. Selection of Cable, Circuit Breaker and Panels
Selection of these materials is not a simple and easy things but through out the lessons we will make that happen.
5. Wiring Of Luminaries
After every equipments is selected we will make a circuit and check.
6. Make the circuit in AutoCad electrical
We will use AutoCad 2021 version.
7. Learn to make 3D drawing from 2D sketch
8. Use of DiaLux Software to design & visualize office lighting system
This is the most important part of this whole course.
target_audience: for electrical technicians , engineers & for the people with curious mind.

Skeleton Method of Assembly Design

courses.description:
Advanced CATIA v5

Goal of this course is to learn how to start/work with complex and large assemblies. The is course is focused developing advanced skills and concepts of CATIA v5 that will help us to create a robust assembly design.


Target Audience :
•  Engineering Freshers
•  Design Engineers
•  Working Professionals with a minimum of 6 months of hands on experience on CATIA v5.


Prerequisites :
•  Basics if Engineering Design
•  Fundamentals of CATIA v5


Course Contents:
Section #1. Introduction
Section #2. Setup your Environment
•  Settings and Preferences
•  Set up Keyboard Shortcuts
•  Customize workbench and restore toolbars
Section #3. Basic of Advanced Engineering Design
•  Design Intent and Relations
•  Paste Special
•  Ribs, Slots and Solid Combine
•  Multi-section Solid
Section #4. Introduction to Surfacing Workbench
•  Point, Line and Plane
•  Project, Intersect and Parallel Curve
•  Join and Extract Operations
•  Manipulation and Extrapolate in Surfacing Work Bench

Section #5. Advanced Features of CATIA v5

*Find attachments in the course content to play with for respective topic.

courses.title: Introduction of Furniture Design
courses.bio: Learn about furniture design from carpentry to modular furniture (Hindi + English)
objectives: Have keen knowledge of each and every aspect of furniture designing in interior space.
Use of different types of furniture and its typology in interior design.
Installation of the equipment’s knowledge associated with the services should be done properly to achieve a good design output.
Carpentry and modular furniture design and its uses.
How to implement furniture design effectively in interior designing.

Furniture Design Hinglish Version: Who will benefit from Modular Design
Furniture Design English Version: Who will benefit from Modular Design

requirements: No Requirement
courses.description:
Interior design is connected with the design of spaces and what makes those spaces is Furniture. That’s why its important to learn about furniture design and their various aspects of this ‘making’.
Furniture design changes with the space. Analysing how a space will be used and what activities will take place in that space determines which furniture is involved. Function determines which furniture and furnishings like appliances, fittings and other accessories are necessary for that particular space,
Furniture matters the most when a design is implemented as furniture bringing a function to any space. For example, a living room in any house. How would you know where to sit when you are watching TV or having a discussion? You will look around for a seating element, right? This is because furniture clearly states intended function of the living room. The right combination of pieces of furniture gives rooms a balanced look and feel. It makes even the intentionally unused spaces look more beautiful and can help to create an airy, yet well put together feeling in any room.
For making any furniture carpentry is basics and as an interior designer one should have proper knowledge about methods of carpentry and different types of furniture styles.
target_audience: Anyone who wants to learn about interior designing and furniture design.
Aspiring and professional artists, students, architects, interior decorators, interior designers and set designers
Enthusiasts who want to pursue a career in different domains of Interior Design
Anyone who wants knowledge about site execution and different materials used in furniture design
For all entry level to advanced Interior Designers

courses.title: A Calm Home.
courses.bio: Interior Design for More Well-Being.
objectives: Gain insights on how interior design influences emotions and contributes to a calm and serene environment.
Learn to organize your space to alleviate feelings of overwhelm and enhance tranquility.
Discover ways to incorporate elements of nature into your home to boost overall well-being.
Understand why organic shapes promote calmness and learn to incorporate them into your interior design.
Learn to associate specific calming habits with designated spaces in your home to foster regular relaxation.
Understand how maintaining your home and its items can enhance feelings of stability and grounding.
requirements: This course is open to everyone, regardless of previous experience or knowledge in interior design.
courses.description:
In this class, you will learn how the space around you can influence how you feel and how to design your home in a way that is more conducive to calm.
Each lesson delves into a unique design aspect and its impact on your sense of calm and offers practical steps to incorporate these ideas at home.
Order: Explore how the organisation of your environment influences your feelings of overwhelm. Here you’ll learn tips for arranging furniture to foster a greater sense of order and peace.
Nature: Understand nature's profound impact on our well-being and discover ways to incorporate elements of nature into your home to enhance tranquillity.
Round Shapes: Discover why we're instinctively drawn to round or organic shapes and how they contribute to a sense of calm. Here you’ll learn how to introduce more organic forms into your space.
Soft and Heated: Here, we delve into why soft and warm textures comfort us, especially in distressing times, and learn how to integrate these elements into your home design.
A Habit of Calm: Learn how calmness can be cultivated by associating it with specific habits and specific spaces at home. Here you’ll learn how to design a space that supports specific calming habits.
Better with Time: Understand how the perceived value, fragility, and quality of items in your home can impact your feelings of calm. Here you’ll learn how to create a space that makes you feel relaxed rather than on edge.
Fix, Tighten and Repair: Learn the importance of maintaining your home items and how a well-kept home can provide a sense of stability and grounding.


This course is designed for anyone keen to comprehend the connection between space design and emotional well-being. Rest assured; you don't need to overhaul your home or spend a fortune to create a serene and calming environment.
target_audience: People who wish to design their home to create a calm and relaxing environment for themselves.
Homeowners and renters: Whether you're settling into a new home or wanting to rejuvenate your current living space, this course will provide valuable insights into crafting a calmer atmosphere.
Interior design enthusiasts: For those who have a passion for designing spaces, this course offers a unique perspective on how to create environments that enhance well-being.
Wellness advocates: If you're interested in personal well-being and mindfulness, this course offers practical ways to extend this approach to your physical surroundings.
Students studying architecture, design or psychology: This course combines design principles with an understanding of emotional well-being, providing useful insights for students in these fields.
DIY project lovers: If you enjoy hands-on projects and personalizing your space, this course offers a wealth of ideas to inspire your next endeavor.

courses.title: 3D MAX AND CORONA RENDERS IN ARABIC كورس شامل 3 دي ماكس
courses.bio: 3D max and corona render In Arabic
objectives: - Fundamentals of 3ds Max for Interior Design – Master the essential tools and interface.
-Modeling Interior Spaces – Learn how to create walls, furniture, and decorative elements.

-Lighting & Materials – Understand realistic lighting setups and material applications.
- Rendering High-Quality Interior Visuals – Learn rendering techniques for professional-quality images.

Learn how to use cameras and make shot by cameras

CHAPTER 01 - BASICS AND WORKSPACE: Chapter 01 Introduction - what we will learn.

requirements: * Basic computer skills – You should be comfortable using a computer and installing software.
* 3ds Max installed – Having 3ds Max (any recent version) installed on your computer is required.
* No prior experience needed – This course starts from the basics, making it suitable for beginners.
* A passion for interior design – This course is designed for architects, interior designers, and anyone interested in 3D visualization.
*A decent computer – A computer with a good processor and graphics card is recommended for smooth performance while working with 3ds Max.
courses.description:
كورس شامل لتعليم التصميم الداخلي باستخدام برنامج 3ds Max، مقدم بطريقة عملية ومبسطة للمبتدئين والمستويات المتوسطة.
خلال الكورس، ستتعلم كيفية:
بناء موديل ثلاثي الأبعاد متكامل باستخدام Editable Poly وModifiers.
توزيع الأثاث وتخطيط الفراغ الداخلي باحترافية.
التعامل مع الإضاءة والخامات والرندر الواقعي باستخدام Corona Renderer.
إخراج صور نهائية بجودة عالية قابلة للعرض على العملاء أو إضافتها لأعمالك.
الكورس يحتوي على مشروع كامل لتصميم غرفة معيشة، يتم شرحه خطوة بخطوة، مما يجعلك تطبق كل ما تتعلمه بشكل عملي.
لا يشترط أن تكون خبيرًا — الكورس يبدأ معك من الأساسيات وحتى مستوى متقدم في الإظهار المعماري.

This course offers a practical and structured approach to learning 3ds Max from the ground up.
Whether you're a beginner or looking to strengthen your skills, you will learn:
The core tools and interface of 3ds Max
How to model objects using Editable Poly and Modifiers
Scene setup, organization, and best practices for efficient workflows
Lighting, camera placement, materials, and rendering using Corona Renderer
and make interior design for scene.
By the end of the course, you'll be able to create complete 3D scenes with confidence and produce high-quality visuals suitable for various fields such as architecture, product design, or animation.
No previous experience required  — just your interest in 3D.
target_audience: - Interior Designers & Architects – Professionals looking to enhance their 3D visualization skills.
- Students & Beginners – Anyone starting in interior design or architecture and wants to learn 3ds Max.
- Freelancers & 3D Artists – Those who want to create high-quality interior renders for clients.
- Design Enthusiasts – Anyone interested in transforming ideas into realistic 3D interior visuals.

courses.title: Sukulent Bakımı ve Aranjman Hazırlanması
courses.bio: Sukulentlerinize nasıl bakacağınızı öğrenin ve onlarla etkileyici aranjmanlar oluşturun!
objectives: Sukulentleri nasıl diğer bitkilerden ayırırız?
Seçerken nelere dikkat etmek gerekir?
Toprağı nasıl olmalıdır?
Hangi sıklıklarla nasıl sulanmalıdır?
Çoğaltma teknikleri nelerdir? Yapraktan çoğaltmanın aşamaları nelerdir?
Besin uygulamanın zamanı ve kullanım aralıkları nasıl olmalıdır?
Hastalıklarla nasıl baş ederiz? Unlu bitle savaşmanın yolları nedir?
Aranjman yapmanın ilk aşaması, drenajın incelikleri nedir?
Adım adım, aranjman nasıl yapılmalıdır?
Aranjman yaparken nasıl bir tasarım yaklaşımı izlenmelidir?
Aranjman tasarlarken düşünülmesi gereken kriterler nelerdir?
requirements: Sukulent
Geçirgen toprak
İnce uçlu sulama kabı
Dikeceğiniz bir kap
courses.description:
Sukulent dünyasına hoş geldiniz. Sukulentler binlerce türüyle, renkleriyle ve yapısıyla hepimizin ilgisini çekiyor. Bu estetik bitki içinizde saklı yaratıcı enerjiyi ortaya çıkartmak için size alan tanıyacak. Dersler  size bu hobi için bir kılavuz görevi görecek. Sukulentleri nasıl seçeceğinizden başlayarak, onlara nasıl bakmanız gerektiğini anlatacağım. Sonra hastalıklarıyla baş etmeniz için doğal çözümler önereceğim. Kursun sonunda da birlikte bu inanılmaz bitkilerden bir aranjman oluşturacağız.
Sukulentler bakımı zor gibi gözükebilir. Ancak bunun sebebi doğru bilgiye sahip olmamaktır. Bu kurstan  ve verdiğim püfleri uyguladıktan sonra bakımının sanıldığı kadar zor olmadığını göreceksiniz. Ben bu püfleri her derste bilgi notları olarak sizlerle paylaştım. En sonda özet kısmında bunları bir araya getirerek tekrardan size aktardım.
Kursu ben size altı yıllık deneyimlerim sonrasında hazırladım. İki yıldır atölye eğitimleri veriyorum, bu kursla birlikte daha büyük kitlelere ulaşmayı ve aramızaki etkileşimi arttırmayı hedefliyorum.  Kursta bulamadığınız bilgileri ve hobiniz süresince karşılaştığınız sorunları Udemy Soru bölümünden yazabilirsiniz, bunları da cevaplamaya çalışacağım.
target_audience: Çiçek, doğa, kaktüs, sukulent seven
Dekorasyona ilgili
Aranjman tasarımına ilgi duyan

courses.title: Realistic Renders in Blender: Adding 3D Models to Images
courses.bio: Learn to use Blender and fSpy to add a 3D model to an image so that the final render looks as realistic as possible.
objectives: Adding a 3D model to an image.
Rendering a realistic image.
Using the fSpy program.
Adding a 3D model's shadow and reflection to a surface in a photo.
requirements: no previous experience needed
have Blender installed on your computer
courses.description:
Learn to add a 3D model to an image! The first step is to get the perspective of the camera in Blender to match the perspective of the actual camera on which the photo was taken. After that, the 3D model and a plane object will be added to the 3D space. The next step is to make the 3D model form a shadow and, if necessary, a reflection on the surface of the plane object so that they appear to be on top of a surface that is in the image. This makes the end result as realistic as possible. Lastly, an image of the view is rendered.
Skills you will learn:
using fSpy to define the right perspective for the camera
forming a shadow on a surface in an image
forming a reflection on a surface in an image
using the node editor in the Compositor window
using rendering layers and collections
rendering the view into an image
This course is meant for 3D artists who already have some experience with Blender, but if you are a motivated beginner, this course is great for you as well. The programs used in the course, ie Blender and fSpy, are free.
The course includes two exercises that will get you familiar with the process. In the first exercise, a 3D model of a clock will be added to a wall in an image so that the clock forms a shadow on its surface. In the second exercise, 3D models of three coffee mugs will be added on top of a glass table in an image so that they will form both a shadow and a reflection on it. To do this they must be rendered in separate rendering layers and after that those layers will be added on top of each other using the node editor in the Compositor window.
After the course, you can use the skill you have learned to add any 3D models on the surfaces of different kinds of images. This skill is often used, for example, when you want to fill an image of an empty apartment with realistic 3D models of furniture.
target_audience: slightly experienced Blender users who want to learn Interior Design skills
motivated beginners who want to learn a little more advanced use of Blender
those who want to learn how to use fSpy

El más importante requisito para realizar este curso es el entusiasmo y la motivación por aprender nuevas habilidades que aumenten tus competencias profesionales.
courses.description:
EXPERTO en Diseño de Salones y Estar.
Convierte en Profesional del Diseño, Decoración, Organización y Planificación de Ambientes Estar y Salones Domésticos.
Instructores: Arq. Álvaro García y Arq. de Interiores Mariangeles Fernández  Actualizado: Octubre del 2025 Estudiantes: +6.000 Requisitos previos: Ninguno


Descripción del Curso:
Impulsa tu perfil con “EXPERTO en Diseño de Interiores Salones y Estancias de Estar”, la formación en Udemy que transforma espacios cotidianos en ambientes funcionales y elegantes. Aprenderás a dominar layouts inteligentes, zoning, proporción y escala del mobiliario, iluminación por capas, color y texturas para crear salones cómodos y fotogénicos. Es 100% online, a tu ritmo y desde cualquier país, apto para todas las edades y niveles, con ejercicios prácticos, plantillas y ejemplos reales.
Al finalizar, podrás convertir un briefing en un proyecto completo: moodboard, planos, renders, memoria y presupuesto, optimizando almacenamiento, circulación y acústica. Construirás un portfolio convincente con antes/después y criterios de estilo (nórdico, minimal, contemporáneo, clásico actualizado), listo para clientes o tu propia vivienda. Optimizado para SEO: diseño de salones, decoración de sala de estar, organización y planificación del salón. Inscríbete hoy y logra resultados profesionales con certificado de Udemy.
Convierte tu pasión por la Decoración de Interiores en un trabajo y aprende las técnicas más novedosas que podrás aplicar en tus propios proyectos. Optimiza el espacio disponible y elige el color, el estilo, la iluminación y el mobiliario más acorde a cada estancia de una vivienda gracias a este curso.
Distribuir correctamente el salón es clave si queremos estar cómodos en nuestra casa, funcionalidad y estética no tienen por qué estar reñidas. En este curso abordarás conceptos como el espacio, el color, la textura, los estilos o la ilumincación aplicados a cada una de las estancias de una vivienda: dormitorios, baños, cocina, salón, pasillos e incluso terrazas y patios. Adquirir una formación integral en esta materia te permitirá conseguir los mejores resultados y presentar al cliente un proyecto de decoración como lo haría un profesional, adaptado a sus gustos y necesidades. No hay que olvidar que en el hogar desarrollamos gran parte de nuestra vida y que es fundamental sentirnos cómodos y a gusto en él para alcanzar el nivel ideal de felicidad y bienestar.
Estilo moderno, clásico, elegante, tradicional, innovador… sabrás ajustarte a las demandas y peticiones de tus clientes para gestionar una decoración perfecta en cada habitación de su hogar, que además sea práctica y con un toque único y diferencial que refleje su personalidad y estilo de vida. Para ello, te formarás en las últimas tendencias de este campo y en las técnicas de decoración y diseño que emplean los profesionales más reputados. Estar al día en este sector incrementará tu prestigio, lo que se traducirá en un aumento del número de personas que deseen contratar tus servicios.

La iluminación, la combinación de colores y la elección y colocación del mobiliario son aspectos fundamentales que debe dominar todo decorador de interiores y que también abordarás durante este curso. Conocerás los distintos estilos decorativos que pueden aplicarse hoy en día y aquéllos que están recibiendo una mayor acogida. Te mostrarán la importancia de optimizar el espacio disponible y hacer un uso eficaz de los recursos y el presupuesto para presentar un resultado final impecable. En los pequeños detalles muchas veces se encuentra la diferencia, así que también aprenderás a incorporar a tu trabajo distintos complementos decorativos.


Itinerario Formativo:
Introducción a Udemy
Bienvenida al EXPERTO en Diseño de Interiores Salones y Estancias de Estar

Diseño y Organización del Espacio Interior

Medición y Presupuesto de la Ejecución Material del Proyecto
Creación de un CV y Portfolio Creativo Impreso y Digital

Recursos para el Alumno del Experto en Diseño y Planificación de Proyectos de Diseño de Salones
Emisión del Certificado de Finalización del EXPERTO en Diseño de Interiores Salones y Estancias de Estar


Objetivos del curso:
Dominarás una metodología integral para diseñar, decorar y planificar salones y estancias de estar con criterio profesional: del briefing al concepto, layout y zoning, circulación y ergonomía del mobiliario, iluminación por capas (ambiental, acento y tarea), paleta cromática y texturas, textiles y materiales, soluciones de almacenamiento inteligente, confort acústico y climatización pasiva. Aprenderás a resolver espacios pequeños y multifuncionales, integrar tecnología y media wall, y documentar tus propuestas con moodboards, planos, renders, memoria y presupuesto, optimizados para búsquedas como diseño de salones e interiorismo residencial.


Salidas profesionales:
Interiorista residencial especializado en salones y zonas de estar, decorador/a, stylist para editoriales y fotografía, consultor/a para retail de mobiliario y marcas de iluminación, creador/a de contenidos y visualizador 3D. Podrás trabajar como freelance o en estudios de interiorismo, reformas y home improvement, plataformas de alquiler vacacional y home staging residencial, fortaleciendo tu portfolio con proyectos aplicables y un certificado de Udemy valorado por clientes y empleadores.


Dirigido a:
Estudiantes y profesionales de diseño de interiores, arquitectura y decoración, así como propietarios y aficionados que desean transformar su salón con criterios técnicos y estéticos. Apto para todos los niveles y edades, 100% online y global, ideal para quienes buscan resultados medibles en distribución del salón, iluminación, color y organización, con procesos claros, plantillas descargables y una mirada funcional y elegante centrada en la vida diaria.


Metodología de Aprendizaje:
Recuerda que este curso incluye lecciones en vídeo fullHD con audio de estudio (compatible con TV, PC, Mac, tablet y smartphone), artículos didácticos, actividades, animaciones, ilustraciones, proyectos paso a paso, recursos descargables, links de interés, acceso de por vida, certificado de finalización, tutorización online, y una exclusiva comunidad de aprendizaje privada que nos ayudamos aportando nuestras experiencias en el foro de comunicación del curso.
La modalidad de este curso te permite que empieces y acabes cuando tú quieras, marcando el ritmo de la clase según tu disponibilidad. Puedes volver a visualizar lo que te interese, saltar el contenido que ya domines, hacer preguntas, resolver dudas, compartir tus proyectos... Puedes elegir ver todas las lecciones de forma secuencial (lineal) y aprovecharlas al máximo la formación, pero también puedes decidir ver este curso como una guía de referencia.
Las clases están claramente organizadas en secciones y lecciones, puedes decidir visualizar solo las clases que te resulten más importantes según tus necesidades formativas. La mayoría de las lecciones son independientes para que puedas comprender los conceptos de cada lección sin tener que ver las lecciones anteriores del curso.
Para seguir el programa formativo propuesto no ser requieren conocimientos previos, ya que la formación se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0. El curso está orientado a aquellos creativos que quieran ampliar sus skills (habilidades) y conocer múltiples trucos, consejos, recursos y recomendaciones, de la mano de los instructores Álvaro García y Mariangeles Fernández. Además la formación disponen de acceso automático al contenido, sin limitación de tiempo, disponibilidad 24/7 (24 horas al día los 7 días de la semana), sin caducidad y con garantía de devolución.
Con esta formación disfrutarás aprendiendo desde dónde quieras, sin tener que desplazarte, sin horarios, con quién quieras, según tus necesidades y disponibilidad. Aprenderás con un instructor avalado por miles da alumnos satisfechos en todo el mundo (comentarios certificados). Conocerás las técnicas, métodos, trucos y flujos de trabajo de este sector creativo. El docente te transmitirá su sabiduría y conocimientos con pasión a la vez que las explicaciones concisas, claras, sencillas y con un enfoque profesional en cada clase. Podrás conseguir un  certificado homologado personalizado y firmado por tu instructor en cada formación. De está forma podrás compartir tu título en tu portafolio, currículo, en redes sociales...
Con la alta definición de los vídeos (vídeo fullHD y audio de estudio) conseguirá no te perder detalle. Podrás ver las clases las veces que requieras para recordar y perfeccionar tus habilidades como diseñador. Tendrás la posibilidad de preguntar, pedir opinión y ayuda al instructor, además de compartir tu experiencia de aprendizaje con los demás alumnos del curso, tan apasionados como tú, repartidos por todo el mundo. Seleccionamos cuidadosamente los contenidos y producimos cada curso para garantizar una experiencia de aprendizaje online integral y de la máxima calidad.


¿A qué esperas?, este curso es ideal para ti, atrévete a convertirte en un experto y expresa tus ideas de la forma que siempre has deseado. Adelante, nos vemos dentro de la formación ;)

courses.title: All About Interior Decoration
courses.bio: Essential layers of Decoration
objectives: Learn different layers of decoration
Learn about color in detail
