Know the difference between upholstery & non upholstery
Learn how various types of fabrics can be used in decoration
Understand the use of accessories & light & many more things
requirements: Booklet, pen/pencil
courses.description:
The way the word '"Decoration" is used colloquially, it could mean arrangement or selection of ornamental objects, arrangement of picture frames, placement of furniture, color of walls, selection of flooring, carpets, flower vases among many other things.  While some of them may be true in the sense of the word, it has many other aspects to it. In fact, it has 7 dimensions to it. It covers all the areas of the habitat right from the ceiling to floor and everything in the middle
1.  Color
2.  Flooring
3.  Upholstery items
4.  Accent fabrics
5.  Non-upholstered furnishings
6.  Accessories
7.  Plants and lighting


Post the completion of this course, one can expect to have a sound understanding of the various dimensions of decoration. It is like a multilayered petals of a flower, the more the layers the more beautiful the flower.
If one also has a sound understanding of the interior designing aspects then one can go on to use this course to lay the foundation for a very good Interior Designer and Decorator. That way, while one is designing, one can anticipate or ask for the client's preferences/plans for decoration and develop the designs so as to have minimum alterations in design later on.
I have developed a separate & very comprehensive course titled "Interior Designing and Decoration"  that addresses both the design and decoration aspects.
target_audience: Anyone interested to know about home decoration

With an interest in Interior Design

The course is structured in order to help you with interior design. It is structured with the intention to make you feel knowledgeable, aware and intelligent. It is structured with the mindset that although interior design is vast and commonly used, not many people understand the theory, the principles and the amount of effort it requires.
There is a reason as to why interior design became a profession of its own. There is a reason why it is worth around billions and billions of pound each and every year. Think about it, you probably have visited an Ikea store, watch shows detailing people design their dream homes, often dream of your own dream home. probably spend some time in furniture stores and I am certain that you love art. All of this encompasses interior design. It would be a wasteful opportunity not to make the most of this knowledge. Not to understand interior design for yourself, so you can use it when playing with your own space no matter how small.
The job market for interior design grows everyday. Even more so, you as an individual have the opportunity to create work for yourself. If a friend needed an opinion on wallpaper or preffered art, or to gather an idea of color theory, that's where you can help.


So care to join me?

courses.title: Material Code in Interior Design: Complete Guide to Material
courses.bio: Master materials in interior design — selection, combinations, zones, and smart choices.
objectives: Learn how to choose the right materials for kitchens, bathrooms, living rooms, and bedrooms.
Understand the pros and cons of wood, stone, metal, textiles, glass, paints, and more
Discover how to mix materials to create harmony, style, and functionality in any space.
Gain skills to plan budgets: where to invest in materials and where you can safely save.

How to Choose, Combine, and Create Atmosphere.
How Wood, Stone, Glass, and Fabric Shape Your Interior
Materials by Zone. Design That Work.
Avoiding Material Mistakes: Mistakes When Choosing Materials and How to Avoid Them
What You Can Save On and What You Cannot.

requirements: • No prior knowledge of interior design is required. • A passion for interiors and curiosity about materials is enough. • A notebook or digital device for taking notes and saving ideas. • Optional: access to design magazines or Pinterest for inspiration.
courses.description:
Course Description
Materials are the true foundation of every interior. They define not only how a space looks, but how it feels, works, and lasts over time. A perfect layout or expensive furniture will never save a project if the materials are chosen poorly. That is why understanding materials is the secret every successful designer relies on.
In this course, I will guide you step by step into the world of materials in interior design. You will learn how to choose them consciously, how to combine them beautifully, and how to avoid the costly mistakes that most people make. We will explore wood, stone, glass, metal, textiles, paints, and even innovative coatings — and I will show you exactly where each one works best.
The course includes six complete lessons:


Why design starts with materials and how they create atmosphere.
The Material Code: wood, stone, glass, fabrics, and more.
Room by room: which materials to use in kitchens, bathrooms, living areas, and basements.
Impressive material combinations that create a “wow” effect.
The most common mistakes when choosing materials — and how to avoid them.
Where you can save money and where you absolutely cannot.
All lessons are based on my 20+ years of real design experience. I explain everything in simple language, with clear examples from actual projects published in magazines like Architectural Digest and Forbes. You will learn not only theory, but also practical tricks that will make you confident in showrooms, on construction sites, and in conversations with clients.
This course is perfect for beginners, for anyone who wants to renovate their home on their own, and for those who simply want to understand materials better. It is also perfect for professional interior designers who want to master materials at a deeper level and use them with confidence in any project.
By the end of this course, you will feel confident with materials, knowing exactly how to choose, combine, and use them to design beautiful and practical interiors.
target_audience: This course is for interior designers and for anyone who wants to understand materials and make the right choices when creating their own home.

courses.title: How to Create a Shabby Chic Livingroom (Part 1)
courses.bio: Creating a Beautiful Vintage Inspired Shabby Chic Livingroom in Easy to Follow Steps
objectives: 1. Understand the role of the Shabby Chic Livingroom within your home
2. Understand the 5 key elements of Shabby Chic Design
3. Create your Story within the Shabby Chic Style
4. Apply your knowledge of which items of furniture will reflect your Shabby Chic Style
5. Choose lighting that will serve the creation of your Shabby Chic style
6. Apply your understanding of Renovation, Restoration and Decoration to achieve your best outcome
7. Evaluate the importance of Choosing your room anchors
8. Understand the role that soft furnishings, play within your room
9. To remember that your story is the key, to choosing the perfect Objet D' Art
10. Develop the good habit of 'try before you buy' by evaluating the options available to you
11. Analyse all your materials when preparing your visual balance before your commit to your full design scheme
12. Evaluate what must be achieved before you choose the right trade for the right job
13. Set a schedule that will allow for a little wiggle room

Module 2: What constitutes the 5 key ele: Module 2: 5 key elements of a successful Shabby Chic Scheme Video
Module 3: Analysis of a Proposed Shabby: Module 3: Analysis of a Proposed Shabby Chic Livingroom Story
Module 4: Choosing Essential items of Fu: Module 4: Choosing Essential items of Furniture
Module 9: Objet D' Art – Completing the: Module 9: Objet D' Art – Completing the look

requirements: You do not need any design skills to do this course, just a level of desire and passion to create an unique interior space.

Tools/Equipment: Access to a printer. 2-5m+ Tape measure, A3/2 graph paper, A3/2 Mounting board or Art board, glue stick, masking tape, scissors/scalpel knife, a ruler/metal edge ruler, pencil, cutting mat or surface, black marker pen, a roll of lining paper
courses.description:
How often have you found yourself flicking wishfully through glossy home magazines?
Or have you ever visited glamourous showrooms, and found yourself mouthing the words … 'if only I could live in or create a room like that'.
Well, it is now your time to seize the day!
This course is designed with you in mind. You will learn how to transform your livingroom  - which by the way is the most trafficked room in your home - into a beautiful and functional Shabby Chic living space. The skills you will learn on this course are transferable throughout your home. But for this course we will focus on the livingroom. This course is predominately lecture based, although it does contain a number of practical activities and PDF downloads as I progress, to help you to immediately apply what you have learnt, as well as a to-do-list at the end.
I suggest that you watch the lecture video's numerous times. This will ensure that by the end of this course, you will be able to completely design your Shabby Chic livingroom from concept to completion.
You will learn how to:
Understand the role of the Shabby Chic Livingroom within your home
Understand the 5 key elements of Shabby Chic Design
Create your Story within the Shabby Chic Style
Apply your knowledge of which items of furniture will reflect your Shabby Chic Style
Choose lighting that will serve the creation of your style
Apply your understanding of Renovation, Restoration and Decoration to achieve your best outcome
Evaluate the importance of Choosing your room anchor
Understand the role that soft furnishings, play within your room
Remember that your story is the key, to choosing the perfect Object D 'Art
Develop the good habit of 'try before you buy' by evaluating options available to you
Analyse all your materials when preparing your visual balance before your commit to the full design scheme
Evaluate what must be achieved before you choose the right trade for the right job
Ensure that your agreed project manager (if you have opted to employ one), understands how to create your Shabby Chic Livingroom, and is committed to seeing this project through from beginning to end
The ideal students for this course are those who is interested in creating a practical, functional and aesthetically pleasing Shabby Chic Livingroom in their home. Or Owners of Boutique B&B's, Air BnB's, Hotels, Domestic and Commercial Businesses, but do not necessarily have a good working knowledge of interior design.
IMPORTANT NOTES:
Please be aware that this course, is not intended to provide all of the knowledge needed to become a professional interior designer. As in any professional field, there is a significant amount of education and/or experience that is needed to achieve competency in this field. My intention with this course is to provide some solid foundational knowledge to assist either those individuals interested in "DIY" or interior design to work on their own projects more effectively, or to provide supplemental education to both interior design students and professionals alike.
Who this course is for:
This is best suited for individuals with basic to intermediate knowledge, or for those looking for a refresher course in interior design.
This course is for anyone who wants to learn how to create/design a well-pulled together Shabby Chic livingroom (which can also be applied to a family room, dining room, and bedroom).
target_audience: The student who wishes to have greater clarity and direction on their interior design course.
The freelance interior designer/stylist who wishes to add the Shabby Chic Style to their business portfolio.
The DIY enthusiast who wants to inject a feeling of professional polish into their next project.
Property developers who wish to ensure that the properties they offer to their new residents are homes rather than just temporary accommodation.
The everyday slightly nervous person who simply wishes to live in a beautiful home that reflects their own unique personal vintage style.
Boutique B&B Owners, Air BnB Owners, Hotel Owners, Business Owners

مترجم: دورة "كيف تصميم غرفة فندقية في بيتك" تسليط الضوء على الضوء على التعليم الكلمات لا تنسى بطابعة فندقي جمع بين النيلي والفخامة. يستغرق وقتًا طويلاً في اختيار الأثاث والديكور ماء. تم تحديد الوقت المناسب لاستخدامها لاستخدامها ضرورية. تزداد فرص العمل. تصميم معقول بميزانية معقولة. أساسيات التصميم الفندقي: الألوان: استخدام الألوان (مثل) الأبيض والرمادي) مع إضافة لمسات نهائية كالذهبي للحصول على نسخة نهائية على عصير جميل. الأثاث: قطعة متعددة الوظائف مثل الأسرة المزودة بأدراج. الإضاءة: الرابطة بين الرابطة الطبيعية والصناعية اتصل بنا لتعلم المزيد. الخلاصة: تساعد الطيران على تحويل غرفتك إلى مساحة كبيرة بين الماء من الماء.

courses.description:
في هذه الدورة، سأعرض لك أسهل طريقة لإنشاء نموذج لمشهد داخلي في 3dsmax.


كما قد يعرف البعض، لدي بالفعل برنامج تعليمي حول هذا الموضوع. ومع ذلك، أخبرني الجميع أنه سريع للغاية، ويصعب متابعته، ولا يقدم الكثير من المعلومات (ومع ذلك فهو البرنامج التعليمي الأكثر مشاهدة حول هذا الموضوع).
You will receive a certificate from Kent University
لذا قررت أن أصنع هذا الفيديو! سأقدم لك كل التفاصيل الضرورية التي تحتاج إلى معرفتها، حتى تتمكن من البدء في تصميم أي مشهد داخلي بسهولة دون أي مشكلة. قد تحتاج إلى مشاهدته مرتين أو ثلاث مرات بعناية شديدة من وجود الكثير لتتعلمه هنا.
آمل أن يعجبكم هذا، وأرجو أن تخبروني
إذا كان لديك أي أسئلة.
في هذه الدورة، سأعرض لك أسهل طريقة لنمذجة مشهد داخلي في 3dsmax. كما قد يعرف بعضكم، لدي برنامج تعليمي حول هذا الموضوع. ومع ذلك، يخبرني الجميع أنه سريع للغاية، ويصعب متابعته، ويقدم الكثير من المعلومات (ومع ذلك فهو البرنامج التعليمي الأكثر مشاهدة حول هذا الموضوع). لذا قررت عمل هذا الفيديو! سأزودك بكل التفاصيل التي تحتاجها ولا تحتاجها، حتى تتمكن من البدء من الصفر في تصميم أي مشهد داخلي دون أي مشكلة. قد ترغب في مشاهدته مرتين أو ثلاث مرات. هناك بالتأكيد الكثير لنتعلمه هنا. آمل أن يعجبك هذا، وآمل أن يعجبك إذا كان لديك أي أسئلة.

requirements: Установленная программа Archicad (Желательно 19, но не принципиально)
Базовые навыки черчения в Archicad
courses.description:
В видео-курсе "Как сделать дизайн-проект квартиры в Archicad" вы изучите процесс создания дизайн-проекта 3-х комнатной квартиры в программе Arhcicad 19. Разумеется вы можете использовать и более новые версии Archicad, но положение пунктов меню может меняться.
Курс рассчитан на студентов школ дизайна интерьеров, начинающих дизайнеров интерьера; людей, изучающих Archicad самостоятельно по видео-урокам. Курс даёт прекрасную базу для всех, кто решил заниматься дизайном интерьеров квартир, частных домов и офисных помещений.
По окончании курса вы сможете самостоятельно сделать несложный дизайн-проект квартиры в Archicad.
В курс вошли разделы, в которых я расскажу вам, как вычертить в программе Archicad
Обмерный план квартиры
Плана монтажа демонтажа (план реконструкции квартиры)
План расстановки мебели
План пола
План потолка
План расстановки светильников
План розеток
Развертки стен ванной комнаты
Для вашего удобства я постарался разделить весь процесс создания дизайн-проекта на небольшие этапы. Для лучшего запоминания я рекомендую не просто смотреть уроки, но и делать параллельно какой-то дизайн-проект. Желательно, чтобы это был дизайн-проект какого-то другого объекта. Так вы будете более осмысленно воспринимать изложенную в курсе информацию. Никаких тестовых заданий я не даю, а ваша задача просто взять из курса всё, что вам понадобится.
Если у вас будут возникать какие-то вопросы по ходу изучения видео-уроков, вы можете задавать их в комментариях. По возможности постараюсь отвечать на ваши вопросы.
Желаю вам успехов в изучении нового. Спасибо, что приобрели мой видео-курс!

three-dimensional thinking and drawing

DRAWING OF SEATING FROM DIFFERENT ANGLES

requirements: Paper

courses.description:
Hello there..
Furnitures are integrative objects shaped according to the characteristics of the spaces.comes out. Objects drawn with perspective techniques preserve their proportions and geometric substructures.needs. You will have a good command of furniture and object drawing in the Furniture Drawing and Design Course with Perspective Techniques. We will see each object with academic and perspective fundamentals. the simplestFrom furniture to the most difficult objects, you will have learned the general drawing logic of products very well. How should we start first when drawing furniture or any object? What rules should be in the technical infrastructure? Which technique should we use where and how? We will find answers to questions such as how do we adjust the surfaces of objects drawn from different perspectives. The general principle of this training is to teach drawing techniques of all objects by going from certain furniture. Starting from the prisms, which are the basis of the product drawing, you will be able to make different movements on the surfaces. You will come to a level where you can easily draw and design everything from two-dimensional furniture drawings to advanced complex furniture. proportions in furniture,drawing the invisible parts, line perspective, increasing the impressiveness with the darks thrown in certain places, the reactions of the line values according to the direction of the light, how the line value and the tone value are related.Where do we tone so that it should be in harmony and that the perception of depth is felt on the paper? Where do we increase to the darkest values and how can we perceive that it touches the ground more clearly? We will see all these issues not only theoretically, but also practically through product examples. Since we will deal with these two main topics together, we will see much more permanent results. The basics that industrial designers, architects, students who want to improve themselves in the field of drawing and other illustrators who need to draw in production should know are explained. At the end of the training, you will be able to draw all furniture and objects with the right perspective fundamentals.
target_audience: anyone who wants to improve himself in the field of drawing

courses.description:
Мир 3D графики не стоит на месте! Развитие идет геометрической прогрессией. Новый шаг для 3D художника - это изучть рендер реального времени. Игровой движок Unreal Engine 4 как раз, то что нужно для следующего развития.
Unreal Engine 4 (UE4) - один из лидирующих движков на данный момент. У него много функционала от простой визуализации объектов до создания 3D игр. Приятная картинка движка вас удивить и вы больше не захотите переходить обратно к долгим рендерам в самом 3D Studio Max.
На конкретном примере, самые нужные инструменты для начала изучения Unreal Engine 4.

courses.title: Modern Kitchen Design Mastery
courses.bio: Create the kitchen of your dreams: a comprehensive guide to modern kitchen design
objectives: Understanding modern kitchen design principles
Kitchen planning and layout : how to plan and layout a modern kitchen
Materials and finishes the different types of materials and finishes that are commonly used in modern kitchen design
Lighting design: Lighting is a crucial element of any modern kitchen design: how to plan and implement effective lighting schemes
Color and style : different color and style options that are commonly used in modern kitchen design
Visualization and presentation skills: how to use digital tools to create 3D models and renderings
requirements: Basic computer skills: Students should have basic computer skills to use digital tools .

courses.description:
Welcome to Modern Kitchen Design Mastery, a comprehensive course that will teach you how to design and create stunning, functional modern kitchens. Whether you're a professional designer or a homeowner looking to update your kitchen, this course will equip you with the knowledge and skills you need to design a beautiful and functional space.
In this course, you'll learn about the principles of modern kitchen design, including the use of sleek lines, minimalism, and functional design. You'll also learn how to choose the right materials, finishes, and appliances to achieve the modern look you're after. Additionally, you'll learn how to work with Homestyler, an intuitive online tool that lets you create 3D models of your kitchen designs, making it easy to visualize your ideas and make changes.
Topics covered in this course include:
Understanding the principles of modern kitchen design
Selecting the right materials, finishes, and appliances for modern kitchens
Creating functional and stylish kitchen layouts and configurations
Choosing the right lighting design for your modern kitchen
Maximizing storage and organization in your modern kitchen
Decorating and accessorizing your modern kitchen
By the end of this course, you'll have the knowledge and skills to create a stunning, functional modern kitchen. Join us today and start designing your dream kitchen!
target_audience: Interior design students: Interior design students who are interested in specializing in kitchen design may find this course particularly valuable, as it will provide them with a foundation of knowledge and skills specific to this area of design.
Design professionals: Design professionals who are looking to expand their skillset and take on kitchen design projects may find this course helpful in building their expertise and knowledge.

Homeowners: Homeowners who are looking to renovate their kitchens or build a new kitchen from scratch may find this course helpful in understanding the basics of modern kitchen design and in generating ideas and plans for their own spaces.

ome builders and contractors: Builders and contractors who work on residential projects may find this course helpful in understanding the principles of modern kitchen design and in effectively communicating with their clients on kitchen-related topics.

El más importante requisito para realizar este curso es el entusiasmo y la motivación por aprender nuevas habilidades que aumenten tus competencias profesionales.
courses.description:
Diseño de Interiores para Niños
Crea Espacios Mágicos: Seguridad, Creatividad y Aprendizaje para el Cuarto de los Pequeños
Instructor: Arquitecto Álvaro García  Actualizado: Octubre del 2025 Requisitos previos: Ninguno


Descripción del Curso:
Si deseas crear espacios mágicos que estimulen la seguridad, creatividad y aprendizaje de los más pequeños, este curso es ideal para ti. Imagina transformar el cuarto de los niños en un lugar donde cada elemento esté diseñado para inspirar y apoyar su desarrollo. Bajo la guía del Arquitecto Álvaro García, un profesional con más de 150,000 estudiantes formados, aprenderás paso a paso cómo combinar funcionalidad y estética para crear ambientes infantiles inolvidables.
No necesitas experiencia previa para unirte a esta aventura. Este curso está diseñado tanto para principiantes como para profesionales que buscan especializarse en el diseño de interiores para niños. Con material actualizado a julio de 2023, tendrás acceso a las últimas tendencias y técnicas que están revolucionando el mundo del diseño infantil.
A lo largo de la formación, comprenderás los fundamentos esenciales del diseño de interiores para niños, explorando estilos y temáticas infantiles que capturan la imaginación. Aprenderás a crear ambientes funcionales y acogedores, adaptados a las necesidades específicas de cada etapa de crecimiento. Dominarás proyectos personalizados y avanzados, utilizando herramientas profesionales como AutoCAD para dibujo 2D, diseño 3D y renderizado de imágenes fotorrealistas. Además, mejorarás tus habilidades en edición fotográfica para presentar tus proyectos de manera impactante y profesional.
Una de las grandes ventajas de este curso es su flexibilidad y accesibilidad. Tendrás acceso al contenido de por vida, sin horarios fijos y desde cualquier dispositivo, ya sea tu computadora, tableta o smartphone. Podrás avanzar a tu propio ritmo, seleccionando las secciones que más te interesen y revisando las lecciones siempre que lo desees. Si surgen dudas o necesitas asesoramiento, contarás con el soporte personalizado del instructor y formarás parte de una exclusiva comunidad de aprendizaje, donde podrás compartir experiencias y proyectos con otros apasionados del diseño infantil.
El curso también te ofrece recursos exclusivos, como materiales descargables, actividades prácticas y enlaces de interés que enriquecerán tu formación. Al completar el curso, recibirás un certificado que acreditará tus nuevas competencias en diseño de interiores para niños, potenciando tu perfil profesional y abriendo nuevas oportunidades en el mercado.
Esta formación está dirigida a profesionales del diseño y la arquitectura que deseen ampliar sus habilidades, padres y educadores interesados en crear espacios estimulantes para los niños, y cualquier persona apasionada por el diseño de interiores infantiles. No importa cuál sea tu objetivo, este curso te proporcionará las herramientas y conocimientos necesarios para crear ambientes que fomenten el crecimiento y la felicidad de los más pequeños.
No dejes pasar la oportunidad de aprender con uno de los instructores más reconocidos en el sector. Conviértete en un experto en Diseño de Interiores para Niños y transforma tus ideas en espacios que harán brillar los ojos de los pequeños. Atrévete a dar el siguiente paso en tu carrera y crea habitaciones que inspiren y acompañen a los niños en sus aventuras diarias. Te esperamos dentro del curso para comenzar juntos este emocionante viaje hacia la creación de espacios mágicos. ¡Inscríbete ahora y empieza a hacer realidad tus proyectos!


Itinerario Formativo:
Introducción a la plataforma de formación Udemy
Fundamentos del Diseño de Interiores para Niños
Estilos de Diseño y Temáticas Infantiles
Creando Ambientes Funcionales y Acogedores
Proyectos Personalizados y Avanzados
Profesionalización y Proyecto Final
Dibujo 2D Asistido por Ordenador con AutoCAD
Diseño 3D
Renderizado de Imágenes Fotorrealistas de nuestros Diseños
Edición Fotográfica de Nuestros Proyectos y Diseños
Recursos para el Alumno del Curso Diseño de Interiores para Niños
Consultas, Dudas y Sugerencias de los Alumnos de la Formación
Emisión del Certificado de Finalización del Curso Diseño de Interiores para Niños


Metodología de Aprendizaje:
Recuerda que este curso incluye lecciones en vídeo fullHD con audio de estudio (compatible con TV, PC, Mac, tablet y smartphone), artículos didácticos, actividades, animaciones, ilustraciones, proyectos paso a paso, recursos descargables, links de interés, acceso de por vida, certificado de finalización, tutorización online, y una exclusiva comunidad de aprendizaje privada que nos ayudamos aportando nuestras experiencias en el foro de comunicación del curso.
La modalidad de este curso te permite que empieces y acabes cuando tú quieras, marcando el ritmo de la clase según tu disponibilidad. Puedes volver a visualizar lo que te interese, saltar el contenido que ya domines, hacer preguntas, resolver dudas, compartir tus proyectos... Puedes elegir ver todas las lecciones de forma secuencial (lineal) y aprovecharlas al máximo la formación, pero también puedes decidir ver este curso como una guía de referencia.
Las clases están claramente organizadas en secciones y lecciones, puedes decidir visualizar solo las clases que te resulten más importantes según tus necesidades formativas. La mayoría de las lecciones son independientes para que puedas comprender los conceptos de cada lección sin tener que ver las lecciones anteriores del curso.
Para seguir el programa formativo propuesto no ser requieren conocimientos previos, ya que la formación se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0. El curso está orientado a aquellos profesionales que quieran ampliar sus skills (habilidades) y conocer múltiples trucos, consejos, recursos y recomendaciones, de la mano del instructor best seller Álvaro García, con más de 150.000 estudiantes formados. Además la formación disponen de acceso automático al contenido, sin limitación de tiempo, disponibilidad 24/7 (24 horas al día los 7 días de la semana), sin caducidad y con garantía de devolución.
Con la alta definición de los vídeos (vídeo fullHD y audio de estudio) conseguirá no te perder detalle. Podrás ver las clases las veces que requieras para recordar y perfeccionar tus habilidades como diseñador. Tendrás la posibilidad de preguntar, pedir opinión y ayuda al instructor, además de compartir tu experiencia de aprendizaje con los demás alumnos del curso, tan apasionados como tú, repartidos por todo el mundo. Seleccionamos cuidadosamente los contenidos y producimos cada curso para garantizar una experiencia de aprendizaje online integral y de la máxima calidad.


¿A qué esperas?, este curso es ideal para ti, atrévete a convertirte en un experto y expresa tus ideas de la forma que siempre has deseado. Adelante, nos vemos dentro de la formación ;)
target_audience: Estudiantes y profesionales que quieran acceder a una formación innovadora orientada a la metodología de trabajo del mundo laboral, en un formato de e-learining para aprender donde quieran y a su propio ritmo.
Sobre todo aquellas personas que busquen crecer profesionalmente, aumentar sus habilidades y formar parte de nuestra comunidad educativa.
Principalmente aquellos que quieran aumentar sus posibilidades de empleabilidad, contratación y/o promocionar dentro de su sector.

courses.description:
Success Ogwudu, Universal Tech A1
Become a professional 3D building interior designer using SketchUp pro and stand a chance to make cool dollars
In this course you will be learning 3D interior design from basic to advance level.
Everything you need is explained very well in this essential course. Pay close attention and follow my mouse pointer when learning this course.
Congratulations You are about to become a professional 3D building interior designer.


Understand Interior Design Basics
Learn Design Principles: Start by studying the fundamentals of interior design, including color theory, space planning, lighting, and materials.
Analyze Styles: Explore different interior design styles (e.g., modern, traditional, minimalist) to understand what appeals to you and your potential clients.
2. Master SketchUp Pro
Take Structured Learning: Enroll in courses specifically tailored to SketchUp Pro. Platforms like Udemy, LinkedIn Learning, and Skillshare offer courses that range from beginner to advanced levels.
Learn Key Features: Focus on learning the essential tools in SketchUp Pro, such as drawing tools, groups, components, and the 3D warehouse.
Practice Regularly: Regularly work on small projects to apply what you’ve learned. Start with basic room designs and gradually move to more complex interiors.
3. Enhance Your Skills with Extensions
Use Extensions: Explore SketchUp Pro extensions like V-Ray for rendering, Enscape for real-time visualization, and various texture and material plugins.
Create Realistic Renders: Learn how to produce photorealistic renders to make your designs more appealing and professional.
4. Build a Portfolio
Work on Diverse Projects: Include a variety of project types in your portfolio, such as residential, commercial, and hospitality interiors.
Showcase Before and After: Display before-and-after images of spaces to highlight your design impact.
Highlight Unique Skills: If you specialize in certain areas, like lighting design or space optimization, make sure to feature these in your portfolio.
5. Gain Practical Experience
Start with Freelance Projects: Begin by taking on small freelance projects. Websites like Upwork, Freelancer, and Fiverr are good starting points.
Intern or Work with Established Designers: If possible, gain experience by working with or interning for established interior designers or firms.

courses.description:
¡Hola! Te doy la bienvenida al curso “DISEÑO DE INTERIORES: DE PRINCIPIANTE A EXPERTO”.
Mi nombre es Ingrid Odar, y soy arquitecta. Formo parte de Neogestión SAC, una empresa dedicada a la arquitectura, ingeniería y HSEQ.
En este curso, te guiaré desde los conceptos básicos hasta el modelado final de una vivienda, brindándote las herramientas necesarias para desarrollar diseños de alta calidad. Aprenderás a diseñar teniendo en cuenta los elementos fundamentales que contribuyen a la ejecución exitosa de un proyecto.
Este curso es el más completo que he encontrado en internet sobre diseño de interiores hasta la fecha. La razón es simple: el diseño de interiores no se trata solo de estética; es una disciplina que impacta directamente en la calidad de vida de las personas que habitan esos espacios. Aquí está la importancia de saber diseñar bien una vivienda:


Funcionalidad y comodidad: Un buen diseño interior optimiza el uso del espacio, asegurando que cada área cumpla su propósito de manera eficiente. Si no se diseña correctamente, los espacios pueden volverse incómodos y poco funcionales.
Salud y bienestar: El diseño adecuado de una vivienda considera aspectos como la iluminación natural, la ventilación, la ergonomía y la acústica. Ignorar estos factores puede afectar negativamente la salud y el bienestar de los ocupantes.
Estética y armonía: Un diseño bien pensado crea ambientes agradables y armoniosos. Por otro lado, un mal diseño puede generar estrés, desconexión y desorden visual.
Valor de la propiedad: Una vivienda bien diseñada tiene un mayor valor en el mercado inmobiliario. Por el contrario, una mala distribución o elección de materiales puede disminuir significativamente su valor.
Consecuencias negativas de no diseñar bien una vivienda:
Desperdicio de recursos: Si no se planifica correctamente, se pueden malgastar recursos como tiempo, dinero y materiales en correcciones y cambios posteriores.
Insatisfacción del cliente: Un diseño deficiente puede llevar a la insatisfacción del cliente, afectando la reputación del profesional y la posibilidad de futuros proyectos.
En resumen, el diseño de interiores es una disciplina poderosa que va más allá de lo estético. ¡Estoy emocionada por acompañarte en este viaje de aprendizaje!
El curso se estructura en 5 unidades de contenido:

courses.title: SolidWorks: From Sketch to Fabrication Drawings TABLE DESIGN
courses.bio: Master 3D modeling and technical drawing in SolidWorks – step-by-step training for beginners.
objectives: Design an outdoor table using wood and metal with full fabrication-ready drawings.
Create multiple size variations of the same table design using design tables and Excel within SolidWorks, to streamline production and reduce rework.
Generate professional technical drawings, exploded views, and BOMs to support real-world manufacturing and product assembly.
Learn how to choose suitable materials and thicknesses for wood and metal parts based on practical manufacturing requirements.
requirements: No prior experience is required. Basic computer skills and a copy of SolidWorks installed on your PC are all you need to get started.
A Windows PC with SolidWorks 2018 or later installed
Basic computer literacy (mouse, file handling, etc.)
Passion for product design and learning by doing
No prior CAD experience required — beginners are welcome
courses.description:
Are you looking to boost your sheet metal design skills with a real-world project?
This practical, project-based course is designed to teach you everything you need to know about designing a sheet metal table — from the initial concept all the way to production-ready technical drawings. You’ll begin by learning how to create a clean and efficient base sketch, then move on to applying essential sheet metal features step-by-step to bring your design to life.
Throughout the course, you'll master key CAD commands and tools used in sheet metal modeling, including bends, flanges, reliefs, and flat patterns. These are not just theoretical concepts — every step is demonstrated through the design of an actual metal table, giving you immediate hands-on experience.
One of the standout features of this course is the section on creating multiple table sizes within a single design file using configurations. This is an invaluable skill for any designer or engineer working on products that require standard and custom sizes without redesigning from scratch.
We’ll also walk through how to generate clean, detailed, and professional manufacturing drawings — the kind of documentation that can go straight to the workshop floor.
This course is ideal for engineering students, design beginners, or professionals looking to sharpen their CAD skills in the context of real production. By the end, you’ll not only know how to design a metal table but also understand the complete design-to-manufacture workflow in the sheet metal industry.
Join now and start building sheet metal designs that are not only functional — but ready for the real world.
target_audience: This course is for anyone interested in learning real-world product design using SolidWorks. It is ideal for: – Engineering students who want to apply CAD in practical projects – Beginner designers looking to build a strong foundation in SolidWorks – Mechanical engineers aiming to improve their design-to-manufacture workflow – Furniture and product designers seeking to learn table design and fabrication – Anyone curious about turning ideas into technical drawings for production product designer

requirements: El ile manuel ölçü almak isteyenler için 3-5 renkli kalem ve ÇİZGİSİZ TELLİ DEFTER MİNUMUM A4

Normal metre minumum 5 mt olabilir , Lazermetre büyük kolaylıktır ve uygulama yaptığınızda iş ortamlarında gereklidir.
courses.description:
Merhaba arkadaşlar ;
Bu seri bol özveri ile hiç bir bilgi saklanmadan oluşturulmuş Komple Mimari ve İç Mimari gerçek tecrübelerin ve projelerin paylaşıldığı ilerleyen mimari iç mimari projelendirme ve uygulama serilerinin ilk temel dersidir, sebebi RÖLÖVE yani ölçü alma, gerçek değerler, verilerdir ve bu işin TEMELİDİR. Yani veri olmadan sadece hayali gerçeğe dayanmayan tasarımlar tabi ki  yapabilirsiniz.


Meslek hayatımda Gratis, Akbank, Kuveyt Türk, Defacto, Lcw, Garanti Bankası, Yapı Kredi gibi kurumsal zinciri olan birçok firma için rölöve, yerinde keşif metraj ve projelendirme faaliyetlerinde 4 buçuk sene çalıştım, proje ve şantiye koordinasyonlarında bulundum. Bu alanda çok kişileri manuel ve dijital bilgisayar ortamında yetiştirdim ve kurumsal firmalarda proje ve rölöve alanlarında çalıştılar.


Ölçü hemen hemen hayatımızın her alanında karşınıza çıkacaktır, ölçü, ölçekleme hayatın ve bu geometrik hizmet alanlarının da temelidir. Yani sizin altlığınız temeliniz ölçtüğünüz obje mekan vb. yanlış ise boşuna çalışırsınız, ölçeksiz çalışırsınız ve zaman kavramınız boşa gider.


Rölöveyi oturttuktan sonra, güncel piyasaya hazırlanacaksınız, iş bulmanızı hızlandıracak, freelancer veya tam zamanlı mimari bürolarda çalışmak için başvurabilirsiniz, sadece bu alanda çevresi olup sadece rölöve hizmeti veren birçok firma bulunmaktadır.


Mimari , iç mimari piyasasında 12 senelik deneyime sahibim. Sadece rölöve hizmetiyle projelendirme sonrasında uygulama ile ilgili 5 sene yoğun bir firmada çıraklıkla başladım ve proje ekibi yöneticiliği görevleri yaptım.


Tecrübe bu meslekte bu gibi geometrik hizmetlerde bol örneklerle donanmak sizi çok ileriye taşıyacak, daha fazla ekonomik yönden güçlenecek veya daha fazla tasarruf yapmanıza olanak sağlayacaktır.


En Boy Sıradan Ölçü Alma Dışında Açılı 90 derece olmayan veya 90 dereceyi tutturamayarak inşa edilmiş çap dediğimiz mekanlarda doğru sistemle RÖLÖVE PROFESYONEL ÖLÇÜ alarak bunu gerekirse yerinde bilgisayara pratik hızlı komutlarla yaparak dekorasyon uygulama projelendirme hizmetlerinizi profesyonelce yapma eğitimidir.


Rölövenin ne olduğunu güncel piyasa koşullarına hazırlanarak örneklerle öğreneceksiniz.


Bu işin temelini alarak mimari iç mimari uygulama alanlarını sıkılmadan güncel bilgilerle nokta atışlarıyla öğrenebileceğiniz farklı alanlar hiç bir bilgiyi saklamadan yoğun proje ve uygulamalarla FORMS EDUCATION da yayınlanacaktır.


Sıkı çalışarak ve biraz da streste disiplinle bir çok tecrübeyle rakiplerinizin önüne geçeceksiniz. Burada ben de eğitimler aldım çok önemli sorularım tespitlerime cevap alamadığım bir çok eğitimim de oldu FORMS EDUCATION de düzgün üsluplu, ders içeriğini dinlemiş ama farklı sorularına cevap almak isteyen herkese elimden gelen BİLDİĞİM KONULARDA yardım yapılacaktır, uzun serüveninizde elimizden geldiğince öğrencilerimizi yalnız bırakmayacağız.
target_audience: Ev işyeri bahçe gibi özel alanlarınızda en boy ölçü alma dışında gerçek ölçü almak isteyen ihtiyaç duyan her birey
Mimarlık, İç Mimarlık, İnşaat Mühendisi ve Teknikerliği, Şehir Bölge Planlama, Peyzaj Mimarı, Harita Mühendisliği, Çevre Mühendisliği, Ölçü Gerekli Her Birey
Çok zor çap dediğimiz açılı açık ve kapalı mekanlarda gerçek ölçülerle ilerlemek
Cv sinde rölöveyi etkin bir şekilde bildiğini ve kullandığını eklemek isteyenler

courses.description:
Unlock the full potential of Autodesk Revit with "The Ultimate Guide to HVAC Projects in Revit: Start to Finish." This comprehensive course is designed to empower you with the knowledge and skills necessary to excel in HVAC design and implementation within the Revit environment.
From the inception of your HVAC projects to their successful completion, this course provides a step-by-step roadmap that covers every aspect of the process. Whether you're a beginner looking to build a strong foundation or an experienced professional aiming to refine your expertise, you'll benefit from practical, hands-on lessons and real-world examples.


Course Overview
Unlock Your Potential: Whether you're a seasoned professional or just starting, our course caters to all skill levels. We'll begin with the basics and systematically progress to advanced techniques, ensuring that everyone benefits.
Hands-On Learning: Get ready to roll up your sleeves and dive into real-world HVAC projects. Our step-by-step guidance will teach you to create, design, and simulate HVAC systems within Revit.
From Start to Finish: We leave no stone unturned. From project inception to the final implementation, you'll learn every aspect of HVAC design, including load calculations, ductwork design, equipment selection, Project Documentation and more.

requirements: 3Ds Max 2020 or New
courses.description:
Embark on a transformative journey into the world of interior design with our comprehensive course, "Complete Interior Design: Bathroom Edition in 3Ds Max." As your instructor, Ali Haider, a seasoned digital marketing manager with a passion for design, will guide you through the following key elements:
Basic Modeling from Scratch and Paper Sketch: Lay the foundation for your design skills by mastering the art of basic modeling, starting from conceptualization to translating ideas from paper sketches to digital 3D models.
Mid-Level to Advanced Modeling in 3Ds Max: Elevate your expertise by delving into mid to advanced-level modeling techniques using 3Ds Max, ensuring your designs are both intricate and refined.
Adding Assets in the Scene: Learn the art of seamlessly integrating assets into your scenes, enhancing the visual appeal and functionality of your designs.
Making Materials in 3Ds Max: Uncover the secrets of creating realistic and visually stunning materials within 3Ds Max, adding depth and authenticity to your designs.
Adding Lights and Sky in Scene: Illuminate your creations effectively by mastering the placement of lights and creating a captivating sky environment, enhancing the overall ambiance of your designs.
Final Render Settings: Achieve professional-grade renders by understanding and optimizing the final render settings, ensuring your designs are presented in the best possible light.
Playing with Corona Light Mix: Explore the dynamic possibilities of Corona Light Mix, generating multiple compelling images from a single scene simply by manipulating light sources.
Enhancing Image Quality in Photoshop: Elevate your final designs by acquiring skills in post-production enhancement using Photoshop, adding the finishing touches that make your work truly standout.
Embark on this immersive learning experience and emerge with the skills and confidence to create breathtaking bathroom designs in 3Ds Max. Enroll now and unlock your potential in the world of interior design!
target_audience: Interior Designers and Architecture Students

courses.title: Photorealistic Bedroom in 3ds Max & Corona
courses.bio: Learn bedroom interior design: layout, lighting, materials, 3D modeling & rendering in a complete practical workshop
objectives: Professional Bedroom Modeling – Learn the principles and techniques of 3D modeling to design a detailed and realistic bedroom in 3ds Max.
Advanced Material Creation & Texturing – Create and refine realistic materials using Corona Renderer.
Professional Lighting Setup – Set up natural and artificial lighting to create a warm and visually appealing interior design.
High-Quality Rendering – Master rendering settings in Corona Renderer to produce professional, photorealistic final images.
requirements: Basic knowledge of 3ds Max is recommended but not required. A computer with 3ds Max and Corona Renderer installed (trial versions work too). Passion for interior design and 3D visualization. No prior experience in rendering or material creation is needed – everything will be explained step by step!
courses.description:
Welcome to the ultimate bedroom interior design workshop using 3ds Max and Corona Renderer — a complete, hands-on course where you’ll learn how to design beautiful, realistic bedroom interiors from start to final render.


This course is perfect for interior design students, 3D artists, architects, and anyone looking to bring bedroom concepts to life with professional tools and techniques. You’ll start by learning the essentials of space planning, color harmony, and furniture layout, followed by accurate 3D modeling inside 3ds Max.


You’ll create detailed materials such as fabric, parquet flooring, mirrors, and painted walls using Corona’s powerful material editor. Then, we’ll walk through lighting setup, including both natural and artificial light sources, and show you how to place and adjust Corona cameras for the best visual composition.


Finally, you’ll learn how to adjust render settings for high-quality, photorealistic output, as well as basic post-production steps to enhance your final image.


By the end of this course, you'll be able to confidently model, texture, light, and render a fully designed bedroom. You’ll also walk away with a finished portfolio piece that demonstrates your skills and showcases your creative design abilities.
This course will also help you improve your workflow, speed, and creative decision-making.
target_audience: Beginners and intermediate 3D artists who want to improve their interior design skills.
Architects and interior designers looking to create high-quality 3D visualizations.
Freelancers who want to expand their portfolio with realistic bedroom renders.
Anyone passionate about 3D modeling, texturing, lighting, and rendering with Corona Renderer.

courses.title: Spaceplanning for Architects & Design Professionals
courses.bio: The Art and Science of Designing Functional, Beautiful, and Sustainable Environments
objectives: Recognize the importance of effective space planning in architectural and interior design by identifying common issues in poorly planned spaces (e.g., confusing
Explain the role of space planning as a foundational skill in the architectural design process and how it affects user experience and spatial functionality.
Analyze spatial layouts to identify design challenges and opportunities for improvement.
Apply core space planning principles to create harmonious and purposeful environments that enhance usability and aesthetics.
Draw on real-world architectural insights and case examples to inform space planning decisions.
Develop a toolkit of strategies to approach and solve space planning problems with creativity and confidence.

Chapter 4: The Space Planning Process: From Program to Furniture

requirements: A basic understanding of architectural or interior design concepts, such as form, function, and scale.
Familiarity with design terminology and reading floor plans or spatial layouts
Some experience with design tools (digital or analog), such as AutoCAD, Revit, SketchUp, or hand-drawing.
courses.description:
Space planning is a foundational discipline in architecture and interior design that shapes how people experience and interact with built environments. This comprehensive course, led by Branka Knezevic, Principal of Plana Architects, dives deep into the principles, processes, and practical skills essential for effective space planning, empowering architects, designers, and students to create environments that are functional, aesthetically compelling, and sustainable.
Throughout the course, you will explore the intricate relationship between spatial form and function, learning how to visualize and manipulate space in three dimensions to design layouts that foster connection, flow, and purpose. Branka shares her extensive professional experience to help you develop a thorough understanding of key concepts such as orientation, natural light integration, space optimization, and thematic flow—each vital for creating spaces that not only serve their intended use but also elevate user experience.
The course also covers the full spectrum of the space planning process, from initial programming and bubble diagrams to detailed furniture plans, illustrating how early conceptual ideas evolve into detailed, livable environments. Case studies drawn from real-world architectural projects led by Plana Architects provide tangible examples of how thoughtful space planning transforms buildings—whether through historic retrofits, residential designs, or commercial developments.
In addition to design theory, the course emphasizes the technical and collaborative skills necessary for success in professional practice. You will gain insight into coordinating with specialists across disciplines, adhering to dimensional and graphic standards, and utilizing Computer-Aided Design (CAD) tools for drafting and rendering. These competencies ensure your designs are not only visionary but also practical and buildable.
Ultimately, this course invites you to sharpen your spatial awareness and design thinking, equipping you with the knowledge to create spaces that harmonize aesthetics, functionality, and sustainability. Whether you are an aspiring architect, interior designer, or design enthusiast, Branka Knezevic’s expert guidance will inspire and prepare you to craft environments that truly resonate.
target_audience: Architecture and interior design students
Early-career architects and designers
Creative professionals working with physical space (e.g., set designers, exhibit designers)
Anyone curious about how thoughtful space planning improves everyday environments

courses.title: Color theory
courses.bio: Introduction to the colors

Features of colors: Color , hue , tints . tone and shades

requirements: No prior knowledge or design experience needed.
courses.description:
This course covers various aspects of Colors: we discuss the Hue, chroma, and value. We also discuss the Hue, tints, tone, and shades.
We discuss color wheel and color temperature and their influences on interior design. We also talk about the Psychology of colors, how different colors generate different emotions, and how they influence interior design.
Color theory is a collection of rules for combining colors with being attractive to the eye and the senses. It gives us a general language to talk about how colors are utilized, ordered, coordinated, blended, and connected. The color theory explains why some colors look good together, and others don't. As a result, it's all about color mixing and visual effects.
Color has a great impact on our day-to-day life. It also affects human psychology, so one should be more careful while the section of color for your design. You need to apply color theory for the best positive results.
You should be careful about the temperature of color according to requirements. colors are divided into two parts on the color wheel warm colors ( colors which is near to red on the color wheel), cool colors ( colors that are closer to blue on the color wheel)
Understanding color theory necessitates a focus on the psychological components of a color. When choosing a color palette for your design, you're probably thinking about how things will look, but the emotions that colors will evoke are also crucial. Color has a strong psychological impact on the human brain, with different colors evoking different meanings and feelings in your users.
Here, we will talk about colors that evoke most of the people's feelings.
Red: risk, significance, and love The color red is known as the "energy color" because it may raise a person's pulse, heartbeat, and metabolism just by glancing at it. It is an excellent color for catching a visitor's eyes.
Blue: The blue color has different shades and creates different emotions. Light blue evokes calm emotions and makes the user feel fresh. The blue color is also related to luck.
Yellow : Yellow is associated with the warmth and happiness of life. The yellow color of the interior creates warmth and comfort, and is a trendy wall color. Yellow automatically lifts people's hearts and makes the room look bright and sunny.
Orange: Orange is an optimistic color and has a sociable effect. This color is for diplomats who create energy and motivation. The blend of yellow and red turns orange, conveying warmth and excitement and usually appealing to young people.
Green: Green, found everywhere in nature, is the color of growth and health, representing regeneration and life. Green is strongly associated with a refreshing and peaceful color. It awakens a feeling of fullness while conveying a feeling of relaxation and security.
Violet: Violet is frequently related to spirituality and royalty. The power of crimson mixed with the calm of blue is miles a color that evokes intrinsic features and reflection. It is the color of the introvert. It is frequently used to inspire creativity and speak luxury.
target_audience: It is for beginners who want to learn about color theory and its application, specially targeted at interior design students.

Students should come ready to engage themselves fully in a fun-filled training on accessorizing and other design details.
courses.description:
Have you ever wondered what makes a room look so much more polished and pulled together than other rooms?
Have you struggled to find the right paint color that coordinates with the different wood finishes in your home?
Have you ever wondered how interior designers make coffee tables, console tables, fireplace mantels, and bookcases look so beautifully decorated?
If you've ever asked yourself any of these questions, then this is the class for you!  "Design is in the Details" is a class devoted to the main details that make up beautiful room design, including accessorizing, mixing wood and metal finishes, and moldings.
Please be aware that this course only covers the topics of accessorizing, mixing wood and metal finishes, and different types of room molding.  It does not provide information on how to pull together a room (e.g., furniture layouts, rug sizes, etc.).  That information can be found in my course "How to Design a Room in 10 Easy Steps"

In this class we will cover the following main topics:
5 key accessories that every room should have
The importance of accessories
My 7 golden rules for accessorizing
Learn how to beautifully decorate console tables, coffee tables, fireplace mantels, bookcases, and dining tables
Learn how to hang artwork the right way
Learn how to mix different metal finishes with ease, including the kitchen and the bathroom
Learn how to mix different wood finishes like a pro, including which paint colors look best with different wood finishes
Learn how to use moldings to transform your home, including crown molding, baseboard, window and door casing, chair rail, panel molding, and picture frame molding
Throughout the class, you will also be provided with practical exercises to help you immediately apply what you've learned in each section.
This is a great beginner's course for those who are interested in learning more about the details that designers use to elevate the overall design of a space.  This could also be a great class for interior design students or professionals who are new to the field.
Join me for a fun, action-packed class on interior design details!
IMPORTANT NOTES:
If you are interested in taking most or all of my courses, I have a recommended order in which to watch them (although it's certainly not required).  I would start with "How to Design a Room in 10 Easy Steps" because most of my other courses are in-depth classes of the concepts touched on in this 10 step class.  Following the 10 Step Course, I suggest moving on to "How to Use Color Like a Pro", followed by "How to Work with Interior Design Styles Like a Pro", then "How to Use Lighting Design to Transform your Home", and finally "Design is in the Details".

My other five courses, "How to Use Minimalist Interior Design to Live your Best Life",  "Use Eco-friendly, Sustainable Design to Improve Your Life", "How to Design Your Dream Kitchen", "How to Design Your Dream Bathroom", and "Everything Small Home Design" are all stand alone classes on specialty topics within interior design, and therefore, can be taken in any order.

Please be aware that this course, or any of my courses, is not intended to provide all of the knowledge needed to become a professional interior designer.  As with any professional field, there is a significant amount of education and/or experience that is needed to achieve competency in this field.  My intention with these courses is to provide some solid foundational knowledge to assist either those individuals interested in "DIY" interior design to work on their own projects more effectively, or to provide supplemental education to both interior design students and professionals.
target_audience: This course is a great beginner course for anyone interested in taking their home's design to the next level through accessorizing, mixing metal and wood finishes and the application of various moldings.
This course could also be a great supplemental educational course for interior design students or those new to the interior design field.

requirements: Students should have some paper and a pen or pencil ready for the activities.
Students should come ready to engage themsleves fully in a fun-filled training on interior design styles.
courses.description:
With so many different interior design styles available today, do you find yourself getting overwhelmed and unsure of how to choose a style or pull off a style well in your own home? It becomes even more complicated when you want to mix different interior design styles but are unsure of how to do that so it looks fabulous and well pulled together, instead of flat out chaotic.
To that end, this course has been created to help you understand the defining characteristics of 18 different popular interior design styles today so that you can either create one of those styles in your own home, or learn how to easily and effectively mix different styles on your own.
Please note that this course only covers the characteristics of various interior design styles.  It does NOT provide information on how to pull together a room (e.g., furniture layouts, rug sizes, etc.).  That information can be found in my course "How to Design a Room in 10 Easy Steps"
That said, this course will go fairly deeply into 18 different and distinct interior design styles in areas that include:
Defining furniture characteristics
Common materials used in each style
Appropriate color schemes and patterns for each style
Window and floor covering options for each style
Lighting, artwork and accessories appropriate to each style
U.S. and international retailers that carry furnishings for each particular style
We will also spend an entire section focused solely on how to mix styles well using a simple, formulaic approach.  You will learn how to do this both through a lecture approach as well as listening to 2 real life case studies.
You will also have an opportunity to practice your style IQ skills multiple times throughout the course so that you walk away feeling more confident about being able to more easily identify different interior design styles.
Finally, before each style section, you will have an opportunity to take a style quiz to help you find out which interior design styles are best suited to you based on your preferences.  Once you find out your results, this may help you to determine which lectures you would like to watch or how to prioritize watching them.
For bonus material, I have included a lecture with my favorite plant species for each of the 18 different styles.
This course is a great choice for:
Anyone wanting to learn more about different interior design styles
How to mix them successfully on their own
Interior design students who are new to their field
Interior designer professionals who want to brush up their skills
Join me for a exciting journey into the world of interior design styles!
IMPORTANT NOTES:
If you are interested in taking most or all of my courses, I have a recommended order in which to watch them (although it's certainly not required).  I would start with "How to Design a Room in 10 Easy Steps" because most of my other courses are in-depth classes of the concepts touched on in this 10 step class.  Following the 10 Step Course, I suggest moving on to "How to Use Color Like a Pro", followed by "How to Work with Interior Design Styles Like a Pro", then "How to Use Lighting Design to Transform your Home", and finally "Design is in the Details".

My other five courses, "How to Use Minimalist Interior Design to Live your Best Life",  "Use Eco-friendly, Sustainable Design to Improve Your Life", "How to Design Your Dream Kitchen", "How to Design Your Dream Bathroom", and "Everything Small Home Design" are all stand alone classes on specialty topics within interior design, and therefore, can be taken in any order.

Please be aware that this course, or any of my courses, is not intended to provide all of the knowledge needed to become a professional interior designer.  As with any professional field, there is a significant amount of education and/or experience that is needed to achieve competency in this field.  My intention with these courses is to provide some solid foundational knowledge to assist either those individuals interested in "DIY" interior design to work on their own projects more effectively, or to provide supplemental education to both interior design students and professionals.
target_audience: This in-depth course is appropriate for any level of interior design knowledge
This course is for anyone who wants in-depth information on the main interior design styles used today and how to mix those styles with confidence
This course could also be a great choice for anyone who is new to the interior design field and would like more in depth information on interior design styles

courses.title: Догляд за кімнатними рослинами: від новачка до профі
courses.bio: Озеленення та фітодизайн
objectives: Навчишся правильно обирати, поливати, підгодовувати добривами й пересаджувати рослини
Дізнаєшся, як не допустити загибелі рослин через основні помилки
Зможеш підбирати ідеальні рослини під різні умови
Зможеш почати заробляти на озелененні приміщень та терас
requirements: Курс підійде, як початківцям, так і любителям, які хочуть покращити свої знання
courses.description:
Привіт, мене звати Євгенія Броварна. Я квітникарка, займаюсь озелененням житлових та комерційних об'єктів, організатор різних рослинних майстер-класів та рослинний блогер.
Рада вітати тебе на моєму курсі «Догляд за кімнатними рослинами: від новачка до профі». Це повноцінний посібник, де я зібрала найкориснішу та найцікавішу інформацію, щоб твої рослини почували себе щасливими.
Після перегляду 14 уроків ти будеш розуміти та знати абсолютно все - від того як обрати свою першу рослину до того як доглядати за складними та вибагливими видами. Приємного навчання!


Цей курс створений для тих, хто хоче РАЗ І НАЗАВЖДИ розібратися у догляді за кімнатними рослинами.
Твої рослини більше не загинуть
Легко розберешся з доглядом — навіть якщо ніколи не мав рослин
Твій дім стане зеленим — без зайвих витрат часу і грошей
Потрібен тим, хто хоче заробляти на озелененні
Чому цей курс цікавий?


Покроковий підхід – не просто теорія, а конкретні алгоритми дій
Живі приклади – реальні кейси з догляду за рослинами
Мінімум часу – максимум користі – курс структурований так, щоб не перевантажувати
Багато практичних матеріалів у вигляді зрозумілих презентацій
Цей курс — твій перший крок до улюбленої справи, яка приносить і задоволення, і дохід.
Ти навчишся не лише доглядати за кімнатними рослинами, а й зможеш перетворити своє захоплення на джерело заробітку.
Кожен модуль — це практичний досвід, інструменти і натхнення для старту.
Якщо ти давно мрієш працювати з рослинами або просто шукаєш нову справу для себе — цей курс саме для тебе.
Приєднуйся та почни заробляти на тому, що любиш.
target_audience: Початківців, які тільки відкривають для себе світ кімнатних рослин і хочуть одразу робити все правильно
Любителів, у яких вже є рослини, але не завжди зрозуміло, чому вони в'януть, жовтіють чи не ростуть — і хочеться нарешті у цьому розібратися
Зайнятих людей, які не мають часу на нескінченне вивчення догляду, але хочуть мати вдома здорові, красиві рослини з мінімальними зусиллями
Для тих, хто хоче почати заробляти на озелененні, але не впевнений у своїх знаннях

Metodología de Aprendizaje:
Recuerda que este curso incluye lecciones en vídeo fullHD con audio de estudio (compatible con TV, PC, Mac, tablet y smartphone), artículos didácticos, actividades, animaciones, ilustraciones, proyectos paso a paso, recursos descargables, links de interés, acceso de por vida, certificado de finalización, tutorización online, y una exclusiva comunidad de aprendizaje privada que nos ayudamos aportando nuestras experiencias en el foro de comunicación del curso.
La modalidad de este curso te permite que empieces y acabes cuando tú quieras, marcando el ritmo de la clase según tu disponibilidad. Puedes volver a visualizar lo que te interese, saltar el contenido que ya domines, hacer preguntas, resolver dudas, compartir tus proyectos... Puedes elegir ver todas las lecciones de forma secuencial (lineal) y aprovecharlas al máximo la formación, pero también puedes decidir ver este curso como una guía de referencia.
Las clases están claramente organizadas en secciones y lecciones, puedes decidir visualizar solo las clases que te resulten más importantes según tus necesidades formativas. La mayoría de las lecciones son independientes para que puedas comprender los conceptos de cada lección sin tener que ver las lecciones anteriores del curso.
Para seguir el programa formativo propuesto no ser requieren conocimientos previos, ya que la formación se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0. El curso está orientado a aquellos profesionales que quieran ampliar sus skills (habilidades) y conocer múltiples trucos, consejos, recursos y recomendaciones, de la mano del instructor best seller Álvaro García, con más de 150.000 estudiantes formados. Además la formación disponen de acceso automático al contenido, sin limitación de tiempo, disponibilidad 24/7 (24 horas al día los 7 días de la semana), sin caducidad y con garantía de devolución.
Con la alta definición de los vídeos (vídeo fullHD y audio de estudio) conseguirá no te perder detalle. Podrás ver las clases las veces que requieras para recordar y perfeccionar tus habilidades como diseñador. Tendrás la posibilidad de preguntar, pedir opinión y ayuda al instructor, además de compartir tu experiencia de aprendizaje con los demás alumnos del curso, tan apasionados como tú, repartidos por todo el mundo. Seleccionamos cuidadosamente los contenidos y producimos cada curso para garantizar una experiencia de aprendizaje online integral y de la máxima calidad.

courses.title: Дизайн интерьера "Room Course"
courses.bio: Пошаговое руководство по созданию интерьера.
objectives: Создание дизайна интерьеров для новичков
requirements: Никаких специальных навыков не требуется
courses.description: В следующие три недели мы окунёмся в  детальное изучение интерьера. Мы узнаем как искать свой стиль и создавать планировку мебели, узнаем как создать правильное освещение и почему это так важно, узнаем про то как подбирать цветовую гамму и как искать идеальные сочетания. Затем я Вам расскажу про правила по которым мы строим интерьер и композицию, начиная с общих основных элементов и заканчивая декором. Вишенкой на торте станет эскиз интерьера. Я до сих пор в полном восторге от того какие скетчи нарисовали участники предыдущего потока. При этом 95% участников делали это впервые? Завершим курс знаниями о подборе мебели и материалов, узнаем все тонкости этого процесса и создадим финальный уникальный проект?
target_audience: курс будет полезен всем кто хотел бы научиться создавать красивые интерьеры для себя и возможно в будущем работать дизайнером интерьеров.

courses.title: How to Use Color Like a Pro
courses.bio: Interior Design Color Schemes Made Easy
objectives: Create the ideal color scheme for any room in your home using a tool that has been designed to guide you through this process easily!
Use the color wheel like a pro.
Use the psychology of color to create the perfect mood in your home.
Use texture to change the way a color appears.
Mix patterns successfully in a room.
Choose from popular color schemes for different rooms in your home based on the room's orientation, your interior design style, or the function of your room.
Choose the right paint colors, including how to effectively test them out before you start, and how to transition those colors effectively in your home.
requirements: Students should have some paper and a pen or pencil ready for the activities.
Students should come ready to engage themslves fully in a fun-filled training on color.
courses.description:
Do you find yourself struggling to create a cohesive color scheme in your own home?
Do you wonder how interior designers use colors to create a certain mood or feeling in a room?
It's no secret that color is one of the most important elements of great interior design.  To that end, this course has been created to help you create fantastic color schemes for your own home.  This course will cover everything you ever wanted to know (and maybe what you didn't know that you wanted/needed to know!) about color in the world of interior design, including:
How you can use color to positively impact your emotions, improve decision making, curb your appetite, and more!
How to use the color wheel in a very practical and useful way to create beautiful, cohesive color schemes
Learn and understand key color vocabulary and color theory
How to use color to create different moods in a room
How to use color to make your rooms appear larger or smaller than they actually are
How to mix patterns like a pro
Walk away with beautiful color scheme selections for every room in your home based on popular interior design styles, the type of room (e.g., living rooms), and the ideal color schemes for north and south facing rooms
Learn everything you need to know about paint so you can feel confident in your selections and application
We delve deep into the topic of paint, including discussing how many different paint colors you should be using in your home, how to narrow your paint choices, the best white paint colors, how to effectively test out paint colors, and how to transition paint colors from room to room.
Finally, there are exercises in this course as well, to provide you with opportunities to create your own beautiful color schemes.
This course is a great choice for the novice or aspiring interior designer, or for anyone who is interested in learning more about how to create beautiful interior design color schemes like a pro.
Join me for a fantastic journey into the world of interior design color schemes!
IMPORTANT NOTES:
If you are interested in taking most or all of my courses, I have a recommended order in which to watch them (although it's certainly not required).  I would start with "How to Design a Room in 10 Easy Steps" because most of my other courses are in-depth classes of the concepts touched on in this 10 step class.  Following the 10 Step Course, I suggest moving on to "How to Use Color Like a Pro", followed by "How to Work with Interior Design Styles Like a Pro", then "How to Use Lighting Design to Transform your Home", and finally "Design is in the Details".

My other five courses, "How to Use Minimalist Interior Design to Live your Best Life",  "Use Eco-friendly, Sustainable Design to Improve Your Life", "How to Design Your Dream Kitchen", "How to Design Your Dream Bathroom", and "Everything Small Home Design" are all stand alone classes on specialty topics within interior design, and therefore, can be taken in any order.

Please be aware that this course, or any of my courses, is not intended to provide all of the knowledge needed to become a professional interior designer.  As with any professional field, there is a significant amount of education and/or experience that is needed to achieve competency in this field.  My intention with these courses is to provide some solid foundational knowledge to assist either those individuals interested in "DIY" interior design to work on their own projects more effectively, or to provide supplemental education to both interior design students and professionals.
target_audience: This is best suited for individuals with minimal to moderate knowledge of interior design.

This course is for anyone who wants to learn how to use color effectively in interior design to accomplish any or all of the following goals: create a certain mood or effect in a space through color, find the right color scheme for a particular room, and choose the right paint color every time.
This course would also be a great choice for anyone who is new to the interior design field and would like more in depth information on color.

courses.title: The Future Designer - AI for Interior Designers
courses.bio: AI for Interior Designers
objectives: Master AI tools to create stunning, professional mood boards in minutes.
Automate client questionnaires to save time and gather key design details
Transform mood boards into realistic 3D renders with ease
Animate 3D renders to bring design concepts to life for clients
requirements: No prior AI or coding experience needed—beginners welcome
Basic familiarity with interior design concepts is helpful but not required
A computer or tablet with internet access
Access to Canva (free or pro) and other AI tools (links provided in the course)
Willingness to experiment, learn, and apply AI tools creatively
courses.description:
The Future Designer: AI for Interior Designers isn’t just another design course, it’s your ticket to the new era of interior design. Imagine turning ideas into stunning, photorealistic spaces in minutes, automating tedious client tasks, and presenting visuals so breathtaking they leave clients speechless. This is no longer a dream; AI makes it your reality.
Whether you’re a seasoned designer tired of long render times or a young creative eager to break into the industry, this course is built to help you design smarter, faster, and better. You’ll learn to create mood boards that perfectly capture a vision, automate client questionnaires to save hours, and transform those boards into jaw-dropping 3D renders. You’ll even bring still images to life, making curtains sway, lights flicker, and water flow with just a few clicks.
Every module is practical, hands-on, and tailored to help you stand out in a crowded market. By the end, you’ll not only master AI-powered design tools, but you’ll also gain the confidence to wow clients, win more projects, and work with unmatched efficiency.
Your future in design starts here; innovative, faster, and smarter.
The future of design isn’t coming, it’s already here. Step into it. Become The Future Designer.
target_audience: This course is for visionaries of all levels—from seasoned interior designers looking to stay ahead in a fast-changing industry, to ambitious beginners dreaming of creating spaces that inspire. If you’ve ever wished you could bring your ideas to life faster, with less stress and more creativity, this is for you. Whether you’re a student, a creative entrepreneur, or simply someone passionate about transforming spaces, you’ll learn how to use AI to turn mood boards into 3D renders, animate designs, and craft unique art, all without expensive software or years of training.

courses.title: Дизайн интерьера
courses.bio: История - Теория - Практика
objectives: История дизайна, архитектуры и стили интерьеров
Теория цвета, света и композиции
Практика подбора отделочных материалов, мебели, создания дизайн проекта и 3Д модели интерьера
