courses.description: Курс позволит познакомиться с профессией дизайнера интерьеров, получить основные системные знания в этой области и приступить к практической деятельности. Вы узнаете об истории и развитии сферы дизайна, основных этапах и стилях. Теоретические основы помогут вам грамотно подойти к процессу разработки интерьеров, а базовые практические навыки дадут возможность воплощать проекты в жизнь. Курс состоит из трёх разделов, каждый из которых включает в себя по несколько занятий в форме видео-лекций. Материалы занятий основаны на самых важных аспектах профессии, позволяющие быстро и эффективно обучаться!
target_audience: Начинающие дизайнеры интерьеров, абитуриенты
Все желающие самостоятельно создать дизайн собственного жилья

courses.title: Archicad İç Mimari Modelleme Eğitimi
courses.bio: Archicad ile sıfırdan bir mekanın modellenmesi ve render alımı.
objectives: Dışarıdan endüstriyel bir ürünü projenize entegre edebileceksiniz.
2D Bir tasarımı 3D ye dönüştürebileceksiniz.
3D Tasarımlarınızı görselleştirmek için en uygun malzemeyi uygulayabileceksiniz.
Oluşturmuş olduğunuz tasarımları fotogerçekçi bir şekilde görselleştirebileceksiniz.
requirements: Temel Archicad bilginiz varsa kurs size daha kolay gelecektir. Temel seviyeniz yoksa bile uygun adımları tekrarlayarak her şekilde programa adapte olabilirsiniz.
courses.description:
İndirimden yararlanmak isterseniz bu kodu kullanabilirsiniz : 5F1CE0D3DA43D8952C09 (169.99 TL)
Herkese merhaba ben Serdar Barbaros.
Mimarim ve mimarlık alanında Youtube ve Udemy üzerinden online eğitim hizmetleri vermekteyim. Daha önceden temel düzeyde Archicad eğitim setimi paylaşmıştım. bu video setinde temel seviyeden bir adım öteye gidip iç mimari sınıfına giriyoruz. Archicadi bir kademe daha fonksiyonel kullanıyoruz.
Peki iç mimaride neden Archicad kullanmalıyız ? o kadar yazılım varken, 3ds Max, Rhino, Sketchup varken neden Archicad ? bu sorunun cevabı çok basit. Archicadde yapmış olduğumuz tasarımları düzenlemesi çok daha kolay. Tasarımda değişiklik yapmak istediğimizde diğer programlarda olduğu gibi baştan modellemek yerine birkaç parametre değiştirmek bize hem zaman kazandırıyor hem de tasarımlarımızı daha kolay şekillendiriyor. işte bu BIM yazılımları kullanmanın avantajı.
Biz bu eğitim setinde Twinmotion render motorunu kullanacağız. bunun sebebi Archicad ile gerçek zamanlı çalışabilmesi ve yeni teknoloji sayesinde foto gerçekçi renderlar alabilmesi. Archicad modelinde yaptığımız değişikliği anında Twinmotionda görebiliyoruz ve gereksiz zaman kayıplarından kurtuluyoruz.
Son olarak bu sette bir mutfak modelliyoruz. başka mekanlar da modellemek mümkündü fakat işlem tekrarı oluşmaması ve sıkıcı olmaması için bütün teknik detayları anlatabileceğim karmaşıklığı içeren bu mekanı seçtim.
Kursa kayıt olmak için eğitimciye destek olmak adına lütfen yukarıda her ayın başında vermiş olduğum indirim kodunu kullanabilirsiniz.
Şimdiden teşekkür ediyor ve herkese iyi tasarımlar diliyorum.
Bir mimar olmak, tasarım fikirlerinizi ifade etmekten geçmelidir. BIM, bunu bilgisayar teknolojisi ile yapabileceğiniz bir dildir. Mimari modelleme bilginizi, BIM ve görselleştirme becerilerinizi geliştirmenin yolunu bu eğitim setinde bulabilirsiniz. Beni takip ederek BIM becerilerinize çok daha fazlasını ekleyeceksiniz.
target_audience: Bu kurs iç mimari model yapmak isteyen fakat modelleme ve görselleştirme konusunda uygun yazılımı seçmede kararsız ya da kendini bu yazılımda geliştirmek isteyen herkes içindir.
Archicad modelleme benzer yazılımlara göre daha esnek ve kullanıcı dostu olduğundan her seviyede kullanıcıya kolaylıkla hitap edebilmektedir.

requirements: Yeni başlayan ve sektörde deneyim kazanmak isteyen herkes için uygundur.
courses.description:
Selamlar,
Ben Ümit Kayahan ÖZTÜRK kapatılan hesabımdan sonra tekrar aranızdayım. Kısa sürede yayından kaldırılan eski kurslarımı ve yeni kursları platformda tekrardan paylaşacağım. 10 Yıllık proje ve saha tecrübesini sizlerle paylaşmak istiyorum. Sektörün en büyük sorunu nitelikli personel bulunmamasıdır. Sıfırdan başlayarak ileri seviyeye kadar adım adım izah etmeye çalıştım. Kurs ile ilgili yorumlarınızı en son yapmanızı rica ederim. Geri dönüşlerinizi bekliyorum. Kurs içeriğinden ekleme ve çıkarmaları buna göre yapabilirim.
"Kapalı Otopark Jet Fan Sistem Tasarımı" Kursu kapsamında sektöre yeni başlamış veya kendini geliştirmek isteyen kapalı otopark havalandırma sistemlerine merak duyan herkese hitap etmektedir.
Bu kurs kapsamında neler öğreneceğiz ?
Öncelikli olarak otopark çeşitleri kapalı/açık tip ne nedir ? Hangi şartlar altında bu sistemi kurguluyoruz ? Sistem nasıl çalışıyor ve nasıl sıfırdan çizeceğiz ? Jet fan türleri nelerdir ? Kapalı otoparklarda ne tür çözümler yapabiliriz ? Hangi şartlar altında duman egzoz havalandırması yapıyoruz hangi şartlarda otoparklarda havalandırma yapmadan çözüm üretebiliriz ?  Aksiyel ve Radyal tip jet fanlar ne zaman tercih edilir ? Yerleşim matrisi nedir ?
Bu soruların yanıtını bulduktan sonra sistemde kullanılan tüm vana ve ekipmanlar detaylı olarak anlatılmaktadır.
3 Farklı proje ele alınmış olup. Konut, Ticari ve Avm şeklinde kolaydan karmaşıklığa göre örnekler yer almaktadır.
Kursa ait tüm çizimler, föyler kaynaklar bölümüne eklenmiştir.
Kursun faydalı olması dileği ile,

courses.title: SketchUp DC｜動態元件
courses.bio: 讓設計動起來
objectives: 協助您在課程之後，能以動態方式來呈現設計內容。
requirements: 已具有SketchUp之基礎知識
courses.description:
現今設計產業在成果展示之表現手法，僅以虛擬三維模型進行導覽，已漸不敷使用。
更容易讓人可以快速地深入理解產品之新途徑，是將已建立之三維模型，再導入動態展示行為於其中。
本課程以動態元件五大行為介紹(材質更替、比例縮放、物件隱藏、互動點擊與材質縮放)，作為學習出發點。
並在上述的五大行為中，分別導入實作案例，按部就班協助理解如何有效率地，製作出動態元件。
target_audience: 對製作SketchUp動態元件有興趣者

courses.title: 5 popular interior styles
courses.bio: Contemporary, French, Loft, Scandinavian, and Japandi
requirements: No design background or experience is required — this course is perfect for beginners. All you need is curiosity and a desire to learn about interior styles. A device with internet access is enough to view the course and complete any creative tasks.
courses.description:
Are you interested in interior design but don’t know where to begin? This mini-course is the perfect starting point! You'll explore five of the most popular and timeless interior design styles: Contemporary, French, Loft, Scandinavian, and Japandi.
Each lesson introduces you to one style and explains its key characteristics — including typical color palettes, materials, textures, furniture, and decor elements. You'll learn to visually identify each style and understand how to apply it in real interiors. Whether you're decorating your home, planning a renovation, or simply want to understand what makes each design style unique, this course will give you a clear foundation.
You’ll also get inspiration and practical tips to choose a style that fits your taste, or even combine elements from different styles in a harmonious way.
This course is beginner-friendly — no prior experience or special tools are required. All you need is curiosity and a desire to learn. By the end of the course, you'll be able to speak the language of design and confidently identify and use interior styles in your own projects. This course was created by the Diskill school in collaboration with instructor and interior designer Anna Rocha.
Join us and start your interior design journey today!
target_audience: This course is for beginners, aspiring interior designers, home decorators, or anyone interested in learning about popular interior styles like Contemporary, French, Loft, Scandinavian, and Japandi. It’s ideal for those seeking inspiration or starting their first design project.

courses.title: Become an Interior Decorator & Decorate Interior Columns
courses.bio: Complete Guideline to Become an Interior Decorator & Decorate Interior Columns
objectives: How to Become an Interior Decorator
Gaining Experience
Starting an Interior Decoration Business
How to Decorate Interior Columns
Painting Your Columns
Adding Permanent Design Elements
How to Choose Interior Paint Colors
Designing a Single Room
How to Become an Interior Designer in Texas
Earning a Degree
How to Learn Interior Design
Practice with design software.
Obtain work experience.

How to Learn Interior Design: Choose interior design if you’d like technical background or interior decoration
Pursue a B.A. in interior design or architecture.
Take an online course to substitute for a B.A.
Build your knowledge of material sourcing.
Ask trade specialists to review your designs.
Choose a specific industry, design style, or thematic focus for your career.
Take the NCIDQ or CCIDC exam to get certified.
Register with your state as an interior designer.

requirements: There is no prerequisites
A wish to learn
courses.description:
Welcome to the course on "Become an Interior Decorator & Decorate Interior Columns"
If you have a love of decorating and a knack for arranging furniture and choosing decor and color, a career as an interior decorator may be perfect for you. To become a "decorator" you don't need an extensive education or a fancy degree, just a good eye and a passion for the job. However, if you are interested in interior design, you will need to take specialized courses and gain the proper licensing from the state, depending on which state you are in.
If you have columns inside your home, they can be stately and beautiful. However, they can also sometimes make decorating difficult, since they’re hard to miss and you can’t move them around. Luckily, there are ways you can make your column look like an intentional part of your décor, no matter what style you prefer!
Choosing the right interior paint colors depends on the kind of room you want. Take some time to think about what kind of ambiance you want. Certain colors add weight to the room while others create a lighter tone. You can also mix colors into different shades and tints to help create more visual unity. Plan out your rooms before painting so that you can make your home’s interior pleasant no matter what colors you use.
An interior designer is responsible for creating an aesthetic design plan for interior spaces. Additionally, they must ensure the space meets building codes and is accessible to wheelchair users, the visually impaired etc. They also confirm the functionality and safety of the space and know how to communicate with other industry professionals such as building contractors and architects. Because an interior designer's job functions are so broad, it takes a certain amount of education and experience in order to become a professional. To be a designer in the state of Texas, you must have the registered interior designer designation.
Interior design is an exciting profession where you can combine your creative and technical sides. Because many states and provinces in the U.S. and Canada require certification for you to register as a “certified interior designer,” it’s important to know where to find the right knowledge when you’re getting started. We’ve compiled some of the best ways to kickstart your design journey or improve your interior design skills!


Thank You!
target_audience: Any one can take this course.

This course is made carefully to take care of several levels of Interior Design lovers.
You will find your knowledge increasing gradually video by video without even knowing it and in no time you will reach the final video and end up with a very beautiful experience with this course brought to you with so much care of the details of the content, the sequence, and the presenting look of each video.

Please enjoy the course and relax because this course will talk to your heart and then your mind.

courses.title: Proiectul tau de design interior in DOAR 5 ORE
courses.bio: Platforma Homestyler pentru casa ta
objectives: Familiarizare cu platforma Homestyler
Mobilare si iluminat locuinta
Randari fotorealistice
Design interior armonios
Reguli de baza in amenajare

Proiectul casei tale: Baia - trucuri pentru a mari vizual spatiul
Descarca imaginile si bucura-te de rezultat

requirements: Nu e nevoie de experienta anterioara. Invatam impreuna sa folosim platforma si sa efectuam o amenajare corecta.
courses.description:
Dacă iubești designul interior și vrei să înveți cum să-ți amenajezi spațiul într-un mod captivant și eficient, acest curs este perfect pentru tine! Vei experimenta o abordare practică și hands-on în ceea ce privește crearea propriului proiect de design interior, și totul se va întâmpla în doar 5 ore folosind platforma online Homestyler.
Ce vei învăța:
Introducere în Homestyler: Vom începe cu o prezentare a platformei Homestyler, învățând cum să o folosești în mod eficient pentru a crea proiecte realistice de design interior.
Concepte de bază în design interior: Vei descoperi elementele esențiale ale designului interior și cum să le aplici pentru a obține rezultate remarcabile în amenajarea spațiului tău.
Planificarea spațiului: Vei învăța să evaluezi corect dimensiunile și configurația spațiului tău, să creezi planuri precise și să explorezi diverse opțiuni de amenajare.
Selectarea culorilor și a materialelor: Vom explora paleta de culori și materiale disponibile în Homestyler și cum să le combini pentru a aduce personalitate și stil în locuința ta.
Mobila și decorațiunile: Vei avea acces la o varietate de mobilier și decorațiuni din biblioteca Homestyler, învățând cum să le alegi și să le integrezi în proiectul tău.
Iluminat și efecte vizuale: Vom explora modul în care iluminatul și efectele vizuale pot influența atmosfera și aspectul general al spațiului.
Prezentarea proiectului: Vei învăța cum să prezinți proiectul tău de design interior într-un mod profesionist, folosind vizualizări 3D și imagini realiste generate de Homestyler.
Acest curs este perfect pentru oricine dorește să-și descopere creativitatea în design interior și să se bucure de o experiență interactivă și distractivă. Nu este necesară experiență anterioară în design sau utilizarea platformei Homestyler; vei fi ghidat pas cu pas de către instructori experimentați în domeniul designului interior.
La finalul celor 5 ore, vei fi mândru să ai propriul proiect de design interior realizat în Homestyler, gata să îl împărtășești cu prietenii și familia sau să îl implementezi în spațiul tău real.
Înscrie-te acum la cursul "Proiectul tău de design interior în DOAR 5 ore" cu Homestyler și începe să-ți transpui visurile de design în realitate!
target_audience: Pasionati de design interior
Proprietari de locuinta
Incepatori in domeniul designului interior.

requirements: Non ci sono dei requisiti di base per comprendere questo corso se non la buona volontà e la voglia di apprendere
courses.description:
Tutto ciò che c’è da sapere sui nuovi aggiornamenti di Corona Render 7 in merito ai render fotorealistici è presente all’interno di queste lezioni. Il corso approfondirà nel dettaglio tutto ciò che ci permetterà di passare da un livello standard di conoscenze ad un livello pro.
E’ richiesta unicamente la voglia di apprendere perché il corso partirà dalle basi del programma dando a tutti la possibilità di comprenderlo e padroneggiarlo. Verranno spiegati trucchi e consigli utili che io stesso utilizzo per velocizzare il mio flusso di lavoro.
Come tutti i miei corsi anche questo sarà diviso in parte teorica in cui analizzerò a fondo il programma e parte pratica in cui vedremo come si realizza un progetto completo. I concetti sono stati affrontati con le giuste tempistiche e resi i più semplici possibile così da poter portare lo studente passo passo alla più completa e rapida comprensione. Anche le sezioni create sono state studiate in maniera da poter fissare perfettamente gli aspetti importanti del corso aumentando via via la loro complessità.
Alla fine del corso saranno tutti in grado di generare qualsivoglia immagine fotorealistica. Che siano progetti di interni, esterni, still life o qualsiasi altra tipologia di immagini non fa differenza, i concetti illustrati nel corso lasceranno libero sfogo alla fantasia degli studenti così da poter dare loro tutti gli strumenti necessari per creare il proprio stile rappresentativo.
target_audience: Neolaureati in architettura o progettazione d'interni
Chiunque abbia la curiosità e la voglia di creare immagini iperrealistiche

courses.title: Design your Room Using Sketchup
courses.bio: Learn the principles of interior design and how to use SketchUp to make a 3D model of a bedroom's layout and décor.
objectives: Learn how to design a dream bedroom, from choosing the right paint colors, to placing your furniture in their optimal places throughout the space
Know how to use the SketchUp 3D modeling program to design any room
requirements: A computer onto which you can download the SketchUp program
courses.description:
This course will guide you through two exciting elements of design: the SketchUp 3D modeling program and the interior design principles that have allowed the instructor and interior designer, Rebecca Robeson, to create award-winning bedrooms.
If you're interested in interior design, even if it's just to improve the way your home flows and feels, this fun course will show you how to apply basic design techniques that will make your home look like it was professionally designed.
Master Basic Interior Design Principles You Can Easily Apply
Create a virtual model of a sample bedroom using SketchUp
Learn how to properly arrange furniture to make the most of a bedroom space
Choose the best paint colors, accessories, and lighting for a bedroom
Use the SketchUp 3D Modeling Program to Design the Perfect Bedroom
Whether you're an interior designer, someone who's interested in interior design, or someone who simply wants to make their home look its best, this course will show you how to download and use the easy-to-learn interior design program, SketchUp, to design a samplebedroom.
Once you're comfortable designing this sample bedroom, you can then use the same principles to create your own dream bedroom as well as other rooms throughout your home.
Contents and Overview
The first half of this course will focus on how to use SketchUp.
You'll download it, set up your toolbar, and create the walls of your room. You'll also master the paint tool, as well as the doors, windows, and component library.
Once the room is set up as a 3D model, you can move on to the second half of the course, which focuses on decorating a bedroom virtually before tackling it in the real world.
You'll begin with furniture placement so you can set every piece of furniture, from your bed to your nightstand, in its optimal place. This includes choosing the right wall that your bed should be placed against.
A great design also encompasses the right wall colors and artwork, so you'll tackle how to select the best wall colors, and you'll understand the role that art plays in your design so you can choose the right pieces to display.
Accessories and lighting, as well as area rugs and window treatments, will serve to complete the look of your sample bedroom and bring everything together, so you'll learn how to find complementary décor and where to place it.
By the end of this course, you'll know how to use SketchUp to create customized designs for every room in your home, not just your bedroom. You will be ready to move on to the next level by creating your own completely scaled bedroom, providing you the opportunity to design your own virtual reality dream bedroom.
You'll even be invited to post screenshots of your design on the Robeson Design Facebook page to show off your new skills.
target_audience: Anyone interested in interior design or in upgrading their décor
Interior designers of all levels

Cuando compres el curso vas a poder acceder a las clases cuando y donde quieras. El curso se queda en tu cuenta de Udemy para siempre. :)
Interés por adquirir conocimientos de decorador y diseñador de interiores a nivel profesional.
Muy recomendable si ya trabajas en el sector de la decoración y el interiorismo y deseas actualizar y mejorar tus conocimientos teórico-prácticos para progresar en tu trabajo.
Tener un abierta, ser creativo, apasionado del diseño y entusiasta del buen estilo, serán tus mejores herramientas para triunfar en este apasionante sector.
El más importante requisito para realizar este curso es el entusiasmo y la motivación por aprender nuevas habilidades que aumenten tus competencias profesionales.
courses.description:
EXPERTO en Diseño de Habitaciones y Dormitorios Juveniles
Convierte en Profesional del Diseño, Decoración, Organización y Planificación de Dormitorios para Usuarios Jóvenes.
Instructores: Arquitecto Álvaro García y Arquitecta de Interiores Mariangeles Fernández  Actualizado: Octubre del 2025  Estudiantes: +3.500  Requisitos previos: Ninguno


Descripción del Curso:
Impulsa tu perfil con “EXPERTO en Diseño de Habitaciones y Dormitorios Juveniles”, el curso en Udemy que convierte espacios jóvenes en ambientes funcionales, seguros y con estilo. Aprenderás distribución y ergonomía, iluminación por capas, color y materiales, almacenaje inteligente, zonas de estudio, descanso y ocio (gaming, lectura, música), acústica básica y soluciones para habitaciones pequeñas y compartidas. Es 100% online, a tu ritmo y desde cualquier país, apto para todas las edades y niveles, con plantillas y casos reales.
Al finalizar, podrás transformar un briefing en un proyecto completo: moodboard, planos, renders y presupuesto, con criterios de crecimiento evolutivo (infancia → adolescencia), seguridad y mantenimiento fácil. Construirás un portfolio profesional y te posicionarás en búsquedas como diseño de dormitorios juveniles, habitaciones para adolescentes e interiorismo infantil y juvenil. Inscríbete hoy y obtén ventaja competitiva con certificado de finalización en Udemy.
Tu dormitorio es el espacio más íntimo de tu hogar, así que debería ser un reflejo de ti mismo. Planificarlo para que se adapte a tu estilo y a tus necesidades lo hará también el lugar más cómodo de tu casa.
Con esta formación podrás sacar el máximo partido a tu toda tu creatividad decorativa. En el curso online recibirás lecciones teóricas de conceptos como el espacio, el color o la iluminación… específicos para diseñar dormitorios juveniles.
Este curso te ayudará a introducirte en el espacio que dedicas tanto a dormir del tirón como a vivir experiencias que sientes a flor de piel: emocionarte con un libro, estar a solas con tu pareja o bailar con la música a todo volumen, merecen verse reflejadas en tu lugar de descanso.
Es el curso online perfecto para convertir una pasión en una nueva aventura laboral. Por otro lado, también aprenderás a interpretar las necesidades tus futuros clientes y a colaborar junto a ellos para gestionar una decoración perfecta para cada habitación de su hogar. Siempre bajo el consejo y asesoramiento de nuestros expertos en decoración.


Itinerario Formativo:
Introducción a Udemy
Bienvenida al EXPERTO en Diseño de Dormitorios Juveniles.
Historia, Tendencias Actuales y Referencias
Diseño y Organización del Espacio Interior

Recursos para el Alumno del Experto en Diseño y Planificación de Proyectos de Diseño de Dormitorios Juveniles
Emisión del Certificado de Finalización del EXPERTO en Diseño de Dormitorios Juveniles.


Objetivos del curso:
Dominarás una metodología integral para diseño de dormitorios juveniles: del brief al proyecto ejecutivo, con layout y zoning cama–estudio–almacenaje, iluminación por capas, ergonomía, acústica y materiales saludables. Resolverás habitaciones pequeñas y compartidas (literas, modulares, soluciones ocultas), integrarás tecnología y estilo, y documentarás con moodboards, planos, renders y presupuesto listos para cliente.


Salidas profesionales:
Interiorista residencial especializado en dormitorios infantiles y adolescentes, decorador/a, home organizer, asesor/a en retail de mobiliario juvenil, stylist para fotografía y marcas, y visualizador 3D. Oportunidades freelance o en estudios de interiorismo y reformas, e-commerce y home staging, potenciando tu empleabilidad global con un portfolio sólido y certificado en Udemy.


Dirigido a:
Estudiantes y profesionales de interiorismo, arquitectura y decoración, así como familias y propietarios que buscan habitaciones juveniles funcionales y con estilo. Apto para todos los niveles y edades, 100% online y desde cualquier país, ideal para quien necesite resultados reales en diseño de dormitorios juveniles, habitaciones para adolescentes y organización inteligente del espacio.


Metodología de Aprendizaje:
Recuerda que este curso incluye lecciones en vídeo fullHD con audio de estudio (compatible con TV, PC, Mac, tablet y smartphone), artículos didácticos, actividades, animaciones, ilustraciones, proyectos paso a paso, recursos descargables, links de interés, acceso de por vida, certificado de finalización, tutorización online, y una exclusiva comunidad de aprendizaje privada que nos ayudamos aportando nuestras experiencias en el foro de comunicación del curso.
La modalidad de este curso te permite que empieces y acabes cuando tú quieras, marcando el ritmo de la clase según tu disponibilidad. Puedes volver a visualizar lo que te interese, saltar el contenido que ya domines, hacer preguntas, resolver dudas, compartir tus proyectos... Puedes elegir ver todas las lecciones de forma secuencial (lineal) y aprovecharlas al máximo la formación, pero también puedes decidir ver este curso como una guía de referencia.
Las clases están claramente organizadas en secciones y lecciones, puedes decidir visualizar solo las clases que te resulten más importantes según tus necesidades formativas. La mayoría de las lecciones son independientes para que puedas comprender los conceptos de cada lección sin tener que ver las lecciones anteriores del curso.
Para seguir el programa formativo propuesto no ser requieren conocimientos previos, ya que la formación se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0. El curso está orientado a aquellos creativos que quieran ampliar sus skills (habilidades) y conocer múltiples trucos, consejos, recursos y recomendaciones, de la mano de los instructores Álvaro García y Mariangeles Fernández. Además la formación disponen de acceso automático al contenido, sin limitación de tiempo, disponibilidad 24/7 (24 horas al día los 7 días de la semana), sin caducidad y con garantía de devolución.
Con esta formación disfrutarás aprendiendo desde dónde quieras, sin tener que desplazarte, sin horarios, con quién quieras, según tus necesidades y disponibilidad. Aprenderás con un instructor avalado por miles da alumnos satisfechos en todo el mundo (comentarios certificados). Conocerás las técnicas, métodos, trucos y flujos de trabajo de este sector creativo. El docente te transmitirá su sabiduría y conocimientos con pasión a la vez que las explicaciones concisas, claras, sencillas y con un enfoque profesional en cada clase. Podrás conseguir un  certificado homologado personalizado y firmado por tu instructor en cada formación. De está forma podrás compartir tu título en tu portafolio, currículo, en redes sociales...
Con la alta definición de los vídeos (vídeo fullHD y audio de estudio) conseguirá no te perder detalle. courses.title: Biophilic Design for Beginners
courses.bio: Improving mental and physical wellbeing by creating a much needed connection with nature in your interior spaces.
objectives: Biophilic Design: Increase your mental and physical well-being by creating a closer connection to nature in your interior spaces.

Simple Strategies To Incorporate Biophil: Simple Strategies to Incorporate Biophilic Design
Strategies to Incorporate Biophilic Design Quiz
Conclusion: Conclusion

requirements: A passion for all things design and decorating is highly recommended.
courses.description:
Biophilia means a love of nature, so Biophilic Design uses natural elements and resources to create a sense of harmony between our modern living, working and playing spaces and the natural world.
Biophilic Design is proven to:
· Improve mood, physical and mental health and cognitive function
· Reduce stress levels
· Increases productivity, performance, engagement, and creativity
· Advance the natural healing process
In this course you will learn not only the mental and physical benefits of Biophilic Design but also:
· The categories of Biophilic Design
· Why it's becoming increasingly popular (and necessary) as an interior style
· Simple and easy ways to create a connection with nature, in buildings and interior spaces
· Interior trends influencing Biophilic Design
· The connection between Biophilic Design, Wabi Sabi and Hygge


IMPORTANT NOTE:
All of our courses have been designed to be stand-alone courses and can be done in any order. However, if you are interested in taking all of our courses – we’d like to recommend an order in which to do them (although it’s not required):
· Popular Interior Design Styles and How to Use Them
· Design Principles & Elements in Interiors
· Introduction to Colour In Interiors
· Textiles & Fabrics
· Introduction to Space Planning
· Staging and Styling Interior Spaces
· Simple Guide to Curtains and Blinds in Interiors
· Simple Guide to Furniture Styles in Interiors
· Biophilic Design for Beginners
target_audience: This course is ideal for anyone who wants to learn great interior design and decorating techniques
This course is also ideal for enthusiasts, interior design students and professional interior designers who are new to their field
This course is for anyone wanting to improve their physical and mental well being by making changes to their living, working and playing spaces.

courses.title: Flooring Aesthetics - Flooring in Interior

requirements: Open to all Learners
courses.description:
Did you know, Zhangjiajie Grand Canyon Glass Bridge is the world’s highest and longest glass skywalk!?
Flooring is what makes our life easy. It adds life in the form of sq. ft. to spaces. Without flooring, walking and driving would be difficult. Be it a pathway made from stones, marbles or pebbles in a garden or a meditation centre, be it wooden flooring in cold places or rubber flooring in gyms, comfortable and efficient flooring is a necessity.
Marble, granite, and limestone are some of the commonly found varieties of floor tiles. However, there are other elegant varieties as well. While they are usually used in residential and office spaces, there are certain exceptions in terms of use as well.
If you want to understand flooring requirements of a space and install the same, students need to have thorough knowledge of material and its installation techniques. The limitations of each type are poles apart. This module is a comprehensive guide on a variety of flooring options. The flooring in interior covered in this module are -
Concrete
Stones
Flooring Tiles
Carpets
Wooden
PVC
Epoxy
Glass
Rubber
Metal
Learn about various flooring options, their area of use, significance, materials, purpose, challenges, solutions, estimation, and get some interesting styling ideas for the same.
target_audience: An individual aspiring to grow in the field of Interior Design, Interior Styling and Interior Practice.
Aspiring and Professional Artists, designers, stylists, students, architects, set designers, entrepreneurs, and other learners.
One for All – beginner to proficient individuals in the domains of Interior Design.
Enthusiasts who want knowledge on types of flooring.

En este curso que es muy interesante, estaremos revisando desde las bases del diseño de interior, entender los espacios y su importancia para nuestra vivienda o la de nuestros clientes, una breve historia de los orígenes de la vivienda, para tener un lenguaje amplio y más que nada el entendimiento de las necesidades a través del tiempo. Seguiremos con una breve lectura de planos arquitectónicos para poder tener un entendimiento de un par de simbologías necesarias. Ya con el conocimiento básico iremos haciendo prácticas en en programas de 3d gratuitos, para poder aplicar lo que se va entendiendo a manera visual.
Mientras dominamos programas de 3d, iremos adelantando con conocimientos de espacios a profundidad, el uso correcto de elementos de decoración, libros de reglamentos para poder realizar correctos espacios con sus respectivas características, así como herramientas fundamentales para poder hacer composiciones de espacios con su respectivo conocimiento técnico, teorías de color, sus aplicaciones en la vivienda, y demás.
Revisaremos además las actuales tendencias de inteligencia artificial, con aplicaciones gratuitas que nos servirá para poder apoyarnos los trabajos anteriores con más herramientas que nos den inspiración o aporte para las presentaciones con los clientes.
Miraremos las bases de la iluminación, entender la lectura de los planos eléctricos y el funcionamiento de base de la electricidad y lo que debemos tener en cuenta en las instalaciones de las mismas.
Veremos lugares donde podemos conseguir inspiración para nuestros proyectos y una relación entre los costos de viviendas de alta gama, viviendas de clase media, y viviendas más modestas.
AL final vas a poder realizar tus propios trabajos a nivel diseño y representaciones de diseño interior.
Por lo que esperamos que puedas disfrutar de la mejor manera nuestro curso.

Important Note Before Purchase:
The real price of this course is $20. The displayed price of $19.99 is a psychological marketing tactic (psychological pricing) that the platform applies automatically. Unfortunately, I cannot change it.
I just wanted to clarify this point so everything is transparent before you make your purchase.


Welcome to this concise course where we explore the creation of an interior architectural visualization scene utilizing the powerful and freely open-source available software, "Blender."


Throughout this course, we will not dive into the modeling process, but we will delve into various crucial aspects of the archviz process, all done entirely within the open-source realm of Blender. Our journey includes:


Texturing: Learn the art of texturing, covering UV mapping, and more.
Lighting Techniques: Discover effective methods for illuminating your scenes.
Composition: Explore the intricacies of scene arrangement and design.
Rendering: Get the lowdown on rendering within Blender.
Post-Production: Elevate your work through post-processing within Blender.
Furthermore, in the future, maybe, we'll expand our horizons with Additinal content, such as:


Exploring different lighting approaches.
Harnessing the power of light groups.
Leveraging the capabilities of Eevee rendering.
Adding a vignette effect to your creations.
Streamlining your workflow with batch rendering.
Mastering post-production using Affinity Photo.
Cryptomatte
Join us in this free, powerful and open-source journey to enhance your architectural visualization skills with this short blender course.


Level: Beginners.
You should have some basics with Blender to start with this course.


Blender version used: 4.1.0 alpha or above.
target_audience: Beginner who has basics of Blender

courses.description:
¿De qué trata el curso?
En este curso aprenderás las bases de diseño y decoración de interiores con conceptos de diseño, estilos y tendencias decorativas, técnicas y herramientas que permitan el desarrollo de un proyecto de principio a fin orientado a mejorar los ambientes que habitamos.
Se revisarán conceptos básicos de diseño, teoría del color, conocimiento del espacio, como elementos preliminares para seleccionar materiales, elementos decorativos, iluminación que complementen el espacio y le den un toque único en su ambientación.
Conocerás como realizar un plano de una habitación con la representación de sus elementos constructivos y decorativos.
Además con el programa gratutito Sweethome 3D, realizarás tus diseños de manera fácil y entretenida. Crearás tus ambientes paso a paso con paredes, mobiliario y toda la decoración. Al finalizar lograrás crear diseños de espacios con mobiliario, decoración y mas elementos que le darán una visión muy realista del proyecto.
Al final, se realizará un proyecto paso a paso para la decoración de un espacio utilizando herramientas de representación gráfica, cómo leer planos, y medir un espacio previo al inicio de un diseño.
¿Qué temas tiene el curso?
El curso tiene las siguientes video-clases:
Bases de diseño y composición
Estilos y tendencias decorativas
Colores en diseño interior
El Espacio interior
Elementos de un espacio
Representación gráfica
Diseño en computador
Proyecto de diseño
Recomendaciones finales
target_audience: Está orientado a todas las personas que les guste el diseño y decoración de interiores.
Arquitectos, diseñadores, tendrán en Sweethome 3D un complemento para la presentación rápida y muy realista de espacios exteriores e interiores.

courses.description:
Witness the remarkable marriage of 3Ds Max and Marvelous Designer as we embark on an extraordinary journey to create an awe-inspiring armchair. In this captivating collaboration, we skillfully combined the versatility of 3Ds Max's modeling prowess with the fabric simulation capabilities of Marvelous Designer.
With meticulous attention to detail, we meticulously crafted every curve and contour of the armchair using the powerful tools of 3Ds Max. From the sleek lines of the armrests to the intricate patterns on the upholstery, no element was left untouched. The software's precision and flexibility allowed us to bring our vision to life with unparalleled realism.
But our quest for authenticity didn't end there. Enter Marvelous Designer, a game-changer in the realm of fabric simulation. With this innovative software, we meticulously draped the armchair in lifelike virtual fabric, achieving stunningly realistic folds, wrinkles, and textures. The interplay between light and shadow on the fabric gave our creation an extra touch of authenticity and brought it to life.
Join us on this captivating journey as we unravel the intricacies of the design process. Through our meticulous documentation, you'll witness the seamless integration of 3Ds Max and Marvelous Designer, showcasing their combined power to create breathtaking visual masterpieces.
Prepare to be enthralled by the perfect harmony of technology and artistry. Our armchair embodies the pinnacle of CGI modeling, demonstrating the boundless possibilities that arise when exceptional software and visionary creativity converge. Immerse yourself in our creation, and let the armchair transport you to a world where beauty, comfort, and innovation

courses.title: Space Planning In Interior Design
courses.bio: Guide to interior residential design approach
objectives: Designing an ergonomic residential space
Working with criteria matrix
Working with bubble diagrams
Developing a furnished floor plan
Furnishing a floor plan based on residential space standards
requirements: Printable (Found in the resources) : CRITERIA MATRIX AND ADJENCECY-Model, Floor Plan.
Tracing papers, Sticky notes, black marker, 2 colored markers, black ink pen, circular templates ruler (optional), triangle ruler, masking tape.
courses.description:
Space planning is a fundamental aspect of interior design that directly influences the functionality, flow, and overall aesthetic appeal of a space. In this course, participants will explore the principles, techniques, and strategies of effective space planning in interior design. Through a combination of theoretical concepts and a practical exercise. Participants will develop the skills needed to create well-organized, efficient, and ergonomic interior spaces.
This course is divided into 3 sections:
Section 1: We will start by understanding the scope of the project. Elaborating the 5 steps to approaching a project: starting with meeting our clients all the way to executing our project.
Section 2:  I believe that the best way to learning is through practice, for this reason I will explain space planning with an exercise, you have the choice to either watch the process and practice afterwards, or you can grab the materials listed and work along. Hands on we will work step by step to plan efficiently our interior residential space:


Begin by thoroughly examining the space we're working with.
Determine the purpose of the space and identify the specific activities that will take place within it.
Divide the space into different zones based on their intended use.
Assess the plan from different perspectives and make adjustments as necessary. Consider how the space plan aligns with the client's requirements and preferences.


in this section we will get very close to the final outcome and we will reach 70% of our final plan. Only furniture setup would be missing but would be completed by the end of this course.
Section 3: (divided into 5 lectures) we will go deeper and understand the standards of anthropology in interior design through the standards of furnishing in specific rooms covering all of the following objectives.
Lecture 1: bathroom standards and circulations
Lecture 2: bedroom standards and dimensions
Lecture 3: kitchen standards and circulations
Lecture 4: Living room standard and circulations
Lecture 5: Dining room standard and circulations


By the end of this course, participants will have a comprehensive understanding of space planning in interior design. They will possess the skills and knowledge to analyze space requirements, develop efficient floor plans, create functional zones, incorporate design elements and principles, and effectively communicate their ideas.
Whether pursuing a career in interior design or simply seeking to improve their own living environment, participants will be equipped with the tools to create well-designed and thoughtfully organized interior spaces.


Are you brave enough to start?
Join me now and let’s master the interior design profession.
target_audience: Beginners in Interior design, interior design enthusiasts and decorators.

Ben Ümit Kayahan ÖZTÜRK kapatılan hesabımdan sonra tekrar aranızdayım. Sektörün en büyük sorunu nitelikli personel bulunmamasıdır. Sıfırdan başlayarak ileri seviyeye kadar adım adım izah etmeye çalıştım. Kurs ile ilgili yorumlarınızı en son yapmanızı rica ederim. Bu kurs kapsamında neler öğreneceğiz ? Ya da bu seri sizlere ne öğretecek bunu anlatmak istiyorum.
Diğer kurslarım her bir disiplinin tek tek nasıl tasarlanacağını anlatırken sizlere yeni bir proje geldiği zaman nasıl tasarım yapabilirsiniz bunu anlatmaya çalışacağım. Bu proje Ankara'da yer alan bir ofis binasının proje tasarımını izah etmektedir. Sıhhi tesisat kapsamında kurulan tüm sistemler ve bu sistemlere neden ihtiyaç duyuldu neler tasarladık onu anlatacağım.

courses.title: Minimalist vs. Maximalist Interior Design.
courses.bio: Find the perfect blend for you.
objectives: The principles of interior design that create minimalistic and maximalistic style.
Master the art of curating and arranging objects within a space to create harmony and beauty, even in high density environments.
Grasp the concepts of 'grouping', 'families', and 'repetition' and their impact on spatial perception.
Understand the historical and cultural shifts in architectural styles, identifying how simplicity and complexity contribute to aesthetic appeal.
Learn how the shape and form of objects influence the overall complexity of a space and its emotional ambiance.
Acquire skills to strategically select and utilize colors to influence the simplicity or complexity of a design.
Develop the ability to balance minimalistic and maximalistic design elements to create personalized living spaces that reflect changing needs and desires.
requirements: This course doesn't require any prior knowledge or experience in interior design. All you need is an interest in learning more about creating beautiful, functional spaces and a desire to apply these principles in real-life settings.
courses.description:
Redesign a room from your home to make it look more minimal, more maximal or the perfect blend of the two. In this class, you will learn the principles of interior design that contribute to the minimal or the maximal look and I will teach you simple steps you can take to achieve that look.
In this class, you will learn the following:
Why styles do not matter: where you will learn how the architectural styles have shifted between simplicity and complexity
How simplicity and complexity contribute to what we consider beautiful
How to curate your objects to make a space look beautiful despite the high number of objects
How “grouping”, “families”, and “repetition” contribute to how we perceive a space
How the shape of objects can influence the complexity of a space and how we feel around it
How to pick colours strategically to make a space look more simple or more complex
How the arrangement of objects in the space can create a sense of simplicity or complexity
At their core, Minimalists and Maximalism are nothing other than extreme simplicity and extreme complexity. And with this class, I want to teach you the tools that create simplicity and complexity in interior design.
The focus of this class is to help you detach from generic styles and marketing campaigns and empower you to create environments that suit your personal needs and desires. Throughout your life, you will swing back and forth between simplicity and complexity. You might start out as a minimalist, but as your life and family will grow, you might turn into a maximalist, at some point, you might want to swing towards minimalism again to go one maximalist step forward. No matter what comes, I want you to feel empowered to go up or down on the spectrum of complexity with ease.
I also want you to treat minimalism and maximalism like a buffet. You can absolutely be a minimalist that is surrounded by vivid colours and art, and you can definitely be an environmentally conscious maximalist. It doesn’t have to be either-or; it can be both and.
target_audience: People who are interested in learning how to design their own home.
Individuals passionate about home design and seeking to understand the principles of Minimalism and Maximalism in interior design.
Professional interior designer seeking to expand their knowledge base.

courses.title: VRAY PARA SKETCHUP DESDE CERO PARA DISEÑO DE INTERIORES
courses.bio: Curso desde básico a profesional de V-ray 6 para sketchup aprendiendo iluminación, 360 y trucos para renders rápidos
objectives: Utilización del programa VRay para sketchup desde un nivel muy básico para interiores

Realización de dos casos prácticos revisando todos los problemas que se podrían tener
Recorrido 360 para presentar en plataformas especializadas y facebook

2 DESCARGAR OBJETOS DE 3D WAREHOUSE Y PR: 2 Descargar objetos y hacer los primeros renders

requirements: Tener un conocimiento muy básico en sketchup
courses.description:
En este curso de 5 horas aprenderemos desde lo más básico de Vray hasta llegar a un nivel profesional para interiores, utilizaremos la base para hacer un buen render o imagen de nuestro proyecto elaborado en sketchup para que lo podamos presentar a nuestros clientes, utilizando las técnicas de fotografía de arquitectura como composición, iluminación, materialidad y más. Se verán plataformas que nos servirán para poder descargar materiales de apoyo adicional a todos los ejercicios que nuestro estudio de arquitectura a realizado especialmente para el curso de tal manera que podamos practicar de una manera lúdica.
Se revisará iluminación en todas las maneras que se pueden aplicar en un proyecto para que podamos resolver todo tipo de proyectos, interiores, así como diferentes espacios tanto diurnos como nocturnos y al mismo tiempo podamos ir comparando su uso y su mejor opción a la hora de decidir cuál de estas utilizar.
En tema de presentaciones revisaremos una que es la llamada 360, en esta podemos moviendo nuestro teclado o mouse ver todo el espacio a nuestro alrededor, viendo cada detalle de nuestro diseño, esto es un formato que a todo cliente le encanta, y lo haremos mediante nuestro celular, nuestro programa o en plataformas especializadas, como vez es un curso completo y práctico, que hemos ido aprendiendo tanto como docentes, así como en los proyectos que hacemos a nuestros clientes.
target_audience: A personas que utilizan sketchup para su trabajo tanto estudiantes de arquitectura, diseñadores o personas que trabajan con sketchup

courses.title: Guide to blueprints: Interior design drafting essentials
courses.bio: How to read and draw blueprints
objectives: Understand the basics of blueprint

Understand Measurement Systems and Scale
Acknowledge different drawings in a set of blueprints

All about floor plans: Let's practice drawing a floor plan

requirements: no prerequisites needed
courses.description:
This course is specifically designed for individuals who are interested in gaining a comprehensive understanding of blueprint reading and drawing techniques within the context of interior design. This course aims to equip students with the necessary skills to interpret and create accurate blueprints, enabling them to effectively communicate design concepts and collaborate with other professionals in the industry.
Throughout the course, students will learn the fundamental principles and techniques involved in reading and interpreting blueprints. They will explore various types of interior design blueprints, including floor plans, elevations, sections, and details. Through a combination of lectures, demonstrations, and hands-on exercises, students will develop the ability to decipher and extract relevant information from blueprint drawings.
The course will cover the essential elements of blueprint reading, such as understanding scales, dimensions, symbols, and annotations commonly used in interior design blueprints. Students will learn how to interpret floor plans, which illustrate the layout and spatial arrangement of a room or building. They will study elevations, which provide a vertical representation of the interior surfaces, including walls, windows, and doors. Additionally, students will explore sections and details, which offer a more in-depth understanding of specific areas or features within a design.
By the end of the course, students will have the confidence and proficiency to read, interpret, and create accurate blueprints, enabling them to effectively communicate their design ideas and collaborate with other professionals in the field of interior design.
This course provides a solid foundation for individuals aspiring to pursue careers as interior designers, architects, or professionals involved in the built environment. It also serves as a valuable skill set for homeowners, contractors, or anyone interested in understanding and communicating design concepts through the medium of blueprints.


--> So join me in this highly informative course, to Master interior design <--
target_audience: beginners in interior design and architectures, decorators, interior design enthusiasts and everyone seeking a knowledge in blueprint reading and drawing

courses.description: Have you ever wondered how virtual reality can be used for better interior design presentations?  Do you want to impress your clients with immersive virtual reality experiences?  Have you seen how impressive some of the renderings designers are creating these days?  Have you ever wondered how they created them?  Is it worth the time or money to invest in photorealistic software?  Well, in this course, I'll break down my secret to cutting down the cost and time it takes to create beautiful photorealistic renderings.  I'll also show you how to turn this rendered image into a virtual reality experience!  You'll learn how to view this design with the Google Cardboard and Oculus Quest 2 virtual reality headsets.  Please follow all instructions that you receive with your VR headset.  You should be made fully aware that you will need to have the proper space away from animals and people for safety reasons.  Do not use and please take caution before using this VR headset if you experience motion sickness easily.  It’s recommended to consult with your doctor before using a VR headset especially if you have a condition permitting you from using gaming devices such as this or if you easily get motion sickness.
target_audience: Interior Designers who want to increase their skill set and learn how VR can positively impact their client's experience.

courses.title: World History - History of Architecture
courses.bio: Learn about the evolution of art and architecture in different countries and the elements that inspired the interior des
objectives: World History of Interior Designing - Greek Architecture, Gothic Architecture, Chinese Architecture, etc
Evolution of Art and Architecture through different eras
The Emergence of Indian Architecture
Architecture of Temples - Jain, Mughal, Dravidian, etc.
How Mughal Emperors Shaped Architecture that includes Famous Monuments in India like Fatehpur Sikri and Taj Mahal

Introduction: Contribution of Emperor Akbar to Mughal Architecture
Contribution of Emperor Jahangir to Mughal Architecture
Contribution of Emperor Shah Jahan to Mughal Architecture

requirements: No Requirement
courses.description:
Different countries, different eras, different architecture. Every style, era, and country has some distinct elements that separate them from the rest. The course highlights such details thoroughly.
The course gives you access to the necessary resources, industry competent skills and knowledge you need to design a space according to different client requirements.
In this course, you will learn about different architectural trends in the world – right from Chinese Architecture, Gothic Architecture, Greek Architecture to eras or periods known to bring revolution in the field of architecture like the French Renaissance, Italian Renaissance, English Renaissance to inception of Indian architecture and the factors that influenced them.
Indian temples and monuments are popularly known for their structure and architecture. This course covers intricately designed Jain Style and Dravidian Style Temples. Although the design style is different of one from the other, there are some key elements that make each type of architecture magnificent. It also covers the influence of Mughal Emperors like Shah Jahan, Akbar, and Jahangir on architecture.
This course also covers tons of practical information on what defines these particular trends in a particular era and country – materials, colors, tools, and accessories.
Any individual who wants to know about the different history of architecture of some of the most prominent eras, periods, and other popular elements that define them must enroll in this course.
target_audience: 1. Anyone who wants to learn about world history of interior designing
2. Aspiring and professional artists, students, architects, interior designers, and set designers
3. Enthusiasts who want to pursue a career in different domains of Interior Design and Architecture
4. Anyone who wants knowledge about architecture from different eras
5. For all entry level to advanced Interior Designers and Architects

requirements: Accessibility for Everyone This course is designed to be inclusive, welcoming individuals from all backgrounds.
Encouraging Self-Reflection Students are encouraged to actively engage with the content by taking notes for self-reflection purposes. This practice enhances the learning experience.
No Prior Experience Required A standout feature of this course is its inclusivity – no prior experience is needed to enroll. Regardless of your background or expertise.
Simplified Learning Approach the course adopts a simplified learning approach, breaking down complex concepts into easily digestible segments.
Universally Understandable Content The language and delivery of content have been meticulously crafted to be universally understandable.
courses.description:
About This Course:
This course offers a deep dive into IKEA’s groundbreaking design philosophy, manufacturing innovations, and global retail strategy. By analyzing IKEA’s Scandinavian design principles, supply chain efficiency, and customer-centric approach, participants will gain valuable insights into how design, affordability, and business strategy converge to build an enduring global brand.
Key Learning Outcomes:
Exploring Design Perspectives – Study IKEA’s fusion of Bauhaus principles and Scandinavian farm design
Democratic Design in Action – Understand how IKEA balances affordability, functionality, and aesthetics
Product Evolution & Innovation – Trace IKEA’s design evolution from 1960 to 2000 with case studies
Flatpack Revolution – Learn how IKEA’s self-assembly furniture changed logistics and customer experience
Retail Experience & Space Planning – Master IKEA’s immersive store layout and home experience strategy
Visionary Brand Ownership – Discover IKEA’s unique ownership model ensuring brand continuity
Customization & Collaboration – See how IKEA integrates customer preferences into design and manufacturing
The Dining Revolution – Understand how IKEA’s restaurant strategy enhances customer engagement
Why Take This Course?
Gain exclusive insights into IKEA’s success formula in design, logistics, and retail
Learn how affordable, scalable, and customer-driven design transforms global industries
Develop a deeper understanding of ergonomics, aesthetics, and sustainability in product design
Master the business strategy behind one of the world’s most influential furniture brands
Who Is This Course For?
Product Designers & Industrial Designers
Architects & Interior Designers
Retail Strategists & Business Owners
Students & Enthusiasts of Design, Supply Chain, and Business Innovation


Join this immersive course today and uncover the design secrets behind IKEA’s global success. Learn how to blend innovation, affordability, and user experience to create timeless and impactful designs.

Scandinavian Furniture Design

requirements: Yeni başlayan ve sektörde deneyim kazanmak isteyen herkes için uygundur.
courses.description:
Selamlar,
Ben Ümit Kayahan ÖZTÜRK kapatılan hesabımdan sonra tekrar aranızdayım. Kısa sürede yayından kaldırılan eski kurslarımı ve yeni kursları platformda tekrardan paylaşacağım. 10 Yıllık proje ve saha tecrübesini sizlerle paylaşmak istiyorum. Sektörün en büyük sorunu nitelikli personel bulunmamasıdır. Sıfırdan başlayarak ileri seviyeye kadar adım adım izah etmeye çalıştım. Kurs ile ilgili yorumlarınızı en son yapmanızı rica ederim. Geri dönüşlerinizi bekliyorum. Kurs içeriğinden ekleme ve çıkarmaları buna göre yapabilirim.
"Nasıl Yapıldı Seri-3 Okul ve Sanayi Sitesi Proje Tasarımı" Kursu kapsamında sektöre yeni başlamış veya kendini geliştirmek isteyen ve HVAC sistemlerine merak duyan herkese hitap etmektedir.
Bu kurs kapsamında neler öğreneceğiz ? Ya da bu seri sizlere ne öğretecek bunu anlatmak istiyorum.
Diğer kurslarım her bir disiplinin tek tek nasıl tasarlanacağını anlatırken sizlere yeni bir proje geldiği zaman nasıl tasarım yapabilirsiniz bunu anlatmaya çalışacağım. Multi disiplinlerin bir arada nasıl çözümlenebileceğini anlatacağım.  Projelerin hikayesi nedir nasıl sistemler kuruluyor bunlara da deyineceğim.
Bu proje Gross Market ve Otogar binasının proje tasarımını izah etmektedir. Sıhhi tesisat kapsamında kurulan tüm sistemler ve bu sistemlere neden ihtiyaç duyuldu neler tasarladık onu anlatacağım.
Yangın söndürme tesisatında bir teknik hacim kurgusunun yapılması, sulu tip sprinkler nasıl tasarlanıyor bunları izah ettim.
Kurs ile ilgili örnek şemalar, örnek projeler kaynaklar bölümünde yer almaktadır. Buradan indirebilirsiniz.  Sorun yaşayanlar mail adresim üzerinden bana ulaşabilir.
Kursa ait tüm çizimler, föyler kaynaklar bölümüne eklenmiştir.
Kursun faydalı olması dileği ile,

courses.title: Modeling in 3Ds Max and Marvelous Designer from Basics
courses.bio: Learn the Techniques Used by Professionals in the Industry
requirements: 3Ds Max 2020 or Newer
Marvelous Designer 9
courses.description:
Welcome to my comprehensive course on Basic to Mid Level Modeling in 3Ds Max and Marvelous Designer! As a seasoned 3D modeling professional with years of experience, I have designed this course to help you take your modeling skills to the next level.
In this course, you will learn everything you need to know to create stunning 3D models using two of the most powerful design software in the industry - 3Ds Max and Marvelous Designer. We'll start with the basics and gradually move towards more advanced techniques, ensuring that you have a strong foundation in the software.
Throughout the course, we will be modeling a beautiful and iconic piece of furniture - the Mable Sofa by B and B Italia. I'll guide you through the process of creating this sofa, including the elegant curves, smooth surfaces, and intricate details, using a combination of 3Ds Max and Marvelous Designer.
By the end of the course, you will have a solid understanding of 3D modeling and be able to apply your new skills to your own projects. Whether you're interested in product design, interior design, or any other field that requires 3D modeling, this course will give you the knowledge and confidence you need to succeed.
Enroll today and let's start creating stunning 3D models with me
target_audience: Starters of Interior Design

Então, você definitivamente vai considerar este kit de planejamento de espaços útil se estiver com problemas para encontrar o arranjo de móveis perfeito!


Ideal para você que está no meio de uma reforma, pensando em comprar uma nova peça de mobiliário ou apenas quer trocar os móveis de lugar, este kit de planejamento é a maneira perfeita de criar uma planta baixa em escala do seu espaço.
Ideal para você que precisa de ajuda com um quarto, sala de estar, escritório ou sala de jantar, o kit de planejamento pode ajudá-lo a testar todos os tipos de ideias de layout, economizando tempo e dinheiro.


Sinceramente, não poderia ser mais fácil!


Vamos lá!
Eu criei esta ferramenta para ajudá-lo a dispor os móveis no ambiente, descobrindo o MELHOR LAYOUT em questão de minutos. Kit gabarito design de interiores com aula completa sobre planejamento de espaços.

O que está incluído neste kit de planejamento:
uma grade de planta para Impressão e mais de 200 peças de móveis em escala para imprimir: (sofás, bancadas, camas, cadeiras, mesas, armários, escrivaninha, mesas de jantar, tapetes, acessórios e muito mais!)

courses.title: Lighting Mastery in V-Ray 6
courses.bio: A Complete Course for Architects, Designers, and 3D Artists
objectives: Learning the fundamentals of lighting in 3D environments
Learning how to use natural light setups for realistic renders
Creating artificial lighting with IES profiles and area lights
Using HDRI maps to achieve dynamic lighting.
Mastering the Light Gen tool for quick lighting variations.
Light mixing techniques to adjust lighting in post-production.
Optimizing render settings for realistic and efficient results.
Troubleshooting common lighting issues in V-Ray 6.

Lesson 2 - Vray Light , Vray HDRI , Vray: Lesson 2 - part 1 - Vray Light , Vray HDRI , Vray Sky
Lesson 2 - part 2 - Vray Light , Vray HDRI , Vray Sky

requirements: Basic knowledge of 3ds Max or similar 3D software.
V-Ray 6 installed on your system.
Familiarity with basic rendering concepts is helpful but not required.
courses.description:
Lighting is the heart and soul of every great render. Unlock the full potential of V-Ray 6 with our comprehensive lighting course, designed specifically for architects, interior designers, and 3D artists who want to take their rendering skills to a professional level. Whether you are new to V-Ray or looking to enhance your expertise, this course will give you a solid foundation in lighting principles and advanced techniques that can dramatically improve your workflow and final results.
We begin by covering the core fundamentals of lighting, including light physics, color temperature, and shadow behavior, helping you understand how light interacts with different materials and surfaces. From there, we dive into natural lighting techniques, exploring realistic sunlight setups, sky models, and HDRI environments that will bring life and realism to your exterior scenes. You will also master the artificial lighting workflows, learning how to use IES profiles, V-Ray Lights, and the new Light Gen tool to create immersive and atmospheric interiors.
One of the key highlights of this course is our focus on light mixing and optimization. You will learn how to tweak and refine your lighting setup without re-rendering, using V-Ray’s Light Mix to control brightness, temperature, and intensity in real-time. Additionally, we’ll cover global illumination, caustics, volumetric lighting, and advanced shadow techniques, ensuring that you achieve cinematic depth and photo-realistic results in every project.
Throughout the course, you will work on practical, real-world projects, applying your knowledge to a variety of lighting scenarios. Whether it’s a daylight exterior, a moody restaurant interior, or a high-contrast product shot, this course will equip you with the skills and techniques to tackle any lighting challenge.
By the end of this course, you will have a deep understanding of how to control light in V-Ray 6, allowing you to elevate your renders, increase realism, and work more efficiently. With the latest tools and workflows at your disposal, you will be able to create stunning visuals that stand out in the competitive world of architectural visualization and 3D rendering. Whether you're working on architectural exteriors, detailed interiors, or product renders, this course will help you unlock a new level of creativity and precision in your work.
target_audience: Architects looking to enhance the realism of their 3D presentations.
Interior designers who want to showcase their designs with professional lighting.
3D artists aiming to create more impactful and photorealistic renders.
Students and beginners interested in learning the essentials of V-Ray lighting.

courses.description:
Formation Complète SketchUp 2024 – Mac et PC - Modélisation et Textures
Découvrez ma Formation Ultime en Modélisation 3D avec SketchUp !
Vous rêvez de maîtriser la modélisation 3D et de donner vie à vos projets créatifs ? Vous êtes au bon endroit ! Je suis fier de vous présenter ma formation exclusive de presque 19 heures dédiée à SketchUp, le logiciel incontournable pour la modélisation 3D. Pour seulement 70 euros, plongez dans un univers où vos idées prennent forme grâce aux outils natifs de SketchUp.

Pourquoi choisir cette formation ?

Contenu Complet et Approfondi : Avec près de 19 heures de cours, cette formation couvre tous les aspects de la modélisation 3D. Que vous soyez débutant ou que vous ayez déjà des connaissances, vous trouverez des modules adaptés à votre niveau que cela soit sur Windows ou sur Mac
Maîtrise des Outils Natifs de SketchUp : J'apprends à utiliser les outils natifs de SketchUp de manière efficace et créative. Plus besoin de plugins ou de logiciels additionnels. Tout ce dont vous avez besoin est déjà dans SketchUp, et je vous montre comment en tirer le meilleur parti.
Flexibilité et Accessibilité : Accédez à la formation où que vous soyez et à tout moment. Progressez à votre rythme, que vous ayez une heure ou plusieurs heures à consacrer chaque jour à votre apprentissage.
Projets Pratiques : Mettez en pratique ce que vous apprenez grâce à des projets concrets. Modélisez des objets, des bâtiments, des meubles, et bien plus encore. À la fin de cette formation, vous serez capable de modéliser n'importe quoi !

Bon c’est bien joli, tout cela mais que vais-je apprendre :

Pour finir, je reste disponible, pour toutes questions, dans l'espace d'entraide de ce cours.
Je vous dis donc à tout de suite, bonne formation et bon apprentissage sur Sketchup !

> Updated at the end of July 2021 on how to create a Photorealistic Chic Bedroom)

ALL NEW SECTIONS ARE ADDED TO THE TOP OF THE COURSE
Shruti says, "Yes, I absolutely love this course and have gained so much knowledge ever since I started these lessons. Would definitely recommend this to my friends who would like to brush up on their basics as well as learn the fine details in designing on software like Sketch up."
Aparna says, "Just Wonderful! Before this course, I only know how to click interactive render without even adding any lights or settings. Now I know, whats Interactive and Main rendering is, lights, materials, plugins, settings etc. Loved learning this course and also instant clarification of doubts."
Jhoe says, "Excellent SketchUp course! The instructor utilizes the power of SketchUp and Vray with Post-Production...and very easy to follow. Highly recommended!"

Varun says, "Wonderful experience. It helps me a lot to start my interior design firm. I was from an IT background after taking this course I mastered 3D design."


This course is designed to jumpstart your Sketchup, Vray & Interior Design Journey, wherein we take you Step by Step with a Real-Life Apartment Project and get you up & running to design your favourite Interior Design space efficiently, quickly and in the right way.

Why this Course?
Comprehensive coverage of the essential tools to design a bedroom, modular kitchen & more - Learn not only how every tool works but also how to apply it in the right way in your Sketchup workflow.
Downloadable Resources - Exercise files like Sketchup Models for every lecture & section so you can follow along step by step.
Learn from an Expert - I've been using Sketchup for over 10 years and I will be sharing all my skills and secrets which has helped me model faster, efficiently and most importantly, amaze my clients.
Monthly Updates - This course will be updated on a monthly basis with new high-quality tutorials and resources and you will get an in-depth understanding of how to design a modern contemporary bedroom, modular kitchen & more.
Taught by an Architect & Interior Designer - We not only learn about modelling & rendering in Sketchup, but you will also learn useful interior design tips, standards, and secrets along the way from the instructor who has over 6+ years of experience in the Industry.
Access to Exclusive Sketchup & Vray Library - All our students will get exclusive access to our Sketchup Library for every Interior Design space worth over 150$. These models can be imported directly into your scene and rendered since it comes preloaded with Vray materials.

Who is this Course For?
Interior Designers
Architects
Students of Architecture & Interior Design
Hobbyists
Construction Professionals
Anyone with an interest in 3D Modelling in Sketchup
Anyone with an interest in 3D Rendering with Vray Next for Sketchup
(note that this course will be taught on the windows version but the same techniques can be applied in Mac as well)

What you will Learn?
It is crucial that when you learn Sketchup, you start with the right fundamentals (which is also easy to pick up). Once you've picked up on the fundamentals of 3D Modelling, we jump into more advanced topics using specific Sketchup plugins, to take your modelling to the Next Level.
This course is divided into Seven Projects
Prior to Project 01, we will have the introduction and how to install Sketchup, Vray & all the essential plugins

Introduction to Sketchup for Absolute Beginners
Before we start with the projects, we will start with the fundamentals. This section is perfect for absolute beginners who are new to the Sketchup World.
Introduction to Sketchup Interface
Introduction to Sketchup Tools.
Introduction to Sketchup Default Tray
And everything Sketchup + Practice Projects

Project 01 - Vray 6 for Sketchup | Living Room Masterclass (Added in August 2022)

Introducing the photographic approach (the MCLR Workflow) to rendering, a MASSIVE update to the course. Let's make high-quality interior visuals FAST with Sketchup & Vray using the MCLR workflow. And yes, we will be using the latest version of Vray & Sketchup for this section.
Upon completing this section, you should have the skills & knowledge to create high-quality visuals FAST! You can even call yourself a CG artist!
Practice makes Perfect! Continue learning the course  with new projects as shown below:

Project 02 - Model & Render a Photorealistic Chic Bedroom with Vray 5 and Sketchup 2021 (Added in July 2021)

In this project, we will learn to use Vray 5 and Sketchup 2021 respectively, to model, render and post-produce a Contemporary Chic Bedroom. We will also showcase some additional plugins which come in really handy while designing interiors such as profile builder, floor generator and sketchuv. Towards the end of the project, we will create an additional sectional perspective render that would definitely "wow" your clients.


Project 03 -Modeling a Contemporary Bedroom (Sketchup 2020 & Vray Next)
In this project, we will start with the fundamentals
We will learn to import images & CAD into Sketchup
How to model our walls, floors, ceilings, doors & windows.
How to model our Bedroom Placeholders
How to model our Wardrobes, Study Tables, & TV Units.

We then learn some Advanced Sketchup Modelling Taught in this Course
Learn to model Beds using the  Artisan Tools & SubD
Learn to model Curtains using Clothworks
Learn to model Blankets & Pillows using the Clothworks tool.
Create a Studio and import from 3D Warehouse the Right Way!
Create a Bean Bag in the Studio

We then jump into the world of photorealistic rendering with Vray Next for Sketchup.

We will be introduced to the Vray Interface & the Vray Asset Editor
We will learn how to set up Vray Lights in our Bedroom and use an important lighting system. (Photographic Approach with the Archgyan Lighting System)
We will learn to create Vray materials like metal, cloth, wood, glass, glossy, matte laminate sheets.
We will also learn to use Vray-Fur to create rugs & carpets, Vray-Infinite plane, Render elements, and loads more.
Finally, we learn how to render our final image using vray settings and also learn post-production techniques using Photoshop.


Project 04 - Model & Render a Swing Wardrobe with Sketchup & Vray Next (Added in March 2020)
In this project, we will learn how to create a Swing Wardrobe in Sketchup as per interior design standards. We will learn the importance of composition and how to render the swing wardrobe in a Studio setting using Vray Next.


Project 05 - Design & Render a Modular Kitchen with Sketchup 2020 & Vray Next (Added in April 2020)
In this project, we will learn to model and render a Modular Kitchen. We will learn about the various standards, vray materials, lights and more to create an amazing looking Night Render of our Kitchen. We will also learn how to change material colours on Photoshop instead of re-rendering them on Sketchup.


Project 06 - Design & Render a Contemporary Bathroom with Vray 4 and Sketchup 2020 (Added in May 2020)
Here's what you will learn in this project:
Create a Vray Library in the Vray Asset Editor
This will help you create your best Vray Library which you can reuse for all future work, modelling & rendering. Plus, I will be sharing the Exclusive Archgyan Vray Library with you.
Creating Multiple Options in the Same View
You will learn to create multiple options for the same views by leveraging Tags (Layers) & Scenes. This is going to be super useful for all those Interior Designers out there.
Create New Materials
We will learn about various new maps like the falloff maps, edges maps and more. We will learn to create bathroom wall tiles using in-built Vray Maps and much more.
Add Vray Lights in a New Way
We will learn how to add lights in a new way and help you easily change the direction, cone angles & penumbra angle of spotlights.
Leveraging VFB History
We will learn to render a photorealistic bathroom plus we will learn to leverage VFB History to check out before & after of Renders.

Project 07 - Model & Render a Living Room Scene with Vray 5 and Sketchup 2021 (ADDED IN DECEMBER 2021)
In this brand new project, you will learn to recreate a realistic Living Room render with all the new features of Vray 5.
Here's what you get to learn in this workshop:
We'll start off the Sketchup model and learn how to create our room from an imported DWG file.
We will learn to design our living room space using various 3D Warehouse Models and Chaos Cosmos models. (you'll get a deep-dive on how I design Interior spaces)
We will set up the camera using different compositional techniques in Sketchup
We will set up the lighting properly in the scene using some new techniques taught exclusively in this workshop.
We will leverage VFB layers to boost our render further within Vray.
We will create a fur material for our rugs using Vray Fur and learn its various parameters.
We will learn to change the colours of our materials within the VfB window without having to use photoshop.
We will learn additional post-production techniques in Photoshop and learn how to add a beach scene behind our windows.


Bonus Sections - Advanced Modeling in Sketchup
In this section, we will learn to use plugins to create beanbags, tufted headboards, parametric shapes and a whole lot more.

Bonus Sections - Advanced Vray for Sketchup Techniques

In this section, we will learn to share the latest features in Vray, advanced techniques and more.

Bonus Sections - Student Q/A Videos
We help enhance your renders and point out areas of improvement which benefits other students as well.


We will keep updating this course with new course content and add it to the future sections on a monthly basis. We will be updating our course description here as and when we release new tutorials and downloadable resources.


Special Features Provided
Downloadable Scenes, complete with all V-Ray Settings
Exclusive Sketchup & Vray Library for Interior Design


By the end of the course, you will have a solid understanding of Sketchup & Vray, and you will be well on your way to creating amazing renders for your clients.

Contractors
Furniture Designers
All those related to design & those who have an interest for 3D Modeling
Beginner to Advanced Sketchup Users
Beginner to Advanced Vray Users

courses.bio: Learn How to Use Lighting in your Interior Design Like a Pro
objectives: Use 3 layers of light to create a cohesive and dramatic lighting scheme in any room of their home.
Calculate exactly how much artificial light each of their rooms need.
Effectively utilize and control both natural and artificial light in their home.
Select light fixtures appropriate to the type of room.
Place lighting fixtures appropriately throughout their room.

Create a simplified professional lighting plan.
Use artificial light to alter the intensity of colors in their room.
Use artificial light to make a room appear larger or smaller than it is.
Use artificial light to create a focal point in their room.
