Students should have access to a printer so they can print out the resources related to the class activities.
Students should come ready to engage themselves fully in a comprehensive training on lighting design.
courses.description:
Have you ever wondered how much light a room really needs?
Have you struggled with determining the right size light fixtures for the various spaces in your home?
Have you ever wondered how interior designers make a room look so much more dramatic through the use of lighting?
If you've ever asked yourself any of these questions, then I encourage you to check out this class!  "Lighting Design to Transform your home" is a course focused exclusively on residential lighting design.  More specifically, in this class we will cover the following main topics:
3 great lighting tricks!
Why is lighting so important?
How to calculate the correct lumens for your rooms, including rooms with high ceilings or dark walls
How to effectively use and control both artificial and natural light in your home
How to use 3 layers of light to elevate your lighting design
How to choose the right type of light fixtures based on the function of your room
How to choose the right size light fixtures
How to install your light fixtures appropriately in your home
How to hide unsightly table and floor lamp cords
Use lighting to alter the intensity of colors in your room
Use lighting to make your room appear larger or smaller than it is
Use lighting to create a focal point in your room
There are also some fantastic, practical activities in this course:
By participating in activities throughout this course, I will walk you through how to build your own customized lighting design scheme for any room in your home.
To complement the work you will be doing on your lighting scheme, I will also teach you how to create a simplified professional lighting plan.
At the end of this course, you will put your newfound knowledge to work when you are given a hands-on opportunity to improve the lighting in 2 case studies.
This is a great course for all levels of individuals who are interested in learning more about how to effectively build their own residential lighting plan.  This could also be a great class for interior design students or professionals who are new to the field.
Join me for an adventure into the world of lighting design!
IMPORTANT NOTES:
If you are interested in taking most or all of my courses, I have a recommended order in which to watch them (although it's certainly not required).  I would start with "How to Design a Room in 10 Easy Steps" because most of my other courses are in-depth classes of the concepts touched on in this 10 step class.  Following the 10 Step Course, I suggest moving on to "How to Use Color Like a Pro", followed by "How to Work with Interior Design Styles Like a Pro", then "How to Use Lighting Design to Transform your Home", and finally "Design is in the Details".

My other five courses, "How to Use Minimalist Interior Design to Live your Best Life",  "Use Eco-friendly, Sustainable Design to Improve Your Life", "How to Design Your Dream Kitchen", "How to Design Your Dream Bathroom", and "Everything Small Home Design" are all stand alone classes on specialty topics within interior design, and therefore, can be taken in any order.

Please be aware that this course, or any of my courses, is not intended to provide all of the knowledge needed to become a professional interior designer.  As with any professional field, there is a significant amount of education and/or experience that is needed to achieve competency in this field.  My intention with these courses is to provide some solid foundational knowledge to assist either those individuals interested in "DIY" interior design to work on their own projects more effectively, or to provide supplemental education to both interior design students and professionals.
target_audience: This is a great course for anyone interested in taking their home's lighting design to the next level.
This course could also be a great supplemental educational course for interior design students or those new to the interior design field.

courses.title: Experto en Diseño Espacios Educativos, Docentes y Académicos
courses.bio: Conviértete en un Profesional en la Creación de Proyectos destinados al Estudio, Educación, Aprendizaje y Concentración.
objectives: Este curso explora cómo diseñar aulas, bibliotecas y otros espacios de aprendizaje para fomentar la concentración, la creatividad y la colaboración.
Obtener los conocimientos suficientes para abordar la tarea de planificar adecuadamente un proyecto de diseño.
Capacidad para otorgar un carácter diferenciador al espacio, mediante el dominio de los registros sensibles de la luz, los materiales, y el color.
Planificar aulas flexibles: zoning, mobiliario móvil, agrupaciones y flujos que favorecen metodologías ABP/STEAM.
Aplicar neuroarquitectura: luz, color, escala y ritmo espacial para mejorar atención, bienestar y rendimiento.
Integrar accesibilidad e inclusión: medidas, itinerarios, mobiliario adaptable, señalética y contrastes para todos.
Formar profesionales capaces de diseñar y gestionar los procesos de cambio de los espacios educativos.
Capacitar profesionales para diseñar y fabricar dispositivos manipulables de construcción para las aulas y las zonas de juego.
Formar profesionales capaces de analizar la ciudad y el contexto local al que pertenecen los centros educativos como espacios de aprendizaje.
Facultar profesionales conocedores de las propuestas históricas de espacios educativos y pedagogías.
Diseñar iluminación por capas: daylighting, CCT/CRI, UGR y control para tareas, pizarras y vídeo sin deslumbrar.
Controlar acústica: objetivos de T60, absorción, aislamiento y ruido de equipos para una escucha clara.
Optimizar ventilación y calidad de aire: caudales, CO₂, renovación e HVAC con confort térmico.
Integrar tecnología educativa: AV, conectividad, cámaras y microfonía para clases presenciales e híbridas.
Proyectar bibliotecas, laboratorios y makerspaces: seguridad, ergonomía y flujos de uso eficientes.
Documentar FF&E y obra: listados, planos, detalles y memorias con CTE/UNE para licitar y ejecutar.

requirements: Para la realización de este curso (Diseño Espacios Educativos, Docentes y Académicos) no ser requieren grandes conocimientos previos, ya que la formación se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0.
Cuando compres el curso vas a poder acceder a las clases cuando y donde quieras. El curso se queda en tu cuenta de Udemy para siempre. :)
Interés por adquirir conocimientos de decorador y diseñador de interiores a nivel profesional.
Muy recomendable si ya trabajas en el sector de la decoración y el interiorismo y deseas actualizar y mejorar tus conocimientos teórico-prácticos para progresar en tu trabajo.
Tener una mente abierta, ser creativo, apasionado del diseño y entusiasta del buen estilo, serán tus mejores herramientas para triunfar en este apasionante sector.
El más importante requisito para realizar este curso es el entusiasmo y la motivación por aprender nuevas habilidades que aumenten tus competencias profesionales.
courses.description:
Experto en Diseño Espacios Educativos, Docentes y Académicos
Conviértete en un Profesional en la Creación de Proyectos destinados al Estudio, Educación, Aprendizaje y Concentración.
Instructores: Arq. Álvaro García y Arq. Lucía Fernández  Actualizado: Octubre del 2025 Estudiantes: +2.700 Requisitos previos: Ninguno


Descripción del Curso:
Eleva el rendimiento y el bienestar con un curso experto en diseño de espacios educativos que conecta pedagogía y arquitectura. Aprenderás a crear aulas flexibles y activas, bibliotecas, laboratorios y makerspaces que mejoran atención y participación; a dominar neuroarquitectura, iluminación y acústica, ergonomía, accesibilidad e inclusión, wayfinding, ventilación y tecnología educativa para entornos presenciales e híbridos. Diseñarás zoning, circulaciones y mobiliario que se adaptan a diferentes metodologías (ABP, flipped, STEAM) manteniendo identidad y seguridad.
Impartido en Udemy y apto para todas las edades y niveles, avanzarás con método paso a paso, plantillas, checklists y casos reales (infantil, primaria, secundaria, universidad y campus). Saldrás con renders y documentación listos para dirección/cliente (FF&E, memoria y presupuesto), criterios para cumplir normativa y un portafolio educativo que demuestra impacto medible en concentración, bienestar y resultados de aprendizaje. Si buscas un curso de diseño de aulas y espacios educativos práctico y orientado a resultados, aquí empieza tu ventaja.
Los niños tienen tres maestros: el primero, sus compañeros; el segundo, los adultos que le rodean (profesores, padres, familiares); y el tercero, el entorno construido (colegio, casa, barrio, ciudad).
El presente curso online pretende ser un espacio en el que participar de la formación de una nueva línea de capacitación profesional en gestión de ambientes educativos. Al igual que en otros contextos públicos como por ejemplo los destinados a servicios sanitarios, el ambiente debe de estar cuidadosamente atendido.
Constatamos que los espacios educativos no han sido estudiados del mismo modo que los servicios antes mencionados y siguen persistiendo construcciones con fines educativos que no tienen en cuenta la metodología pedagógica para la que van a ser destinadas. Este curso abordará cómo diseñar aulas, bibliotecas, laboratorios y otros espacios educativos que promuevan el aprendizaje y la colaboración.
Formar profesionales conocedores de las propuestas históricas de espacios educativos y pedagogías que han contribuido a la materialización de los actuales ambientes escolares, capaces de diseñar y gestionar los procesos de cambio de los espacios educativos, analizar la ciudad y el contexto local al que pertenecen los centros educativos como espacios de aprendizaje. Este curso se centra en cómo diseñar espacios de aprendizaje efectivos y atractivos para estudiantes de todas las edades.
Aprenderás los principios de la psicología ambiental para valorar el trabajo interdisciplinario como medio para la mejora, mantenimiento y conservación de los espacios educativos. Comprenderás el entorno arquitectónico como instrumento educativo eliminando las fronteras de los entornos formales, no formales e informales. Conocerás la realidad actual de los profesionales dedicados a trabajar acciones de Educación y Arquitectura en el contexto global. Adquirirás conocimientos de investigación acción que permitan intervenciones en comunidades educativas integrando los puntos de vista de los diferentes actores del proceso. Entre lo que aprenderás con esta formación, encontrarás:


Habilidad para proyectar intervenciones arquitectónicas y/o urbanísticas en espacios pedagógicos que faciliten los requerimientos de la escuela actual y su comunidad educativa, adaptándose a su contexto sociocultural.
Capacidad de formular, interpretar o reinterpretar ideas y de transformarlas en nuevos espacios de aprendizaje de acuerdo con los principios de composición, percepción visual y espacial.
Capacidad imaginativa, creativa, innovadora y de liderazgo en el proceso de diseño de dispositivos y Juegos de Educación.
Reconocimiento del ejemplo de vida de maestros de la arquitectura y la pedagogía, que con su aportación resultan agentes motivadores de acción educativa.


Itinerario Formativo:

Recursos para el Alumno del Curso  "Diseño Espacios Educativos, Docentes y Académicos"
Emisión del Certificado de Finalización del Curso "Diseño Espacios Educativos, Docentes y Académicos"


Objetivos del curso:
Dominar el diseño de espacios educativos desde la estrategia hasta la obra: neuroarquitectura, iluminación y acústica, ergonomía, accesibilidad e inclusión, ventilación/HVAC, wayfinding y tecnología educativa. Diseñarás aulas flexibles para ABP, STEAM y modelos híbridos, con zoning, circulaciones, FF&E y documentación (planos, memoria y presupuesto) alineada con CTE/UNE y buenas prácticas.


Salidas profesionales:
Prepárate para roles como Educational Space Designer, Interiorista/Arquitecto educativo, Consultor de campus o Project Coordinator en centros K-12, universidades, academias, edtech y sector público/privado. Crearás un portafolio educativo con renders y casos reales que acreditan impacto en atención, bienestar y resultados de aprendizaje, mejorando tu empleabilidad y valor ante clientes e instituciones.


Dirigido a:
Arquitectos, interioristas, ingenieros, docentes, directivos de centros y facility managers, además de estudiantes que quieran proyectar aulas, bibliotecas, laboratorios y makerspaces centrados en el aprendizaje. Formato Udemy, apto para todas las edades y niveles, con plantillas, checklists y casos prácticos para aplicar de inmediato en proyectos educativos presenciales e híbridos.


Metodología de Aprendizaje:
Recuerda que este curso incluye lecciones en vídeo fullHD con audio de estudio (compatible con TV, PC, Mac, tablet y smartphone), artículos didácticos, actividades, animaciones, ilustraciones, proyectos paso a paso, recursos descargables, links de interés, acceso de por vida, certificado de finalización, tutorización online, y una exclusiva comunidad de aprendizaje privada que nos ayudamos aportando nuestras experiencias en el foro de comunicación del curso.
La modalidad de este curso te permite que empieces y acabes cuando tú quieras, marcando el ritmo de la clase según tu disponibilidad. Puedes volver a visualizar lo que te interese, saltar el contenido que ya domines, hacer preguntas, resolver dudas, compartir tus proyectos... Puedes elegir ver todas las lecciones de forma secuencial (lineal) y aprovecharlas al máximo la formación, pero también puedes decidir ver este curso como una guía de referencia.
Las clases están claramente organizadas en secciones y lecciones, puedes decidir visualizar solo las clases que te resulten más importantes según tus necesidades formativas. La mayoría de las lecciones son independientes para que puedas comprender los conceptos de cada lección sin tener que ver las lecciones anteriores del curso.
Para seguir el programa formativo propuesto no ser requieren conocimientos previos, ya que la formación se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0. El curso está orientado a aquellos creativos que quieran ampliar sus skills (habilidades) y conocer múltiples trucos, consejos, recursos y recomendaciones, de la mano de los instructores Álvaro García y Lucía Fernández. Además la formación disponen de acceso automático al contenido, sin limitación de tiempo, disponibilidad 24/7 (24 horas al día los 7 días de la semana), sin caducidad y con garantía de devolución.
Con esta formación disfrutarás aprendiendo desde dónde quieras, sin tener que desplazarte, sin horarios, con quién quieras, según tus necesidades y disponibilidad. Aprenderás con un instructor avalado por miles da alumnos satisfechos en todo el mundo (comentarios certificados). Conocerás las técnicas, métodos, trucos y flujos de trabajo de este sector creativo. El docente te transmitirá su sabiduría y conocimientos con pasión a la vez que las explicaciones concisas, claras, sencillas y con un enfoque profesional en cada clase. Podrás conseguir un  certificado homologado personalizado y firmado por tu instructor en cada formación. De está forma podrás compartir tu título en tu portafolio, currículo, en redes sociales...
Con la alta definición de los vídeos (vídeo fullHD y audio de estudio) conseguirá no te perder detalle. Podrás ver las clases las veces que requieras para recordar y perfeccionar tus habilidades como diseñador. Tendrás la posibilidad de preguntar, pedir opinión y ayuda al instructor, además de compartir tu experiencia de aprendizaje con los demás alumnos del curso, tan apasionados como tú, repartidos por todo el mundo. Seleccionamos cuidadosamente los contenidos y producimos cada curso para garantizar una experiencia de aprendizaje online integral y de la máxima calidad.


¿A qué esperas?, este curso es ideal para ti, atrévete a convertirte en un experto y expresa tus ideas de la forma que siempre has deseado. Adelante, nos vemos dentro de la formación ;)
target_audience: Arquitectos e interioristas que quieren dominar diseño de espacios educativos: aulas flexibles, bibliotecas, laboratorios y CTE/UNE.
Docentes y directivos que buscan entornos con mejor atención, inclusión y bienestar aplicando neuroarquitectura y diseño activo.
Estudiantes y juniors que desean curso práctico en español con plantillas, FF&E y casos reales para aulas, makerspaces y campus.
Ingenieros, facility managers y técnicos municipales: accesibilidad, iluminación, acústica y HVAC con evidencia y normativa.
Estudios y pymes de arquitectura que quieren portafolio educativo potente y procesos para licitar, ejecutar y medir impacto.

courses.title: SketchUp furniture modeling + technical docs in LayOut
courses.bio: Basics of furniture design in Sketchup and the creation of working documentation in LayOut. For example, the desktop.
objectives: We will explore basic SketchUp tools
We will create a model of a computer desk with a drawer from scratch
We will learn to create technical documentation for production
We will learn to apply material textures
We will learn how to edit an already finished project
After completing the course, you will be able to design any furniture made of wood and metal

Table modeling: Determining the overall dimensions of the table and creating a table top
How to use the Component tool
Preparation of working documentation: Importing a model into SketchUp Layout
How to make documentation for a carpenter (part 1)
How to make documentation for a carpenter (part 2)
How to make documentation for a carpenter (part 3)
How to make documentation for a carpenter (part 4)
How to make documentation for a carpenter (part 5)
How to make documentation for a carpenter (part 6)
How to make documentation for a welder (part 1)
How to make documentation for a welder (part 2)
How to export documentation to PDF format

requirements: A basic knowledge of SketchUp drawing and editing tools are required.
A computer with either SketchUp Pro and SketchUp LayOut installed on it
SketchUp 2018 is still available on the Sketchup website
courses.description:
Hey! My name is Valentin, I am engaged in the production of furniture. In my work, I use the SketchUp program. Sketchup is a simple furniture design tool.I have been using it for 3 years already, but at the beginning designing I encountered various problems and mistakes. This increased development time and corrections. Therefore, I created a video tutorial in which I collected my experience in furniture design. I hope the learning process will be easy and you will save time at work.
As an example, let's create a computer desk with a drawer. In this tutorial, I will show you where to start designing, what tools you need to use when designing, how to create working documentation.

After completing this course, you will be able to design furniture.


The course is divided into 2 parts: design and creation of working documentation.
1. The first block uses basic tools to design wood and metal parts. Separately, we will look at the correct use of tools: rectangle, movement, rotation, extrusion and many others. How to use texture fill to visually separate wood from plywood and metal.
2. In the second block, on the basis of the resulting model, we will carry out the detailing and prepare the drawings. With this documentation, the carpenter and welder will get it right. For this we will use the LayOut program and the Sketchup plugin.
I would be glad to receive feedback. What did you like and what did not like? All comments will be used to create additional materials.
Hope you find it useful.
target_audience: Any designer
Any furniture manufacturer who wants to present a project to clients
Any furniture designer who wants to present a project to clients
Any DIY makers who wants to make a furniture
Any carpenter who wants to present a project to clients

El profesional de la decoración de interiores es capaz de analizar, investigar y proyectar diseños ajustados a las necesidades y a los espacios, además de dirigir equipos multidisciplinares en el ámbito de su profesión.

courses.description:
Il corso di Design degli Interni, si pone l’obiettivo di insegnare ad organizzare gli spazi, riconoscere gli stili e progettare e arredare tutti gli spazi: camere, soggiorni, bagni, cucine ecc..
Il corso è strutturato in 10 Sezioni, più una introduttiva, ognuna composta da:
-1 video-lezione esplicativa;
-1 riassunto in formato pdf scaricabile e stampabile;
-1 test di valutazione (10 domande a risposta multipla), per quantificare il livello di apprendimento e comprensione dei contenuti appena affrontati.
L’allievo potrà seguire comodamente i filmati dal proprio PC o ascoltarli su qualsiasi riproduttore audio.
I video sono inoltre visibili tramite il nostro sito senza scadenza, mentre tutto il resto del materiale è interamente visibile, scaricabile e consultabile 24h su 24, il tutto una volta effettuato il pagamento.
Al termine del percorso, è possibile ricevere l’Attestato di Frequenza, come CORSO DI DESIGN DEGLI INTERNI, previo svolgimento dei test di valutazione. Questo certificato può essere usato per motivi di lavoro, come allegato al curriculum vitae, e in caso di richiesta di un’attestazione scritta a conferma di un percorso formativo.
target_audience: Può partecipare chiunque. Chi vuole ristrutturare casa o una stanza. A chi interessa approfondire i temi legati agli ambienti della casa, oppure a chi si vuole affacciare alla professione.

courses.title: Transform Your Home with Biophilic Design: Beginner's Guide
courses.bio: Transform Your World with Architect Will’s Design Insights
objectives: Identify Key Biophilic Elements: Recognize essential elements like natural light and plants to enhance indoor environments.
Design for Well-being: Apply biophilic design principles to create living spaces that improve physical health and psychological well-being.
Incorporate Sustainable Materials: Choose & integrate sustainable, natural materials into your home design to foster environmental health and personal comfort.
Create a Biophilic Design Plan: Methodically develop a comprehensive plan integrating biophilic elements into your home to enhance living spaces effectively.

Introduction: Transform Your Home with Biophilic Design: Nature-Inspired Living for Well-being
Your 3 eBooks :-): Biophilic Beauty: Transform your Living Space with Nature

requirements: No prior experience in design is required for this course.
Ideal for beginners interested in integrating nature into home design for enhanced well-being.
Just bring your enthusiasm and a willingness to learn!
courses.description:
Welcome to "Transform Your Home with Biophilic Design: A Beginner's Guide," a course dedicated to integrating the natural world into your living environment. This class will teach you how to use biophilic principles to enhance your home's well-being and aesthetic, creating spaces that are not only beautiful but also beneficial for your mental and physical health.
What You Will Learn:
Principles of Biophilic Design: Understand the core concepts behind biophilic design and why they're effective.
Incorporating Natural Elements: Learn techniques for integrating elements like plants, water, and natural light into your home.
Designing for Well-being: Explore how to create spaces that promote health and wellness.
Sustainable Practices: Gain insights into choosing materials and designs that are environmentally friendly.
Practical Applications: Step-by-step guidance on applying biophilic design principles in different areas of your home.
Why You Should Take This Class: Biophilic design connects us with the natural world, a vital aspect of our environment that enhances our well-being. This class offers practical, easy-to-apply techniques that will transform your home into a healthier, more soothing place. Learn from an expert in biophilic design who will provide you with the knowledge and tools to make informed design choices, helping you to create a home that is not only sustainable but also a true sanctuary.
Who This Class is For: This course is perfect for homeowners, apartment dwellers, and anyone interested in home improvement who wants to create a healthier, more inviting living space. No prior design knowledge is required, making this class ideal for beginners who are eager to learn and apply biophilic design principles.
Materials/Resources: To participate in this class, you will need:
Basic design tools (measuring tape, sketchpad, etc.)
Access to natural materials (plants, stones, wood)
Any architectural or home design software (optional for advanced projects)
Course worksheets and resource lists provided by the instructor
Enhance your home's design and your quality of life by enrolling in "Transform Your Home with Biophilic Design: A Beginner's Guide." Join us to learn how to bring the beauty and restorative power of nature into your everyday spaces.
target_audience: This course is tailored for homeowners, environmental enthusiasts, and design professionals eager to explore biophilic design principles. Whether you are a beginner looking to transform your living space into a healthful retreat or a design professional seeking sustainable, innovative solutions for clients, this course offers valuable insights.
It's perfect for those interested in enhancing their well-being and connecting more deeply with nature through thoughtful home design.
Ideal for individuals passionate about sustainability and mental health, it is not suited for those looking for quick, superficial home decor tips.

courses.title: Unreal Engine 5 интерьерная визуализация (с 0 до PRO)
courses.bio: Запеченный свет в интерьере
objectives: Благодаря курсу ты освоишь новую специальность Unreal Engine Аrtist
Благодаря курсу ты узнаешь о фишках фотореализма, научишься работать со светом, ракурсами
Благодаря курсу ты войдешь в новую незаполненную нишу
Благодаря курсу ты научишься создавать цепляющие ролики с продуманным сценарием

Подготовка сцены в 3Ds Max: Удаляем лишнее и очищаем сцену от мусора
Создание разверток для запекания: Оконный проём. Делаем развертки на 2-м канале (Lightmap)
Мягкая мебель. Делаем развертки на 2-м канале (Lightmap)
Шаг 4. [6.9 GB] Освещение в Unreal Engin: Sun and Sky. Обзор инструментов освещения
Шейдеры. Создаём реалистичные материалы: Blend MTL. Смешивание материалов через маску
Quixel Bridge. Добавление ассетов и материалов в проект
Migrate. Сохранение и использование ассетов в других проектах
Камеры и анимация: Movie Render Queue. Настройки и рендер

requirements: Должен быть опыт работы в 3ds Max + Corona/Vray. В идеале, иметь опыт работы с интерьерами, наличие понимания постановки света, ракурсов, наличие художественной насмотренности. Чем выше исходная планка - тем легче и продуктивнее пройдет обучение.
При работе в UE главную роль играет видеокарта. Она должна быть от Nvidia, должна поддерживать технологии RTX и CUDA. Видеопамять - не менее 6 Гб.
Оперативная память: критический минимум - 32 Гб
Процессор: можно поставить на 2-е место по влиянию. Он работает в связке с видеокартой, и может как полностью раскрыть ее потенциал, так и не в полной мере. Можно как Intel, так и AMD.
courses.description:
Добро пожаловать на вдохновляющий курс "Интерьерная визуализация в Unreal Engine 5", который предоставит вам все необходимые знания для создания уникальных визуализаций в виртуальном пространстве. В ходе этого курса мы подробно рассмотрим следующие ключевые аспекты:
1. Перенос сцены из 3D Max:
Разберемся в процессе безболезненного переноса сцены в Unreal Engine 5, обеспечив максимальную совместимость и сохранение деталей.
2. Оптимизация и работа с лайт-мапами:
Вглядимся в методы оптимизации геометрии.
Исследуем методы оптимизации Lightmap для создания легких, но качественных сцен без ущерба для визуального восприятия. Будем акцентировать внимание на настройке освещения без лишней потери в производительности.
3. Создание материалов, анимация и камеры:
Мы погрузимся в мир творчества, создавая материалы, которые придадут вашим объектам характер и стиль. Освоим тонкости анимации, чтобы ваши сцены заиграли жизнью. Разберемся с расстановкой камер, выявляя лучшие ракурсы для подчеркивания архитектурных деталей и атмосферы интерьера. Научимся использовать композицию для создания эффектных кадров, которые запомнятся зрителю.
Почему этот курс стоит выбрать:
Ясные идеи: Я уделяю особое внимание понятности и ясности, чтобы вы чувствовали уверенность в каждом новом техническом аспекте.
Многогранный подход: От материалов и анимации до композиции, вы получите обширный опыт, который поможет вам стать уверенным в создании уникальных и качественных визуализаций в Unreal Engine 5.


Присоединяйтесь к курсу прямо сейчас, и давайте вместе создадим увлекательные интерьерные визуализации в Unreal Engine 5!

Курс будет полезен, если ты изучаешь UE самостоятельно, но не хватает системности и мотивации.
Курс будет полезен, если ты хочешь повысить качество и скорость рабочего процесса в Unreal Engine.

Master Business Interactions and BOQ: The Professional Interior Designer’s Guide

courses.title: Furniture Design Using Blender
courses.bio: Blender Essentials for Interior & Furniture Designers
objectives: Se familiariser avec les principaux modificateurs utilisés en modélisation de mobilier, notamment Subdivision Surface, Mirror, et Cloth.
Acquérir les techniques de base en modélisation 3D de mobilier.
Maîtriser l'UV unwrapping et l'application de textures réalistes.
Produire des rendus finaux de qualité professionnelle dans Cycles.

3D Modeling: Sofa Modeling Step-by-Step – Using Image Reference

requirements: Disposant d'une connaissance de base, encore limitée, de Blender, notamment en ce qui concerne la navigation dans l'interface et la manipulation d’objets simples.
courses.description:
This course offers a comprehensive introduction to furniture design using Blender, a powerful open-source 3D modeling software. Through a structured and progressive approach, students will learn to model a variety of furniture pieces, including a closet, an accent chair, and a sofa. Emphasis is placed on the use of reference images to ensure accurate proportions and realistic design outcomes — a fundamental technique in 3D modeling workflows.
Students will be introduced to essential Blender modifiers such as Subdivision Surface, Mirror, and Cloth, which play a critical role in enhancing model complexity, symmetry, and realism. These tools are presented through practical applications to reinforce understanding and skill acquisition.
The course also covers UV unwrapping techniques, enabling students to prepare models for high-quality texturing. Proper unwrapping ensures that textures are applied without distortion, an essential step in creating professional 3D assets.
In the final phase, students will explore rendering techniques, including camera setup, lighting with HDRI and environment textures, adjusting sample settings, and configuring output properties. By the end of the course, students will be equipped with foundational skills in 3D furniture modeling, texturing, and rendering.
Whether you are a beginner or looking to strengthen your skills in 3D design, this course is designed to support your growth. Enroll now and start creating your own professional-quality furniture models.
target_audience: Ce cours s’adresse aux designers et passionnés de design souhaitant se spécialiser ou se perfectionner dans le design de mobilier (furniture design) à l’aide de Blender, un outil 3D gratuit et puissant.

courses.description:
Learn how to select the perfect paint colours quickly and easily for your home. Using a tried and tested system, this course teaches you how to avoid those dreaded and costly paint mistakes and help you select the perfect paint colours that work and give you perfect finish every time!
Gone are the days you must purchase hundreds of tester pots and hope one of them looks good. Or quickly decide on a paint colour because the painter is arriving. Or worse still, be paralysed in overwhelm at all the choice available, then just go for what you know looks good. Rather than choosing something that could really make your room or home look amazing.
Along with around 25-min of video instructions, the course also comes complete with a workbook that can be downloaded and kept for your own confidence. The workbook is jammed pack full of tips and tricks to help you on the way. As a bonus I have also included a bonus printable PDF which gives you tried and tested colour pallets, these are great if you are in a hurry and need to make quick choices. The printable also has explanations of the available paint finishes, so again it is easy to work out the best finish for your project.
The course is designed to give you all of the tools needed, to be able to go away and confidently choose your paint colours for any paint project in your home.
target_audience: DIY ers, Anybody Interested In Interior Design, Home Improvement and Not Wanting To Make Costly Mistakes When Doing It Themselves.

requirements: Yeni başlayan ve sektörde deneyim kazanmak isteyen herkes için uygundur.
courses.description:
Selamlar,
Ben Ümit Kayahan ÖZTÜRK kapatılan hesabımdan sonra tekrar aranızdayım. Kısa sürede yayından kaldırılan eski kurslarımı ve yeni kursları platformda tekrardan paylaşacağım. 10 Yıllık proje ve saha tecrübesini sizlerle paylaşmak istiyorum. Sektörün en büyük sorunu nitelikli personel bulunmamasıdır. Sıfırdan başlayarak ileri seviyeye kadar adım adım izah etmeye çalıştım. Kurs ile ilgili yorumlarınızı en son yapmanızı rica ederim. Geri dönüşlerinizi bekliyorum. Kurs içeriğinden ekleme ve çıkarmaları buna göre yapabilirim.
"Nasıl Yapıldı Seri-3 AVM Proje Tasarımı" Kursu kapsamında sektöre yeni başlamış veya kendini geliştirmek isteyen ve HVAC sistemlerine merak duyan herkese hitap etmektedir.
Bu kurs kapsamında neler öğreneceğiz ? Ya da bu seri sizlere ne öğretecek bunu anlatmak istiyorum.
Diğer kurslarım her bir disiplinin tek tek nasıl tasarlanacağını anlatırken sizlere yeni bir proje geldiği zaman nasıl tasarım yapabilirsiniz bunu anlatmaya çalışacağım. Multi disiplinlerin bir arada nasıl çözümlenebileceğini anlatacağım.  Projelerin hikayesi nedir nasıl sistemler kuruluyor bunlara da deyineceğim.
Bu proje Ankara'da yer alan bir AVM binasının proje tasarımını izah etmektedir. Sıhhi tesisat kapsamında kurulan tüm sistemler ve bu sistemlere neden ihtiyaç duyuldu neler tasarladık onu anlatacağım.
Yangın söndürme tesisatında bir teknik hacim kurgusunun yapılması, sulu tip sprinkler nasıl tasarlanıyor bunları izah ettim.
Havalandırma tesisatında rotorlu tip ısı geri kazanım sistemleri, ofis bölümlerinin havalandırılması, proje çizimi ve kurgu detayları izah edilmiştir.
Isıtma ve soğutma tesisatında 4 borulu fan coil cihazı kullanılmıştır. Döşemeden ısıtma sistemlerinin kombin edilmesi ve tüm akış şemasının üzerinden tek tek geçilmiştir.
Kurs ile ilgili örnek şemalar, örnek projeler kaynaklar bölümünde yer almaktadır. Buradan indirebilirsiniz.  Sorun yaşayanlar mail adresim üzerinden bana ulaşabilir.
Kursa ait tüm çizimler, föyler kaynaklar bölümüne eklenmiştir.
Kursun faydalı olması dileği ile,

When working in UE, the primary role is played by the graphics card. It should be from Nvidia and support RTX and CUDA technologies. The video memory should be no less than 6 GB.
RAM: critical minimum - 32 GB.

Processor: can be placed in second position in terms of impact. It works in conjunction with the graphics card and can either fully unlock its potential or not fully utilize it. Both Intel and AMD processors are acceptable.

courses.description:
This beginner-friendly course offers a comprehensive introduction to 3D modeling and visualization using SketchUp, alongside exciting technologies like Virtual Reality (VR), Augmented Reality (AR), and 3D printing. Starting with the basics, you will master essential SketchUp tools to design accurate 3D models, learning techniques to create shapes, apply textures, and add realistic materials to your designs.
The course includes hands-on exercises to deepen your understanding. You’ll explore Enscape, a powerful tool for generating photorealistic renderings and creating immersive VR simulations that bring your designs to life. You’ll also learn how to use BuildAR to create dynamic and interactive AR presentations, enabling you to showcase your work in innovative and engaging ways. Finally, you’ll gain practical experience exporting your models for 3D printing, transforming your virtual creations into tangible prototypes.
Whether you’re an aspiring designer, a student starting out in digital design, a hobbyist, or someone eager to explore creative technologies, this course is designed for you. No prior experience is needed—just curiosity and a passion for learning! By the end of this course, you’ll have the knowledge, skills, and confidence to use modern tools and techniques to design, visualize, and materialize creative ideas in both digital and physical spaces. Come learn with me!
target_audience: This course is designed for: Aspiring Designers and Creatives Individuals who are curious about 3D modeling and want to explore how digital tools can bring their design ideas to life. Students and Beginners in Design Fields Students or professionals just starting out in architecture, interior design, product design, or related fields, looking to build a strong foundation in 3D content creation and visualization. Hobbyists and Enthusiasts Anyone interested in learning how to use modern 3D tools to create, visualize, and bring their creative ideas to reality through digital and physical mediums. Learners Exploring Emerging Technologies Beginners eager to gain hands-on experience with tools like Virtual Reality, Augmented Reality, and 3D printing to stay ahead in a technology-driven world. This course is perfect for those with little to no prior experience but a strong interest in digital design and visualization. It offers a beginner-friendly introduction to powerful tools and techniques that can serve as a stepping stone to more advanced projects.

courses.description:
Transform your living space with the power of wall art through our engaging course, 'Interior Design: Style Your Home with Wall Art'. Master the art of selecting, positioning, and integrating wall art into your home decor to create a harmonious and aesthetically pleasing environment. This course provides straightforward guidelines to overcome any apprehension you may have about decorating with wall art.
During this journey, you will acquire essential skills and knowledge:
The Art of Selection: Learn how to choose wall art that complements your style and elevates your living space.
Strategic Placement: Discover the ideal locations for your wall art and how it can enhance the aesthetic appeal of key areas - from prime meeting spaces like living and dining rooms to low-level storage units and those odd, often neglected corners.
Complex Simplicity: How to make a space progressively more simple or more complex with wall art by changing 4 elements: the contour of the group, the underlying framework, the colour and style of the frame and the piece of art it contains.
Creating Harmony: Gain insights into aligning wall art with furniture and other decor elements for a cohesive look.
The Power of Composition: Learn how to create compelling compositions and use artwork as inspiration for arranging your home decor items.
Using Color and Material: Grasp how to use colour and materials to make your compositions appear as a unified element.
Seamless Integration: Learn to adapt your environment so that newly acquired art feels like a natural part of the composition.
Additionally, the course will address a student's question about dealing with different decor elements in their home, ensuring you're fully equipped to make your wall art a stunning home feature. This course is perfect for anyone wishing to bring their walls to life with art, requiring no prior knowledge, only an interest in creating a beautiful, personalized home environment.

courses.description:
Light is a powerful thing. Lighting affects everything it falls upon.
It creates atmosphere, drama and evokes different emotions as it changes.
In a famous quote Glenn Cunningham described effective lighting design like a beautiful painting. It is your medium to bring someone to an emotional state with your art.
Lighting design is indeed both a science and a art.
Light is the first element of design, without it there is no color form or texture.


Perhaps when it comes to interior design, lighting design is the one of its most important elements.
Without proper lighting design the home decor and architectural beauty cannot be experienced to its fullest capacity.


A well lit room assures a warm and inviting atmosphere in your home.
The right lighting design can make you feel more relaxed and productive.


It enhances every single corner in a room from the furniture to the fittings and textures.




Utilizing the right type of lighting and ensuring the correct light placement is the most crucial task in lighting design.


And modern day Lighting designers achieve this task, through tools like lighting design and simulation softwares.
A range of lighting design softwares are available in the market,
but the most popular Lighting design software is Dialux.


And in this course we are going to learn to use this software for our Indoor lighting design.
target_audience: This is a great course for for all levels of individuals Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced with an interest in Lighting Design principles and tools.
This course would also be of great value for DIY Enthusiasts interested in doing the lighting design of their home and office.

courses.description:
Do you dream of having a beautiful new kitchen, but don’t know where to start?

Are you about to start a kitchen remodel, but you are already overwhelmed with all of the choices you have to make?

If this is you, then you have come to the right place!
Whether you are planning on simply updating your kitchen finishes or you are planning a complete kitchen gut remodel, the breadth of today’s kitchen options are truly incredible, and I am here to break it all down for you so that you feel confident in creating the perfect design for you.
This course really is the A-Z of kitchen design, covering the most important aspects of kitchen design, including, but not limited to:
Realistic kitchen remodeling budgets and timelines
Knowing what to ask your contractors to avoid costly mistakes
Sorting through all of the functional and aesthetic decisions you’ll need to make during the kitchen design process including, but not limited to, layouts, cabinetry, lighting, window coverings, breakfast nooks, countertops, backsplashes, appliances, and hardware
How to mix metal finishes in the kitchen like a Pro
How to choose the best kitchen style for you and your home
How to save money when purchasing countertops and backsplashes
Learn the latest in innovative storage solutions and the best small kitchen design hacks
I’ll also provide you with some invaluable downloadable resources, first and foremost, a "Master Kitchen Design Planner", which we’ll complete together in the course, and once completed, will contain all of the design details you’ll need for your kitchen remodel. You’ll also be able to download my "Ultimate Kitchen Design Style Guide", which contains a wealth of information, covering the ideal finishes and selections for whichever style of kitchen you choose.
In short, kitchen design is complicated.  Unless you are a seasoned interior designer who already has experience in kitchen design, I encourage you to enroll, as this course is ideal for both non-designers as well as professional interior designers who are new to the world of kitchen design.  I look forward to seeing you in the course!

IMPORTANT NOTES:
If you are interested in taking most or all of my courses, I have a recommended order in which to watch them (although it's certainly not required).  I would start with "How to Design a Room in 10 Easy Steps" because most of my other courses are in-depth classes of the concepts touched on in this 10 step class.  Following the 10 Step Course, I suggest moving on to "How to Use Color Like a Pro", followed by "How to Work with Interior Design Styles Like a Pro", then "How to Use Lighting Design to Transform your Home", and finally "Design is in the Details".

My other five courses, "How to Use Minimalist Interior Design to Live your Best Life",  "Use Eco-friendly, Sustainable Design to Improve Your Life", "How to Design Your Dream Kitchen", "How to Design Your Dream Bathroom", and "Everything Small Home Design" are all stand alone classes on specialty topics within interior design, and therefore, can be taken in any order.

Please be aware that this course, or any of my courses, is not intended to provide all of the knowledge needed to become a professional interior designer.  As with any professional field, there is a significant amount of education and/or experience that is needed to achieve competency in this field.  My intention with these courses is to provide some solid foundational knowledge to assist either those individuals interested in "DIY" interior design to work on their own projects more effectively, or to provide supplemental education to both interior design students and professionals.
target_audience: This course is ideal for anyone who wants to learn how to design their dream kitchen
This course is also for professional interior designers who are new to the field of kitchen design

requirements: Para la realización de este curso no ser requieren grandes conocimientos previos, ya que la formación se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0.
Cuando compres el curso vas a poder acceder a las clases cuando y donde quieras. El curso se queda en tu cuenta de Udemy para siempre. :)
El más importante requisito para realizar este curso es el entusiasmo y la motivación por aprender nuevas habilidades que aumenten tus competencias profesionales.
courses.description:
Estilismo de Interiores
Perfeccionando el Arte de Combinar Colores, Texturas y Objetos para Crear Espacios Únicos
Instructor: Arquitecto Álvaro García  Actualizado: Octubre del 2025 Requisitos previos: Ninguno


Descripción del Curso:
Bienvenido a "Estilismo de Interiores: Creando Espacios con Carácter y Estilo Propio", un curso dedicado a revelar los secretos de los estilistas de interiores profesionales. Aquí aprenderás a transformar cualquier espacio en un entorno con encanto, funcionalidad y personalidad.
Este curso te llevará más allá de los fundamentos del diseño de interiores para explorar el arte del estilismo. Te enseñaremos cómo seleccionar y combinar muebles, accesorios, colores y texturas para crear un look coherente y personalizado. También exploraremos cómo la luz, el espacio y la disposición pueden ser manipulados para cambiar la atmósfera y el impacto de un espacio.
Aprenderás sobre las últimas tendencias y cómo adaptarlas a diferentes estilos y espacios, desde hogares acogedores hasta oficinas modernas. También cubriremos cómo diseñar y estilizar para fotografía de interiores y revistas, permitiéndote expandir tus oportunidades de carrera.
Este curso es ideal tanto para diseñadores de interiores que buscan perfeccionar sus habilidades de estilismo como para entusiastas del diseño que desean llevar su hogar o espacio de trabajo al siguiente nivel. No se necesita experiencia previa, solo tu creatividad y pasión por el diseño.
¡Inscríbete hoy en "Estilismo de Interiores: Creando Espacios con Carácter y Estilo Propio" y comienza a crear espacios que cuentan historias, evocan emociones y, lo más importante, se sienten como en casa!
Con esta formación disfrutarás aprendiendo desde dónde quieras, sin tener que desplazarte, sin horarios, con quién quieras, según tus necesidades y disponibilidad. Aprenderás con un instructor avalado por miles da alumnos satisfechos en todo el mundo (comentarios certificados). Conocerás las técnicas, métodos, trucos y flujos de trabajo de este sector creativo. El docente te transmitirá su sabiduría y conocimientos con pasión a la vez que las explicaciones concisas, claras, sencillas y con un enfoque profesional en cada clase. Podrás conseguir un  certificado homologado personalizado y firmado por tu instructor en cada formación. De está forma podrás compartir tu título en tu portafolio, currículo, en redes sociales...


Itinerario Formativo:
Introducción a la plataforma de formación Udemy
Bienvenida al Curso de Estilismo de Interiores
Introducción Estilismo de Interiores
Teoría y Práctica Estilismo de Interiores
Recursos para el Alumno del Curso Estilismo de Interiores
Consultas, Dudas y Sugerencias de los Alumnos de la Formación Estilismo de Interiores
Emisión del Certificado de Finalización del Curso "Estilismo de Interiores "


Metodología de Aprendizaje:
Recuerda que este curso incluye lecciones en vídeo fullHD con audio de estudio (compatible con TV, PC, Mac, tablet y smartphone), artículos didácticos, actividades, animaciones, ilustraciones, proyectos paso a paso, recursos descargables, links de interés, acceso de por vida, certificado de finalización, tutorización online, y una exclusiva comunidad de aprendizaje privada que nos ayudamos aportando nuestras experiencias en el foro de comunicación del curso.
La modalidad de este curso te permite que empieces y acabes cuando tú quieras, marcando el ritmo de la clase según tu disponibilidad. Puedes volver a visualizar lo que te interese, saltar el contenido que ya domines, hacer preguntas, resolver dudas, compartir tus proyectos... Puedes elegir ver todas las lecciones de forma secuencial (lineal) y aprovecharlas al máximo la formación, pero también puedes decidir ver este curso como una guía de referencia.
Las clases están claramente organizadas en secciones y lecciones, puedes decidir visualizar solo las clases que te resulten más importantes según tus necesidades formativas. La mayoría de las lecciones son independientes para que puedas comprender los conceptos de cada lección sin tener que ver las lecciones anteriores del curso.
Para seguir el programa formativo propuesto no ser requieren conocimientos previos, ya que la formación se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0. El curso está orientado a aquellos creativos que quieran ampliar sus skills (habilidades) y conocer múltiples trucos, consejos, recursos y recomendaciones, de la mano del instructor Álvaro García. Además la formación disponen de acceso automático al contenido, sin limitación de tiempo, disponibilidad 24/7 (24 horas al día los 7 días de la semana), sin caducidad y con garantía de devolución.
Con la alta definición de los vídeos (vídeo fullHD y audio de estudio) conseguirá no te perder detalle. Podrás ver las clases las veces que requieras para recordar y perfeccionar tus habilidades como diseñador. Tendrás la posibilidad de preguntar, pedir opinión y ayuda al instructor, además de compartir tu experiencia de aprendizaje con los demás alumnos del curso, tan apasionados como tú, repartidos por todo el mundo. Seleccionamos cuidadosamente los contenidos y producimos cada curso para garantizar una experiencia de aprendizaje online integral y de la máxima calidad.


¿A qué esperas?, este curso es ideal para ti, atrévete a convertirte en un experto y expresa tus ideas de la forma que siempre has deseado. Adelante, nos vemos dentro de la formación ;)
target_audience: Estudiantes y profesionales que quieran acceder a una formación innovadora orientada a la metodología de trabajo del mundo laboral, en un formato de e-learining para aprender donde quieran y a su propio ritmo.
Sobre todo aquellas personas que busquen crecer profesionalmente, aumentar sus habilidades y formar parte de nuestra comunidad educativa.
Principalmente aquellos que quieran aumentar sus posibilidades de empleabilidad, contratación y/o promocionar dentro de su sector.

courses.description:
In the competitive world of interior design, being able to present your ideas visually can make all the difference in winning clients and ensuring successful project execution.


Concept Design Modeling is a critical skill for interior designers looking to effectively communicate their creative vision. It involves creating conceptual models that visually represent design ideas and spatial layouts before they are finalized.


Whether it's through mood boards, isometric perspectives, or collage art styles, strong concept design modeling enables designers to showcase their creativity and design solutions in a compelling, easily digestible way. AND, whether you're a beginner or intermediate user, this course will teach you the skills needed to create impressive mood boards, isometric perspectives, and collage art-style presentations that bring your design concepts to life.


Mastering SketchUp & LayOut gives you the power to create stunning, realistic, and effective interior design presentations whether you’re presenting to clients or collaborating with a team.


In this course, you'll:
Master the art of Mood Board Designing to visually convey design ideas.
Create impactful Isometric Perspective Style presentations for clear, engaging designs.
Design visually appealing Collage Art Style Presentations to showcase creative concepts.
Learn practical tips for improving workflow and presentation quality in interior design projects.


Join us today..!
Learn how to create stunning interior design presentations with SketchUp and LayOut. Master mood boards, isometric perspectives, and collage art styles in this comprehensive online course.


You’re welcome to preview some of the lectures for free, and then you’ll be able to enroll with confidence!
target_audience: Interior Designers
Illustrators
Architects
Students

objectives: Use the New PBR shader in Blender and create amazing materials Architectural designs

The core skills needed to create photo realistic interior scenes

requirements: You will need a computer capable of running Blender
courses.description:
Do you want to learn how to create stunning, photo-realistic interior renders in Blender? This course will teach you how to design and 3D model your own architectural projects using this powerful, free software. By the end of the course, you will be able to use the methods and techniques demonstrated to create unique, professional-quality 3D models and scenes.
Throughout the course, you will learn basic concepts, discover powerful tools, and learn efficient processes for designing photo-realistic 3D models and interior scenes in Blender. The course is designed for practical learning and will allow you to develop your 3D modeling skills as you see the results of your progress in real time.
You will learn how to manipulate Blender to achieve the results you desire and solve tasks quickly and easily. The course takes you step by step through the process of modeling, adding materials, and rendering the final result. You will also discover the new PBR capabilities in Blender and learn how to add materials, lighting, cameras, and even create a short animation.
By the end of the course, you will be able to use Blender as a complete drafting and 3D visualization package. With the latest release of Blender, there has never been a better time to unleash your creativity. Blender is an amazing program that enables your creative side while constantly challenging you to improve.
The lessons are taught with practical examples and are aimed at completing an architectural design project. Learning Blender doesn't have to be difficult and you will enjoy the journey as you create amazing architectural renders and 3D models. This 3D design course will take you step by step through each critical stage and help you develop your skills along the way.
Unleash your creative side by opening Blender and discovering the possibilities. Blender is free, constantly improving, and offers industry-standard tools. It has a strong online community that is waiting to be discovered.
More industries than ever are starting to use Blender, with more and more small production houses releasing work created using this user-friendly software. This trend will continue to grow in the coming years due to the huge improvements made to Blender in recent releases. Blender offers a full production pipeline and is constantly improving to ensure you have access to the best 3D tools available.
target_audience: Students who want to learn a free design package for their own professional use
Anyone who wants to complete Architectural visualization projects
Interior designers and 3D visualization students
Anyone who want to learn Blender and take their ideas to another level

courses.description:
A Masterclass Decore Sua Casa é o guia completo, passo a passo, para transformar sua casa em um lugar mais elegante e confortável, mesmo que você não saiba nada sobre decoração de interiores e sem precisar de grandes modificações.


O propósito é dar todos os ensinamentos necessários para que você, por conta própria, possa transformar sua casa no lugar que sempre sonhou, fazendo decisões mais assertivas.


Saber fazer boas escolhas é crucial para ter uma casa bela e harmônica. Se você não tem certeza sobre suas escolhas, acaba gastando duas vezes mais do que o previsto no orçamento do projeto da sua casa.


Investir na decoração não significa derramar rios de dinheiro ali num móvel assinado ou ter a casa toda de móveis planejados. Você pode sim ter uma casa bonita e confortável para você independente do seu orçamento.


Ao final desta Masterclass você terá todos os ensinamentos necessários para tornar sua casa o lugar que sempre sonhou, fazendo boas escolhas e decisões mais assertivas na decoração, sem precisar mudar todos seus móveis ou fazer grandes reformas.

Você também terá como tirar as suas dúvidas através do chat dentro da plataforma ao final de cada aula, garantindo seu aprendizado. Vamos começar?

courses.description:
¿Sabías que el escaparate de un local comercial  no solo representa un importante porcentaje del nivel de ventas, sino que también representa la imagen de la marca ante el mundo?.
En este curso conocerás de primera mano las herramientas necesarias para que diseño y mercadeo estén presentes al momento de definir, crear y armar un escaparate, que genere una imagen de impacto y comunicación visual. Mediante una serie de conferencias teóricas se darán las bases de conocimiento y además se desarrollarán ejercicios prácticos que integran los conceptos aprendidos.

Analizaremos escaparates de las grandes marcas, conoceremos a sus diseñadores y echaremos un vistazo a sus estrategias de creación. Revisaremos las tendencias en búsqueda de métodos vanguardistas de exhibición y conoceremos las investigaciones de expertos en marketing sobre las zonas más rentables en el escaparate.
El curso hace énfasis en los aspectos artísticos y de diseño de escaparates incentivando tu creatividad.
target_audience: Todos aquellos que estén interesados en adquirir conocimientos en el área del escaparatismo.
Diseñadores, artistas visuales, arquitectos, empresarios, estudiantes, empleados de almacenes.

بعد انهاء الكورس ستكون قادر على فهم وعمل فراغ انتريور كاملاً واخراجه بفكر الـ
(Luxuriant Style)
بعد دراسة الموديلينج والاتجاه الخاص بالستايل وتوزيع الاضاءات الخاصة به وعمل الخامات وتوزيعها فى المشروع واخيرا فكر الرندر والبوست البرودكشن لعمل اخراج واقعى للمشروع

Students
Designer
Visualizer

courses.title: Классическая угловая кухня с пилястрами и карнизами
courses.bio: Для мебельщиков и дезайнеров а также для любителей
objectives: Курс состоит из 7 мастер-классов. Детально рассмотрим все моменты проектирования классической кухни. Только практика!
Научитесь правильно проектировать нижние и верхние секции кухни
Спроектируете пилястры и карнизы для угловой классической кухни
Рставите технику для кухни, фурнитуру и комплектующие
requirements: Навыки проектирования не требуется. Научитесь с нуля
courses.description:
Дизайн и проектирование мебели с Михаилом Скрипником
Несколько фактов обо мне:
Меня зовут Михаил Скрипник, я автор одноименного ютуб канала по проектированию и дизайну мебели уже с 2011 года
В основном работаю в пограмме ПРО100


ПРО100 -Профессиональная программа для производства мебели и разработки дизайна интерьера. Поддерживаю лозунг разработчиков. Самая удобная и интуитивно понятная прога для мебельщиков, дизайнеров и любителей.
А чтобы Вам было легко и быстро проектировать, я подготовил для Вас пошаговый тренинг по проектированию классическуой кухни с пилястрами и карнизами.
Пошаговый обучающий курс по проектированию классическуой кухни с пилястрами и карнизами. для новичков и профи.
В данном курсе вы научитесь проектировать с нуля корпус угловой кухни
Научитесь расставлять правильно карнизы и пилястры
Буквально в пару кликов покажу как сделать угловой и радиусный карниз с инструментом "токарный станок"
Устанавливать плинтус (кухонный бортик)
Расставим мебель для интерьера
Узнаете, что такое фотореализм

+ 3 Бонусных мастер-класса
Ящики Tandem BLUMOTION и Tandem BOX
Подъемные механизмы AVENTOS
Системы петель CLIP-TOP BLUMOTION
Курс подойдет как для новичков так и для профи, кто уже работает в мебельной сфере и хочет обоести новые знания и облегчить себе рабочий процесс.


В данном курсе собран многолетний опыт в дизайне и проектировании мебели.


Только практические знания и никакой воды.
Четкие и понятные инструкции.
Низкая цена за большой объем знаний.
Для тех у кого нет времени собирать нужную информацию в сети по крупицам.
target_audience: НАЧИНАЮЩИМ МЕБЕЛЬЩИКАМ, ДИЗАЙНЕРАМ-ТЕХНОЛОГАМ, ЛЮБИТЕЛЯМ, МЕБЕЛЬНЫМ СТУДИЯМ

courses.title: Start your journey to become successful interior stylist.
courses.bio: A comprehensive course to know and understand elements, aspects and essentials of different interior styling.
objectives: 1. Introduction to interior styling in different fields.
2. Interior styling for different purpose and spaces.
3. Interior styling for digital or non-digital media.
4. Interior styling to revamp a space without changes.
5. Interior styling for different events and festivals.
requirements: Anyone interested to learn about the fundamentals of interior design & styling. No prior knowledge is needed and all are welcomed!
courses.description:
Indian Design League helps amateurs, professionals, experts & entrepreneurs to turn their specialized knowledge, talents, and abilities into a career & business that works so well that they can live a lifestyle that they want and achieve peace of mind, financial Freedom and a Career for Life.


If you an aspiring interior stylist, interior designer or you simply want to upgrade your home or any other space. If you got a passion for interior? Or have your space/home/office always been the best place and now you want to help other people feel great about their place? An interior styling course may be right for you!
This course is for you. An upgrade interior styling will dramatically transform your space and it will help you to decorate and design your dream place. This course is designed in a way to understand the fundamentals of interior design & styling. This interior styling courses is certainly for interior stylist, designer, blogger, artist and creator. It trains the students to become a professional stylist. Being more stylish and having better interior sense improve a person’s self-esteem and undoubtedly this course will make you feel more stylish and confident. The tips and tricks provided in this course will definitely be a great help for you.
target_audience: 1. Anyone who wants to learn about Interior Styling.
2. Aspiring and professional artists, students.
3. Interior stylists, interior managers, and interior bloggers to brush up their skills.
4. Enthusiasts who want to pursue a career in different domains of interior styling.
5. For all entry level to advanced Interior Stylists.

courses.title: احتراف التصميم الداخلي: من الأساسيات إلى الإبداع
courses.bio: تقنيات التصميم البصري
objectives: أساسيات ومفاهيم التصميم الداخلي
عناصر الجمال والتوازن في التصميم الداخلي
تحليل المساحات وتحقيق التناغم البصري والوظيفي
الاتجاهات الحديثة والتطبيقات العملية في التصميم الداخلي
requirements: هذه الدورة تمثل نقطة انطلاق مثالية للراغبين في دخول عالم التصميم الداخلي، دون الحاجة إلى أي خبرات سابقة
courses.description:
نحن فخورون بجهودنا الرامية إلى خلق عالم من السلام والوئام والتناغم، وخلق عالم من السلام والوئام، وخلق عالم من السلام والوئام، والحقيقة هي أن وهذه هي المرة الأولى التي يموت فيها شخص في حادث سيارة بمدينة الجيزة، لكنه توفي في حادث سيارة بمدينة الجيزة. أفضل طريقة للتعرف على بعضنا البعض الأفضل في العالم – الأفضل في العالم، الأفضل في العالم، الأفضل في العالم. أفضل طريقة لتوفير المال - أفضل طريقة لتوفير المال هي توفير المال. السلطان في المعبد – رجل في وسط جبل، ورجل في وسط جبل، ورجل في وسط جبل. الروح القدس والروح القدس – رجل باركه الله بالروح القدس والروح القدس والروح القدس. الموجة العظيمة – مكان جميل وهادئ في قلب البحر الأبيض المتوسط. الروح القدس – رجل نبي، ونبي، ونبي هو نبي. أفضل طريقة للتخلص من الفيروس هي استخدامه كأداة لمنع انتشار الفيروس. في هذه الحالة، أنا سعيد جدًا بوجودك في منزلي. لقد تم تنصيب رجال الدين في الولايات المتحدة في المقام الأول. رجال الدين من أهل البلد هم الذين ... الرب يسوع المسيح هو الوحيد الذي لديه القدرة على صنع السلام مع شعبه. الهدف الرئيسي لهذا المشروع هو تقديم أفضل خدمة ودعم ممكن للشعب. أفضل طريقة لتحسين صحتك ورفاهتك هي استخدام أفضل التقنيات. سلطان السلطان في مدينة الناصرة
انضم لهذه الدورة التدريبية الان.
target_audience: هذه الدورة مثالية للمبتدئين ومحبي التصميم، وأيضًا للمحترفين الراغبين في تطوير مهاراتهم

courses.title: Estimation and Costing for Interior Design Project - Part 1
courses.bio: Civil Works and Fixed Furniture works
objectives: Become an expert on Estimation & Costing
Become an excellent contractor with skills for giving competitive rates
Become an expert Designer with near to perfect cost estimates
Get a complete insight into understanding how a works is done and the important issues to be taken into consideration when preparing estimates
requirements: One should be able to read drawings and design a space
One should be an Interior Designer student , Civil Engineer or Architecture student
Anyone who wants to be a designer and can read drawings
courses.description:
You will be learning the Civil works involved in the Interior Design Project in this Part 1 like Walls, Plasters, Granite Flooring, Marble & Tile Floorings, Window, and Door frames, Waterproofing, Kitchen Platforms, Wall tiling, Fixed furniture works like Main door & Safety door, TV unit, Wardrobes, Bed with siders and Headrest, Dressing unit, Shoe rack etc. What is covered under the Part 1 will be an introduction to Estimation and Costing. Also we are covering related topics like what is the best way ,the work is executed .You will learn how to create a  BOQ . We will also be learning  specification writing as per International standards . Then we are covering a lecture on the Working Drawings and how to read them for our estimation works.  The most important point that we will be creating is the Rate Analysis for all the items considered in Interior Works for any project.
Part 2 will cover all the Furniture works like Loose Furniture,  Glass , Aluminium, Gypsum and wooden Partitions, Aluminium doors and windows,  etc.
Part 3 will cover all the services like Electrical works, Automation works, etc.
Part 4 will cover all the Plumbing , drainage, HVAC , etc.
Part 5 will cover Curtain walls systems , external cladding systems , Design of Acoustics and Sound systems for Home Theatres and Auditoriums and estimates for the same.
target_audience: Civil Engineering students , Architecture students and Interior design students
Professional Interior Designers and Architects can enhance their Knowledge base
Civil Engineering Students aspiring to make Interior Design their Profession.
Anyone who has experience of managing Interior Design sites

courses.title: Nasıl Yapıldı Seri-5 Millet Bahçesi ve İşçi Kampı Proje Tsrm
courses.bio: Havalandırma Tesisatı, Isıtma ve Soğutma Tesisatı, Tasarım Teknikleri, Yangın söndürme Tesisatı
objectives: Sıhhi Tesisat
Isıtma ve Soğutma Tesisatı
Havalandırma Tesisatı
Yangın Söndürme Tesisatı
requirements: Yeni başlayan ve sektörde deneyim kazanmak isteyen herkes için uygundur.
courses.description:
Selamlar,
Ben Ümit Kayahan ÖZTÜRK kapatılan hesabımdan sonra tekrar aranızdayım. Kısa sürede yayından kaldırılan eski kurslarımı ve yeni kursları platformda tekrardan paylaşacağım. 10 Yıllık proje ve saha tecrübesini sizlerle paylaşmak istiyorum. Sektörün en büyük sorunu nitelikli personel bulunmamasıdır. Sıfırdan başlayarak ileri seviyeye kadar adım adım izah etmeye çalıştım. Kurs ile ilgili yorumlarınızı en son yapmanızı rica ederim. Geri dönüşlerinizi bekliyorum. Kurs içeriğinden ekleme ve çıkarmaları buna göre yapabilirim.
"Nasıl Yapıldı Seri-5 Millet Bahçesi İşçi Kampı Proje Tasarımı" Kursu kapsamında sektöre yeni başlamış veya kendini geliştirmek isteyen ve HVAC sistemlerine merak duyan herkese hitap etmektedir.
Bu kurs kapsamında neler öğreneceğiz ? Ya da bu seri sizlere ne öğretecek bunu anlatmak istiyorum.
Diğer kurslarım her bir disiplinin tek tek nasıl tasarlanacağını anlatırken sizlere yeni bir proje geldiği zaman nasıl tasarım yapabilirsiniz bunu anlatmaya çalışacağım. Multi disiplinlerin bir arada nasıl çözümlenebileceğini anlatacağım.  Projelerin hikayesi nedir nasıl sistemler kuruluyor bunlara da deyineceğim.
Bu proje Gross Market ve Otogar binasının proje tasarımını izah etmektedir. Sıhhi tesisat kapsamında kurulan tüm sistemler ve bu sistemlere neden ihtiyaç duyuldu neler tasarladık onu anlatacağım.
Yangın söndürme tesisatında bir teknik hacim kurgusunun yapılması, sulu tip sprinkler nasıl tasarlanıyor bunları izah ettim.
Kurs ile ilgili örnek şemalar, örnek projeler kaynaklar bölümünde yer almaktadır. Buradan indirebilirsiniz.  Sorun yaşayanlar mail adresim üzerinden bana ulaşabilir.
Kursa ait tüm çizimler, föyler kaynaklar bölümüne eklenmiştir.
Kursun faydalı olması dileği ile,
target_audience: Yeni mezunlar
Sektör Çalışanları
Üniversite Öğrencileri
Mekanik Tesisat Sektörüne İlgi Duyan Herkes

courses.title: Industrial Product-Object Drawing Course with Perspective
courses.bio: drawing objects and industrial products with perspective rules, product design, pencil drawing course
objectives: how perspective rules are used in product drawing
object drawing and analysis through examples
three-dimensional thinking and transfer to paper
to increase the effect by capturing the line perspective and the close relationship in the product
drawing of invisible inner parts of products as if they were transparent
requirements: paper
pencil
drawing motivation
courses.description:
Hello.. (This is the second course of the three-stage series.)
When we examine our daily life, perspective and proportion are in every part of our lives. On the streets, in the products, in the places, in short, everywhere. In this training, which is the second of the perspective trainings, it is aimed not only to draw with a different perspective, but also to be able to observe consciously.
- We will see the rules of perspective with academic and advanced perspective foundations.
- You will have learned the general drawing logic of the most difficult objects very well.
- How should we start first when drawing objects? What rules should be in the technical infrastructure? Which technique should we use and how? We will find answers to questions such as how do we adjust the surfaces of the object drawn in different perspectives.
- The general principle of this training is to teach drawing techniques of all objects by going through certain basic rules.
- You will be able to make different movements on the surfaces based on the prisms, which are the basis of the product drawing.
- While drawing the products, we will see not only the visible and clear areas, but also the inside and invisible parts of the drawing.
- To draw the most complicated objects in a very easy way,
- How to focus the actual lines of the object among many lines,
- How contrasts are captured with the line value,
- How to show the drawn objects more effectively and strikingly,
- The reactions of the line values according to the direction of the light,
- Toning (light - shadow)
- How the line value and the tone value should be in harmony,
- Where we tone so that the perception of depth can be felt on the paper,
- Where we should increase to the darkest values.
- How we can more clearly show that it is in contact with the ground,
We will see all these issues not only theoretically, but also practically through product examples. Since we will deal with these two main topics together, we will see much more permanent results. At the end of the trainingWith the right perspective foundations, you will be able to draw all objects and architectural structures. Create professional product drawings from scratch, even in the most intense details you can take it out. In this training, you will learn the techniques that should be used in product-oriented drawings, even when drawing any composition. You can start to develop quickly by watching the training videos to learn the techniques that an architect, industrial designer or hobbyist drawing should know.
target_audience: anyone who wants to learn drawing

courses.title: Instalaciones eléctricas de interior.
courses.bio: Modulo I: Introducción a los circuitos eléctricos, diseño de planos, selección de cables y herramientas.
objectives: Unidad I Realizar los cálculos de las magnitudes eléctricas y aplicación de la ley de Ohm en instalaciones eléctricas de interior, partiendo de valores conocidos. Realizar los cálculos de potencia, energía y costos por consumos de energía de los equipos eléctricos. Conocer las equivalencias entre potencia eléctrica y potencia mecánica. Realizar los cálculos de resistencia equivalente, simplificando los circuitos eléctricos.

Unidad II Elaborar en formato ejercicios de rotulación y doblado de planos. Trazar los esquemas de las instalaciones eléctricas, usando los tipos de líneas conforme a las normas. Utilizar el rotulado en la elaboración de planos conforme a las normativas para instalaciones eléctricas de interior. Interpretar y analizar la información en los planos de las instalaciones eléctricas. Utilizar la simbología en la elaboración de planos conforme a las normativas para instalaciones de interior.

Unidad III Identificar los cables eléctricos conforme al aislamiento y el código de colores. Selección del mínimo de herramientas a usar en las instalaciones eléctricas. Uso adecuado y conservación de las herramientas a utilizar en las instalaciones eléctricas.
requirements: Tener conocimientos de electricidad básica y conocimientos de matemática básica
courses.description:
El objetivo del curso es brindar al participante una guía práctica que le permita realizar sus actividades laborales con ética profesional, teniendo presenta los criterios necesarios para intervenir una instalación eléctrica residencial o industrial de forma segura y cumpliendo con estándares internacionales.
Para esto se ha dividido el curso en siete (7) módulos, cada uno de ellos con alcances y objetivos específicos y alcanzables por el participante, si bien los módulos están planteados en una secuencia de conocimiento lógicos, no son obligatorios para el lector cursarlos todos, es decir, es opcional la escogencia de los módulos que para el lector sea de su interés.
El Modulo I, permite al participante tener las bases teóricas, prácticas y de normativas, necesarias para realizar una instalación eléctrica segura. Facilitando la interpretación de los planos eléctricos, la selección de los cables acorde a las condiciones ambientales, la selección y el buen uso de las herramientas de trabajo, la medición y cálculo de magnitudes y parámetros de la electricidad presentes en las instalaciones de interior.
target_audience: Estudiantes de ingeniería eléctrica, arquitectos, tecnólogos en electricidad, electricistas industriales, electricistas de instalaciones domésticas, maestros electricistas, linieros, ayudante de electricista y personas con conocimientos básicos de electricidad.

courses.title: Architettura e Photoshop - colorare e disegnare
courses.bio: Presentare al meglio i tuoi progetti
objectives: Realizzare tavole di progetto ricche di colori e dettagli.
Creare pattern e texture.
Essere più veloci nella creazione di alternative progettuali e nella presentazione.
requirements: Essere in possesso di un abbonamento a Creative Cloud.
Conoscenza di base di Photoshop
courses.description:
Questo videocorso raccoglie una serie di tecniche e tutorial pratici per arricchire i disegni di presentazione di un progetto: piantine, prospettive, alzati e tutti i disegni che servono ai progettisti per descrivere le loro idee a committenti e commissioni.
Si parte da zero, ossia dall'importazione di una piantina realizzata in un programma CAD all'interno di Photoshop: nella prima parte imparerai a impostare le dimensioni del disegno, modificare gli spessori di linea, effettuare le colorazioni di base delle varie zone sia in maniera statica che dinamica.
Per esprimere al meglio i materiali, vedrai diverse tecniche per utilizzare le texture, a partire da quelle predefinite di Photoshop. Disegnerai da zero un tuo pattern personalizzato stile legno e ne creerai a partire da immagini fotografiche di materiali reali. Per lavorare al meglio, vedrai come impostare una tua libreria personale di materiali e colori, da utilizzare sui tuoi progetti o condividere coi colleghi.
Per comporre disegni più accattivanti vedrai come per aggiungere ombre, effetti di luce, come salvare silhouette personalizzate per contestualizzare meglio le proporzioni di un prospetto. Imparerai a utilizzare i pennelli per disegnare alberi per arricchire le aree esterne di un appartamento. L'impiego delle sfumature per simulare la luminosità di un interno.
Il corso si conclude con consigli per velocizzare il lavoro: come creare alternative progettuali, come salvare una propria libreria di finiture, come esportare il proprio lavoro per condividerlo col cliente.
target_audience: Architetti, geometri, interior designer, arredatori che vogliono migliorare la qualità della presentazione dei loro progetti.
