courses.title: Lighting Contrive - Lighting in Interior Styling
courses.bio: A comprehensive course on types of lighting, understanding human psychology and more
objectives: 1. Types of lighting and their applications
2. Lighting challenges and solutions
3. Material awareness
4. Difference between natural and artificial lighting
5. Use of Decorative Lights
6. Type of spaces and lighting - residential, commercial, safety, miscellaneous.
requirements: Open to all learners
courses.description:
Intensity, color, direction, movement, and form are the five basic qualities of lights. They are an interior designer, decorator, and stylist’s tools. Light is what facilitates to design and describe all the visual elements physically and psychologically. An Interior Stylist and a Designer need to have sufficient knowledge about a variety of lighting options and develop skills to decide which type to use when and where. The foremost task would be to understand the direction, flow and intensity of natural light to style a room as per a theme accordingly.
Topics Covered -
1) Lighting and Its Benefits
2) Natural Light in Interior Styling
3) Artificial Lights- Overall Categories
4) Decorative Lights - Application and Choice for Theme and Style
5) Outdoor Lights
6) Creating Ambiance Through Lights
7) Colour of Lights
8) Light and Human Psychology

This course is designed in such a way that will not only introduce learners to a variety of lighting options and dive deep into their use.
The Lighting Contrive - Lighting in Interior Styling course will prove to be a handy guide to a variety of lighting interior and exterior styling options, their area of use, significance, materials, purpose, challenges, solutions, estimation, and styling ideas for using texture.

courses.description:
Selamlar,
Ben Ümit Kayahan ÖZTÜRK kapatılan hesabımdan sonra tekrar aranızdayım. Kısa sürede yayından kaldırılan eski kurslarımı ve yeni kursları platformda tekrardan paylaşacağım. 10 Yıllık proje ve saha tecrübesini sizlerle paylaşmak istiyorum. Sektörün en büyük sorunu nitelikli personel bulunmamasıdır. Sıfırdan başlayarak ileri seviyeye kadar adım adım izah etmeye çalıştım. Kurs ile ilgili yorumlarınızı en son yapmanızı rica ederim. Geri dönüşlerinizi bekliyorum. Kurs içeriğinden ekleme ve çıkarmaları buna göre yapabilirim.
"VRV/VRF Proje Tasarımı" Kursu kapsamında sektöre yeni başlamış veya kendini geliştirmek isteyen soğutma sistemlerine merak duyan herkese hitap etmektedir.
Bu kurs kapsamında neler öğreneceğiz ?
Öncelikle merkezi klima sistemi nedir ? Çalışma prensibi nasıl olmaktadır. Klima çeşitleri nelerdir? Bu soruların cevabını bulduktan sonra 2 ve 3 borulu olarak tasarlanan bu sistemin ayrı ayrı irdelenmesini inceleyeceğiz.  Sıfırdan başlayarak önce cihazları, cihazların çalışma prensibini, soğutma yükünün hesaplanmasını, cihazların seçimi, mimari projeye göre çizilmesi, bakır boru ve yapıştırma muflu drenaj çaplandırması, termostat yerleşimi ve kablosunun çekilip MİDEA programına verilerin girilip hidrolik analizlerinin yapılması ve kolon şemasıyla metrajlarının alınmasını öğreneceğiz. Midea programının setup linki son dersin kaynaklar bölümünde yer almaktadır.
Kurs ile ilgili örnek şemalar, örnek projeler kaynaklar bölümünde yer almaktadır. Buradan indirebilirsiniz.  Sorun yaşayanlar mail adresim üzerinden bana ulaşabilir.
Kursa ait tüm çizimler, föyler kaynaklar bölümüne eklenmiştir.
Kursun faydalı olması dileği ile,

courses.title: Homestyler Like a Pro (Part.1)
courses.bio: Mastering Interior Design with Homestyler: A Comprehensive Guide to Creating Stunning 3D Spaces
objectives: Unlock the secrets of Homestyler App and bringing your creative visions of interior design to life
Craft stunning floor plans with precision
Bring spaces to life with style
Create breathtaking visuals and duzzle Audiences in easy steps
learn to create 3d images and walk-through videos experience

Topic 1. Introduction: The Importance of Digital Tools in Interior Design

requirements: Interest in Interior design, No other prior educational experience needed
access to the internet and you need to know how to use and nagivate in internet and basic keyboards and shortcuts options
courses.description:
Unlock your creative potential and dive into the world of interior design with our Homestyler Mastery Course. This comprehensive course is designed to guide you through the process of creating beautiful, realistic 3D interiors using the powerful Homestyler platform. Whether you're a beginner looking to explore design concepts or an experienced designer aiming to refine your skills, this course offers practical lessons, hands-on projects, and expert tips to help you bring your design visions to life. in Part 1 of this course you will learn mainly how to navigate the Homestyler interface and tools with ease , how to design floor plans and arrange furniture to optimize space and much more details.
In part 2 of this course you will learn more 3D Visualization Techniques, develop the ability to generate photorealistic renderings of your designs, allowing you to visualize and share your concepts with clients, team members, or for personal projects.
With a practical, project-based approach, you'll work on real-life design scenarios, allowing you to apply the concepts learned in each module to create impressive, fully-realized spaces. You'll also receive tips and tricks from industry experts to help you save time and avoid common design pitfalls.
By the end of this course, you will be equipped with the skills and confidence to create sophisticated interior designs that can be used in professional portfolios, client presentations, or personal projects. Whether you're pursuing a career in interior design, architecture, or simply passionate about transforming spaces, this course will empower you to bring your design vision to life with Homestyler’s intuitive platform.
Join us and take the first step toward mastering interior design in the digital age!
target_audience: Aspiring Interior Designers, DIY Home Enthusiasts, Architure and Design stydents, Real Estate Proffessionals, Stylists, Creative Professionals, Small business Owners

courses.title: Use Eco-friendly, Sustainable Design to Improve your Life
courses.bio: Save Money and Live Healthier through Eco-Friendly Interior Design
objectives: Learn how to save money in the areas of energy, water, and lighting for your home
Improve your indoor air quality by choosing green finishes and furnishings for your home
Be able to explain the difference between eco-friendly and sustainable interior design
Understand and apply the main principles of green interior design to your own home
Be able to make green selections for all the finishes of your home (e.g., floors, walls, kitchen)
Be able to make green selections for all types of furnishings in your home (e.g., furniture, textiles, accessories)
Learn where to source green finishes and furnishings for your home
Create your own residential eco-friendly interior design plan
For design professionals, learn about green certifications/accreditations available to you

Welcome and Introduction: Introduction and Course Overview: Let's Get Started on Your Eco-Friendly Home
Frequently Asked Questions
3 Easy Ways to Incorporate Green Interior Design into Your Home Today
Eco-friendly, Sustainable Interior Desig: Why Should We Care About Eco-Friendly, Sustainable Design?
Eco-Friendly vs. Sustainable Interior Design – Yes, They are Different
Main Principles of Eco-Friendly, Sustainable Interior Design
Make Easy Green Choices for Your Home: Power/Energy: Affordable Upgrades for Your Home
Power/Energy: Costlier Upgrades for Your Home that Pack a Punch
Make Water-Wise Choices in Your Home
Harness Natural Lighting in Your Home
Maximize your Artificial Lighting in Every Room of Your Home

Furnishing Your Home the Green Way: Green Finishes for Your Kitchen and Bathrooms
Green Vendors you Should Know About
Activity #2 – Create Your Own Eco-Friendly, Sustainable Design Plan
Important topics for the Interior Design: The Importance of Our Role in the Eco-Friendly, Sustainable Design Movement
Conclusion: Final Conclusion: Thank You for Supporting Eco-Friendly, Sustainable Design
Other Easy Ways to Green your Life
Bonus Lecture - Do You Love Interior Design?

requirements: Pen/pencil
Scratch paper
courses.description:
Do you want to save money on your utilities and improve your indoor air quality?
Are you interested in making changes to your home to make it more eco-friendly and sustainable?
Are you a design professional who wants to learn how to incorporate this hot design movement into your own business?

If you answered with a resounding "yes!" to any of these questions, then this will be a great course for you!  Eco-friendly, sustainable design is a rapidly evolving area of interior design with so many choices available today.  For the average consumer, it can be incredibly overwhelming.  My goal with this course, is to break it all down for you so that you can create your own eco-friendly dream home at your own pace.
By the end of this class, you will be able to:
Use 3 Easy Ways to Incorporate Green Interior Design into Your Home Today
Understand why Eco-Friendly, Sustainable Design is More Important than Ever
Explain the Difference Between the Terms, "Eco-Friendly" and "Sustainable"
Articulate the Main Principles of Eco-Friendly, Sustainable Interior Design
Implement Affordable and Higher End Upgrades to improve Your Energy Efficiency
Implement Easy Ways to improve Your Water Efficiency
Maximize your Natural and Artificial Lighting in an Eco-Friendly Way
Improve Your Indoor Air Quality
Understand the Green Finishes and Furnishings Available for Your Home and Where to Source Them
If You're a Professional, You Will Learn About Green Professional Certifications and Green Trade-Only Vendors
In this course, you will have an opportunity to apply the information in a very practical way through two exercises:  By creating a list of current and future upgrades that you can make to your home, and by creating your own eco-friendly, sustainable interior design plan.  I've also included a bonus lecture that will show you other easy ways to "green" your home and your life.
This is a great course for all levels of individuals who are interested in learning more about green interior design, and more importantly, how they can easily incorporate these principles into their own homes.  It’s also an ideal course for design professionals who want to learn how to incorporate green design into their own business.
Please join me as I help you to navigate the rapidly evolving world of eco-friendly, sustainable interior design!
IMPORTANT NOTES:
If you are interested in taking most or all of my courses, I have a recommended order in which to watch them (although it's certainly not required).  I would start with "How to Design a Room in 10 Easy Steps" because most of my other courses are in-depth classes of the concepts touched on in this 10 step class.  Following the 10 Step Course, I suggest moving on to "How to Use Color Like a Pro", followed by "How to Work with Interior Design Styles Like a Pro", then "How to Use Lighting Design to Transform your Home", and finally "Design is in the Details".

My other five courses, "How to Use Minimalist Interior Design to Live your Best Life",  "Use Eco-friendly, Sustainable Design to Improve Your Life", "How to Design Your Dream Kitchen", "How to Design Your Dream Bathroom", and "Everything Small Home Design" are all stand alone classes on specialty topics within interior design, and therefore, can be taken in any order.

Please be aware that this course, or any of my courses, is not intended to provide all of the knowledge needed to become a professional interior designer.  As with any professional field, there is a significant amount of education and/or experience that is needed to achieve competency in this field.  My intention with these courses is to provide some solid foundational knowledge to assist either those individuals interested in "DIY" interior design to work on their own projects more effectively, or to provide supplemental education to both interior design students and professionals.
target_audience: This course is for anyone looking to incorporate eco-friendly, sustainable interior design into their home
This course is also for interior design professionals who want to add eco-friendly design practices into their business

courses.title: Master Architectural Rendering: SketchUp & V-Ray Course
courses.bio: SketchUp & V-Ray Course
objectives: Fundamentals of SketchUp and V-Ray 6: They will get familiar with both programs and learn how to use them effectively from beginner to professional level.
Architectural Rendering Techniques: Students will learn how to create stunning, photorealistic renderings for both interior and exterior spaces.
Lighting Techniques: They will understand how to use different types of lighting, including natural and artificial light, and how lighting affects their renders
Materials and Textures: Students will learn how to create realistic materials, adjust material properties, and understand how textures will appear in their rend
Color Harmony: They will learn how to balance colors effectively and create aesthetically pleasing color palettes for their visualizations.
Post-Processing: Students will be taught how to edit and enhance their renders with post-processing techniques to make them look more professional.
V-Ray 6 Features: They will discover the advanced features of V-Ray 6 and how to use them to achieve high-quality and faster renders.
V-Ray 6 Features: They will discover the advanced features of V-Ray 6 and how to use them to achieve high-quality and faster renders.

Giriş: Let's Get to Know Sketchup Vray Menus
Creating quality Textures by downloading Textures from different sites
General Lighting Logic of a 3D Scene
Making Quality Curtains Easily in Vray
Use of ies light and emmisive light

Artificial Intelligence Driven Change on Scene

requirements: Basic Computer Knowledge: A basic understanding of computer usage and file management is sufficient. Even students with no technical background can easily follow the course.

SketchUp and V-Ray Installation: Before starting the course, you need to have SketchUp and V-Ray 6 installed on your computer. Both software programs are essential for this course, so it's important they are properly installed.
Interest in Relevant Programs: A genuine interest in 3D modeling and rendering software like SketchUp and V-Ray will help you stay motivated and succeed in the course.
Internet Connection: The course is offered online, so a stable internet connection is necessary.

Patience and a Willing Mindset: One of the key factors for success is having an open and patient mindset. 3D visualization can sometimes be time-consuming, but with dedication, you can achieve great results.
courses.description:
In this comprehensive course, you will learn how to create photorealistic interior and architectural renders using SketchUp and V-Ray. Whether you are a beginner or an advanced user, this step-by-step guide will help you achieve highly realistic visualizations.
What You Will Learn:
Introduction to SketchUp & V-Ray  interface and tools
Best rendering techniques for achieving realism
Lighting: General and supportive lighting, DomeLight, IES lights
Materials & Textures: Basic material creation, texture mapping, and external texture usage
Cosmos Library: Quickly creating scenes with ready-made models and elements
Color & Texture Harmony: Best material and color combinations for realistic rendering
Advanced Techniques: AI-powered modifications, post-processing in Photoshop
Final Rendering: Batch rendering and powerful effects for stunning results
Who Is This Course For?
Designers who want to master architectural visualization
Anyone looking to create professional renders with SketchUp and V-Ray
Interior designers and architects aiming for high-quality presentations
Those who want to speed up and optimize their rendering workflow
By the end of this course, you will be creating breathtaking architectural visualizations and taking your rendering skills to a professional level!
Start now and push the boundaries of realism with SketchUp & V-Ray

Getting Started with V-Ray 6: Interface, menus, and essential tools
Achieving Realism in Renders: Understanding visual aesthetics and emotional impact
Lighting Techniques: General lighting, DomeLight, IES lights, and atmospheric effects
Materials & Textures: Creating realistic materials, applying textures, and using external resources
Working with Cosmos Library: Adding high-quality models and assets to your scenes
Advanced Shading & Texturing: Achieving perfect color and texture harmony
AI-Powered Modifications: How to enhance your renders with AI tools
Camera Settings & Composition: Adjusting perspectives for dynamic and cinematic visuals
Rendering Optimization: Reducing render times while maintaining high quality
Final Touches in Photoshop: Post-processing techniques for a professional finish
Batch Rendering & Special Effects: Producing multiple renders efficiently with stunning final touches
target_audience: Beginner Designers: If you're new to architectural rendering and want to learn how to create stunning, photorealistic visualizations, this course will guide you through the basics and beyond.

Intermediate Designers: If you already have some experience with SketchUp or V-Ray and want to enhance your skills, this course will help you take your renderings to the next level with advanced techniques.
Architects and Interior Designers: Professionals who want to improve their rendering skills and create high-quality visual presentations for their projects will find this course highly beneficial.
3D Artists and Visualizers: If you're in the field of 3D modeling or visualizations and want to expand your knowledge with powerful rendering techniques, this course will help you refine your skills.

Anyone Interested in Architectural Visualization: If you have a passion for architecture, design, or 3D modeling and want to learn how to bring your ideas to life with photorealistic renders, this course is perfect for you!

courses.title: Teknik Dasar Menggambar Interior untuk Pemula
courses.bio: Interior drawing
requirements: Kertas Gambar A3
Pensil
Penggaris
courses.description:
Mata kuliah ini memberikan materi dan latihan menggambar interior pada tahapan dasar. Mulai dari menarik garis sampai dengan memberi rendering sederhana menggunakan material pinsil/ pinsil warna/ cat air.


Diawali dari pengenalan akan Desain Element yang terdiri dari : titik, garis, bentuk (shape), form (bidang), tekstur, warna, tone (Cahaya). Dari pelajaran dasar Latihan membuat garis-garis lurus, diagonal sampai dengan mengaplikasikan gelap terang (tone) pada benda. Teori warna dasar juga diberikan, walaupun dalam proses penggambarannya masih menggunakan media kertas dan pinsil grafit hitam (pinsil B). Tahapan dasar menggambar interior ini dapat disebut juga menggambar bentuk. Mahasiswa belajar menggambar dari benda-benda sederhana sampai dengan prinsip dasar menggambar perspektif. Gambar perspektif mahasiswa diperkenalkan dengan Teknik menggambar dengan satu dan dua titik hilang. Gambar perspektif satu titik hilang dapat dipraktikan untuk menggambar ruang baik dalam residential seperti: ruang tidur, ruang keluarga maupun ruang komersial seperti restoran, café, took dan sebagainya.


Video pembelajaran diberikan dalam 10 sesi yang setiap sesinya berdurasi sekitar 10 – 15 menit. Materi-materi yang telah disusun sedemikian rupa agar dapat mudah diikuti, dipelajari dan dipraktikan. Diharapkan dari materi pembelajaran ini, mahasiswa dapat membuat gambar dari teknik dasar sampai tahapan menggambar perspektif. Mahasiswa dapat menerapkan teknik gambar serta rendering dan pencahayaan sehingga menghasilkan gambar presentasi yang informatif dan baik hasilnya.
target_audience: Student yang ingin belajar teknik dasar menggambar interior

courses.title: BLENDER: How to create realistic BedRoom with Cycle & Eevee
courses.bio: In this Blender course I will show you how to create realistic Bed Room from start to finish with cycles and eevee
objectives: how to model full interior scene from start to finsih.
how to add the material correctly and texture all the scene.
how to render the scene and make it realistic.
How to make camera animation to create nice video shot to your scene.
requirements: you need to download Blender 2.8x it's free open source 3D software
courses.description:
Are you one of the people who seek to achieve a realistic Render with Blender?
Did you try to start and suddenly you had many problems while modeling?
Did you think that Blender is not intended for interior or exterior design ??
well, too many people think that and I don't know where they got that concept.


If you have experienced problems like this or were similar to them, let me hold your hand and take you on a journey through the world of this course.
First, let me introduce myself, I am Marwan Hussein, I worked in the 3D field for more than 10 years, and during this time I gained many skills that qualify me to place courses. I can say that they are very useful courses for everyone who wanted to learn new skills.


In this course, we will learn how to prepare the scene and directly we will enter the modeling world, where we will be modeling all the details in the scene, and during our journey in the modeling, we will learn how to deal with fabric and how to simulate it.


We will learn how to make curtains, how to make bedding, and we will learn to use the new brush that was recently added to the Blender in order to create a real, attractive-looking fabric.


After the modeling trip, we will learn how to place the lighting, we will simulate the external and internal lighting and we will take the scene to the important level to which is to apply the materials on the geometry
We will take care of this aspect until we come up with real results that every Blender user seeks.
after that, we will prefer the whole scene to render it with Cycle and we will learn how to achieve realistic render results with that.
when the render is finished we will use Blender compositor to post-process the final result and not just that, we will take these images to Photoshop to post-process them, so if you like to work with Photoshop you got it.


and after that sure, we will switch to Eevee, with Eevee we will have a nice reader result, and yes we will discuss the necessary options that you need to achieve nice render results with this render engine.


The course did not stop there, but after this, we will learn how to make a camera animation so that we make beautiful videos shoot that make your design looks provisional using Eevee renderer.
target_audience: all level

إن التصميم الداخلي ليس جديدا على الحضارة الغربية أو العربية إنما هو قديم قدم الزمان حيث تضرب جذوره إلى الحضارة الرومانية والفرعونية والحضارة الإسلامية أيضا فتلك الكتابات الهيروغليفية التي عرفت بها الحضارة المصرية وتلك الرموز التي رسمت على الجدران الداخلية تعتبر بدايات فن التصميم الداخلي.
مهمة المصمم الداخلي تكمن في حسن توزيع عناصر التصميم الداخلي بطريقة دقيقة من خلال حل مشكلات الفراغ وذلك بالاعتماد على التناسق والابتكار والتجديد من خلال تنسيق الألوان بمختلف درجاتها. واعتماد الإضاءات المناسبة والشكل الأنيق.
target_audience: المهتمين بالتصميم الداخلى
المهتمين بالديكور وتريندات الديكور العالمية
طالبات التصميم الداخلى
كل من تهوى تنسيق المنزل والإهتمام بأناقته وذوقه

courses.title: Elabora un proyecto de interiorismo residencial desde cero.
courses.bio: Además te brindaremos plantillas de propuestas, portafolio y una lista de más de 30 proveedores en Perú.
objectives: Adquirirás la confianza y las habilidades necesarias para elaborar correctamente un proyecto desde cero.
Tendrás el paso a paso de lo que debes hacer para presentar tus proyectos a tus clientes.
Tendrás las plantillas de portafolios de presentación, de presupuesto y de primeras propuestas para tus clientes.
Realizaremos un proyecto desde cero en el que aplicarás todos los temas aprendidos.
Veremos fuentes de inspiración; los estilos de interiorismo, la teoría del color, como hacer una visita técnica, modelado 3D y presupuesto de obra final.

Moodboard y paleta de colores: Tarea Moodboard y paleta de colores

requirements: No necesitas contar con experiencia previa, solo tus ganas de aprender a realizar proyectos de interiorismo.
Necesitarás hoja, papel, tu computadora para que puedas seguir el curso y mucho entusiasmo.
Cuando adquieras el curso podrás acceder a las clases grabadas para siempre (:
Necesitarás tener Sketchup y AutoCAD en tu computadora.
courses.description:
En este curso veremos las distintas fuentes de inspiración para diseñadores como AD España, Elle Decor y otros; veremos los principales estilos de interiorismo y los más usados en los últimos años. Aprenderemos que es un Moodboard y como elaborarlos junto con la teoría del color y paginas que te ayudarán a tener los códigos exactos del color. Haremos una pequeña demostración de una toma de medidas. Veremos el procedimiento que seguimos con la empresa cuando entrevistamos a los clientes. Desarrollaremos un ejercicio practico de un modelado 3D. Te mostraré el modelo de portafolio que utilizamos para presentar nuestro proyectos, al igual que el modelo de presupuesto utilizamos y también te brindaremos plantillas que te ayudarán a diseñar tus propios proyectos y más de 30 proveedores de Perú. Si tienes todo listo para comenzar, empecemos!
Temario:
- Inspiración – Cap 1
1. Inspírate- Fuentes de inspiración para diseñadores
1.1 AD España
1.2 Arquitectura y diseño
1.3 Elle Decor
1.4 Diseño Interior
1.5 Proyecto Contract
1.6 Wallpaper
1.7 Yellowtrace
1.8 Designboom
1.9 Dezeen
1.10 The New York Style Magazine
1.11 Pínterest
1.12 El Mueble


- Estilos de Interiorismo – Cap 2
1. Estilo Nórdico
2. Estilo Clasico
3. Estilo Industrial
4. Estilo Wabi Sabi
5. Estilo Mediterraneo
6. Art Nouveau
7. Estilo Memphis
8. Estilo Etnico
9. Ecleptico
10. Estilo Contemporaneo
11. Boho Chic
12. Estilo Minimalista


- Moodboard – Cap 3
1. ¿Que es?
2. Como crear uno
3. Plantillas para hacerlo
- Paleta de colores – Cap 4
1. Teoría del color
2. Páginas donde te sacan paletas


- Layout/visita técnica del espacio a intervenir – Cap 5
1. Como tomar medidas
2. Desarrollaremos un trabajo practico
3. Dibujo a mano en papel
4. Que medir en el espacio
5. Procedimiento


- Requerimientos del cliente – Cap 6
1. Entrevista con el cliente
2. Preguntas para hacerle
3. Cuadro de necesidades
4. Perfil de usuario
5. Moodboard y paleta de colores


- Primera etapa de diseño/ modelado 3d – Cap 7
1. Comenzamos a diseñar en Sketchup
2. Pasamos el plano a AutoCAD
3. Proceso de diseño básico
4. Renders
5. Elaboracion de ppt para primeras propuestas
6. Modelo de ppt de primera propuesta


- Propuesta final
1. Esquema de que poner en el portafolio final
2. Planos completos
3. Modelo de portafolio


- Presupuesto de obra de implementación
1. Mostrar plantilla de presupuesto
2. Dejar plantilla en excel
3. Mostrar resultado final de obra en fotos
target_audience: Diseñadoras o arquitectas de interiores que deseen aprender a elaborar proyectos de diseño desde cero con Sketchup.
Estudiantes de interiorismo que deseen saber los pasos para presentar sus proyectos a sus futuros clientes.
Personas interesadas en el interiorismo que deseen empezar a aprender.
Interioristas que deseen plantillas de proveedores, presupuestos y de presentación de portafolio final.

courses.title: Autocad ile Mobilya Tasarımı ve Çizimi
courses.bio: Bu dersleri izleyerek mobilya tasarımına başlamadan çizim tekniklerini öğrenebilirsiniz.
objectives: Bu ders ile mobilya ve iç dekorasyon elemanlarının teknik çizimleri sorunsuz yapabilecek hale geleceksiniz.
3-D modellemeleri rahatlıkla yapabileceksiniz.
Görselleştirme ve render yapabileceksiniz
İç mekan tasarımı ve mimari görselleştirmelerde 20 yıllık Autocad deneyimimi sizlerle paylaşmış olacağım.
requirements: Bilgisayarınız ve bilgisayarınızda herhangi bir autocad sürümünün olması yeterli olacaktır.
courses.description: Videolarda anlatmış olduğum tüm çizimleri sizler de tekrar edebilir ve çizim yeteneğinizi geliştirebilirsiniz. Mobilya tasarımı yapabilmek için öncesin o mobilyanın nasıl görsele döküleceğinin bilinmesi gerekmektedir. hayal gücünüzün sınırlarını zorlayarak bir ürün tasarımı yapmak ne kadar önemliyse onu görsel olarak ifade edebilmek te o derece önemlidir. bu nedenle görselleri ifade edebilecek programları bilmek ve çizim yöntemleri öğrenmek gerekmektedir. Bilgisayar destekli mobilya çizimi yapabilmek için 2D autocad ile 3D autocad komutları hakkında bilgi sahibi olmanız gerekmektedir. bu komutları öğrenmek için diğer derslerime göz atabilirsiniz. ayrıca autocadi öğrencikten sonra bu videoları seyrederek modelleme yeteneğinizi de geliştireceksiniz.  3D çizim uygulamalarını benle beraber yaparak modelleme tecrübesi kazanacaksınız. Aynı zamanda autocad programı görselleştirme amacıyla da kullanılmaktadır. Autocad'de cisimlere materyal ekleme, materyal skalası ayarlama, mekan çizimi, mekanın ışıklandırılması (genel ışıklandırma, lokal ışıklandırma ve güneş ışığı ayarları), ölçeklendirme, çıktı alma, autocad dosyasını farklı dosyalara dönüştürme ile görselleştirme eğitimini de almış olacaksınız. Daha öncesinde her alanda çalışan öğrencilerin ve kursiyerlerin eğitimine katkı sağlamış bir eğitici olarak, hem mühendislik, hem mimarlık hem de teknik alanlardaki tüm bireylerin katılabileceği geliştirici bir eğitim videosu olduğunu düşünmekteyim. Hangi alanda çalışırsanız çalışın, hangi autocad sürümünü kullanırsanız kullanın bu eğitimler ile 2D ve 3D autocad'i öğreneceksiniz. Yirmi yılımı autocad öğrenmeye ve öğretmeye çalışmış biri olarak hayal ettiğiniz her şeyi çizebileceğiniz konuma geleceksiniz.
target_audience: Bu kurs, mimarlık, iç mimarlık, mobilya, dekorasyon ve daha bir çok alanda tasarım yapmak isteyen herkes içindir.

courses.title: 3Ds Max Interior Design Course | ინტერიერის დიზაინი ქართულად
courses.bio: ისწავლე 3Ds Max და შექმენი ინტერიერის დიზაინი პროფესიონალურად - ნულიდან რეალურ პროექტებამდე
objectives: 3D Max-ისა და Corona Renderer-ის გამოყენებით ინტერიერის დიზაინის მოდელირების საფუძვლები
დასრულებული ინტერიერის დიზაინის კონცეფციის შექმნა და მისი ფოტორეალისტური რენდერინგი
სივრცის ზონირება, განათება და ფერთა სქემის შერჩევა პრაქტიკულ მაგალითებზე
სრული დიზაინ პროექტის დამოუკიდებლად დაგეგმვა, შესრულება და ვიზუალიზაცია

Introduction: ობიექტების დაჯგუფება, Mirror-ინგი, სტანდარტული მაგიდისა და სკამების აგება
მარტივი მოდიფიკაციები, შედარებით განსხვავებული ობიექტების შექმნა
გარე განათებები, VRay მატერიალის Corona მატერიალად გადაქცევა
სარენდერო ფანჯრის, კამერისა და კორონას პარამეტრების დაყენება

requirements: კურსის დასაწყებად არ გჭირდებათ წინასწარი გამოცდილება დიზაინში ან 3D პროგრამებში — ყველაფერს ეტაპობრივად ისწავლით. მნიშვნელოვანია, რომ გქონდეთ კომპიუტერი საკმარისი მონაცემებით (სასურველია მინიმუმ 8GB RAM და ვიდეოკარტა), ასევე კურსის დაწყებამდე უნდა დააყენოთ პროგრამები: 3D Max და Corona Renderer.
courses.description:
ეს კურსი განკუთვნილია მათთვის, ვისაც სურს პროფესიონალურად დაეუფლოს ინტერიერის დიზაინს და ისწავლოს 3Ds Max-ის გამოყენება დიზაინის პროცესში. კურსი აგებულია ეტაპობრივად – ნულიდან რეალურ პროექტებამდე, რაც საშუალებას გაძლევთ შეისწავლოთ არა მხოლოდ მოდელირება, არამედ მასალების შექმნა, განათების დაყენება და ვიზუალიზაცია.
მთელი კურსი შექმნილია ქართულ ენაზე და გთავაზობთ მარტივად ახსნილ ვიდეოგაკვეთილებს, რეალური პრაქტიკული მაგალითებითა და სავარჯიშოებით. აქ ისწავლით თუ როგორ დაგეგმოთ სივრცე, როგორ იმუშაოთ სამგანზომილებიან მოდელებთან და როგორ შექმნათ დეტალური და პროფესიონალური ინტერიერის დიზაინის სცენა.
განსაკუთრებული ყურადღება ეთმობა განათების სწორად დაყენებას და ფოტორეალისტური გამოსახულებების მიღებას. კურსის განმავლობაში ასევე გაეცნობით Corona Renderer (Chaos Corona)-ის გამოყენებას 3Ds Max-ში — ისწავლით როგორ იმუშაოთ განათებასთან, მასალებთან და კამერასთან Corona-ს საშუალებით, რომ მიიღოთ მაღალი ხარისხის რენდერები.
კურსი იდეალურია როგორც დამწყებთათვის, ასევე იმ დიზაინერებისთვის, ვისაც სურს შეიმუშაოს საკუთარი ინტერიერის პროექტები და მოამზადოს პრეზენტაციები კლიენტებისთვის. კურსის დასრულების შემდეგ თქვენ შეძლებთ დამოუკიდებლად შექმნათ ინტერიერის დიზაინის სრულფასოვანი პროექტები და დაარენდეროთ პროფესიული ხარისხით.
ამ კურსის განსაკუთრებულობას წარმოადგენს მისი პრაქტიკულობა — ყოველი სექცია დაფუძნებულია რეალურ დიზაინ ამოცანებზე, რაც გეხმარებათ, გაიღრმავოთ არამხოლოდ ტექნიკური უნარები, არამედ გქონდეთ წარმოდგენა რეალურ სამუშაო პროცესზე. კურსი დაგეხმარებათ სწორი გეგმარების, მასალების შეჯერების, სტილის არჩევის და სივრცის ვიზუალურად სწორად გადმოცემის უნარების განვითარებაში.
გარდა ამისა, გაჩვენებთ თუ როგორ მოამზადოთ თქვენი ნამუშევრების პორტფოლიო, რაც განსაკუთრებით მნიშვნელოვანია მათთვის, ვინც გეგმავს დასაქმებას ან კლიენტებთან თანამშრომლობას. ჩვენ ერთად გავივლით მთელ პროცესს – იდეის დასაწყისიდან საბოლოო პრეზენტაციამდე.
კურსის მსვლელობისას მიიღებთ სასარგებლო რჩევებს დიზაინის პრაქტიკიდან და შეისწავლით მნიშვნელოვან დეტალებს, რომლებიც ხარისხიან რენდერებსა და რეალისტურ სივრცეებს ქმნის. ბოლოს კი თქვენ გექნებათ კონკრეტული დასრულებული პროექტი, რომელიც შეგიძლიათ დაამატოთ თქვენს პორტფოლიოში.
target_audience: კურსი განკუთვნილია მათთვის, ვინც დაინტერესებულია ინტერიერის დიზაინით და სურს დაეუფლოს პროფესიულ ინსტრუმენტებს, როგორიცაა 3D Max და Corona Renderer. ეს არის იდეალური არჩევანი დამწყები დიზაინერებისთვის, სტუდენტებისთვის და იმ ადამიანებისთვის, ვისაც სურს დამოუკიდებლად შექმნას სივრცის პროფესიონალური ვიზუალიზაცია.

courses.title: Creando el Rincón de Estudio Perfecto para tus Hijos
courses.bio: "Crea el espacio de estudio ideal para potenciar el aprendizaje, la creatividad y el éxito académico de tus hijos."
objectives: Cómo diseñar un espacio de estudio que promueva la concentración, el orden y la creatividad.
Los principios clave del diseño ergonómico adaptado a niños y adolescentes.
Estrategias para organizar materiales escolares y gestionar el tiempo de estudio.
Técnicas para incorporar colores, iluminación y decoración que fomenten la motivación y reduzcan el estrés.
Consejos prácticos para adaptar el espacio según las diferentes etapas de crecimiento y necesidades individuales.
Ideas para crear un equilibrio entre estudio y recreación en el hogar.

Explorando el Espacio de Estudio Ideal p: Lección 2. Adaptación de los Principios del Feng Shui
MÓDULO 2 Aplicando Principios de Feng Sh: Lección 1. Selección de Colores y Elementos Decorativos
Lección 3. Integración de Elementos Personales y Zonas de Descanso
ANEXOS: 2. Accesorios de Almacenaje para la Zona de Estudio
3. Accesorios para el Escritorio en la Zona de Estudio

requirements: No se necesitan conocimientos previos en diseño o pedagogía.
Acceso a un lugar en el hogar que puedas ajustar para convertir en el rincón de estudio ideal.
Motivación para mejorar el entorno de aprendizaje de tus hijos.
courses.description:
¿Sabías que el entorno en el que tus hijos estudian puede impactar directamente su rendimiento académico y su bienestar emocional? Este curso te guiará paso a paso para diseñar un rincón de estudio perfecto, adaptado a las necesidades de tus pequeños y alineado con las mejores prácticas de ergonomía, organización y diseño.
Aprenderás a transformar cualquier espacio en un lugar inspirador, cómodo y funcional, donde tus hijos puedan concentrarse, aprender con entusiasmo y alcanzar su máximo potencial. Tanto si tienes un área amplia como un espacio reducido, este curso te dará las herramientas y estrategias necesarias para crear un rincón de estudio único y efectivo.
Con consejos prácticos, ejemplos visuales y actividades personalizables, estarás listo para marcar una diferencia positiva en el día a día de tus hijos.
¡Inscríbete ahora y comienza a construir el futuro que ellos merecen desde la comodidad de tu hogar!


Contenido:
Módulo uno: Explorando el Espacio de Estudio Ideal para tus Hijos
Descubre cómo crear el rincón de estudio perfecto en el dormitorio de tus hijos con nuestro módulo inicial:
Lección 1: Identificación del Espacio Propicio en el Dormitorio: Realiza una observación detallada del entorno, evalúa la iluminación natural y artificial, y encuentra estratégicamente la ubicación perfecta para el rincón de estudio.
Lección 2: Adaptación de los Principios del Feng Shui: Sumérgete en los principios del Feng Shui para asegurar un flujo de energía positiva. Aprende a ubicar el escritorio, elegir colores que equilibren y seleccionar muebles y accesorios para armonizar el entorno.
Crea un espacio de estudio inspirador y equilibrado para tus hijos.


Módulo dos: Aplicando Principios de Feng Shui para tus Hijos
En este módulo, nos sumergimos en la magia del Feng Shui, adaptando sus principios a los espacios de estudio infantiles. Descubre cómo crear un ambiente que potencie el bienestar y la concentración de tus hijos a través de tres lecciones clave:
Lección 1: Selección de Colores y Elementos Decorativos: Sumérgete en la psicología de los colores y aprende a seleccionar aquellos que estimulen la concentración y el bienestar. Además, descubre cómo integrar elementos decorativos que reflejen la personalidad única de tu hijo, creando un espacio que inspire y motive.
Lección 2: Incorporación de Elementos Motivadores: Crea un rincón de estudio que inspire con citas motivadoras y proyectos DIY personalizados. Estos no solo fortalecerán el vínculo emocional con el estudio, sino que también convertirán el espacio en una fuente constante de motivación para tus hijos.
Lección 3: Integración de Elementos Personales y Zonas de Descanso: Aprende a incluir objetos personales con significado especial, agregando un toque personal al espacio de estudio. Además, descubre la importancia de crear zonas de descanso y relajación, logrando un equilibrio completo que favorezca el aprendizaje y el bienestar.


Anexos
Anexo1. Mobiliario para Zona de Estudio
Descubre el mobiliario ideal para crear un espacio de estudio cómodo y funcional para tus hijos. Desde una mesa evolutiva hasta una silla ergonómica, este conjunto está diseñado para acompañar cada etapa del aprendizaje.
¡Haz del estudio una experiencia placentera con el mobiliario adecuado!
Anexo 2. Accesorios de Almacenaje para la Zona de Estudio
Descubre cómo transformar el caos en orden en el rincón de estudio de tus hijos. Desde estanterías modulares hasta carritos rodantes, estos accesorios no solo organizan sino también añaden estilo al espacio.
¡Haz del estudio un lugar funcional y atractivo!
Anexo 3. Accesorios para el Escritorio en la Zona de Estudio
Añade un toque de creatividad y funcionalidad al escritorio de tus hijos con accesorios encantadores.
Transforma el espacio de estudio de tus hijos con accesorios llenos de estilo y funcionalidad. Desde portalápices creativos hasta lámparas LED, estos detalles hacen del estudio una experiencia única y organizada.
¡Crea un entorno inspirador para el aprendizaje!
target_audience: Padres que desean optimizar el espacio de estudio de sus hijos.
Educadores que buscan ideas innovadoras para apoyar el aprendizaje desde casa.
Personas que quieren entender cómo el ambiente físico impacta el rendimiento académico y la salud emocional de los niños.
A cualquier persona que quiere crear una zona de estudio en su hogar

Tener una mente abierta, ser creativo, apasionado del diseño y entusiasta del buen estilo, serán tus mejores herramientas para triunfar en este apasionante sector.
El más importante requisito para realizar este curso es el entusiasmo y la motivación por aprender nuevas habilidades que aumenten tus competencias profesionales.
courses.description:
Experto en Diseño de Espacios Deportivos y Gimnasios
Conviértete en un Profesional en la Creación de Proyectos destinados a la practica de Actividad Físicas y el Deporte.
Instructores: Arq. Álvaro García y Arq. Lucía Fernández  Actualizado: Octubre del 2025 Estudiantes: +5.400 Requisitos previos: Ninguno


Descripción del Curso:
Desde el inicio del proyecto se debe tener en cuenta que nuestra apuesta debe convertir el gimnasio en un lugar de desconexión para el usuario de sus rutinas y responsabilidades. El diseño del gimnasio, debe orientarse a conseguir un espacio de ocio, relax y motivación para el abonado.
Frente a este escenario, el diseño del gimnasio se debe reinventar de modo que nuestros potenciales y actuales clientes perciban nuestra propuesta como única y con valor añadido. Del mismo modo, que los profesores y sus clases, su arquitectura debe ser exclusiva y diferente para que tanto la primera visita como el día a día sean experiencias memorables. Este curso se centra en cómo diseñar espacios de fitness que sean funcionales, motivadores y que maximicen el uso del espacio.
El gimnasio debe ser percibido por el usuario no solo como un espacio para hacer actividades físicas sino, como un lugar en el que sus miembros encuentran el equilibrio entre cuero y mente, puedan establecer relaciones sociales, encontrar una vía de relajación y conseguir divertirse así como marcarse metas deportivas.
En general, los clientes potenciales tienen que sentirse emocionados de algún modo para concretar una compra, este mismo motivo que sirve para la comercialización en general también es aplicable en los gimnasios. Debemos entender quién es nuestro público objetivo, cuál es su edad, su nivel socioeconómico y cultural así como sus expectativas respecto al servicio que va a contratar.


Itinerario Formativo:
Introducción a Udemy y al Curso de Diseño de Espacios Deportivos y Gimnasios.
La Iluminación en los Espacios Deportivos y Gimnasios.
El Color en Diseño de Espacios Deportivos y Gimnasios.
Los Materiales en Espacios Deportivos y Gimnasios
Representación Gráfica Arquitectónica de los Materiales en los Proyectos.
Principales Conceptos sobre Dibujo Técnico Arquitectónico en Diseño de Espacios
Feng Shui en Espacios Deportivos y Gimnasios.
Dibujo 2D Asistido por Ordenador con AutoCAD para Diseño de Espacios Deportivos y Gimnasios
Diseño 3D de Espacios Deportivos y Gimnasios.
Renderizado de Imágenes Fotorrealistas de nuestros Diseños con VRay
Edición Fotográfica de Nuestros Proyectos y Diseños en Adobe PhotoShop
Medición y Presupuesto de la Ejecución Material del Proyecto.
Consideraciones en Seguridad y Salud en las Obras de Espacios Deportivos y Gimnasios.
Diseño de Espacios Deportivos y Gimnasios Accesibles.
Recursos para el Alumno del Curso "Diseño de Espacios Deportivos y Gimnasios
Emisión del Certificado de Finalización del Curso "Diseño de Espacios Deportivos y Gimnasios"


Metodología de Aprendizaje:
Recuerda que este curso incluye lecciones en vídeo fullHD con audio de estudio (compatible con TV, PC, Mac, tablet y smartphone), artículos didácticos, actividades, animaciones, ilustraciones, proyectos paso a paso, recursos descargables, links de interés, acceso de por vida, certificado de finalización, tutorización online, y una exclusiva comunidad de aprendizaje privada que nos ayudamos aportando nuestras experiencias en el foro de comunicación del curso.
La modalidad de este curso te permite que empieces y acabes cuando tú quieras, marcando el ritmo de la clase según tu disponibilidad. Puedes volver a visualizar lo que te interese, saltar el contenido que ya domines, hacer preguntas, resolver dudas, compartir tus proyectos... Puedes elegir ver todas las lecciones de forma secuencial (lineal) y aprovecharlas al máximo la formación, pero también puedes decidir ver este curso como una guía de referencia.
Las clases están claramente organizadas en secciones y lecciones, puedes decidir visualizar solo las clases que te resulten más importantes según tus necesidades formativas. La mayoría de las lecciones son independientes para que puedas comprender los conceptos de cada lección sin tener que ver las lecciones anteriores del curso.
Para seguir el programa formativo propuesto no ser requieren conocimientos previos, ya que la formación se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0. El curso está orientado a aquellos creativos que quieran ampliar sus skills (habilidades) y conocer múltiples trucos, consejos, recursos y recomendaciones, de la mano de los instructores Álvaro García y Lucía Fernández. Además la formación disponen de acceso automático al contenido, sin limitación de tiempo, disponibilidad 24/7 (24 horas al día los 7 días de la semana), sin caducidad y con garantía de devolución.
Con esta formación disfrutarás aprendiendo desde dónde quieras, sin tener que desplazarte, sin horarios, con quién quieras, según tus necesidades y disponibilidad. Aprenderás con un instructor avalado por miles da alumnos satisfechos en todo el mundo (comentarios certificados). Conocerás las técnicas, métodos, trucos y flujos de trabajo de este sector creativo. El docente te transmitirá su sabiduría y conocimientos con pasión a la vez que las explicaciones concisas, claras, sencillas y con un enfoque profesional en cada clase. Podrás conseguir un  certificado homologado personalizado y firmado por tu instructor en cada formación. De está forma podrás compartir tu título en tu portafolio, currículo, en redes sociales...
Con la alta definición de los vídeos (vídeo fullHD y audio de estudio) conseguirá no te perder detalle. Podrás ver las clases las veces que requieras para recordar y perfeccionar tus habilidades como diseñador. Tendrás la posibilidad de preguntar, pedir opinión y ayuda al instructor, además de compartir tu experiencia de aprendizaje con los demás alumnos del curso, tan apasionados como tú, repartidos por todo el mundo. Seleccionamos cuidadosamente los contenidos y producimos cada curso para garantizar una experiencia de aprendizaje online integral y de la máxima calidad.


¿A qué esperas?, este curso es ideal para ti, atrévete a convertirte en un experto y expresa tus ideas de la forma que siempre has deseado. Adelante, nos vemos dentro de la formación ;)
target_audience: Dirigido a profesionales del diseño como: Arquitectos, Arquitectos técnicos, Aparejadores, Infografistas, Delineantes, Ingenieros de Edificación, Licenciados en Bellas Artes, Diseñadores Industriales, Expertos en Mobiliario y Decoración, Interioristas, Graduados Superiores en Diseño...
Si trabajas en el sector de la construcción y reforma y deseas ofrecer soluciones de diseño a tus clientes.
Emprendedor que desee fundar un estudio de interiorismo, o incorporar a su empresa un departamento de diseño de interiores.

Dirigido a toda clase de personas que quieran aprender todo lo necesario para incorporarse al sector del interiorismo y la ambientación especializada en espacios arquitectónicos, en poco tiempo, pero sin dejarse nada.
Principalmente aquellos que quieran aumentar sus posibilidades de empleabilidad, contratación y/o promocionar dentro de su sector.

courses.title: Home Interior Design for More Joy
courses.bio: Cultivating Happiness through Decor
objectives: Define and identify the attributes of joy and how specific design elements in interior spaces can evoke these feelings.
Analyze and apply the principles of abundance, surprise, play, creativity, connection, and nostalgia in interior design to create joyous environments.
Curate and integrate design elements in their homes that promote feelings of happiness, unity, and meaningful connections.
Design spaces that foster creativity and play, understanding their profound impact on enhancing joy in everyday life.
requirements: For beginners: Don't worry! A passion for enhancing the joy and happiness in living spaces is the primary requirement. All concepts will be explained in detail, ensuring everyone can follow along.
courses.description:
In this class, you will discover the power of interior design in evoking a sense of joy. We will explore a myriad of examples from the world of interior design and delve into their profound impact on our happiness and joyous emotions.
During our journey, we will begin by examining the essence of joy and its typical manifestations. Next, we will explore several environments known for their ability to elicit joy. By analysing the five critical elements in these environments, we will uncover their direct influence on our joyous experiences.
Lastly, five class lessons will be dedicated to a specific environment. Within these lessons, we will explore how different aspects of home interior design can replicate those environments and create an atmosphere brimming with joy.
Below, you will find a detailed description of each of the six lessons:
1. Joy: Understand joy, its common instances, and five key attributes in joy-invoking surroundings.
2. Abundance: Get familiar with the idea of abundance aesthetics and explore the use of interior design to promote a feeling of abundance in our homes.
3. Surprise: Learn how interior design can trigger surprise, kindling a feeling of happiness. Learn how to include elements that pleasantly surprise us.
4. Play: Let your inner child free by looking at how elements from our childhood and the "cute aesthetic" can make our spaces more playful. Learn how these aspects can foster happiness.
5. Creativity: Participate in the playful act of creativity and see its unique power to generate joy. Understand why it's essential to reserve a place for creativity in our homes and ways to nurture creativity in our everyday lives.
6. Connection: Appreciate the crucial part social connections have in our search for joy and well-being. Understand how space design promoting meaningful connections with others can enhance our happiness. Learn the value of creating spaces that encourage unity and good relationships.
7. Nostalgia (extra lesson) - Understand the relationship between reminiscence therapy and our decor. Learn about the three ways you can curate your decor to generate nostalgic and joyful feelings about the past.
target_audience: Anyone passionate about creating an environment at home that fosters creativity, playfulness, nostalgia, and meaningful connections.
Individuals keen on understanding the psychological impacts of interior design and want to leverage it for personal well-being.
Aspiring interior designers who wish to deepen their understanding of how design can influence emotions and well-being.
Homeowners or renters looking to infuse their living spaces with elements that heighten joy and happiness.

Unlock the future of interior design with the power of AI and ChatGPT. This complete AI Powered interior design course is your step-by-step guide to mastering interior designing using intelligent tools to plan, visualize, and deliver real interior design projects with speed and precision.
Whether you're a beginner exploring interior designing or a creative professional looking to enhance your workflow, this course teaches you how to generate design ideas, plan room layouts, write project briefs, and present full design solutions — all with the help of AI.
You'll learn how to use tools like ChatGPT to brainstorm room styles, write client-ready visuals, plans, themes, designs, and automate parts of your creative process. From choosing color schemes to space planning and branding a room's aesthetic, this course blends design fundamentals with cutting-edge technology.

requirements: Para la realización de este curso no ser requieren grandes conocimientos previos, ya que la formación se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0.

El más importante requisito para realizar este curso es el entusiasmo y la motivación por aprender nuevas habilidades que aumenten tus competencias profesionales.
courses.description:
Estilo Escandinavo en Diseño de Interiores
Domina el Minimalismo, Funcionalidad, y Luz Natural para Transformar Espacios con Estilo Escandinavo.
Instructor: Arquitecto Álvaro García  Actualizado: Octubre del 2025  Requisitos previos: Ninguno


Descripción del Curso:
Si te apasiona el diseño de interiores y deseas llevar tus habilidades al siguiente nivel, este curso es perfecto para ti. Imagina poder transformar espacios combinando simplicidad, calidez y elegancia, creando ambientes que reflejen el distintivo estilo escandinavo. Bajo la guía del Arquitecto Álvaro García, un profesional con más de 150,000 estudiantes formados, aprenderás paso a paso los secretos y técnicas que han hecho de este estilo uno de los más apreciados en el mundo del diseño.
No necesitas experiencia previa para sumergirte en este fascinante universo. Este curso está diseñado tanto para principiantes como para profesionales que buscan profundizar en el estilo escandinavo. Con material actualizado , te asegurarás de aprender las últimas tendencias y prácticas más innovadoras en el campo.
A lo largo de la formación, comprenderás los fundamentos clave que definen el estilo escandinavo, aprendiendo a implementar el minimalismo, la funcionalidad y la luz natural en tus proyectos. Dominarás el diseño de espacios más elaborados y personalizados, manejando herramientas profesionales como AutoCAD para dibujo 2D, diseño 3D y renderizado de imágenes fotorrealistas. Además, mejorarás la presentación de tus proyectos con técnicas de edición fotográfica profesional, lo que te permitirá destacar en un mercado cada vez más competitivo.
Una de las grandes ventajas de este curso es su flexibilidad. Tendrás acceso al contenido de por vida, sin horarios fijos y desde cualquier dispositivo, ya sea tu televisión, computadora, tableta o smartphone. Podrás avanzar a tu propio ritmo, eligiendo las secciones que más te interesen y revisando las lecciones siempre que lo desees. Si tienes dudas o necesitas orientación, contarás con soporte personalizado del instructor y podrás participar en una exclusiva comunidad privada de aprendizaje, donde compartirás experiencias y proyectos con otros apasionados del diseño.
El curso también te ofrece recursos exclusivos, como materiales descargables, actividades prácticas y enlaces de interés que complementarán tu formación. Al finalizar, recibirás un certificado que avala tus nuevas competencias en diseño de interiores, potenciando tu perfil profesional y abriendo nuevas oportunidades en el mercado laboral.
Esta formación está dirigida a profesionales del diseño y la arquitectura que deseen ampliar sus habilidades, estudiantes y entusiastas del diseño de interiores interesados en el estilo escandinavo, y emprendedores que buscan aplicar principios de diseño funcional y estético en sus negocios. No importa cuál sea tu objetivo, este curso te proporcionará las herramientas y conocimientos necesarios para destacar y transformar tus ideas en espacios que inspiran.
No pierdas la oportunidad de aprender con uno de los instructores más reconocidos en el sector. Conviértete en un experto en Estilo Escandinavo en Diseño de Interiores y lleva tus proyectos al siguiente nivel. Atrévete a dar el siguiente paso en tu carrera y crea espacios que marquen la diferencia. Te esperamos dentro del curso para comenzar juntos este apasionante viaje al corazón del diseño escandinavo. ¡Inscríbete ahora y comienza a transformar tus ideas en realidad!


Itinerario Formativo:
Introducción a la plataforma de formación Udemy
Introducción y Fundamentos: Estilo Escandinavo en Diseño de Interiores
Aplicación y Técnicas
Dominio y Proyectos Complejos Estilo Escandinavo

Dibujo 2D Asistido por Ordenador con AutoCAD
Diseño 3D

Consultas, Dudas y Sugerencias de los Alumnos de la Formación
Emisión del Certificado de Finalización del Curso Estilo Escandinavo en Diseño de Interiores


Metodología de Aprendizaje:
Recuerda que este curso incluye lecciones en vídeo fullHD con audio de estudio (compatible con TV, PC, Mac, tablet y smartphone), artículos didácticos, actividades, animaciones, ilustraciones, proyectos paso a paso, recursos descargables, links de interés, acceso de por vida, certificado de finalización, tutorización online, y una exclusiva comunidad de aprendizaje privada que nos ayudamos aportando nuestras experiencias en el foro de comunicación del curso.
La modalidad de este curso te permite que empieces y acabes cuando tú quieras, marcando el ritmo de la clase según tu disponibilidad. Puedes volver a visualizar lo que te interese, saltar el contenido que ya domines, hacer preguntas, resolver dudas, compartir tus proyectos... Puedes elegir ver todas las lecciones de forma secuencial (lineal) y aprovecharlas al máximo la formación, pero también puedes decidir ver este curso como una guía de referencia.
Las clases están claramente organizadas en secciones y lecciones, puedes decidir visualizar solo las clases que te resulten más importantes según tus necesidades formativas. La mayoría de las lecciones son independientes para que puedas comprender los conceptos de cada lección sin tener que ver las lecciones anteriores del curso.
Para seguir el programa formativo propuesto no ser requieren conocimientos previos, ya que la formación se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0. El curso está orientado a aquellos profesionales que quieran ampliar sus skills (habilidades) y conocer múltiples trucos, consejos, recursos y recomendaciones, de la mano del instructor best seller Álvaro García, con más de 150.000 estudiantes formados. Además la formación disponen de acceso automático al contenido, sin limitación de tiempo, disponibilidad 24/7 (24 horas al día los 7 días de la semana), sin caducidad y con garantía de devolución.
Con la alta definición de los vídeos (vídeo fullHD y audio de estudio) conseguirá no te perder detalle. Podrás ver las clases las veces que requieras para recordar y perfeccionar tus habilidades como diseñador. Tendrás la posibilidad de preguntar, pedir opinión y ayuda al instructor, además de compartir tu experiencia de aprendizaje con los demás alumnos del curso, tan apasionados como tú, repartidos por todo el mundo. Seleccionamos cuidadosamente los contenidos y producimos cada curso para garantizar una experiencia de aprendizaje online integral y de la máxima calidad.


¿A qué esperas?, este curso es ideal para ti, atrévete a convertirte en un experto y expresa tus ideas de la forma que siempre has deseado. Adelante, nos vemos dentro de la formación ;)

Sobre todo aquellas personas que busquen crecer profesionalmente, aumentar sus habilidades y formar parte de nuestra comunidad educativa.

courses.title: The Interior Design Complete Course
courses.bio: Master the Art and Science of Interior Design to Transform Any Environment into a Work of Art
objectives: Fundamental Knowledge: Grasp core interior design principles, history, and various design roles in the industry.
Design Thinking Skills: Master the design thinking process to empathize, define, ideate, prototype, and test design concepts.
Space Planning Expertise: Create functional spaces by analyzing user needs and traffic flow using ergonomic principles.
Color Theory Application: Apply color theory to develop harmonious color schemes that enhance mood and aesthetics.
Technical Proficiency: Gain drafting and rendering skills using AutoCAD and SketchUp for professional design presentations.
Understanding Materials: Learn about building materials and finishes, assessing their properties and sustainability.
Lighting Design: Design effective lighting solutions that enhance ambiance while promoting energy efficiency.
Commercial Awareness: Understand client communication, branding, and project management in commercial design contexts.
Sustainable Practices: Explore eco-friendly design principles and materials for creating environmentally responsible interiors.
Portfolio Development: Build a compelling portfolio showcasing your projects and skills to enhance career opportunities.

Project Creating a Functional home: Module Creating an Home Office Part 1
Module Creating an Home Office Part 2
Module Creating an Home Office Part 3
Module Creating an Home Office Part 4
Module Creating an Home Office Part 5
Module Creating an Home Office Part 6
Module Creating an Home Office Part 7

requirements: Not Prerequisites
courses.description:
Welcome to Interior Design Complete Course, where the convergence of innovation and aesthetics leads to transformative spaces that inspire and elevate the human experience.
In this course, we invite you to explore the essence of interior design through a lens of creativity and functionality. Just as Apple revolutionized technology by prioritizing user experience, we will emphasize the importance of understanding the needs and emotions of those who inhabit the spaces you create. You will learn to design environments that not only fulfill practical requirements but also evoke joy, comfort, and inspiration.
Key Features of the Course:
Foundational Principles: Begin your journey with a deep dive into the fundamentals of interior design. Understand the critical elements that shape our perceptions of space, from color theory to spatial dynamics. You will explore how history, technology, and culture have influenced design practices, giving you a comprehensive understanding of the discipline.
Design Thinking: Embrace a design-thinking mindset that encourages empathy and creativity. You will learn to identify and define the core problems faced by users, brainstorming innovative solutions that enhance the functionality and beauty of spaces. Each module will challenge you to prototype and test your ideas, ensuring that every design decision is grounded in user experience.
Technical Mastery: Master the tools of the trade, from traditional sketching techniques to advanced software like AutoCAD and SketchUp. Gain proficiency in drafting, rendering, and creating construction documents that bring your visions to life. Our hands-on projects will give you the confidence to navigate complex design challenges with ease.
Sustainable Practices: In an era where sustainability is paramount, we will explore eco-friendly materials and energy-efficient design strategies. You will learn to create spaces that not only look beautiful but also contribute positively to the environment, promoting well-being and harmony.
Real-World Applications: Engage in a series of projects that simulate real-world scenarios, from residential design to commercial spaces. Each project will allow you to apply your knowledge and skills, fostering a portfolio that showcases your unique design philosophy.
Collaboration and Feedback: The best ideas often emerge from collaboration. Throughout the course, you will participate in discussions, peer reviews, and workshops that encourage constructive feedback and collective growth. This community-driven approach mirrors the collaborative spirit of the design industry.
Conclusion:
By the end of this course, you will not only have a solid foundation in interior design principles but also the confidence to innovate and create spaces that resonate with those who experience them. Whether you aspire to design residential homes, commercial spaces, or any environment that shapes human interaction, Interior Design Complete Course will equip you with the tools and mindset to make a lasting impact.
Join us as we reimagine interior design and create spaces that inspire, engage, and transform lives.
Together, let’s design the future, one space at a time.
target_audience: Interior Designers: Professionals who create functional and aesthetically pleasing spaces.
Architects: Individuals involved in designing buildings who wish to understand interior elements better.
Landscape Architects: Designers focused on outdoor spaces looking to integrate interior design principles.
Furniture Designers: Creators of furniture pieces who want to understand how their designs fit within spaces.
Event Planners: Professionals organizing events and seeking to create engaging environments.
Retail Designers: Professionals who design commercial spaces and need insights into customer experience and spatial design.
Interior Decorators: Specialists who focus on the aesthetics of spaces and want to expand their skills to include design fundamentals.

requirements: Non è richiesta nessuna capacità specifica, questo corso è stato creato e pensato per arrivare in modo semplice e pratico ad avere strumenti atti a renderti indipendente e consapevole nella scelta di un colore piuttosto che un altro.
courses.description:
Benvenuta/o nella pagina del video corso "Come abbinare il colore sulle pareti di casa”
Se sei qui, è perché stai cercando il modo migliore per scegliere i colori che renderanno la tua casa unica e speciale.

Scegliere i colori per la tua nuova casa - ma perché no, anche per il tuo ufficio o attività commerciale - può sembrare un compito semplice, ma in realtà richiede una certa conoscenza e competenza.


Che tu stia "mettendo su casa" o che tu stia cercando di ridare vita alla tua "vecchia casa" o semplicemente desideri dare un tocco di freschezza ai tuoi ambienti...
ebbene... scegliere i colori giusti può fare la differenza!!

Ecco perché ho creato questo video corso, proprio per aiutarti a fare le scelte giuste in modo pratico e consapevole.

Con il corso "Come abbinare il colore sulle pareti di casa!” imparerai a:


Comprendere il significato dei colori e come influenzano il tuo umore e le tue emozioni.
Scegliere il colore giusto per ogni stanza, in modo da creare un'atmosfera accogliente e armoniosa.
Utilizzare tecniche di combinazione dei colori per creare abbinamenti vincenti e sorprendenti.
Evitare gli errori comuni che spesso commettiamo quando scegliamo i colori per la nostra casa.

Ecco alcuni dei vantaggi di questo corso:

è accessibile da qualsiasi dispositivo e puoi accedere ai contenuti quando e dove vuoi.
è disponibile in formato video, con spiegazioni ed immagini chiare e dettagliate.
è progettato per essere facile da seguire, anche per chi non ha esperienza nel campo dell' Interior design.
ti aiuterà a risparmiare tempo e denaro, evitando errori costosi nella scelta dei colori per la tua casa.

Il corso "Come abbinare il colore sulle pareti di casa” è un investimento per il tuo benessere e per la tua felicità.

Scegliere i colori giusti per la tua casa può migliorare la qualità della tua vita, creando un ambiente rilassante, funzionale e confortevole.


Il corso è stato creato e pensato per arrivare in modo semplice e pratico ad avere strumenti atti a renderti indipendente e consapevole nella scelta di un colore piuttosto che un altro.

Inoltre, nell'area risorse troverai guide in formato PDF,
pratiche e complete per la scelta- accostamento - funzione - ispirazione..
dei diversi colori, da poter utilizzare ogni volta che avrai dubbi o incertezze.
Non solo, potrai anche esercitarti tornando un po’ bambina/o e dando sfogo alla tua vena artistica, provando a colorare ambienti in diversi modi.

Non perdere l'opportunità di scoprire i segreti sulla scelta dei colori !!

Ti aspetto

courses.title: Atmospheric interior using 3ds max and Marvelous Designer
courses.bio: Learn how fast and easy create cool interior scene with the help of 3ds Max and some other plugins.
objectives: Create atmospheric scene using 3ds max!
Get best knowledges of Marvelous Designer!
Set up light in your scenes much cooler then ever!

Modelling: Creating a basic form of the attic
Adding fabric into the scene using Marvelous Designer
Adding materials: Continue with adding materials and adding volume light
Rendering: Finalising scene. Preparing to final render.

requirements: Students should have installed 3ds Max, V-Ray and Marvelous Designer. All of the links for trial software will be added in the description of the lessons.
Also Photoshop and After Effects are needed.
courses.description:
In this course, you will learn how to create and visualize atmospheric interior using 3ds Max and Marvelous Designer just in 3 hours!


9 videos will show you the process of creating beautiful result in simple steps.
If you are beginner and mid-user of 3ds Max this course is perfect for you!

The course will give you a lot of useful information about setting up the light in your scene. You are going to learn how to use some useful plugins making the process of creation much easier!

If you really into creating cool interiors with interesting atmoshpere this course is definetely for you!
target_audience: This course is for students who already have basic knowdleges about 3ds max interface, Photoshop and are familiar with polymodelling.
It is also for students who doesn't know anything about Marvelous Designer - tool for creating clothes
Also basic knowledges of V-Ray render should be

courses.title: 3ds max and Vray basics for interior designers
courses.bio: 3ds max basics and interior design basics
objectives: 3ds max vray basics and Interior design basics for absolute beginners
an easy to understand basic course for beginners developed after 7 years of live teaching with quick results
understanding the psychology, goals and the type of thinking of an interior designer
how to create and model first interior objects and rendering using vray to obain realistic images
3ds max professional method to work using hotkeys
a step by step plan how to begin and finish an interior design project
not necessary linked to other next parts of the full course
learn the program and tools in a manner that is usually used to prepare persons to begin to activate in interior design process
requirements: desire to work and advance
computer with 3ds max and Vray 5
courses.description:
Hi, my name is Aurelian and I work now as an interior designer for more than 10 years, but I've also worked in parallel as a teacher of 3ds max and interior design and I created this course for interior designers and 3ds max and Vray users that start from absolute beginner level in order to share, using my experience, how to approach learning of 3ds max in the fastest way possible, after I've refined these topics in time when I used to teach live and at the same time I had to deliver in the fastest way possible the info to students.
This course is made for absolute beginners and it explains how to begin to work in 3ds max, the basic principles of the program 3ds max and Vray are presented in a very easy to understand image based way, using a professional working method, tested on over 2000 students for more than 7 years, that is based on using hotkeys (that will increase your speed), so that you can work in a professional manner from the start.
The method used in this course is based on learning the program and tools in a manner that is usually used to prepare persons to begin to activate in interior design process.
In this first part of the course we will model in the end 10 exact 3d models from scratch, that will increase in difficulty, using just internet images as visual reference, in order to implement into practice the learned knowledge. After modeling we will learn the basics of lighting and rendering and we will learn how to render or visualise our objects and create 3d realistic images.
The objects presented in this course belong to basic level. In the next parts of our course the difficulty will increase, as we will proceed and learn more advanced instruments.
This method of teaching was created after my 7 years of live teaching 3ds max and vray, developed and perfected throught time practice.
In this part we will have also interior design psychology lessons in order to form an interior designer thinking and approach, understand the goals and the requirements that a designer needs to show in order to start to work with real projects.
If you ever thought about becoming an interior designer, than in order to proceed you will have to learn at least 3 things that lead to a designer profession:
- principles how to obtain an interesting design using artistic laws and approach
- a method to draw and show your ideas and in this course we will be using 3ds max as it is one of the top instruments used to visualize 3d spaces and objects
- knowledge how to manage a project from the start to the end and how to interact with clients,  as they are the ones that form the preferences and you as a designer must gather all their ideas into one concept that will lead to a final result based on artistic principles
target_audience: 3ds max users
vray users
interior designers

courses.description:
Experto en Diseño de Cocinas. Impartido por Arquitectos.
Convierte en Profesional del Diseño, Decoración, Organización y Planificación de Espacios destinados a Cocinar.
Instructores: Arq. Álvaro García y Arq. de Interiores Mariangeles Fernández  Actualizado: Octubre del 2025 Estudiantes: +6.000  Requisitos previos: Ninguno


Descripción del Curso:
Impulsa tu perfil con “EXPERTO en Diseño de Cocinas. Impartido por Arquitectos”, la formación en Udemy que convierte cualquier planta en una cocina eficiente, bella y segura. Aprenderás distribución profesional (L, U, isla, península), triángulo de trabajo y ergonomía, iluminación por capas, elección de materiales y encimeras durables, electrodomésticos y almacenaje inteligente para proyectos a medida. Es 100% online, a tu ritmo y desde cualquier país, apto para todas las edades y niveles, con casos reales, plantillas y criterios listos para obra.
Al finalizar, sabrás planificar y presupuestar una reforma con garantías: ventilación y extracción, instalaciones (electricidad, fontanería, gas), seguridad, acústica y mantenimiento. Documentarás con moodboards, planos, renders, memoria y cronograma, resolverás cocinas pequeñas y defenderás propuestas que elevan valor y experiencia de uso. Optimizado para SEO —curso de diseño de cocinas, cocina a medida, triángulo de trabajo, reforma de cocina—, este programa impulsa tu visibilidad profesional. Inscríbete hoy y obtén la ventaja de un perfil especializado y certificado en Udemy.
Esta acción formativa te va a permitir conocer las más novedosas tendencias actuales en el diseño de cocinas, consiguiendo ambientes bien organizados, planificados, bellos y funcionales. Actualmente el campo del diseño de cocinas contemporáneo se centra en las necesidades básicas de los usuarios en cuanto a ergonomía, accesibilidad y funcionalidad. Resultando imprescindible que diseño y funcionalidad vayan ligados, dotando de comodidad y simplicidad a los espacios destinados a elaborar alimentos.
Sin duda alguna, las estancias destinadas a cocinar son espacios en los cuales vivimos y disfrutamos, que han dejado de ser simplemente lugares de preparación de alimento, pasando a presentar un  equilibrio entre una actividad y relajación. La importancia de la cocina como elemento social y central, permite que surja una relación con el resto de estancias de la vivienda, ayudando en la creación de espacios diáfanos, en los que las islas, penínsulas y office pueden vincularse con la sala de estar y el comedor, generando una zona común para el deleite tanto gastronómico social.


Itinerario Formativo:

Creación de un CV y Portfolio Creativo Impreso y Digital
