Consultas, Dudas y Sugerencias de los Alumnos de la Formación
Emisión del Certificado de Finalización del EXPERTO en Diseño de Cocinas. Impartido por Arquitectos.


Objetivos del curso:
Dominar una metodología profesional para diseñar, planificar y ejecutar cocinas a medida: del briefing al proyecto ejecutivo, layouts L, U, isla o península, triángulo de trabajo y zonas (cocción, lavado, preparación, almacenaje), ergonomía, iluminación por capas, selección de materiales y encimeras durables, y almacenaje inteligente. Aprenderás instalaciones (electricidad, fontanería, gas), ventilación y extracción, control acústico, normativa y seguridad, y a documentar con moodboards, planos, renders, presupuesto y cronograma, resolviendo también cocinas pequeñas con alto rendimiento.


Salidas profesionales:
Interiorista residencial especializado en diseño de cocinas, kitchen planner en showrooms y retail, consultor/a técnico en encimeras y equipamiento, project manager de reformas, delineante/visualizador 3D y freelance para estudios de interiorismo, constructoras y marketplaces de reforma. Potencia tu empleabilidad global con un portfolio convincente y certificado de Udemy, orientado a resultados medibles en funcionalidad, estética y coste.


Dirigido a:
Estudiantes y profesionales de interiorismo y arquitectura, reformistas, carpinterías y retail de cocina, así como propietarios y autopromotores que buscan integrar diseño, técnica y presupuesto real. Apto para todos los niveles y edades, 100% online y a tu ritmo desde cualquier país; ideal para quienes desean cocinas eficientes, seguras y bellas, con procesos claros y planificación lista para obra.


Metodología de Aprendizaje:
Recuerda que este curso incluye lecciones en vídeo fullHD con audio de estudio (compatible con TV, PC, Mac, tablet y smartphone), artículos didácticos, actividades, animaciones, ilustraciones, proyectos paso a paso, recursos descargables, links de interés, acceso de por vida, certificado de finalización, tutorización online, y una exclusiva comunidad de aprendizaje privada que nos ayudamos aportando nuestras experiencias en el foro de comunicación del curso.
La modalidad de este curso te permite que empieces y acabes cuando tú quieras, marcando el ritmo de la clase según tu disponibilidad. Puedes volver a visualizar lo que te interese, saltar el contenido que ya domines, hacer preguntas, resolver dudas, compartir tus proyectos... Puedes elegir ver todas las lecciones de forma secuencial (lineal) y aprovecharlas al máximo la formación, pero también puedes decidir ver este curso como una guía de referencia.
Las clases están claramente organizadas en secciones y lecciones, puedes decidir visualizar solo las clases que te resulten más importantes según tus necesidades formativas. La mayoría de las lecciones son independientes para que puedas comprender los conceptos de cada lección sin tener que ver las lecciones anteriores del curso.
Para seguir el programa formativo propuesto no ser requieren conocimientos previos, ya que la formación se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0. El curso está orientado a aquellos creativos que quieran ampliar sus skills (habilidades) y conocer múltiples trucos, consejos, recursos y recomendaciones, de la mano de los instructores Álvaro García y Mariangeles Fernández. Además la formación disponen de acceso automático al contenido, sin limitación de tiempo, disponibilidad 24/7 (24 horas al día los 7 días de la semana), sin caducidad y con garantía de devolución.
Con esta formación disfrutarás aprendiendo desde dónde quieras, sin tener que desplazarte, sin horarios, con quién quieras, según tus necesidades y disponibilidad. Aprenderás con un instructor avalado por miles da alumnos satisfechos en todo el mundo (comentarios certificados). Conocerás las técnicas, métodos, trucos y flujos de trabajo de este sector creativo. El docente te transmitirá su sabiduría y conocimientos con pasión a la vez que las explicaciones concisas, claras, sencillas y con un enfoque profesional en cada clase. Podrás conseguir un  certificado homologado personalizado y firmado por tu instructor en cada formación. De está forma podrás compartir tu título en tu portafolio, currículo, en redes sociales...
Con la alta definición de los vídeos (vídeo fullHD y audio de estudio) conseguirá no te perder detalle. Podrás ver las clases las veces que requieras para recordar y perfeccionar tus habilidades como diseñador. Tendrás la posibilidad de preguntar, pedir opinión y ayuda al instructor, además de compartir tu experiencia de aprendizaje con los demás alumnos del curso, tan apasionados como tú, repartidos por todo el mundo. Seleccionamos cuidadosamente los contenidos y producimos cada curso para garantizar una experiencia de aprendizaje online integral y de la máxima calidad.


¿A qué esperas?, este curso es ideal para ti, atrévete a convertirte en un experto y expresa tus ideas de la forma que siempre has deseado. Adelante, nos vemos dentro de la formación ;)
target_audience: Estudiantes de interiorismo y arquitectura que buscan dominar diseño de cocinas, triángulo de trabajo y documentación lista para obra.
Profesionales de reformas y kitchen planners que necesitan layouts L, U, isla/península, normativa e instalaciones seguras.
Propietarios y autopromotores que quieren reforma de cocina eficiente: materiales durables, extracción eficaz y almacenamiento inteligente.
Carpinterías y retail de cocina que desean vender mejor con asesoría técnica, modulación a medida, encimeras y venta consultiva.
Freelancers, delineantes y 3D artists que buscan ampliar portfolio con planos, renders y proyectos reales de cocina a medida.

Planificar espacios residenciales, comerciales o de trabajo, definiendo inequívocamente todos sus elementos, ya sean objetos existentes o diseños propios.
Conocer los materiales de construcción, tejidos y texturas y sus características, limitaciones y usos en interiorismo.
Componer documentos de calidad gráfica superior que ayuden en la presentación y comercialización de los proyectos.

Construir paletas de color, materiales y texturas coherentes con el estilo y el presupuesto del proyecto.
Aplicar iluminación por capas: general, acento y tarea, logrando ambientes confortables y fotogénicos.
Seleccionar y especificar FF&E, textiles y arte para espacios funcionales, duraderos y fáciles de mantener.
Crear moodboards, planos y listas de compra; estimar costes y priorizar decisiones de alto impacto.

Cocinas + Dormitorios + Salón + Comedor + Baños + Terrazas
Instructores: Arq. Álvaro García, Arq. Lucía Fernández, Arq. Int. Mariangeles Blanco. Actualizado: Octubre del 2025 Estudiantes: +5.000  Requisitos previos: Ninguno


Descripción del Curso:
Transforma cualquier vivienda con un método integral de diseño y decoración de interiores: distribución, ergonomía, materiales y color, iluminación por capas y FF&E para cocinas, baños, salones, dormitorios, comedores y terrazas. Aprende a crear espacios funcionales y estéticos, coherentes con el estilo y el presupuesto, desde el brief hasta la entrega profesional.
En Udemy, 100% online, global y para todos los niveles, avanzarás a tu ritmo con plantillas, moodboards, guías de compra y documentación lista para cliente. Construye un portfolio sólido, mejora tus decisiones de diseño de interiores y comunica propuestas que enamoran y venden, con resultados medibles en confort, estética y valor del espacio.
La decoración de interiores no abarca solo decoración, sino también diseño e interiorismo. Se trata de crear espacios, ambientes, desarrollando todo un discurso empleando diferentes elementos decorativos, acorde a un gran número de factores y puntos a evaluar por parte del decorador/a de interiores.
El profesional de la decoración de interiores es capaz de analizar, investigar y proyectar diseños ajustados a las necesidades y a los espacios, además de dirigir equipos multidisciplinares en el ámbito de su profesión.
Como paso preliminar a la proyección del diseño y decoración, se analizan los factores o los objetivos funcionales de uso, mediante un estudio detallado del espacio, siempre teniendo en cuenta las peticiones del cliente. Por otra parte, la decoración de interiores requiere necesariamente estar al día de las últimas tendencias, modas y novedades de este campo sobre los que fundamentar los procesos creativos. Este curso se centraría en los aspectos particulares del diseño residencial, incluyendo la planificación de espacios privados, la elección de materiales, la iluminación y la decoración.
En este curso aprenderás esta fascinante disciplina capaz de crear proyectos de decoración y diseño de interiores impresionantes. A través de esta  formación relacionada con la decoración de interiores lograrás adquirir todos los conocimientos además de las habilidades necesarias para desenvolverte en este ámbito e incrementar tus oportunidades laborales. Entre las principales profesiones relacionadas con la decoración de interiores así como el diseño de interior podrás aprender todo acerca de las reglas del interiorismo.

Dominarás el diseño y la decoración de interiores de principio a fin: brief, distribución y ergonomía, elección de materiales, color y texturas, iluminación por capas, FF&E y estilismo. Aprenderás a construir moodboards, planos y listas de compra, estimar presupuesto, y presentar con storytelling visual para cocinas, baños, salones, dormitorios, comedores y terrazas.

Podrás conseguir un  certificado homologado personalizado y firmado por tu instructor en cada formación. De está forma podrás compartir tu título en tu portafolio, currículo, en redes sociales...
Con la alta definición de los vídeos (vídeo fullHD y audio de estudio) conseguirá no te perder detalle. Podrás ver las clases las veces que requieras para recordar y perfeccionar tus habilidades como diseñador. Tendrás la posibilidad de preguntar, pedir opinión y ayuda al instructor, además de compartir tu experiencia de aprendizaje con los demás alumnos del curso, tan apasionados como tú, repartidos por todo el mundo. Seleccionamos cuidadosamente los contenidos y producimos cada curso para garantizar una experiencia de aprendizaje online integral y de la máxima calidad.


¿A qué esperas?, este curso es ideal para ti, atrévete a convertirte en un experto y expresa tus ideas de la forma que siempre has deseado. Adelante, nos vemos dentro de la formación ;)
target_audience: Estudiantes de interiorismo y decoración que quieren dominar el diseño de cocinas, baños, salones y dormitorios con método profesional.
Arquitectos y diseñadores que buscan curso online de diseño de interiores: del brief al plano, paletas, iluminación y FF&E listas para cliente.

Are you fascinated by the world of interior design and want to learn how to identify, mix, and apply different design styles to real spaces?

courses.title: أساسيات العمل بالأخشاب من الجانب النظري
courses.bio: المساق النظري لورشة العمل بالأخشاب والتي يتبعها تدريب عملي في مساحة السي هب في عمان-الأردن
objectives: المعرفة بأنواع الأخشاب وتميزها
المعرفة بأدوات وألآت العمل بالأخشاب
المعرفة النظرية بكيفية صنع قطع أثاث خشبية بسيطة
المعرفة الأساسية بالصناعات الثقافية والإبداعية ودورك فيها كاصانع

مقدمة عن الصناعات الثقافية والإبداعية: مقدمة عن الصناعات الثقافية والإبداعية في الأردن
الفهم النظري للخشب من مواد وماكينات: إختبار لقياس مستوى المعرفة: أنواع الخشب واستعمالاته
إختبار لقياس مستوى المعرفة: آلآت الخشب
التطبيق النظري في المشغل: المصباح الجانبي: إختبار لقياس مستوى المعرفة
صنع طاولة القهوة ذات الأشكال الهندسية
طاولة الأشكال الهندسيّه: إختبار لقياس مستوى المعرفة
رفوف خلية النحل إختبار لقياس مستوى المعرفة
الكرسي القابل للطي: إختبار لقياس مستوى المعرفة

requirements: اهتمام بالعمل اليدوي وصناعة الأشياء في المنزل ورغبة في فهم أساسيات النجارة والعمل بالأخشاب
هذا المساق مخصص أيضا لدعم الشباب والشابات المشاركين في برامج مؤسسة أنا أتجرأ للتنمية المستدامة في الأردن
courses.description:
نحن في هذا المساق النظري نهدف إلى تقديم الأسس الأساسية للعمل في مجال النجارة، حيث سيتعرف الطلاب على أنواع الخشب وأدوات النجارة والمعدات اللازمة للعمل النجاري من منظور نظري. وبالنجاح في هذا المساق، سيتاح للطلاب الانضمام إلى ورشة السي هب في عمان لتطبيق عملي عبر صناعة قطع أثاث مختلفة، مثل مصابيح الإضاءة الجانبية، أو طاولات القهوة ذات الأشكال الهندسية، أو كراسي الطي، وحتى رفوف تصميمها يشبه خلية النحل.


ورشة العمل في النجارة من بين الورش الأكثر شهرة لدينا وتتمتع بإقبال كبير. خلال هذه الورشة، يحصل المشاركون على دروس نظرية وعملية في فنون النجارة، حيث يتعلمون كيفية تصنيع الأثاث ويستكشفون منظومة الصناعات الثقافية والإبداعية. كما يُعطى للمشاركين فرصة لتطوير مهاراتهم في حل المشكلات والإبتكار.


تعلم أساسيات النجارة والعمل بالأخشاب ذو أهمية كبيرة. يُمكنك تحويل أفكارك إلى واقع من خلال تصميم وصناعة الأثاث. تعلم هذه المهارات يفتح فرص العمل والإبداع في مجال النجارة. كما يمكنك توفير المال عبر صناعة الأثاث بنفسك وإصلاح الأثاث المتضرر. هذا يُطيل عمر الأثاث ويوفر الوقت والمال.


نأمل أن تكون هذه الرحلة التعليمية ممتعة ومثمرة. وإذا كنتم من سكان المنطقة الوسطى في الأردن من المحافظات القريبة على عمان، فسنكون سعداء بلقاءكم في الورشة العملية قريباً.


نتمنى لكم عملية تعلم موفقة وننصحكم بأنهاء كافة المحاضرات وإختبارات قياس المعرفة الخاصة بها.
target_audience: الراغبين في تعلم أساسيات النجارة والعمل مع الأخشاب

courses.title: 3Ds Max V-ray5 Gerçekçi Banyo Aydınlatma (2022)
courses.bio: Gerçekçi vray aydınlatma Eğitimi
objectives: Vray Kamera yerleşimi
Vray Test ve Final ayarları
Vray light (plane,ve disc) kullanımı ve detayları
Vray Sun, Vray Sky kullanımı
Vray interactive render, Lightmix ve Lens Effect kullanımı
ZDepth of Field kullanımı
Photoshop render düzenleme
requirements: 3Ds Max 2018 ve Vray 5 sürümü ile eğitim verilecektir, Az da olsa 3Ds Max bilgisi olanlar
courses.description:
Merhaba değerli dostlar, yeni bir eğitim ile tekrar birlikteyiz.
Bu kursumuzda 3ds max 2018 ile hazırlanmış, hazır modelleri  ve mazlemeleri bulunan bir sahneyi,  aydınlatmayı öğreneceğiz.
Vray ışıklar ile gündüz aydınlatması yapacağız.
En önemlisi dar zamanda basit metotla bu tarz sahneleri aydınlatabileceksiniz.
Aydınlatma eğitiminde basit bir şekilde kolaylıkla eğitimi tamamlayacağız.
Vray kamera kullanımını göreceğiz ve detaylarını inceleyeceğiz. (F-number, shutter speed ve İso nasıl kullanılır ve bir mekanı aydınlatmak için kamera ayarları nelerdir sorusunun yanıtlarını bulacağız.
Vray Sky, Vray Sun kullanımı ile aydınlatma sağlayacağız.
Vray menüsünü uygulama yaparak inceleyeceğiz.
Vray Test render ve Final render ayarlarını yapacağız.
Vray çözünürlük ayarları
Ambient Occlusion nedir? Nerede kullanılır?
Kurs bitiminde bu tarz iç mekanı aydınlatmayı öğrenmiş olacaksınız.
En önemlisi de detaylarda boğulmadan, zamana karşı yarışma halinde olan bizler için etkili ve pratrik bir eğitim. Sadece birkaç detay ve dokunuşla doğru sonuçlar alacağımız bir kurs içeriği.
Bu eğitimde modelleme olmayacak, sadece render ayarları ile sahne aydınlatmayı öğreneceğiz.
3D's Max ve Vray render motorunu yeni öğrenenler için doğrudan etkili bir eğitim. Ayrıca orta seviye kullanan fakat doğru sonuçlar alamayan kişiler içinde etkili bir eğitim.
İleri seviye bilgisi olanlara önerilmez.
Render sonrası düzenlemede fazla bir photoshop bilgisine sahip olmamız gerekmeden birkaç dokunuşla gerçekçi sonuçlara gideceğiz.
Photoshop nik collection kullanarak, render sonrası basit düzenlemeyle çalışmamızı tamamlayacağız.
target_audience: Mimarlar, İç Mimarlar, Mimari görselleştirme ile uğraşanlar, 3Ds Max ve Vray programına ilgi duyanlar,
Başlangıç ve Orta Düzey 3Ds Max bilgisi olanlar

courses.title: Faux Floral Arrangement - Designer Workshop
courses.bio: Learn to beautify your home and create special joyful moments that last by creating your own faux floral arrangements.
requirements: No experience needed! Just a love for design and all things beautiful.
courses.description:
Greenery and florals are what make a home truly come to life. No vignette or room is complete without them.
You will join Interior Decorator Sarah Kirkpatrick, and guest floral artist Jaqueline Spackman of Blossoms YYC, to learn the basics of floral arrangement design for your home. We will spend ~45 minutes walking you through our favourite arrangements and modern florals (both real and fake), the vases we recommend to display them in, and how to pull it all together for your interior design.
We encourage you to grab a few vases that you’ve been wanting to style with, and follow along with us as we show you a number of pre-made arrangements, as well as a 'from scratch' design from Jaqueline! Have some faux stems to play with? We will talk through how to analyze them for quality, and what to keep in mind when styling different styles, shapes, and lengths.


Design should bring you joy, and we hope this course does too! We had a blast putting this workshop together (and all of the beautiful arrangements we show off), and can't wait to have you join us for a little 'flower power' in your space.
Let's get designing!
target_audience: Design enthusiasts and people wishing to learn to beautify their own homes all year.

Introduction: Whom This Course is Intended for?
Designing Interior & Modifying Objects w: Designing Interior & Modifying Objects with Spacely AI
Designing Kitchen & Living Room Interior: Designing Kitchen & Living Room Interior with Interior Render AI
Turning Sketch Into Rendering with Archi: Turning Sketch Into Rendering with Architect Render
Remodelling Bathroom Interior with ReIma: Remodelling Bathroom Interior with ReImagineHome AI
Remodelling Bedroom Interior with AI Hom: Remodelling Bedroom Interior with AI Home Design
Designing Bedroom Interior with Prome AI: Designing Bedroom Interior with Prome AI

requirements: No previous experience in interior design is required
Basic knowledge in generative AI
courses.description:
Welcome to Interior Design with Generative AI course. This is a comprehensive project based course where you will be guided step by step on how to generate stunning interior designs using the cutting edge AI technologies. This course will give you a whole new perspective about the future of interior design and you will be amazed by how far artificial intelligence has advanced in the past couple of years to the point where you can generate aesthetic interior designs with only a single click. This technology will definitely save a lot of your time and energy. Can you imagine, rearranging your room using AI or generating captivating interior designs and detailed floor plans in less than a minute? Well those are things that you are going to learn in this course and even more exciting, you will also learn how to potentially turn this opportunity into an interior design agency business. In the introduction session, you will learn the basic fundamentals of generative AI and interior design, such as getting to know generative AI applications in interior design, its limitations, and you will get to see the showcase of interior designs generated by AI. Then, in the next session, we will start the projects, so the project will be consisted of four main sections, in the first section, you will learn how to generate high quality interior designs using AI tools like Spacely AI, Interior Render AI, Architect Render, Reimagine Home AI, AI Home Design, Visualize AI, Prome AI, and Oda Studio AI. Afterward, in the second section, you will learn how to rearrange and customise your room using AI tools like Reroom AI, AITWO, RoomGPT IO, the process is very straightforward, all you need to do is to upload the image of the room that you want to design, then AI will automatically reorganise the room and make it more beautiful and more aesthetic. Meanwhile, in the third section, you will learn how to generate floor plans using an AI tool called Maket IO. Lastly, in the fourth section, you will learn how to utilize virtual reality technologies like Copernic AI and Skybox Blockade Labs to visualize interior design. Once you have learnt to use generative AI for interior design, then, you will get to know several business models to monetise your interior design skills, such as building interior design agencies, doing home staging for real estate sales, and partnering with rental companies. Last but not least, to take it to the next step, you will also learn how to build a website for your interior design agency using an AI tool called Pineapple Builder. By having a professional website that showcases your interior designs gallery, it will be easier for you to get your first clients.
Firstly, before getting into the course, we need to ask this question to ourselves: why should we utilize generative AI for interior design? Well there are many reasons why and let me answer it from the perspective of interior designers and architects, generating fresh ideas and design concepts can be very time consuming as it will require you to concentrate while exploring your imagination. In addition to that, turning designs in your imagination into reality can also be quite challenging as you will need to draw the sketch while paying very close attention to every single detail. Therefore, generative AI can be all in one solution to those problems as it enables you to not only generate creative innovations for your designs but also automatically transform it into high quality images. Lastly, the interior design industry will always be in high demand in the market because houses are basic human necessities and definitely people want to design their living space to be comfortable and functional.
Below are things that you can expect to learn from this course:
Learn the basic fundamentals of generative AI and interior design
Learn how to design interiors and modify objects using Spacely AI
Learn how to design kitchen and living room interior with Interior Render AI
Learn how to turn sketch into rendering using Generative AI
Learn how to remodel bathroom interior using ReImagineHome AI
Learn how to remodel bedroom interior using AI Home Design
Learn how to remodel stairs using Visualize AI
Learn how to design bedroom interior using Prome AI
Learn how to design home office interior using Oda Studio AI
Learn how to design dining room interior and add natural lighting using ReRoom AI
Learn how to remodel laundry room using AITWO
Learn how to design backyard interior using RoomGPT IO
Learn how to generate residential floor plan using Maket AI
Learn how to generate 3D interior designs using Copernic AI
Learn how to generate 3D interior designs using Skybox AI
Learn how to monetise your interior design skills and get to know several business models like building interior design agency, home staging for real estate sales, and selling customisable interior design packages
Learn how to build website for your interior design agency business using Pineapple Builder
target_audience: People who are interested in designing interior using generative AI
People who are interested in generating residential floor plan with AI
People who are interested in remodelling their house's interior using generative AI

courses.title: A Biophilic Home.
courses.bio: Interior Design for All Your Senses.
objectives: Understand biophilic design principles for holistic well-being.
Learn to maximize natural light for mood and health improvement.
Discover ways to enhance indoor air quality with plants and ventilation.
Learn noise reduction techniques for a peaceful home environment.
Gain insight into using natural materials for sensory stimulation.
Design a kitchen that promotes easy and enjoyable healthy cooking.
requirements: For this course, no prior experience or specific skills in interior design are required
An interest in the crossing between science, psychology and interior design .
An interest in home design, health, and well-being.
courses.description:
Learn how to design a home for all your senses and create more well-being at home. The aim of this course is to go beyond the visual elements that are emphasised in interior design and create a home that connects you with nature and stimulates all your senses. A biophilic home is not just about style; it's about setting up a space that works with you for your well-being.


In this class, we'll explore the simple yet often overlooked aspects that can really impact how you feel in your home, such as:
The way light impacts your mood and emotions
How to improve the quality of the air you breathe
Managing the noise around you
The importance of the materials and textures you live with
How your kitchen setup influences the quality of your meals


While wall colours and matching curtains might seem like a top priority, they become secondary if poor choices compromise our sensory needs. Thus, I’m inviting you to rethink your design approach and place emphasis where it truly matters - on creating an environment that satiates your senses just as nature intended.


By the end of this course, you'll have plenty of tips on how to create a home that:


Is flooded with natural light
Ensures the air you breathe is pure
Effectively keeps noise at bay
Features an array of natural materials with diverse textures
Encourages and enables the preparation of wholesome meals


Join me in discovering how the science of Biophilic design can unlock a healthier, happier living space. Redefine the relationship between your senses and your surroundings. Start designing not just a home but a lifestyle.
target_audience: People who wish to feel more balanced at home.
Homeowners: Those who have their own property and wish to make changes to enhance their well-being.
Renters: People living in rented accommodations can also benefit, as many of the tips might be implementable without requiring structural changes.
Interior Design Enthusiasts: Anyone interested in interior design, particularly those with an interest in biophilic design or creating more holistic, wellness-focused spaces.
Health and Wellness Seekers: Individuals interested in improving their overall well-being and lifestyle through changes to their living environment.
Sustainability Advocates: Given the focus on natural light, clean air, and natural materials, those interested in sustainable and eco-friendly living might find this course valuable.
Professional Interior Designers or Architects: These professionals might benefit from the course to learn more about biophilic design principles and apply them in their work for clients.

courses.title: Blender 4.2: Full interior scene creation
courses.bio: Step by step we will learn how to create a full interior scene using Blender 4.2
objectives: Create Detailed Interior Scenes: Students will learn how to design and model complete interior environments using Blender
Model Custom Furniture and Objects: Students will gain the skills to model a variety of furniture and interior objects from scratch, enhancing their 3D modeling
Utilize BlenderKit for Models and Materials: Learners will understand how to efficiently use BlenderKit to import additional 3D models and high-quality material
Create Realistic Night and Natural Lighting: Learners will understand how to create both night scenes and natural daylight setups for stunning, realistic lighti
Sunbeam Effect: Students will learn how to create a sunbeam effect, where sunlight streams through windows, adding depth and atmosphere to the scene.
Render High-Quality Images: Students will learn how to render high-quality images, ensuring their interior scenes are ready for post-processing or final present

Modeling: 022_Creating the curtain box and fixing the windows height
025_How to use BlenderKit to download 3D models
Materials: 028_Adding materials for the wall and panels
029_Texturing the picture frames and other panels
031_Adding texture for lights, door, ground, part_2
032_Adding materials for the chairs and adding a new carpet
Lighting and post processing: 038_Post Process the rendered images using Photoshop

requirements: Basic Knowledge of Blender: This course is designed for students who already have a fundamental understanding of Blender's interface and know how to navigate the software.
Familiarity with 3D Modeling: Learners should have experience in basic 3D modeling techniques, as this course will not cover beginner-level modeling concepts.
BlenderKit Add-on: We will be using the BlenderKit add-on for importing models and materials, so make sure it’s installed and ready to use.
Photoshop (Optional): While not mandatory, having access to Photoshop or similar software will be helpful for post-processing the final rendered images.
courses.description:
Mastering Interior Scene Creation in Blender 4.2
Step up your Blender skills with this in-depth course designed to teach you how to create stunning, photorealistic interior scenes from start to finish! This course is perfect for intermediate Blender users who already know their way around the basics and are ready to dive into more advanced techniques to bring their creative visions to life.
What You’ll Discover:
Working with References: Start by importing architectural plans or reference images directly into Blender, laying the groundwork for your scene with precision.
Advanced Modeling: We’ll cover the modeling process in-depth, creating much of the furniture and decor from scratch. For added variety, we'll use BlenderKit to bring in additional 3D models, giving your scene a rich, diverse look with minimal effort.
Texturing Mastery: Learn how to expertly texture your scene using pre-made materials from BlenderKit and take it further by creating custom textures for that unique, professional touch.
Lighting Like a Pro: Elevate your scene with advanced lighting techniques:
Discover how to create a Night Scene, using interior lighting to craft a moody, atmospheric environment.
Master Natural Lighting by utilizing Blender’s sky texture to simulate daylight with incredible realism.
Bring drama to your render with a captivating Sunbeam Effect (or Light Beam Effect), where sunlight streams through the windows, casting beautiful shadows and highlights that enhance the depth of your scene.
Rendering & Post-Processing: We’ll take your final renders to the next level with techniques like Depth of Field, adding a cinematic feel to your shots. Once the rendering is complete, we’ll move the images to Photoshop for advanced post-processing, ensuring your final product is as polished as possible.
Why This Course?
This course isn't just about modeling and texturing—it’s about creating a complete, realistic interior scene that tells a story. You’ll learn the full workflow, from setting up your scene to adding those all-important finishing touches that make your work stand out. By the end of the course, you'll have a portfolio-worthy project that showcases your newfound ability to create stunning interiors in Blender 4.2.
I’m Marwan Hussein, a passionate Blender instructor with over 6 years of experience in creating high-quality 3D content. Let’s turn your interior design concepts into reality!
target_audience: This course is ideal for intermediate Blender users who already have a solid understanding of the basics and want to take their skills to the next level by learning how to create realistic, professional-quality interior scenes. It’s perfect for 3D artists, designers, and architectural visualization enthusiasts who are looking to enhance their portfolio with detailed, beautifully rendered interiors. Whether you are a freelancer wanting to improve your services, a student aiming to master 3D interior design, or a professional seeking to expand your skill set, this course will provide the in-depth knowledge and techniques needed to elevate your work. This course is not suited for complete beginners—basic familiarity with Blender’s interface and navigation is required. If you're ready to move beyond the basics and create stunning, lifelike interior scenes, this course is for you!

courses.title: Como Criar uma Paleta de Cores no Design de Interiores
courses.bio: Aprenda a montar paletas de cores exclusivas para sua casa ou a casa do seu cliente, com o meu método passo a passo
objectives: Use cores em sua decoração, sem medo de bagunçar e não gostar das cores que escolher ou ficar enjoado delas
Trabalhe com as cores que não pode mudar no ambiente
Deixe a casa com uma aparência harmoniosa, sem que todos os cômodos sejam exatamente iguais
Use cores com confiança para obter a aparência que deseja
Finalmente aprenda a escolher as cores para ambientes sem indecisões.
requirements: não tem pré requisito
courses.description:
Finalmente você aprenderá a escolher as cores sem indecisões.
Curso + exercício prático + 3 materiais extras incríveis


1. O básico das cores:
A cor desempenha um papel importante em como nos sentimos em um espaço. Nesta unidade você...
Aprende como diferentes combinações de cores funcionam juntas (harmonias cromáticas), o papel da cor e como ela afeta nossas emoções e a sensação de um espaço quanto dimensão e luminosidade.


2. Como identificar a cor da pintura:
Os pigmentos base das cores são os culpados pela maioria dos erros de cor. Nisto até que você
Aprende a identificar estes pigmentos base em tintas, acabamentos de madeira, tecidos e tapetes para obter as cores e tons exatos que deseja.
Saberá como aquecer ou esfriar as cores para que você possa usar qualquer combinação de cores que quiser sem que elas entrem em conflito.


3. Como trabalhar com cores existentes:
O orçamento geralmente não permite que você altere certas cores em sua casa, mas isso não deve impedi-lo de criar uma casa que você adora. Nesta unidade você ...
Aprende a trabalhar com as cores existentes em itens como armários ou pisos que você não pode alterar e obter um visual novo que você goste.


4. Crie a sua paleta de cores exclusiva:
Agora que você está armado com todo o conhecimento de cores de que precisa, te orientarei nas etapas para criar sua paleta de cores exclusiva para casa e você aprenderá:
Quantas cores você deve incluir em sua paleta de cores.
Quais cores incluir em sua paleta de cores.
Como aplicar as cores que proporcionarão a sensação exata que você deseja em sua casa.


5. Regras de cores a serem observadas ao decorar o ambiente.
Quer você goste de cores fortes ou sutis, saber onde usá-las para obter a sensação exata que deseja no ambiente é essencial. Nesta unidade você ...
Aprende a fórmula para adicionar cor a qualquer espaço para que sua casa flua de um cômodo para o outro, sem que todos tenham a mesma aparência.
Aprende meu truque simples, mas super eficaz, para usar cores para adicionar interesse e chamar a atenção no ambiente.
Saberá como usar sua paleta de cores em qualquer espaço.


3 Materiais extras incríveis.
Tutorial como criar Moodboards
Como trabalhar com Estampas
Decoração para estações frias do ano, incluindo paleta de cores
target_audience: Este curso é apropriado para todos que queiram aplicar com segurança um esquema de cores na sua casa ou na casa de seus clientes. Destinado a aprimoramento pessoal e/ou profissional.

requirements: A computer or laptop with SketchUp and V-Ray installed (latest version recommended).
Basic knowledge of computer use (no prior 3D modeling experience required).
Willingness to learn and practice through the exercises provided.
For best results, some basic design/architecture interest is helpful.
courses.description:
Take your 3D design skills to the next level with this comprehensive SketchUp + V-Ray course in Hindi, created by Hindi Design Studios. Unlike quick tutorials, this paid course offers hours of structured, step-by-step training designed to help you not only understand the basics but also master advanced techniques for professional-level work.
You’ll start with the SketchUp interface and move into powerful modeling tools to create both simple and complex 3D structures. From drafting precise architectural models to adding details like furniture, textures, and components, you’ll learn to create realistic and detailed projects from scratch.
Next, you’ll dive deep into V-Ray for SketchUp, the industry-leading rendering engine. This course covers everything from material creation, lighting setups, and camera views to advanced rendering techniques for producing photorealistic images. You’ll gain the ability to present your designs like a professional architect or interior designer.
By the end of this course, you will be able to:
Master SketchUp tools to create accurate 3D models for real-world projects.
Apply textures, materials, and components to enhance design detail.
Set up and control realistic lighting, shadows, and camera perspectives in V-Ray.
Create photorealistic renders for client presentations, portfolios, and professional use.
Work efficiently with tips, shortcuts, and workflows used by design professionals.
This course is perfect for students, architects, interior designers, freelancers, or professionals aiming to level up their 3D modeling and rendering skills. With in-depth explanations, practical exercises, and real-world examples, you’ll gain the confidence to deliver high-quality projects and stand out in the design industry.
target_audience: Architecture and interior design students who want industry-ready skills.
Professionals seeking to upgrade their design and visualization abilities.
Freelancers aiming to create realistic renders for clients.
Hobbyists who want to explore 3D modeling and rendering at an advanced level.
Anyone who completed the free SketchUp + V-Ray course and wants to go deeper.

courses.title: Rendering Modern Living Room in Blender
courses.bio: A comprehensive course demonstrating the entire process from modeling to rendering an interior scene
objectives: Modeling the entire living room.
The students will learn how to model Furniture.
Fluffy looking Carpet
Creating materials and applying textures.
Easily understand Blender material node system.
Adding lights and illuminating the scene and rendering it.
Students will learn how to use Krita for final post processing of the rendered image.
requirements: At least a very basic knowledge of using Blender.
Willing to learn and follow along.
courses.description:
Welcome to my comprehensive course on creating and rendering a modern living room in Blender! In this course, I will guide you through every step of the process as you learn to bring your ideas to life with


3D modeling
UV mapping
Texturing
Lighting techniques.
But that's not all – I will also show you how to use the powerful Krita image editing program to add the finishing touches to the final rendered image, bringing it to life with color correction, filters, and more ensuring it looks absolutely stunning.
To make the learning process as easy and understandable as possible, I have broken down the course into five sections, with over 40+ video lectures that walk you through each step of the process.


The First section deals with introduction, understanding the layout and importing it.
The Second section is about modeling and enveloping the room with building walls, flooring , ceiling , windows and so on..
In the Third section, I will demonstrate modeling of all the furniture and positioning them as per the layout.
The Fourth section is where I will start texturing and coloring the entire scene step by step.
The Fifth and final section is all about lighting, illuminating and bringing life to the scene. And ending with the post processing the rendered image.
As we understand that in real-world scenarios, design changes can occur at any stage of the process. That's why I will also teach you how to deal with design changes and modifications, giving you the skills and confidence to tackle any project.
As your instructor, I'll guide you through the course material in a clear, concise, and engaging way, allowing you to learn at your own pace. By the end of this course, you'll be able to generate a professional-quality rendering of a modern living room that will amaze your clients and friends alike.
This course assumes you have at least very basic knowledge of using the blender application.
By breaking down the course into sections and video lectures, I have made it easy for you to follow along and learn at your own pace and create a "Modern Living Room".
So, whether you're a beginner with basic knowledge or an experienced 3D artist, join me now and let's create an amazing modern living room together!
target_audience: 3d visualizers looking for an alternative rendering solution
Interior designers interested in rendering their own designs
3d artists looking to expand their skill set

courses.description:
MÁSTER en Arquitectura Ecológica, Sostenible y Bioclimática.
Convierte en Profesional del Diseño, Gestión y Planificación Sostenible y Medio Ambientalmente Eficiente.
Instructores: Arq. Álvaro García y Arq. Lucía Fernández  Actualizado: Octubre del 2025 Estudiantes: +3.100 Requisitos previos: Ninguno


Impulsa tu perfil con el “MÁSTER en Arquitectura Ecológica, Sostenible y Bioclimática”, la formación en Udemy que te enseña a diseñar espacios de alto desempeño energético con estrategias pasivas, bioclimática aplicada, selección de materiales sostenibles y análisis básico de huella de carbono. Convertirás un briefing en un proyecto completo: orientación, envolvente, iluminación natural, ventilación, gestión de agua y vegetación, integrando confort térmico, acústico y visual. Es 100% online, a tu ritmo y desde cualquier país, apto para todos los niveles y edades, con ejercicios prácticos y plantillas descargables para llevar a obra.
Al finalizar, podrás justificar decisiones con datos (LCA/LCC, consumos, confort), presentar memorias técnicas convincentes y construir un portfolio de ecodiseño listo para clientes y licitaciones. Este máster te posiciona en búsquedas como arquitectura sostenible online, arquitectura bioclimática, eficiencia energética y ecodiseño. Potencia tu empleabilidad en estudios, consultorías y real estate responsable, y diferencia tu marca con un certificado de finalización en Udemy. Inscríbete hoy y lidera proyectos medioambientalmente eficientes y rentables.
Ante la enorme presión medioambiental que ejerce la actividad humana sobre el planeta, es fundamental identificar e implementar aquellas actividades, iniciativas y modelos, que consigan reducir al mínimo los residuos y aumenten al máximo la sostenibilidad, el reciclaje, y la reutilización. Por eso la gestión e implantación de la Arquitectura Ecológica y Sostenible se ha convertido en una herramienta estratégica imprescindible para las empresas que busquen crecer y prosperar en un mercado en el que sus consumidores son cada vez más conscientes del impacto ambiental que tiene lo que consume.
El diseño y la implementación de la arquitectura sostenible ecológica y bioclimática, requiere profesionales que sean no solo capaces de cumplir la normativa actual y los compromisos internacionales, sino que sobre todo cuenten con las herramientas, conocimientos, y competencias necesarias para convertir los desafíos planteados por la transición a modelos de producción sostenibles en oportunidades estratégicas de negocio que no solo repercutan en beneficios para la sociedad y el medioambiente, sino también en la creación de riqueza y trabajos para la empresa. Esta formación te aporta el conocimiento teórico‐práctico para que obtengas una visión transversal de todos los ámbitos de aplicación de esta tipología de arquitectura y bioconstrucción. Este curso se centra en cómo hacer que los diseños sean más ecológicos, desde la elección de los materiales hasta la eficiencia energética. Este curso se centra en cómo elegir materiales y técnicas de diseño que minimicen el impacto ambiental de un proyecto de diseño de interiores.


Itinerario Formativo:
Introducción a Udemy
Bienvenida al MÁSTER en Arquitectura Ecológica, Sostenible y Bioclimática.
Introducción al Desarrollo Sostenible en la Construcción

Introducción al Diseño Bioclimático en la Arquitectura
Iluminación Natural en Arquitectura

Dibujo 2D Asistido por Ordenador con AutoCAD en Diseño de Arquitectura Ecológica, Sostenible
Modelado 3D de Proyectos de Diseño de Arquitectura Ecológica, Sostenible

Edición Fotográficas de Nuestros Proyectos y Diseños en Adobe PhotoShop
Maquetación, Presentación y Documentación Técnica de Nuestras Propuestas de Diseño
Recursos para el Alumno del Experto en Diseño y Planificación de Proyectos Sostenibles
Emisión del Certificado de Finalización del MÁSTER en Arquitectura Ecológica, Sostenible y Bioclimática.


Objetivos del curso:
Adquirirás una metodología integral de arquitectura sostenible y bioclimática: lectura climática del lugar, estrategias pasivas (orientación, envolvente, soleamiento, ventilación, inercia), iluminación natural, gestión eficiente del agua y vegetación; selección de materiales de bajo impacto y principios de economía circular. Desarrollarás criterio para modelado energético básico, LCA/LCC, y redacción de memorias técnicas alineadas con NZEB y estándares como LEED/BREEAM/VERDE, culminando en un portfolio profesional listo para clientes y licitaciones.


Salidas profesionales:
Arquitecto/a o diseñador/a especializado en eficiencia energética, consultoría de sostenibilidad, energy modeler (junior), técnico de certificación ambiental, gestor/a de sostenibilidad en promotoras, constructoras y real estate, asesor/a en rehabilitación energética y mejora de envolventes, facility manager con enfoque ESG, o freelance de ecodiseño para vivienda, terciario y espacio público. Potencia tu empleabilidad global con habilidades aplicables y certificado de Udemy.


Dirigido a:
Estudiantes y profesionales de arquitectura, interiorismo e ingeniería, técnicos municipales, promotores, property managers y perfiles de urbanismo y medio ambiente que buscan criterios prácticos y actualizados. Apto para todos los niveles y edades: no requieres experiencia previa; si ya trabajas en el sector, consolidarás procesos con datos, métricas y documentación verificable. 100% online en Udemy, a tu ritmo y desde cualquier país, con enfoque directo, aplicable y orientado a resultados medibles.


Metodología de Aprendizaje:
Puedes elegir ver todas las lecciones de forma secuencial (lineal) y aprovecharlas al máximo la formación. Pero también puedes decidir ver este curso como una guía de referencia. Las clases están claramente organizadas en secciones lógicas y puedes decidir visualizar solo las clases que te resulten más importantes según tus necesidades formativas. A excepción de las lecciones PRO, la mayoría de las lecciones son independientes para que puedas comprender los conceptos de cada lección sin tener que ver las lecciones anteriores del curso.
Para desarrollar el programa formativo propuesto no ser requieren grandes conocimientos previos, ya que la formación se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0. El máster está orientado a aquellos creativos que quieran ampliar sus skills (habilidades) y conocer múltiples trucos, consejos, recursos y recomendaciones, de la mano de los arquitectos Álvaro García y Lucía Fernández. Además todas las formaciones de Udemy disponen acceso automático al contenido, sin limitación de tiempo, disponibilidad 24/7 (24 horas al día los 7 días de la semana), sin caducidad y con garantía de devolución.
La modalidad de este máster te permite que empieces y acabes cuando tú quieras, marcando el ritmo de la clase según tu disponibilidad. Puedes volver a visualizar lo que te interese, saltar el contenido que ya domines, hacer preguntas, resolver dudas, compartir tus proyectos...
Recuerda que este máster global incluye lecciones en vídeo fullHD con audio de estudio (compatible con TV, PC, Mac, tablet y smartphone), artículos didácticos, actividades, proyectos paso a paso, recursos descargables, links de interés, acceso de por vida, certificado de finalización, tutorización online, y una exclusiva comunidad de aprendizaje privada que nos ayudamos aportando nuestras experiencias en el foro de comunicación del curso.
Con esta formación disfrutarás aprendiendo desde dónde quieras, sin tener que desplazarte, sin horarios, con quién quieras, según tus necesidades y disponibilidad. Aprenderás con un instructor avalado por miles da alumnos satisfechos en todo el mundo (comentarios certificados). Conocerás las técnicas, métodos, trucos y flujos de trabajo de este sector creativo. El docente te transmitirá su sabiduría y conocimientos con pasión a la vez que las explicaciones concisas, claras, sencillas y con un enfoque profesional en cada clase. Podrás conseguir un  certificado homologado personalizado y firmado por tu instructor en cada formación. De está forma podrás compartir tu título en tu portafolio, currículo, en redes sociales...
Con la alta definición de los vídeos (vídeo fullHD y audio de estudio) conseguirá no te perder detalle. Podrás ver las clases las veces que requieras para recordar y perfeccionar tus habilidades como diseñador. Tendrás la posibilidad de preguntar, pedir opinión y ayuda al instructor, además de compartir tu experiencia de aprendizaje con los demás alumnos del curso, tan apasionados como tú, repartidos por todo el mundo. objectives: 3ds Max'e Genel Bakış

Örnek sahnelerin İncelenmesi/Analizi

Tasarımcı bilgisayarının sahip olması gereken özellikler

PDF Kitap Hediyeli

Parazit Problemi (Anti-aliasing): Parazit Tespiti için bir Teknik: Sample Rate

requirements: Temel seviyede 3ds Max
courses.description:
3ds Max ve V-Ray ile Gerçekçi Render Alma Kursu
Render'larınızda sürekli çıkan parazit (noise), ışık patlamaları ve soluk görüntülerden sıkıldınız mı? Sektör standardı olan V-Ray'in gücünü tam olarak kullanamadığınızı mı düşünüyorsunuz?
Bu yoğunlaştırılmış V-Ray eğitimi, en sık karşılaşılan render problemlerini kökünden çözmek ve size 3ds Max içinde profesyonel kalitede, kusursuz görseller üretebilmeniz için gereken "uzmanlık seviyesinde" becerileri kazandırmak üzere tasarlandı. Karmaşık görünen tüm ayarları basitleştirerek, temiz, keskin ve doğru aydınlatılmış render'lar almanın en net yolunu öğreneceksiniz.
Bu Kursta Hangi Problemleri Çözeceğiz?
Parazit (Noise) ve Grenlenme: Render'larınızı lekesiz ve pürüzsüz hale getirecek Anti-aliasing ve render ayarları.
Işık Patlamaları ve Karanlık Alanlar: Sahnenizdeki aydınlatmayı dengeleyerek her detayın doğru görünmesini sağlayan Global Illumination teknikleri.
Bulanık ve Soluk Görüntüler: Netliği ve keskinliği artırarak görsellerinize profesyonel bir bitiş kazandıran ayarlar.
Uzun Render Süreleri: Kaliteden ödün vermeden render süresini kısaltan optimizasyon stratejileri.
Bu Kurs Kariyer Yolculuğunuzun Neresinde? (Portfolyo Kampı)
Bu eğitim, sektörde bir standart olan V-Ray'de ustalaşmanızı sağlayan, 8 Haftalık Portfolyo Kampı'nın en kritik modüllerinden biridir (6. Hafta). Bu kamp, AutoCAD, 3ds Max Modelleme ve diğer modern render motorları (Corona, Lumion) gibi yetkinliklerin yanına, V-Ray gibi vazgeçilmez bir aracı ekleyerek portfolyonuzu kurşun geçirmez hale getirir.
Bu kurs kimler için ideal?
V-Ray ile aldığı render'ların kalitesini artırmak isteyen Mimarlar ve İç Mimarlar.
Portfolyoları için sektör standardı işler üretmek zorunda olan 3D Sanatçılar.
3ds Max'te temel bilgisi olup, render konusunda profesyonelleşmek isteyen öğrenciler ve tasarımcılar.
Hatalı render'larla vakit kaybetmeyi bırakın. V-Ray'de ustalaşmak ve portfolyonuza değer katmak için hemen başlayın!
*
ATTENTION: THE PRIMARY LANGUAGE OF INSTRUCTION FOR THIS COURSE IS TURKISH. ENGLISH SUBTITLES AND SUPPORTING TEXTS ARE PROVIDED.
Are you tired of constant noise, blown-out highlights, and washed-out images in your renders? Do you feel you're not harnessing the full power of the industry-standard V-Ray?
This intensive V-Ray course is designed to solve the most common rendering problems and equip you with the expert-level skills needed to produce flawless, professional-quality visuals in 3ds Max. You will learn the clearest path to achieving clean, sharp, and perfectly lit renders by simplifying all the seemingly complex settings.
What You Will Master in This Course:
Solving Render Issues: Eliminate noise, artifacts, and light bleeding with advanced Global Illumination and Anti-aliasing settings.
Professional Lighting & Camera: Master V-Ray Sun, HDRI lighting, and physical camera settings for realistic results.
Optimized Render Settings: Achieve the best balance between quality and speed for your final renders.
Post-Production in Photoshop: Learn professional techniques to enhance your final images.
This course is a critical module (Week 6) of our 8-Week Portfolio Camp, designed to make you a master of V-Ray, an essential tool for any serious 3D professional. Ideal for architects, interior designers, and 3D artists with a basic knowledge of 3ds Max. Join now to stop wasting time on flawed renders and start creating stunning visuals!
*
Eğitmen Hakkında: Emre Timur
Mimar, yazar ve eğitmen Emre Timur, 15 yılı aşkın mesleki tecrübesiyle tasarımdan yapay zekaya uzanan geniş bir yelpazede eğitimler vermektedir. Udemy'de 35.000'den fazla öğrenciye ulaşan ve Bestseller rozetine sahip olan Timur, yayımlanmış dokuz kitabın yazarıdır. Eğitim felsefesi; zamanınıza değer veren, tempolu, küresel kalitede ve en güncel bilgileri sunarak size sadece bir programı değil, o programla neler yapabileceğinize dair özgüven kazandırmayı hedefler.
target_audience: İç Mimarlar ve İç Mimarlık Öğrencileri
Mimarlar ve Mimarlık Öğrencileri
Peyzaj Mimarları ve Peyzaj Mimarlığı Öğrencileri
Tasarımcılar, Mühendisler ve Eğitmenler

courses.title: Colour Secrets for Professional Home Stagers

objectives: Understanding colour is a key requirement for all home stagers. We introduce you to the key principles of colour, & how it is practically applied when staging
COLOUR BASICS - Colour is key for home staging. Learn the basics, including how to choose & add colour, how colours work together, & how light affects colour

COLOUR BASICS - Colour is KEY! Learn the basics, from how to choose and add colour; how colours work together and how light affects colour.
PAINT BASICS - Learn all you need to know about paint. From the basics of paint, which paints to choose, and the best way to test your paints.
COLOUR THEORY  - Learn the principles of colour theory, how to use the colour wheel and how to successfully use colour in real rooms.

Once you have ideas of interior construction and understand materials on site and technical terminology, the next step is observing all things on site. This course is intricately designed to equip students with the necessary details on construction method, materials from basics to advance.


To understand interior construction, firstly, an individual needs to be acquainted with basic materials, its types, and different terminologies associated with it. The course is divided into 12 topics including the introduction video to IDL.

Hi everyone, I'm Madhavi. Let me tell you a bit about myself. I'm an engineer with a passion for interior design. During the COVID-19 pandemic, my interest intensified. Coincidentally, the rapid advancements in AI during this time inspired me to combine my technical skills with my love for interior design.
This beginner-level course focuses on how AI can be used in interior design. We're at an exciting juncture where we can finally use this technology to personalize our spaces. We'll explore tools like ChatGPT, MidJourney, and Perplexity, with a strong emphasis on practical applications.

Understand the basics of AI in interior design
Use key AI tools to enhance your design process while learning their limitations.
And discover how to apply AI techniques to your own design projects
You'll see demos of various design scenarios. No prior experience with AI or interior design is required – just bring your creativity and willingness to learn!

courses.title: Interior Types of Ceiling - Harmonious Ceiling
courses.bio: A complete guide to ceiling types: design, usage, materials, practical tips, and common mistakes to avoid
objectives: Types of ceilings and their applications
Challenges while implementing any ceiling
Material awareness
Standard structures, size, and shape of a ceiling
How to select a type of ceiling for any space

Interior Types of Ceiling - Harmonious C: Bonus - The Power of Setting Short Term Goals

requirements: Open to all learners
courses.description:
Master Ceiling Design: Learn Types, Applications, and Styling Techniques
Ceilings are one of the most overlooked yet impactful elements of interior spaces. From grand museums and libraries to iconic monuments and cinematic masterpieces, ceiling designs have shaped the way we experience architecture and interiors.
This course is designed to help interior designers, architects, stylists, and creative enthusiasts understand the technical and creative aspects of ceiling design. Learn how a variety of ceilings can transform the look and feel of a space, and gain insights into their materials, functionality, and installation techniques.
Whether you’re working on residential or commercial spaces, or simply passionate about design, this course equips you with the knowledge to make ceilings a statement feature in your projects.
What You’ll Learn
Explore different types of ceilings and their unique applications
Understand materials, functionality, and structural aspects
Learn professional tips and tricks for ceiling installations
Discover the do’s and don’ts of ceiling design and styling
Gain creative inspiration to elevate interior spaces
Course Overview
This course is structured into 12 detailed modules, covering a wide variety of ceiling types and their applications:
1. Introduction to Ceiling Design
Understand why ceilings are an essential element in interior spaces and how they influence aesthetics and functionality.
2. Types of Ceilings Covered
Suspended Ceilings
Wooden Ceilings
PVC Ceilings
Mineral Fibre Ceilings
Tray Ceilings
Coved Ceilings
Vaulted Ceilings
Dome Ceilings
Concrete Ceilings
Hipped Ceilings
Beamed Ceilings
Coffered Ceilings
Each module explores their construction techniques, uses, challenges, and styling potential with practical tips for application.
Why Take This Course?
Understand the technical details of ceiling types and materials
Learn how to design and implement ceilings that elevate interiors
Avoid common mistakes and learn professional best practices
Perfect for design students, hobbyists, and professionals alike
Who This Course is For
Interior designers and architects
Aspiring stylists and home decorators
Hobbyists passionate about design and creativity
Bloggers and content creators focusing on interiors
Design Ceilings That Make a Statement
Join this course and take your knowledge of ceiling design to the next level. Learn how to combine technical know-how with creative vision to create interiors that inspire.
target_audience: An individual aspiring to grow in the field of Interior Design, Interior Styling and Interior Practice
Aspiring and Professional Artists, designers, stylists, students, architects, set designers, entrepreneurs, and other learners
One for All – beginner to proficient individuals in the domains of Interior Design
Enthusiasts who want knowledge on types of ceiling

courses.title: Learn SketchUp Pro the Right Way!
courses.bio: Learn SketchUp from an expert. Build strong habits and create accurate, efficient 3D models like a pro.
objectives: Build a complete 3D model of an interior space using professional SketchUp techniques
Add and adjust furniture, materials, and textures to create realistic, detailed designs
Create basic renderings and animations to visualize your work
Export models to LayOut and develop polished presentation documents with dimensions and notes

Modeling from Scratch: Using the Component Tool Palette / Window
Creating and Working with Components: Making Design Changes to the Bookcase
Importing an Oversized Component from the 3D Warehouse
Creating the Knob Component on the Cabinet
Creating Book Components on the Shelves
Adding Materials and Textures: Creating a Seamless Texture from a Google Image Search
Adding the Small Details: Creating a Door Frame and Panel Divide with 1001 Bit Tools
Simplifying and Creating a Cleaner Sliding Glass Door Unit
Creating Artwork as a Glue to Component: Overview of Glue to and Cut Opening
Working with Tags and Scenes: Overview of Tags (2020-2021) vs Layers (older versions of SketchUp )
Position Camera and Setting the Field of View
Preparing a Model for LayOut: Creating Rendering Views and a Plan View
Sending to LayOut and Setting up a Document
Creating a Document in LayOut: On Every Page Text for Titleblock
Updating and Relinking the SketchUp Model

requirements: SketchUp Pro 2021 or newer recommended (older versions and SketchUp Free will also work)
PC or Mac (both versions demonstrated throughout the course)
A 3-button scroll wheel mouse is highly recommended for efficient modeling
courses.description:
Learn SketchUp the right way — by building strong modeling habits and mastering real-world workflows.
Taught by Daniel Brown — a full-time SketchUp trainer, consultant, and educator with over 15 years of experience helping architects, designers, and contractors master 3D workflows. This isn’t a side hustle or a casual passion project — it’s my career and expertise.
This course is built for SketchUp users who want to model professionally. Whether you're a motivated beginner or an experienced user, you'll learn how to create organized, real-world 3D models and polished presentations using SketchUp Pro.
You'll start by setting up your custom template and toolbars for efficiency, then dive into SketchUp’s core modeling tools.
Throughout the course, you'll build a simple living room space from scratch — creating walls, adding doors and windows, and organizing your model using groups and components. You’ll learn to place and adjust furniture, apply materials and textures, and incorporate custom artwork to bring your space to life.
As you progress, you'll add architectural details like trim and baseboards, use tags for better visibility control, and create scenes to save views for renderings, plans, and elevations.
Finally, you'll send your model into LayOut, SketchUp’s presentation tool, where you’ll create a polished document complete with title blocks, dimensions, labels, and design notes.
By the end of this course, you'll have the skills to model interior spaces efficiently, organize projects professionally, and produce real-world documentation ready for clients, presentations, or project teams.
target_audience: Beginners who want to build strong, professional SketchUp skills from the start
Current SketchUp users who know the basics but want to model faster, smarter, and more accurately
Interior designers, architects, contractors, and creatives who need organized, real-world 3D models and professional presentation documents
Anyone serious about using SketchUp for real projects

courses.title: Fees and Charging for Residential Interior Designers
courses.bio: Learn how to price your interior design services, calculate fees, and present proposals professionally.
objectives: Identify the different ways residential interior designers can charge for their services
Calculate appropriate fees for a range of project types and service structures
Select the most suitable pricing model for each client and project
Structure a clear, persuasive fee proposal using professional language and layout
Present your fees confidently in client meetings and consultations
Manage the proposal process from initial inquiry to onboarding and first invoice
Design a storyboard layout for your own Signature Fee Proposal document

Introduction: An Introduction To Fees And Charging For Residential Interior Designers
The Different Ways To Charge For Your Se: Charging A Percentage Of Contract Value
Calculating Your Hourly Rate: How To Calculate A Bespoke Rate For Your Business
How To Use The Calculating Tool
Wrapping Up The Class: Thank You For Taking This Class

requirements: No particular software is needed to complete this course, however some course downloads are in Microsoft Office formats (Word and Excel).
courses.description:
If you’ve ever felt unsure about what to charge - or anxious about presenting your fees to a client—you’re not alone.
In this comprehensive class, interior design business coach and former design school director Julia Begbie guides you through the entire process of pricing your design services with confidence, clarity, and professionalism. Whether you’re just starting out or refining an established practice, this course will help you understand the value you bring - and how to communicate it.
You’ll learn:
All the ways interior designers charge for their work
How to calculate your fees accurately and fairly
How to structure and present a compelling fee proposal
What to say (and what not to say) in a client meeting about money
10 powerful tips for managing this process smoothly - drawn from decades of experience
This course is designed to give you practical tools and the mindset shift needed to stop second-guessing your worth.
You’ll also get access to a Signature Fee Proposal storyboard project - a creative opportunity to design the layout and flow of your dream client proposal, from cover page to final call to action.
Templates (including an hourly rate calculator, fee calculator, and various client-facing documents), suggestions, and examples are included to help you get started.
target_audience: This course is designed for residential interior designers at any stage of business who want to feel more confident and in control when it comes to pricing their services.

courses.title: 3D Interior Visualization by 3ds Max in a fast efficient way
courses.bio: Use 3ds Max to make a Photo-Realistic Interior Visualization using V-Ray and its tools. No skills needed
objectives: Create 3d spaces in a fast and efficient way
Create realistic lighting for an interior fast
Use V-Ray materials to create a realistic render fast
Insert pre-made 3d models and use them to create photorealistic renders fast

Converting the 2D shape into a 3D Model: Inserting the Built-In Doors and Windows in 3ds Max
Lighting and Materials: Create Lighting for the Living Room and Assigning Materials
Finalizing the Shot: Loading Pre-Made 3D Models and Post-Production using V-Ray

requirements: No skills needed
courses.description:
Use 3ds Max to make a Photo-Realistic Interior Visualization using V-Ray and its tools. No skills needed. We'll use 3ds Max tools to trace the imported AutoCAD Drawing. Then use 3ds Max Modifiers and Objects to create the walls and subtract the openings. Insert built-in doors and windows provided with 3ds Max.

Make a lighting setup that's suitable for a 3D Floor Plan using V-Ray Lights like V-Ray Dome Light and V-Ray Plane Light. Make a natural light scenario for the living room by adding V-Ray Sun.

Use V-Ray built-in materials like Paint and Wood Materials to create materials for the room. Insert 3d Models from a pre-made scene and customize them for our shot. Use some modifiers to edit the geometry and make them fit to our scene and delete the unwanted objects.

Then use V-Ray VRay Frame Buffer (VFB) Post-Production tools and layers to enhance the look of the shot.

This course is for the beginners and intermediate users alike that wish to enhance their workflow to create compelling 3d shots in a fast manner with little to no effort. A very straightforward  simple yet effective approach.
You'll enjoy this workflow and there's a guarantee 30 days to have your money back if you are not satisfied. What are you waiting for, enroll now !
target_audience: Beginner users of 3ds max and intermediate users who want an efficient pipeline for rendering projects fast

courses.title: Ahşap Oyma Öğrenin
courses.bio: Bu dersleri izleyerek ahşap çentik oyma (chipcarving) alanında eserler oluşturabilirsiniz.
objectives: Çentik oyma yöntemiyle ahşap oyma öğrenin.
Ahşap oyma tasarımı hakkında bilgi edinin.
Kullanabileceğiniz malzeme çeşitlerini öğrenin.
Diğer oyma tekniklerinden daha ekonomik olacak tasarımlar yapın
requirements: Ahşap malzemeyi ve kesici bıçakları temin etmeniz yeterli olacaktır. Gerisi videolarda mevcuttur.
courses.description:
Ahşap üzerine aktarılan bir motifin bazı bölgeleri çıkarılarak, motife derinlik verilmesi, boyama ve eskitme teknikleriyle de bu derinliğin daha da ilgi çekici hale getirilmesi sanatıdır. Eski kültürlerde de sıklıkla kullanılan ahşap oyma sanatı genellikle tarihi yapılarda taş ve mermer malzemeler üzerinde kendini göstermektedir. Türk süsleme sanatında çok önemli bir yeri olan ahşap oyma, özellikle Selçuklu ve Osmanlı dönemlerinde yoğun olarak kullanılmış ve çok sayıda ahşap oyma eser oluşturulmuştur. Osmanlı döneminden günümüze kalan bir çok ahşap yapı ve mimari eserde ahşap oymanın zengin uygulama örneklerini görmek mümkündür. Ahşap oyma yönteminde motif oluşturma basamaklarını bir kaç alt başlıkta incelemek gerekirse;
*Motif Çizme
*Milimetrik Kâğıt Üzerine Çizimi
*Eskiz Üzerine Çizimi
*Motif Büyültme ve Küçültme
*Orantı
*Kareleme Yöntemi
*Fotokopi
*Motif Aktarma
teknikleri ile ahşap oyma yöntemine başlayabilirsiniz. Bu kursta motif aktarma yöntemiyle çentik oyma tekniği öğretilmektedir. Bu kurs için alacağınız bir ahşap ürüne istediğiniz motifi aktarabilir ve bu motifi oyma yaparak zengin görseller elde edebilirsiniz. Alacağınız ahşap ürün için başlangıç seviyesinde ayous ağacı tercih edilmesi uygun olacaktır. Sonrasında pratiklik kazandıkça ıhlamur, kayın, ceviz veya mahun ağaçları da tercih edilebilir. Kesici bıçak için 3 Numara neşter sapı ile 11 Numara neşter ucu kullanımı uygun olacaktır. Motife ve el yatkınlığına göre ilerleyen zamanlarda farklı neşter uçları da kullanılabilir.
target_audience: Ahşap oyma tekniğine ilgi duyan, evinin görselliğine katkı sunmak isteyen herkes için.

courses.description:
تهدف الدورة إلى توفير المعلومات الأساسية التي يحتاجها المصمم والمهندسون المعماريون قبل بدء عملية التصميم الداخلي.


وتجمع المعلومات المقدمة في الدورة بين الخبرات العلمية والعملية المقدمة وفقاً لمبدأ الصورة والمعلّق عليها بالتفسير والتحليل.


تركز الدورة على بناء قاعدة معرفية تصميمية وجمالية لدى المصمم تتطلب ذلك قبل بدء أي تصميم وتجنبه الكثير من الارتباك.


تتوفر أيضًا شهادة إتمام مساق بعد اجتياز الامتحانات وإتمام جميع المتطلبات.


وفيما يلي أهم محتويات الدورة:


التعرف على عناصر ومبادئ التصميم من حولنا والتمييز بينها


تعرف على أساسيات تصميم الواجهة والسقف والأرضية في التصميم الداخلي

تعرف على الأنماط المختلفة للتصميم الداخلي وخصائص كل منها


بشكل عام، توفر الدورة المعرفة الأساسية للمصممين والمهندسين المعماريين لإنشاء مشاريع تصميم داخلي ناجحة. من خلال فهم أساسيات التصميم، يمكن للمواد والإضاءة والمصممين إنشاء مساحات وظيفية وجذابة بصريًا.


وتتميز هذه الدورة بأنها مصممة لتناسب جميع المستويات والخلفيات المختلفة، حيث يمكن للمبتدئين والمحترفين الاستفادة منها على حد سواء. كما أنها تعتمد على مجموعة من الأمثلة العملية والتطبيقات العملية المختلفة، مما يساعد على تعزيز قدرات المتدربين في التصميم الداخلي.

وتجمع المعلومات المقدمة في الدورة بين الخبرات العلمية والعملية المقدمة وفقاً لمبدأ الصورة والمعلّق عليها بالتفسير والتحليل.

تتوفر أيضًا شهادة إتمام مساق بعد اجتياز الامتحانات وإتمام جميع المتطلبات.

courses.title: Interior Design Foundations: All-In-One Interior Design
courses.bio: The Full Interior Design Toolkit
objectives: Develop a comprehensive understanding of design principles
Cultivate a strong design aesthetic and personal style
Gain insight into the business side of Interior Design
Gain expertise in design for diverse spaces

Introduction to Interior Design: Definition and Scope of Interior Design
Role of Interior Designers in Different Settings

requirements: No prior design experience needed!
courses.description:
Have you ever dreamed of designing beautiful, functional spaces that reflect your personal style? Whether you’re a beginner or have a passion for design, this course is your ultimate guide to mastering the art of interior design.
In this comprehensive course, you’ll learn the principles and elements of design, how to use color and lighting effectively, and how to choose furniture and decor that perfectly suits your space. From creating mood boards to mastering layouts, you’ll gain hands-on knowledge and practical skills that can be applied to any room, whether it’s a cozy bedroom, a productive office, or a vibrant living room.
You will explore how to balance aesthetics with functionality. You’ll also learn tips for budgeting, sourcing materials, and working with different design styles—from minimalist to eclectic and everything in between.
By the end of this course, you’ll have the confidence to create stunning interiors that not only look amazing but also feel uniquely yours. Whether you're redesigning your home or aspiring to become a professional interior designer, this course is the perfect place to start. You’ll discover that great design is not about following trends but about creating timeless spaces that truly resonate with you.
Join me today and let’s bring your design dreams to life!
target_audience: This course is for anyone looking to learn the essentials of Interior Design - whether for your own home or to break into the world of Interior Design in a professional way.

No se necesita conocimiento para nada en diseño o en el programa ya que la clase es desde lo más básico
courses.description:
En este curso veremos desde lo más básico de sketchup el uso de las herramientas que se necesita para crear geometrías básicas, haciendo algunos módulos para poder entender el concepto de la creación de muebles modulares, el paso por el uso de herramientas de desplazamiento, rotar, mover, tratando de que sea la manera más sencilla y práctica.
Se entenderá herramientas de optimización de corte que nos ayuda a calcular la cantidad de planchas de melamina y se comparará con algunas empresas fuertes como Arauco, Edimca y Masisa, el saber que se puede utilizar las páginas de ellos pero directamente podremos usar nuestro propio pluging.
Se utilizará inteligencia artificial para nuestro trabajo porderlo representar de manera realista de una forma sencilla y real a nuestros clientes para poder obtener mejores recursos visuales.
A diferencia de poder solamente hacer un mueble simbólico en sketchup que si bien ayuda a la parte de render o visual, el tener mueblería y material propio ayuda a que a futuros trabajos se haga más fácil el desarrollo del diseño, cuantificación de costos y su respectiva representación hará que se puede entender de mejora manera la construcción de los muebles y generar mejor rentabilidad en el tema laboral.
target_audience: Carpinteros
Arquitectos
Muebleristas
Diseñadores 3d
Personas que trabajen en la construcción de vivienda

requirements: Cette formation ne nécessite pas de prérequis.
courses.description:
Description
Bienvenue à notre formation sur le design d'intérieur ! Durant ces moments passés ensemble, vous allez acquérir toutes les compétences nécessaires pour maîtriser les principes du design et concevoir des projets originaux. Vous découvrirez également l'histoire de l'architecture, ce qui vous permettra de mieux appréhender les différents styles décoratifs et de les maîtriser dans vos projets.
Vous apprendrez à identifier ces différents styles décoratifs et à comprendre comment les utiliser de manière appropriée pour créer des ambiances originales et personnelles. Vous développerez les compétences clés nécessaires pour concevoir des espaces intérieurs harmonieux et esthétiquement agréables du sol au plafond, en accord avec les souhaits et les goûts de tous.
Notre formation vous montrera également comment associer les textiles à chaque pièce et à chaque usage, en distinguant les différentes caractéristiques des tissus et leur utilisation appropriée dans un contexte d'aménagement intérieur.
En explorant l'histoire de l'architecture, vous comprendrez comment, souvent, le contexte socioculturel a façonné les différents styles de mobilier à travers les époques ; cela vous donnera une vision globale de l'évolution du design d'intérieur au fil du temps et la logique qui la sous-tend.
Notre formation est conçue pour vous offrir une expérience d'apprentissage enrichissante et pratique, avec des exemples concrets pour renforcer vos compétences en design d'intérieur. Un designer d’intérieur est aussi un entrepreneur : c’est pourquoi nous joignons un module consacré à la relation client, ainsi qu’un autre destiné à la communication visuelle. Enfin, l’éthique étant notre préoccupation première, nous vous enjoignons à adopter un comportement de « créateur durable » dans le dernier module de la formation. Rejoignez-nous et développez vos connaissances en design d'intérieur pour concevoir des projets alliant l’esthétique au confort afin de créer des espaces intérieurs uniques et tendances qui répondent aux besoins et aux aspirations de vos clients.
target_audience: Cette formation s’adresse à tous ceux et toutes celles qui souhaitent développer leurs connaissances du design.
