requirements: Measuring tape to measure room
Ruler
Pen/pencil (pencil is preferred)
courses.description:
Do you find yourself struggling to pull together a room in a way that is both functional and aesthetically pleasing?
Do you think that interior design is all art and no science?
If you answered yes to either or both of these questions, then this is the class for you!  In this course, you will learn that you can actually use an easy, systematic approach for creating beautiful and functional designs for the primary rooms  in your home, primarily focusing on family and living rooms, dining rooms, and bedrooms.  (Please note that this class does not cover kitchen or bath design).  This course is primarily lecture based, but does contain activities along the way to help you immediately apply what you've learned, as well as a quiz at the end.
By the end of this beginner course, you will be able to completely design a room end-to-end using a simple 10-step approach.  Specifically, you will learn how to:
Measure a room to maximize the use of your space and select appropriately sized furniture
Create your ideal floor plan (various sample floor plans are provided)
Identify your preferred interior design style(s)
Create a cohesive interior design color scheme
Select the appropriate sized rug and furniture for a room
Efficiently shop for furniture online
Create a layered lighting scheme
Learn the secret for making off-the-shelf drapes look custom
This course also covers:
Using focal points to take your design to the next level
Considerations and challenges for open floor plans
How/when to use wallpaper in your design
Common design challenges, including but not limited to, how to brighten rooms with little light, child and/or pet friendly design choices, and design techniques for irregular shaped rooms
My favorite AI and technology tools to accelerate and enhance the skills you learned in this course
The ideal student for this course is a person who is interested in creating functional and aesthetically pleasing rooms in their home, but does not already have a lot of knowledge in interior design.
IMPORTANT NOTES:
If you are interested in taking most or all of my courses, I have a recommended order in which to watch them (although it's certainly not required).  I would start with "How to Design a Room in 10 Easy Steps" because most of my other courses are in-depth classes of the concepts touched on in this 10 step class.  Following the 10 Step Course, I suggest moving on to "How to Use Color Like a Pro", followed by "How to Work with Interior Design Styles Like a Pro", then "How to Use Lighting Design to Transform your Home", and finally "Design is in the Details".

My other five courses, "How to Use Minimalist Interior Design to Live your Best Life",  "Use Eco-friendly, Sustainable Design to Improve Your Life", "How to Design Your Dream Kitchen", "How to Design Your Dream Bathroom", and "Everything Small Home Design" are all stand alone classes on specialty topics within interior design, and therefore, can be taken in any order.

Please be aware that this course, or any of my courses, is not intended to provide all of the knowledge needed to become a professional interior designer.  As with any professional field, there is a significant amount of education and/or experience that is needed to achieve competency in this field.  My intention with these courses is to provide some solid foundational knowledge to assist either those individuals interested in "DIY" interior design to work on their own projects more effectively, or to provide supplemental education to both interior design students and professionals.
target_audience: This is best suited for individuals with limited knowledge of interior design.

This course is for anyone who wants to learn how to create/design a well-pulled together looking room (e.g., family room, living room, dining room, and bedroom). This course does not cover interior design for kitchens or bathrooms

When I’m off to an installation, the one thing I never leave home without is my trusty “bag of tricks”. See my list of some of the basic essential go-to items: Measuring Tape, Note Pad or Phone, Hammer and Nails, Level, Picture Hooks (various sizes), Screw Drivers, Glue Gun, Gorilla Glue/Crazy Glue, Mr. Clean Magic Eraser, Lint Brush, Spot Remover, Goo Gone, Furniture Polish, Silver Polishing Cloth, Light Bulbs, Touch-up Pens; Sharpies Fabric Steamer, Extension Cords, Furniture Glides, Felt Pads, Extra Lamp Harps, Risers & Finials.
courses.description:
A ROOM SO PERFECT, YOU WON'T BELIEVE YOU DESIGNED IT.
In Jonathan Rosen’s online interior design course, Refind, you’ll learn how to dramatically transform any room in one day – with virtually no budget! Refind is an eight episode video course where Jonathan shows you, step by step, how to transform any room in one day. He’ll share the secrets he’s learned from decades of creating high-end residential homes and demonstrate how you can apply them to elevate your space into a luxurious environment you’ll look forward to coming home to everyday.
WHAT REFIND DELIVERS
After signing up, you will get access to eight online modules where Jonathan demystifies the interior design process. You’ll get tips, inspiration, and clear direction on how to transform any room into a striking interior space that is uniquely you.
You’ll learn how to evaluate and curate collections of furniture, objects and artwork (most of which you already own) to cultivate a distinct style, and create a space that tells your story and evokes a distinct feeling.

With the knowledge, confidence and skills gained from the eight module course, you will be more than ready to transform your space into one you’ll never want to leave.
target_audience: Interior designers or novice interior designers who are interested in learning the fundamentals of good design
Home DIYers who want to learn how to elevate their space
New homeowners looking to bring old furniture and accessories into a new space
For those who are upscaling or downsizing their homes and want to know how to use their own items in the new space

requirements: Vous devez vous inscrire sur le site Floorplanner
courses.description:
Floorplanner
Floorplanner est un logiciel qui permet de créer un plan en 2D et d'obtenir en temps réel le rendu en 3D. Ce logiciel est spécialisé pour le design d'intérieur, mais il est aussi possible d'élargir sur l'aménagement extérieur. Le logiciel permet d'optimiser tous les designs d'intérieur grâce au système de cliquer déposer avec des tailles préréglées. En effet, il est rapide d'ajouter des portes, des fenêtres, ou encore du mobilier grâce à sa vaste bibliothèque. Le changement vers la vue 3D est très puissant avec une vue en temps réel du rendu du plan. On peut ainsi se déplacer dans les pièces pour voir son aménagement. Il est ensuite possible d'exporter les vues. Floorplanner propose une version totalement gratuite. Cette version donne accès à toutes les fonctionnalités de design. En revanche, il faudra acheter des crédits si on veut exporter son projet avec des formats haute qualité ou si on veut travailler sur plusieurs niveaux.


A qui s'adresse le logiciel
- Les particuliers qui veulent créer un rendu de leur futur appartement, maison ou simplement faire le design d'une pièce.
- Les entrepreneurs qui exercent pour le design d'intérieur. Cet outil ergonomique permet de faire des présentations et des rendus pour les clients, aussi bien en vue plan 2D que en vue 3D.
- Les agences immobilières qui veulent un outil ergonomique pour donner des idées aux clients et créer des rendus de projets.


La formation
Dans cette formation vous allez apprendre à utiliser l'outil en ligne Floorplanner. Etape par étape, efficacement, vous serez capable de créer vos designs de pièces, de maisons ou encore d'appartement. Utilisation du tableau de bord, gestion de la navigation, maitrise des différents outils de conception pour créer son plan en 2D. courses.title: Fitments and Paraphernalia
courses.bio: Fitments and Paraphernalia in Interior Styling
objectives: 1. Introduction to a variety of furniture in residential and commercial spaces.

3. Furniture and furnishings in a hospital.
4. Essentials of furniture for kids’ bedroom.

requirements: Open to all learners
courses.description:
Did you know, the Bodleian Library has the world’s oldest bookcase!? Yes! Now imagine if bookcases and bookshelves do not exist, then how would we organise books and categorise them according to their genre. Would you even want to visit a library which has no chairs or tables to sit on and read or no organised books? Probably not.
Chairs, tables, bookshelves, cupboards, etc. are an important part of our lives. Furniture has become an integral part of our lives. It adds comfort to our life. Therefore, furniture planning is one of the most vital aspects of Interior Designing and Styling. It allows you to create a layout of your room during your shopping process, so that it makes it much easier to buy the right furniture for your space.
This module Fitments and Paraphernalia in Interior Styling has been categorised into two sections -
1. Residential Furniture & Furnishings
2. Commercial Furniture & Furnishings
Do you know now a days terraces or balconies are giving more importance than living room?  Rather some people are attracted because of spacious and open balcony space. They consider balcony whenever they purchase a new home. This open space is perfect for sit outs, small gathering and tea parties. In addition, people love t add garden furniture to make it more amazing. Do you want to learn more about it with related styling ideas?
For your ease of understanding this module is divided into two categories, i.e., Residential aur Commercial Furniture & Furnishings. Firstly, we’ll go through the styling ideas for the residential sector then we will discuss another one.
The Fitments and Paraphernalia module that is offered by IDL teaches you everything about Fitments and Paraphernalia in Interior Styling. You will learn about a variety of Furniture options for rooms of Residential and Commercial spaces with its significance, challenges, solutions, and styling ideas.
target_audience: 1. An individual aspiring to grow in the field of Interior Design, Interior Styling and Interior Practice.
2. Aspiring and Professional Artists, designers, stylists, students, architects, set designers, entrepreneurs, and other learners.
3. One for All – beginner to proficient individuals in the domains of Interior Design.
4. Enthusiasts who want knowledge on furniture and furnishings in residential and commercial spaces.

This course is for you. This course is designed in a way that will help hobbyists, aspiring and professional creators, artists, bloggers, stylists, and designers learn the technical and creative process and efforts behind some of the most popular Décor and Lifestyle brands in the world. Um dos diferencial é que no curso tudo é construído com medidas, mostrando várias técnicas para usar as ferramentas do programas para esse proposito.

El más importante requisito para realizar este curso es el entusiasmo y la motivación por aprender nuevas habilidades que aumenten tus competencias profesionales.
courses.description:
Experto en Diseño y Ejecución de Escaleras
Conviértete en un Experto en el Diseño de Escaleras de cualquier tipología
Instructores: Arquitecto Álvaro García y Arquitecta Lucía Fernández  Actualizado: Octubre del 2025 Estudiantes: +1.000 Requisitos previos: Ninguno


Descripción del Curso:
Domina el diseño y la ejecución de escaleras de cualquier tipología (rectas, en “L”, “U”, caracol, voladas) con un método claro y profesional. Aprenderás a calcular huella y contrahuella, pendientes óptimas, ancho útil y descansos, así como a resolver estructuras en madera, acero, hormigón y vidrio. Integra normativa, accesibilidad y seguridad, barandillas y pasamanos, protección frente a caídas e incendios, y iluminación para una experiencia cómoda y segura.
Lleva tus ideas a obra con detalles constructivos, modelos CAD/BIM, listados de materiales y control de costes y tolerancias. Descubre soluciones de anclaje, acústica y vibraciones, y comunica tus propuestas con renders y láminas de alto impacto. Un curso de Udemy para todos los niveles, pensado para que diseñes escaleras bellas, funcionales y eficientes, listas para fabricar y montar con confianza.
Cuando hablamos de escalera, nos referimos principalmente al elemento arquitectónico con la función de conectar dos planos horizontales a distinto nivel de altura, con una trayectoria habitualmente en diagonal a través de la superposición de peldaños o escalones consecutivos, facilitando el desplazamiento a lo largo de la misma.
En los proyectos arquitectónicos contemporáneos los elementos de escalera representan un elemento articulador y organizador en nuestros diseños. Nos van a permitir desplazarnos  entre los distintos niveles que constituyen el edificio. Durante el curso conoceremos los múltiples diseños, modelos y tipologías de escaleras que podremos encontrar actualmente. Además veremos el proceso de diseño y ejecución de escaleras de principio a fin.
La formación te permitirá convertirte en un experto en el diseño y ejecución de escaleras, y todo ello desde una formación principalmente práctica. A través de variadas actividades y proyectos completos podrás adquirir los conocimientos suficientes para ejercer profesionalmente de forma solvente. Además conocerás en detalle mi flujo de trabajo a la hora de afrontar un proyecto profesional de diseño de escaleras de cualquier tipología


Itinerario Formativo:
Introducción a la plataforma de formación Udemy
Bienvenida al Curso Experto en Diseño y Ejecución de Escaleras
Introducción al Diseño de Escaleras

Emisión del Certificado de Finalización del Curso Experto en Diseño y Ejecución de Escaleras


Objetivos del curso
Aprenderás a diseñar y ejecutar escaleras de cualquier tipología (rectas, en L/U, helicoidales, caracol, voladas): cálculo de huella/contrahuella, pendiente y descansos, normativa y accesibilidad, estructuras (madera, acero, hormigón, vidrio), barandillas/pasamanos, antideslizantes e iluminación. Dominarás detalles constructivos, uniones y anclajes, control de vibraciones, documentación CAD/BIM, presupuesto y planificación de fabricación y montaje.


Salidas profesionales
Te capacita para trabajar en estudios de arquitectura/interiorismo, constructoras, carpinterías metálicas y de madera, empresas de prefabricados o como freelance especializado en diseño, cálculo, detailing y supervisión de escaleras. Añadirás un servicio de alto valor en retail, residencial, hospitality y equipamientos, mejorando tu empleabilidad con planos, memorias y listados listos para obra.


Dirigido a
Arquitectos, ingenieros, interioristas, delineantes, modeladores BIM, jefes de obra y fabricantes que buscan perfeccionar el diseño de escaleras con criterios de seguridad, ergonomía y estética. También para estudiantes y profesionales que desean un método claro, con plantillas, checklists y buenas prácticas para pasar del concepto al montaje con confianza.


Metodología de Aprendizaje:
Recuerda que este curso incluye lecciones en vídeo fullHD con audio de estudio (compatible con TV, PC, Mac, tablet y smartphone), artículos didácticos, actividades, animaciones, ilustraciones, proyectos paso a paso, recursos descargables, links de interés, acceso de por vida, certificado de finalización, tutorización online, y una exclusiva comunidad de aprendizaje privada que nos ayudamos aportando nuestras experiencias en el foro de comunicación del curso.
La modalidad de este curso te permite que empieces y acabes cuando tú quieras, marcando el ritmo de la clase según tu disponibilidad. Puedes volver a visualizar lo que te interese, saltar el contenido que ya domines, hacer preguntas, resolver dudas, compartir tus proyectos... Puedes elegir ver todas las lecciones de forma secuencial (lineal) y aprovecharlas al máximo la formación, pero también puedes decidir ver este curso como una guía de referencia.
Las clases están claramente organizadas en secciones y lecciones, puedes decidir visualizar solo las clases que te resulten más importantes según tus necesidades formativas. La mayoría de las lecciones son independientes para que puedas comprender los conceptos de cada lección sin tener que ver las lecciones anteriores del curso.
Para seguir el programa formativo propuesto no ser requieren conocimientos previos, ya que la formación se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0. El curso está orientado a aquellos creativos que quieran ampliar sus skills (habilidades) y conocer múltiples trucos, consejos, recursos y recomendaciones, de la mano de los instructores Álvaro García y Lucía Fernández. Además la formación disponen de acceso automático al contenido, sin limitación de tiempo, disponibilidad 24/7 (24 horas al día los 7 días de la semana), sin caducidad y con garantía de devolución.


¿A qué esperas?, este curso es ideal para ti, atrévete a convertirte en un experto y expresa tus ideas de la forma que siempre has deseado. Adelante, nos vemos dentro de la formación ;)
target_audience: Arquitectos e interioristas que buscan dominar diseño de escaleras, normativa y accesibilidad para proyectos residenciales y retail.
Ingenieros y delineantes que necesitan cálculo de huella/contrahuella, barandillas, detalles y modelado CAD/BIM listo para obra.
Fabricantes y carpinterías metálicas/madera que quieren optimizar fabricación y montaje: listados de corte, anclajes y calidad.
Jefes de obra y constructores que buscan planificar costes, plazos y seguridad, integrando iluminación y protección contra incendios.
Estudiantes y creativos que desean especializarse en escaleras: rectas, L/U, caracol, helicoidales y voladas, con ergonomía y acabados.

courses.description:
Welcome to the course on " 4 Ways to Decorate Your Home/Bedroom/Guest's & Girl's Room "
A new home is a blank canvas; you get the opportunity to transform each and every room into a personality filled space that you'll adore. Whether you're tired of your old space or you're moving into a new one, decorating it is imperative to adding coziness and charm. Try changing up large aspects of your home along with incorporating small details, for the best results.
Smaller bedrooms can present a challenge to even the best of decorators. With a limited amount of floor space or low ceilings, it can almost feel like you are trying to solve a puzzle. Luckily, with some decorating secrets, a good attitude, and a little creativity, you'll be able to create a beautiful room that feels larger than it actually is. Also, keep in mind that small rooms can be cozy and comfortable.
Good guest room decor should make your guests feel relaxed and welcomed, as though your home is a "home away from home." Stick with a soothing color scheme and fill the room with decorative furnishings that have practical uses. Consider the amenities that a nice hotel room might offer and strive to provide the same level of comfort and convenience with a greater personal touch.
Decorating a teen girl's bedroom doesn't have to mean spending a ton of money on new furniture and accessories. All you need to do is choose a theme and colors, buy or modify furniture, rearrange a bit, and tidy up. Be creative, and a great room can be yours (or your daughter's) with a modest budget.

objectives: 1. Introduction to Space Planning

3. Importance of proportions in Space Excogitate

requirements: Open for all learners
courses.description:
Imagine that you go on a vacation, check-in in a hotel and guess what, the entrance door is too small for a normal built human to enter. Wouldn’t it be uncomfortable for you to walk into a grand hotel with such a crammed up entrance? Think of a mall without enough space to walk. How would you feel wearing clothes which are either four times larger or smaller than the size you usually wear? The thought itself would make anyone uncomfortable.
Knowledge about which object (cupboard, table, chair, toilet, etc.) will occupy how much area along with usable space is what makes a property functional. Space planning is the key to avoid such inconveniences.
Learn how to shape a space using the right kind of décor, furniture, and storage according to the requirements of various residential areas and types of commercial spaces like hotels, hospitals, malls, etc.
This course will help students to get acquainted with the technical and creative aspects of Space Planning. The course has been categorised step by step to guide students understand the crucial aspects of the subject.
1. Introduction to Space Planning, Space Proportion and Anthropometry - These topics will not only introduce you to the topic will establish a base in the form of common terms and terminologies but also give you a headstart to dive deep into the topic.
2. Styling ideas for Residential and Commercial Spaces - The topics covered in this category will give you insightful ideas to style rooms of residential spaces (kitchen, bedroom, dining, guest, and master) and commercial layouts (office, mall, hotel, hotel suite, restaurant, and hospital).
3. Sustainable Design Practice - Understand the significance and need for sustainable design practices and get tips to implement them.
Enroll in this course and get invaluable styling insights on how to make a property operational and comfortable to carry out the functions (residential and commercial) for the purpose it is designed.
target_audience: An individual aspiring to grow in the field of Interior Design, Interior Styling and Interior Practice

objectives: Interior Design of a 3-Bedroom, Hall, Kitchen Flat
Presentation tips for clients after interior design!
Individual Space Planning
Amenities & interior elements that need to be provided in residential projects
Interior Design key points for high profile clients
What should the 3D walkthrough of such projects should look like?
How to make final PPT once the project is completed?
All the documents and drawings used in the course will be available for download!
requirements: No prerequisites.
courses.description:
This is a complete guide for all architects, engineers and interior designers who wish to learn how to do the interior design of a Residential Project.
In this course, you can learn about the various elements involved in interior designing of a 3 BHK Flat.
A 3D walkthrough of entire project is given so that you can visualize the house areas very easily.
In this course, we will see in detail about:
Interior Space & Furniture Planning Of A Luxurious 3 BHK Flat Project With Walk Through & PPT Presentation.
Planning Of Living Room With TV Unit, Sofa, Swing & Entrance Foyer.
Planning Of Dining Area Near To Kitchen.
Planning Of Modular Kitchen, Pull Out Units, Appliances, Chimney.
Planning Of Master Bed Room With WFH Office, Dress Area & Bath With Shower Panels, Artificial Grass Garden Balcony.
Planning Of Parents Bed Room With Study & Attached Bath.
Planning Of Children’s Bed Room With Ferrari Beds Theme, Study Area.
Folded Elevations Of Furniture & Bath Areas.
How To Prepare Final PPT Presentation Of The Project.
Reference Drawings.
Enlarged Plans and 3D views of individual rooms.
Reference 3D models.
Reference 3D Walk Through.
Downloadable AutoCAD drawings of the project.
You will get a lifetime access to all these lectures, AutoCAD drawings, PPTs and the book whenever you want to revisit!
You can also check out another of our courses where we have covered the Architecture Planning & Design of this 3 BHK Flat in detail. You can also download the working drawings and PDFs for reference or for other projects.
So what are you waiting for? Join the course now and create the commercial spaces you always dreamed of!!
target_audience: Anyone interested in learning how to do the interior design and plan a 3 BHK Flat (Residential project). It is suitable for architects, engineers and interior designers aspiring to do their own Residential Architecture & Interior projects!!

courses.title: Neuroarquitetura
courses.bio: Espaços projetados de forma inteligente
objectives: Compreender os conceitos fundamentais que envolvem a neuroarquitetura
Projetar de forma inteligente
Promover o bem estar físico em diferentes espaços
Entender a influencia de um espaço na qualidade de vida das pessoas

Impactos que a neuroarquitetura pode ger: Impactos que a neuroarquitetura pode gerar
Arquitetura de luxo: A neuroarquitetura e a arquitetura de luxo

requirements: Interesse na Arquitetura
Interesse em design de interiores
Interesse em projetos de arquitetura
Interesse na neurociência
Interesse no mercado de imóveis
Interesse no desenvolvimento de projetos arquitetônicos
courses.description:
Você já ouviu falar em neuroarquitetura? Como seriam os espaços se os arquitetos projetassem edifícios com base nas emoções, na cura e na felicidade dos usuários? Hospitais que ajudam na recuperação dos pacientes, escolas que incentivam a criatividade, ambientes de trabalho que deixam permitem aumentar o foco...
Isso é neuroarquitetura: projetar ambientes eficientes baseados não apenas em parâmetros técnicos de legislação, ergonomia e conforto ambiental, mas também em índices subjetivos como emoção, felicidade e bem-estar.


Quantas vezes você já esteve em um lugar, seja um parque, um conjunto habitacional, um shopping, uma casa, um prédio, e se sentiu deprimido e ansioso, ou o contrário, feliz e animado?


Com os avanços da neurociência, fica cada vez mais fácil entender como um ambiente pode influenciar as sensações humanas, como formas, cores e escalas, entre outros elementos.


O curso de NEUROARQUITETURA é uma curso inovador de alto impacto na engenharia, arquitetura e no design de interiores, essencial para profissionais que desejam compreender a aplicação da neurociência à arquitetura e ao design.


Os principais temas da neurociência – emoção, memória, percepção, entre outros – são combinados com elementos de arquitetura e design – iluminação, design biofílico, cores, materiais, entre outros – a fim de melhorar experiência do usuário e o equilíbrio entre funcionalidade e bem-estar. As diversas áreas do conhecimento dentro da Neuroarquitetura são apresentadas através de vídeo aulas exclusivas.
A neuroarquitetura é considerada uma realidade em todo o mundo. E os reflexos deste fenômeno são presentes em praticamente todos os ambientes que frequentamos.


O objetivo deste curso é te ajudar a projetar espaços que possam impactar os usuários de forma profunda através da compreensão do cérebro, e especialmente de pensamentos que permanecem abaixo do nível de consciência. A compreensão do instinto de sobrevivência, emoções, entre outros aspectos, podem transformar a arquitetura em uma ferramenta ainda mais eficiente para a mudança e melhoria do comportamento humano.


Mas porque é preciso estudar neuroarquitetura?
O ambiente pelo qual passamos a maior parte do tempo, muitas vezes, afeta diretamente a nossa saúde mental, por esse motivo, é preciso dar atenção ao que a arquitetura tem a oferecer a fim de elaborar projetos mais intencionais, eficientes e bem-sucedidos, além de proporcionar maior qualidade de vida aos espaços contribuindo com a melhoria de aspectos estéticos.


Nesse curso, utilizaremos uma combinação de vídeos, questionários e materiais para download a fim de garantir a fixação da aprendizagem adquirida neste curso, para que você possa aplicar esse conteúdo em projetos futuros.


O curso foi elaborado e direcionado engenheiros, arquitetos ou entusiastas que sentem necessidade de atualizar os conceitos fundamentais e básicos que cercam a neuro arquitetura.


Ao concluir este curso, você irá adquirir um certificado para atuar no âmbito do território nacional e será capaz de: interpretar as sensações que diferentes tipos de ambientes podem proporcionar aos usuários; aplicar com proficiência técnicas da neuroarquitetura em diferentes ambientes; – Discernir diferentes estratégias para a melhoria do bem-estar e a qualidade de vida de indivíduos em ambientes e muito mais.


Mais do que teorias acadêmicas, você encontrará inspiração e insights para nascer projetos inovadores, arrojados e absolutamente únicos.
target_audience: Engenheiros Civis
Construtores
Designers de Interiores
Administradores
Arquitetos

courses.title: Basics of Design Interior
courses.bio: A detailed course on understanding the basics of designing, their elements and principles, salient features.
objectives: 1. We’ll start by understanding what a DESIGN is!
2. What is Form, Function and Aesthetics.
3. What are the Elements and Principles of Design and what is its significance.
4. What are the zones in a space and their circulation patterns.
5. How to plan a particular space while designing.

Basics of Design English Version: BOD Elements and Principle of Design

requirements: Open to all learners
courses.description:
Understanding a design with the help of its elements and principles builds the foundation of any designing field. Any individual who wants to start their career as an interior designer, architect, or a set designer must have sound knowledge about anthropometry, ergonomics, aesthetics and the interconnection between them.
In this course, all the essential factors are thoroughly explained.
It will also throw light on various techniques of planning a particular space with the help of various examples of forms and spaces and their types. It will also guide you through the process of designing by giving insightful information and show ways to implement them. It will also state the importance of understanding the purpose and the use of the space- whether it is meant to be a residential house, commercial property or an industrial project.
You will learn how to design layouts in a space by mapping the complete floor plan, which helps you estimate the space available for furniture and accessories in advance. When an interior designer is able to integrate design, colours, fenestrations, placements, accessories, etc. altogether in a cohesive fashion, it brings life into the space.
Individuals will also get acquainted with different career prospects of designing their space and giving it the look of their dreams.
target_audience: 1. Anyone who wants to learn about Interior designing.
2. Aspiring and professional students, architects, interior decorators, interior designers, stylists, writers and set designers.
3. Enthusiasts who want to pursue a career in different domains of Interior Design.

4. Anyone who wants knowledge about the basics of designing, presentation techniques, the science of human measurements and the application in interiors, understanding comfort and aesthetics in designing and a lot more.
5. For all entry level to advanced Interior Designers

courses.title: Kitchen Design with Revit
courses.bio: from family creation to layout desing
objectives: Student will learn how to create and publish kitchen designs using Revit
architects, interior designers
requirements: no
courses.description:
In this course you will learn how to design and build kitchen cabinets families and combining them into professional kitchen layouts.
Primevally you will learn how to develop and manipulate casework families adding parameters, materials and categorize then to create kitchen cabinets of any size and style, from classic to contemporaneity.
For this course is not necessary to have previous knowledge of either Revit or kitchen design.
Every step its explained in great detail and all supported files are provided.
The course also include a real life case study project where the student will have the opportunity to put in practice and test all the families previously created.
At the end of this chapter the student will learn a very valuable lesson; how to create a customized template for kitchen designs. This in my opinion is one of the most important lessons from this course since the utilization of templates is very important for it can help to save a lot of modeling time.
Among the topics covered are: family creation, casework families, embedding families, parameters, layout, template creation and rendering
At the end of this course you will be in the position of put together a layout of a kitchen of any size or style using Revit software. In addition to that you will also be capable of create realistic renders images to present your projects in the most professional fashion.
My name is Marcelo, I am an architect, revit expert and kitchen designer with more than ten years of experience working mainly in the US.
target_audience: Architects, Students, ID, Designers
Architects, Students, ID, Designers

courses.title: Google SketchUp Complete Course
courses.bio: Learn Modeling and Rendering for Architecture and Interior Design
objectives: Mastery of 3D Modeling Techniques
Effective Use of Vegetation and Landscaping Elements
Enhanced Design Thinking
Confidence in Presenting Your Designs
Proficiency in Navigating the 3D Warehouse
Understanding of Design Principles
Development of a Professional Portfolio

Introduction to Google SketchUp: Quiz for Introduction to Google SketchUp
Getting Started with SketchUp: Quiz for Getting Started with SketchUp

requirements: No prerequisites
courses.description:
Are you someone who’s eager to dive into Google SketchUp but feels overwhelmed by where to start or how to advance your skills?
You’re not alone. Whether you’re a beginner frustrated by complex 3D modeling concepts or a designer wanting to add dynamic elements to your projects, finding clear, structured guidance can be a challenge. Google SketchUp is a powerful tool, but many aspiring designers struggle with its intricacies, from understanding basic shapes to adding realistic details like plants, trees, and other essential features.
That’s where our course comes in.
The "Google SketchUp Complete Course" is specifically designed to bridge the gap between novice and pro by taking you through SketchUp’s fundamentals and advanced features in a straightforward, practical manner. You’ll start with the basics, covering everything from navigating the SketchUp interface to drawing and modeling, before moving on to more advanced topics. One of the highlights of the course is our module on Planting and Vegetation, where you’ll explore:
Using the 3D Warehouse for Vegetation: Access a wide variety of plants and trees that you can directly import into your projects, helping you create vibrant, realistic landscapes.
Customizing Plant Components: Make your models unique by modifying plant details to fit the specific needs of your project.
Seasonal and Growth Variations: Elevate your designs by showing how plants look through different seasons or as they grow, giving your work a realistic, dynamic edge.
Meet Your Expert Trainer – Sagrika Saraf
Your guide through this journey is Sagrika Saraf, a highly experienced interior designer with a Master’s degree in Interior Design from Paris. With a portfolio of 70+ projects completed and hundreds of interior designers mentored under her belt, Sagrika brings a wealth of practical, real-world knowledge to the course. Her extensive background and unique teaching approach make it easy for you to grasp SketchUp concepts, transform ideas into detailed designs, and gain confidence in your 3D modeling skills. You’ll benefit not only from her expertise in SketchUp but also from her insights into the design industry, learning how to use the software as a powerful tool in your creative process.
It’s time to turn your ideas into reality.
Enroll in the "Google SketchUp Complete Course" today and start creating professional-grade 3D models with ease. With Sagrika’s guidance, you’ll gain the skills and confidence to use SketchUp effectively for your design projects.
Don’t wait – take the first step towards mastering Google SketchUp and bring your visions to life!
target_audience: Students: Architecture or design students seeking to enhance their skills and gain practical experience with 3D modeling software that is widely used in the industry.
Architects: Professionals looking to enhance their 3D modeling skills and visualize their architectural designs effectively
Interior Designers: Designers seeking to create detailed room layouts and presentations for clients using SketchUp
Landscape Designers: Individuals wanting to incorporate realistic vegetation and landscaping elements into their projects
Engineering Students: Aspiring engineers interested in learning 3D modeling for various applications in their studies and future careers
Educators: Instructors aiming to integrate Google SketchUp into their teaching to help students develop practical design skills.
Business Owners: Entrepreneurs in the design industry wanting to create compelling visual presentations for clients and marketing purposes.

courses.title: Color Psychology in Interior Design and Architecture.
courses.bio: The influence of colors on emotions and behaviour.
objectives: Grasp the psychological impact of colour on human emotions and behaviours.
Understand the factors influencing our perception of colour: Light, Culture, and Time
Gain insights from case studies of effective colour usage in various societal contexts
Analyze the historical significance and impact of specific colours, like red and pink.
Develop strategies for using colour to influence emotions and actions in design projects.
requirements: No prior knowledge of psychology or design is required - beginners are welcome and encouraged!
Note-taking tools for capturing ideas and insights during the course.
courses.description:
Discover the hidden influence of hues in our daily life with our online course, 'Unraveling the Impact of Colour Psychology in Interior Design and Architecture'. Harness the power of colour to shape emotions and behaviour, an often overlooked yet crucial aspect of design.
This course offers an in-depth study divided into three key segments:
Uncovering the Mystery of Colour Impact: We delve into why colours have such a profound effect on our emotions and psyche.
Triad of Colour Perception: This part focuses on the trio of elements that alter our colour interpretation - Light, Culture, and Time.
The Colour Chronicles: We unravel four gripping narratives demonstrating the complex interplay between colour, human emotions, and behaviours, emphasising its tactical application in eliciting specific responses.
Our first tale takes you to Tirana, where Mayor Edi Rama rejuvenated public trust and a sense of belonging by splashing buildings with vibrant hues, a strategy also adopted in parts of the United States.
Next, we explore the sensory deprivation created by an all-white environment, illustrating how critical colour becomes when it's absent for extended periods.
Our third narrative is a fascinating story of the colour red—its uses, its roots, and its powerful influence.
Lastly, we delve into the pink phenomenon of the 70s, a period when this shade was believed to induce calmness, leading to an intriguing trend in prison design.
Take this journey with us to understand how you can integrate colour psychology into your design strategy for more meaningful and impactful spaces.
Additional reading:
Beauty, by Stefan Sagmeister
The secret lives of colour, by Kasia St. Clair
Joyful. The surprising power of ordinary things to create extraordinary happiness.
target_audience: People who wish to understand more about their emotions and behaviour and how they can be influenced by the built environment.

This course is ideal for anyone fascinated by the intersection of psychology and design, especially those working in or aspiring to work in fields related to interior design, architecture, or visual arts. If you're a professional seeking to infuse your projects with a deeper understanding of colour psychology, this course will provide practical insights and applicable case studies.

Equally, students of design or psychology, educators, and enthusiasts with no formal background but a curiosity about how colour shapes our world will find this content illuminating. The course also caters to marketers and brand strategists interested in the psychological impacts of colour in branding and product design.

courses.title: Interior Design and Decorating: Colour Masterclass
courses.bio: Understanding colour and how to use it
objectives: Select the Perfect Colors for Any Space: Confidently choose the ideal color palette for both interior and exterior spaces, tailored to mood, purpose, and style.
Master Color Psychology and Theory: Understand the psychology of color and how to use color theory effectively to create harmonious and impactful designs.
Implement Professional Painting Techniques: Learn time-saving painting tips, tricks, and techniques to achieve a flawless finish and save money on your projects
Create Stress-Free and Joyful Environments: Use de-stressing colors and the right combinations to design spaces that promote calmness, positivity, & well-being
requirements: Come with an open mind and excitement to dive into an engaging, hands-on journey into the world of color and design.
Bring along some paper and your favorite pen or pencil to jot down ideas and complete fun activities.
A love for interior decorating or simply a curiosity to create beautiful spaces—no prior experience needed, just your enthusiasm!
courses.description:
This course is designed for anyone who wants to master the art of choosing and combining colors with confidence. Whether you're a homeowner looking to refresh your space, a decorator wanting to refine your skills, or someone interested in the psychology behind color, this course has you covered.
We start with the basics—understanding the color wheel, color theory, and how different shades impact emotions and mood. You’ll learn how to create harmonious color combinations, choose the right hues for every space, and avoid costly mistakes when selecting paint. If you’ve ever struggled with picking the perfect color or felt overwhelmed by too many choices, this course will give you the tools and knowledge to make informed decisions.
Beyond just theory, we dive into practical application. From de-stressing colors to color tricks for selling your property, we explore how to use color effectively for different purposes. Plus, you'll gain insider tips from professional painters on how to save money and achieve the best results.
By the end of the course, you'll confidently create beautiful, cohesive color schemes, understand the emotional impact of color, and have the skills to transform any space—whether for yourself or your clients.   The best thing about this course is that you are going to have fun while learning.
target_audience: This course is for anyone passionate about interior decorating, whether you're a beginner exploring the basics of color or a seasoned decorator looking to refine your skills. If you want to create stunning color schemes, understand the psychology of color, or confidently choose the perfect paint for any space, this course is for you. Whether you're designing your own home, helping clients, or dreaming of becoming a color consultant, you'll gain the knowledge and tools to bring your vision to life.

Apply practical design strategies to create efficient and patient-friendly clinic interiors
Evaluate how layout, materials, lighting, and furniture choices affect healthcare spaces
Design functional interiors for small and medium-sized clinics, including dental clinics, diagnostic centres, and pediatric clinics
Collaborate effectively with doctors and healthcare professionals to meet medical design requirements
Follow a step-by-step process of real-world clinic interior design — from concept planning to final execution
requirements: No prior experience in clinic design is needed — beginners are welcome
Useful for doctors and healthcare professionals planning to set up or renovate a clinic
Ideal for students, fresh graduates, or professionals in architecture, interior design, or healthcare
Curiosity about how real-world clinics are designed for function, comfort, and aesthetics
courses.description:
If you're an architect, interior designer, or healthcare professional looking to create efficient, welcoming clinical spaces, this course is for you. Designing the interiors of clinics isn’t just about aesthetics—it’s about getting the functionality right, understanding how doctors and patients move through the space, and creating an environment that feels safe, clean, and comfortable.
In this course, I’ll walk you through my actual clinic projects—including dental clinics and diagnostic centers—and break down the full design process from start to finish. We’ll look at how to plan layouts, approach zoning, pick the right materials, and make sure even the smallest details work well in real-world settings.
You’ll learn how to:
Plan layouts that support smooth patient and staff flow
Design zoning strategies for hygiene and privacy
Select appropriate materials for durability and cleanliness
Create lighting plans that are both functional and calming
Choose and arrange furniture to maximize space
Balance warmth and function for a welcoming feel
Apply design principles to different clinic types and scales
The goal is to give you a practical framework you can apply to your own work—whether you’re working independently, part of a team, or just starting to explore this niche. This course is designed to be clear, grounded, and experience-based. No fluff—just real insights you can use.
By the end, you’ll be able to confidently take on clinic interiors that are not only beautiful but truly work.
target_audience: Doctors and clinic owners who want to design or upgrade their clinics
Architecture and design students interested in real-world healthcare projects
Freelancers looking to specialize in medical interior design

courses.title: Quintessential Interior Styling
courses.bio: Learn about various elements, aspects, and essentials of Interior Styling, Home Staging, and Property Styling.
objectives: 1. What is Interior Styling, its significance and applications
2. What is the difference between Interior Designing and Interior Styling
3. What are Elements and Principles of Styling, Types of Styling - Residential and Commercial
4. What are Interior Styling Essentials - Color Selection, Materials, Finishes, Visual Communication
5. What is the significance of Interior Styling in Home Staging and Property Styling
requirements: Open to all learners
courses.description:
Did you know that the use of natural elements like plants, flowers, stones, pebbles, and soil in a space can improve your productivity!?
“Monday Blues,” is a term which is a commonly used term by corporate professionals. However, did you know blue is one of the most preferred colours that boosts productivity, creativity, and happiness at work as well as at home!?
Adding furniture and accessories to any space may not beautify it. To make aesthetically pleasing and usable, it needs diligent attention to detail and knowledge of what fits best where. Only then can we say that a space has achieved its maximum productivity and then, can it benefit the users and give the space its perfect look and feel.
Do you know what is the difference between Interior Designing and Interior Styling and what is its scope of career? Do you want to learn how important visual communication is in Styling, and how to be present your ideas effectively to a client? Do you want to help clients in staging a property for resale or rent? Have you ever found yourself asking the question what are the different types of interior design styles?
May be you want to switch up your style but can’t decide which direction to go in. A good foundation in interior design and styling basics and principles can have a huge effect on the look and feel of a space. Throughout this module, students will learn Quintessential Interior Styling.
target_audience: 1. Anyone who wants to learn about Interior Styling and its various applications
2. Aspiring and professional artists, students, architects, interior decorators, interior designers, interior stylists, art directors and set designers
3. Enthusiasts who want to pursue a career in different domains of Interior Design
4. For all entry level to advanced Interior Designers, Interior Stylists, Interior Decorators, Architects, Set Designers, and other enthusiasts

Welcome to the "3Ds Max Interior Design Modeling Masterclass"!
Are you passionate about interior design and eager to bring your creative ideas to life through 3D models? This comprehensive course is designed to take you from a beginner to a proficient interior design modeler in 3Ds Max.

Whether you're an aspiring interior designer, architect, or a 3D enthusiast looking to expand your skill set, this course is the perfect starting point.
Our experienced instructors will guide you through every step of the process, starting with the basics of 3Ds Max interface and navigation. You'll then dive into foundational modeling techniques, learning how to craft precise and accurate 3D representations of various interior elements like furniture, decor, fixtures, and architectural elements.
As you progress, you'll tackle more complex challenges, refining your skills to create intricate details and intricate structures. You'll explore a wide array of modeling tools, modifiers, and shortcuts, empowering you to efficiently build complex scenes while maintaining optimal workflow.
Throughout the course, you'll have the opportunity to work on practical projects and real-life scenarios, applying what you've learned to design compelling interior spaces. By the end of the "3Ds Max Interior Design Modeling Masterclass," you will possess the expertise to produce stunning and realistic 3D models that captivate clients, colleagues, or potential employers. Join us and unleash your creativity in the world of interior design modeling with 3Ds Max.

objectives: Come modellare passo passo una Chaise Longue in 3ds max.

requirements: 3ds max 2016 e superiore
courses.description:
Note: We recommend viewing videos on Edge browser, please note that Google Chrome may experience interruptions, thank you.
Nota: Si consiglia di visualizzare i video su browser Edge, abbiano notato che su Google Chrome si possono verificare interruzioni, grazie.
Argomenti: modellazione tramite tecniche spline, poligonale e modificatori di elementi di arredo e design, creazione di coordinate di mapping tramite unwrap, creazione di materiali in V-ray e mental ray, creazione di materiali in iray, comparazione e rendering tra V-ray, Mental ray e iray.
Esercizi multipli per diverse tecniche di modellazione degli stessi oggetti per una vasta panoramica delle tecniche disponibili.
In questo corso utilizzeremo le seguenti tecniche di modellazione: Costruzione Spline base, Outline ed Estrusione Spline, Symmetry ed edit Poly, Bucare e Smussare la geometria, utilizzo Shell Spessore, creazione estrusioni Poligonale.
Allegate alle lezioni sono disponibili i file di esercizio di 3ds max 2016 impostati per il motore di render Mental Ray compatibili fino a 3ds max 2017 ed i file di esercizio di 3ds max 2016 e 2017 impostati per il motore di render Vray compatibile con le relase superiori di 3ds max.
Nota: i file di esercizio sono allegati alla lezione 3dsmax_002_Costruzione Spline base
Aggiornamenti: sono stati aggiunti i file di esercizio per 3ds max 2020 impostati per Vray.
Il vostro insegnate Marcello Pattarin: Si è laureato all'Accademia di Belle Arti di Brera, diplomato alla scuola d'arte superiore applicata all'industria del Castello Sforzesco di Milano, diplomato al Liceo Artistico Primo di Milano, specializzato in illustrazione pubblicitaria, architettonica, si è specializzato nella creazione di video corsi per 3ds max, creazione contenuti 3D e Beta Tester per 3ds max e Iray Nvidia.
Con ventennale esperienza nell'utilizzo del software per modellazione, rendering animazione e Fx è stata la prima realtà italiana a realizzare video corsi dedicati al Rendering e successive produzioni, oggi arrivate a più di 5000 video lezioni, distribuite sui più importanti siti di grafica 3D internazionali.
target_audience: 3D Artist, Modellatori 3D, Studenti, Insegnati, Designer

courses.description:
Join me and start gaining the re-upholstery skills you've always wanted.
The Ultimate Guide to Recovering Dining Room Chairs will give you skills that will stand up to professional work. This course will enhance or give you skills in the world of re-upholstery or your money back
The course is your track to obtaining re-upholstery skills like you always knew you should have! Whether for your own projects or to re-upholster for other people.
This course will take you from having little knowledge of upholstery to re-covering your own pieces and having a better understanding of upholstery fundamentals.
So what else is in it for you?
I’ll show you how to re-upholster three different styles of dining room chairs and in the process, transform your skill level.
You’ll gain instant access to all 6 sections of the course.
The course is setup to quickly take you through, step by step, the process of re-upholstering three different chairs of different styles and will equip you with the knowledge to create stunning pieces of furniture!
Don’t believe me? I offer a full money back guarantee within the first 30 days of purchasing the course.
Here’s what you get with the course:
Within the 6 sections of the course you will obtain the fundamentals of upholstery from the ground up. The course is supported with over 4.5 hours of clear content that I walk you through each step of the way.
I’ll walk you through the tools you’ll need throughout the course.
I’ll show you where to find and how to choose a chair with good bones.
I’ll teach you the tricks of the trade as we disassemble your chair and help you keep track of your pieces.
Then we’ll make a full assessment of your chair; going over what components can be reused and what supplies you will need.
I’ll go over what your options are for refinishing or just touching up those exposed wooden portions.
I’ll discuss what kinds of fabrics you will need and how much you should get.
We’ll discuss fabric textures, what a nap is and why it's important, and I’ll even show you how to determine how much fabric you will need for each chair.
And then finally I’ll walk you through step by step the process of re-upholstering your chairs.
What else will you get?
Lifetime access to course materials
Understanding of how professional upholstery is created
Quizzes and check lists
This all comes under one convenient easy to use platform. Plus you will get fast, friendly, responsive support on the Udemy Q&A section of the course or direct message.
I will be here for you every step of the way!
So what are you waiting for? Sign up now and change your world today!
Who is the target audience?
Students wanting to learn how to re-upholster
Students willing to put in a couple hours per chair to learn how to re-upholster
Students willing to take action and start creating their own beautiful pieces of furniture
Students wanting to add another skill to their tool belt.

courses.title: Experto Diseño Espacios de Salud, Bienestar, Relajación SPA
courses.bio: Conviértete en un Profesional en la Creación de Proyectos destinados a la Salud y el Bienestar de las Personas.
objectives: Obtener los conocimientos suficientes para abordar la tarea de planificar adecuadamente un proyecto de diseño.
Este curso explora cómo diseñar espacios que promuevan la salud y el bienestar, incluyendo gimnasios en casa, estudios de yoga y espacios de meditación.
Capacidad para otorgar un carácter diferenciador al espacio, mediante el dominio de los registros sensibles de la luz, los materiales, y el color.
Dotar al estudiante de los conocimientos y las técnicas de representación para presentar un proyecto visualmente ordenado y valido para su posterior ejecución..
Planificar circuitos termales: sauna, hammam, piscinas, duchas experiencia y áreas de relax con capacidad y recorridos óptimos.
Zoning húmedo/seco y flujos de usuarios; vestuarios, back-of-house y limpieza separados para operaciones eficientes.
Este curso se centra en cómo crear espacios que promuevan la curación y el bienestar, desde consultorios médicos hasta centros de bienestar y spas.
Seleccionar materiales higiénicos y antideslizantes; juntas, pendientes y resistencia química aptas para zonas húmedas.
Diseñar HVAC/ventilación: control de humedad y CO₂, renovación de aire, recuperación térmica y confort higrotérmico.
Tratar el agua: filtración, desinfección, balance químico y prevención de legionela, con protocolos de mantenimiento.
Iluminación wellness por capas: CCT/CRI adecuados, luminarias IP, escenas regulables y control circadiano para calma.
Acústica: tiempos de reverberación, materiales fonoabsorbentes y control de ruido de equipos y voces.
Accesibilidad y seguridad: recorridos, antideslizantes, barandillas, emergencias, IP/eléctrico y señalética clara.
Especificar FF&E: cabinas, hidromasaje, lockers, duchas y mobiliario; flujo de servicio y almacenaje.
Documentar proyecto: planos, detalles, memorias, presupuesto y KPIs de ROI/OPEX; renders que venden la propuesta.

courses.description:
Experto Diseño Espacios de Salud, Bienestar, Relajación y SPA
Conviértete en un Profesional en la Creación de Proyectos destinados a la Salud y el Bienestar de las Personas.
Instructores: Arq. Álvaro García y Arq. Lucía Fernández. Actualizado: Octubre del 2025 Estudiantes: +3.600 Requisitos previos: Ninguno


Descripción del Curso:
Diseña experiencias de salud, bienestar y relajación SPA con criterio técnico y sensibilidad estética. En este curso experto de diseño de spas y wellness aprenderás a planificar circuitos termales (sauna, hammam, duchas experiencia, piscinas), hidroterapia, materiales higiénicos y antideslizantes, iluminación y acústica para calma, ventilación/HVAC y tratamiento de agua. Dominarás flujos de usuarios, accesibilidad, zonificación (húmedo/seco), brand experience y detalles que elevan el confort y la rentabilidad del proyecto.
Impartido en Udemy y apto para todas las edades y niveles, es 100% práctico: plantillas, checklists, FF&E, guías de mantenimiento y casos reales (hotel, club, day spa). Saldrás con renders y documentación listos para cliente y proveedor, criterios de normativa y seguridad, y un método replicable para crear espacios wellness sostenibles que reducen retrabajos y aumentan el valor percibido de cada proyecto. Si buscas un curso de diseño de spas que una técnica y emoción, aquí tienes tu atajo.
En su día los spas eran todo un lujo, pero hoy son un standard en todo hotel que se precie. Las nuevas tendencias en el cuidado personal están provocando una poderosa revolución en cómo se plantean estos espacios. Durante años, al igual que los gimnasios, se les otorgaba las plantas menos favorecidas o zonas sin grandes vistas. Hoy eso es impensable, el diseño ha pasado a ser la clave principal. Este curso cubre cómo diseñar espacios que promuevan la salud física y mental, incluyendo la elección de colores, la iluminación, la ventilación y otros factores. Este curso cubre el diseño de hospitales, clínicas, consultorios médicos y otras instalaciones de salud, con un enfoque en la creación de espacios que apoyen la recuperación del paciente.
El diseño de un spa requiere de una atención particular en la organización y distribución de los espacios. Es necesario garantizar un ambiente cómodo para el usuario y no detenerse solo en el efecto escénico de las formas.
Cuando se diseña un spa es necesario tener en cuenta múltiples aspectos normativos que van de la regulación de las características funcionales y organizativas de una estructura (iluminación, temperatura en el interior de la misma, calidad del aire, etc.) hasta la seguridad de los usuarios y trabajadores que viven dichos espacios (vías de escape, seguridad y salud de los trabajadores, etc.).
En el diseño de un spa es posible incluir diferentes funciones. Es posible catalogar estas funciones en:  Wellness (sauna, baño turco, sala de masajes, etc.), Fitness (gimnasio), Servicios accesorios (vestuario, WC), Servicios al cliente (bar, restaurante, recepción, etc.)

Objetivos del curso:
Dominar el diseño de espacios wellness y SPA de principio a fin: circuito termal (sauna, hammam, duchas experiencia, piscinas), zoning húmedo/seco y flujos de usuarios; HVAC/ventilación, tratamiento de agua y control de legionela; iluminación por capas (CCT/CRI), acústica, materiales higiénicos y antideslizantes y accesibilidad. Aprenderás a elaborar planos, detalles, FF&E, presupuestos y protocolos de mantenimiento con enfoque en seguridad, confort y sostenibilidad.


Salidas profesionales:
Te capacita para roles como Wellness/SPA Designer, Interiorista Hospitality, Consultor de balnearios/health clubs o Project Coordinator en hoteles, resorts, clubs deportivos y clínicas. Podrás presentar renders y documentación que cumplen normativa, optimizan OPEX y mejoran ROI (capacidad, rotación, satisfacción), tanto en freelance como en estudios y cadenas hoteleras.


Dirigido a:
Arquitectos, interioristas, ingenieros HVAC, operadores hoteleros, gestores de gimnasios/centros médicos y estudiantes que deseen crear espacios de salud y relajación con estándar profesional. Formato Udemy, con plantillas, checklists y casos reales para aplicar desde el primer día y elevar el valor percibido de cada proyecto.


Metodología de Aprendizaje:
Recuerda que este curso incluye lecciones en vídeo fullHD con audio de estudio (compatible con TV, PC, Mac, tablet y smartphone), artículos didácticos, actividades, animaciones, ilustraciones, proyectos paso a paso, recursos descargables, links de interés, acceso de por vida, certificado de finalización, tutorización online, y una exclusiva comunidad de aprendizaje privada que nos ayudamos aportando nuestras experiencias en el foro de comunicación del curso.
La modalidad de este curso te permite que empieces y acabes cuando tú quieras, marcando el ritmo de la clase según tu disponibilidad. Puedes volver a visualizar lo que te interese, saltar el contenido que ya domines, hacer preguntas, resolver dudas, compartir tus proyectos... Puedes elegir ver todas las lecciones de forma secuencial (lineal) y aprovecharlas al máximo la formación, pero también puedes decidir ver este curso como una guía de referencia.
Las clases están claramente organizadas en secciones y lecciones, puedes decidir visualizar solo las clases que te resulten más importantes según tus necesidades formativas. La mayoría de las lecciones son independientes para que puedas comprender los conceptos de cada lección sin tener que ver las lecciones anteriores del curso.
Para seguir el programa formativo propuesto no ser requieren conocimientos previos, ya que la formación se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0. El curso está orientado a aquellos creativos que quieran ampliar sus skills (habilidades) y conocer múltiples trucos, consejos, recursos y recomendaciones, de la mano de los instructores Álvaro García y Lucía Fernández. Además la formación disponen de acceso automático al contenido, sin limitación de tiempo, disponibilidad 24/7 (24 horas al día los 7 días de la semana), sin caducidad y con garantía de devolución.
Con esta formación disfrutarás aprendiendo desde dónde quieras, sin tener que desplazarte, sin horarios, con quién quieras, según tus necesidades y disponibilidad. Aprenderás con un instructor avalado por miles da alumnos satisfechos en todo el mundo (comentarios certificados). Conocerás las técnicas, métodos, trucos y flujos de trabajo de este sector creativo. El docente te transmitirá su sabiduría y conocimientos con pasión a la vez que las explicaciones concisas, claras, sencillas y con un enfoque profesional en cada clase. Podrás conseguir un  certificado homologado personalizado y firmado por tu instructor en cada formación. De está forma podrás compartir tu título en tu portafolio, currículo, en redes sociales...
Con la alta definición de los vídeos (vídeo fullHD y audio de estudio) conseguirá no te perder detalle. Podrás ver las clases las veces que requieras para recordar y perfeccionar tus habilidades como diseñador. Tendrás la posibilidad de preguntar, pedir opinión y ayuda al instructor, además de compartir tu experiencia de aprendizaje con los demás alumnos del curso, tan apasionados como tú, repartidos por todo el mundo. Seleccionamos cuidadosamente los contenidos y producimos cada curso para garantizar una experiencia de aprendizaje online integral y de la máxima calidad.


¿A qué esperas?, este curso es ideal para ti, atrévete a convertirte en un experto y expresa tus ideas de la forma que siempre has deseado. Adelante, nos vemos dentro de la formación ;)

Basic knowledge of computer use and file handling.
Interest in 3D modeling, architecture, or design.
No prior experience in SketchUp or V-Ray required—this course starts from zero.
courses.description:
Master the art of 3D design with this FREE SketchUp + V-Ray course in Hindi, designed especially for beginners. This course takes you step by step through the essentials of SketchUp for creating 3D models and teaches you how to bring them to life with realistic rendering in V-Ray. No prior experience is required—just a computer and your willingness to learn!
You’ll start by learning how to navigate the SketchUp interface, set up your workspace, and use drawing and modification tools to create accurate 3D models. From basic objects to complex structures, you’ll gain the confidence to model anything you imagine.
Once your models are ready, you’ll explore V-Ray for SketchUp, one of the most powerful rendering tools in the industry. You’ll learn how to apply realistic materials, adjust lighting, set up cameras, and render professional-quality images. By combining SketchUp’s modeling capabilities with V-Ray’s rendering power, you’ll be able to produce stunning visuals that look ready for presentation.
By the end of this course, you will be able to:
Navigate and customize the SketchUp interface with ease
Create accurate 3D models step by step
Apply textures, materials, and components for detailed designs
Use V-Ray to create realistic lighting and rendering effects
Produce professional-quality rendered images for real-world projects
Whether you’re a student, architect, interior designer, or hobbyist, this course will help you quickly gain the essential skills for 3D modeling and rendering. Start your journey today and bring your creative ideas to life!
target_audience: Beginners who want to learn SketchUp and V-Ray in Hindi.
Architecture, interior design, or engineering students looking to build 3D skills.

Hobbyists or freelancers exploring 3D design as a career path.
Anyone who wants to design and render realistic 3D models efficiently.

Descripción del Curso:
Impulsa tu perfil con el “MÁSTER Arquitectura de Interiores, Interiorismo y Decoración”, una formación en Udemy para crear espacios funcionales y bellos con criterio profesional. Aprenderás una metodología integral: del briefing al proyecto ejecutivo, investigación del usuario, concepto y storytelling, moodboards, color y materiales, iluminación por capas, ergonomía y distribución, además de documentación técnica, renders y presupuesto listos para obra. Todo 100% online, a tu ritmo y desde cualquier país, apto para todas las edades y niveles.
Al finalizar, tendrás un portfolio sólido con proyectos residenciales, comerciales y hospitality, plantillas descargables y procesos que mejoran la comunicación con clientes. Te posiciona en búsquedas como interiorismo online, arquitectura de interiores y diseño de interiores profesional, aumentando tu visibilidad y oportunidades. Obtén un certificado de finalización en Udemy y da el salto de aficionado a especialista capaz de planificar, presentar y ejecutar propuestas con seguridad. Inscríbete y empieza a diseñar con impacto.
Con este Máster en Diseño de Interiores, Reformas y Decoración, adquirirás los conocimientos teóricos y las competencias necesarias para desarrollar una profesión de futuro, como es la de diseño de interiores. Es la formación que se necesita para especializarse en el sector y encontrar un empleo que supere las expectativas.
El sector del diseño y la decoración, así como sus oficios y profesiones, están íntimamente relacionados con el mundo artístico y de la creación. Si te planteas formar parte de este ámbito en plena expansión y quieres potenciar tus inquietudes artísticas, no pierdas la oportunidad de estudiar diseño de interiores. Con la formación específica que te presentamos podrás adquirir todos los conocimientos necesarios para dedicarte profesionalmente al sector del interiorismo.
El Máster en Diseño del Espacio Interior está dirigido a estudiantes que deseen especializarse en diseño de espacios interiores arquitectónicos. El Máster se enfoca en mejorar el espacio interior con un carácter distintivo y un significado apropiado, subrayando sus sensibilidades inherentes (luz, color, materiales, texturas, etc.) y también proporcionándole condiciones de uso adecuadas.
Adquiere los conocimientos que todo apasionado de la decoración desearía encontrar recopilados en un solo curso. Aprenderás a reconocer y aplicar los diferentes estilos decorativos que existen, combinar textiles, elegir el mobiliario adecuado en cada estancia, saber aplicar la gama de color correcta y reconocer el mobiliario de diseño que tantas veces has visto en las revistas de decoración.


Itinerario Formativo:
Introducción a la plataforma de formación Udemy
Bienvenida al MÁSTER Arquitectura de Interiores, Interiorismo y Decoración
Historia, Tendencias Actuales y Referencias

Mobiliario, Iluminación y Atrezzo

Dibujo 2D Asistido por Ordenador con AutoCAD en Diseño de Interiores
Modelado 3D de Proyectos de Diseño de Interiores
Renderizado de Imágenes Fotorrealistas de nuestros Diseño de Interiores

Maquetación, Presentación y Documentación Técnica de Nuestras Propuestas de Diseño de Interiores
Medición y Presupuesto de la Ejecución Material del Proyecto
Creación de un CV y Portfolio Creativo Impreso y Digital
